original: Tattha abhivādetabba bhāvoti navattabbaṃ. Abhivāditabhāvoti pana abhivādananti vā

original: vattabbaṃ. Evañhi sati idha adhippetassa kriyā samavāyassa siddhattā dhammasaṅghānaṃpi
analyzed: vattabbam evam hi sati idha adhippetassa kriyā samavāyassa siddha ttā dhamma saṅghānam pi

original: therassa vandanā kriyāpatti siddhā hotīti. Itarathā tabbapaccayassa arahatthadīpanato
analyzed: therassa vandanā kriyā āpatti siddhā hoti iti itarathā tabba paccayassa arahattha dīpanato

original: abhivādanā rahatā saṅkhāta guṇasamavāyo vutto siyā. Soca idha nādhippeto. Attano
analyzed: abhivādanā raha tā saṅkhāta guṇa samavāyo vuttaḥ siyā so ca idha na adhippetaḥ attanaḥ

original: nidassanena ca saha na sameti saputtadāro āgatoti.
analyzed: nidassanena ca saha na sameti sa putta dāraḥ āgataḥ ti

original: Apica thero imaṃ ganthaṃ racayissāmīti pubbabhāgeyeva tīṇi ratanāni vandi, atha taṃ
analyzed: apica theraḥ imam gantham racayissāmi iti tīṇi ratanāni vandi atha tam

original: attano vandanaṃ ganthappaṭiññāya saha ghaṭetvā dassento imaṃ gāthaṃ racayītipi na
analyzed: attanaḥ vandanam gantha ppaṭiññāya saha ghaṭetvā dassentaḥ imam gātham racayi iti pi na

original: na sakkā vattunti. Tathāhi abhivādiyāti vuttaṃ. Na abhivādiyāmīti. Esanayo aññatthapi.
analyzed: na sakkā vattunti tathā hi abhivādiya ati vuttam na abhivādiyāmi iti esa nayaḥ aññattha api

original: Tattha saddhammena ca gaṇuttamena ca attanā nimmitena sakalalokassa saraṇabhūtena
analyzed: tattha saddhammena ca gaṇuttamena ca attanā nimmitena sakala lokassa saraṇa bhūtena

original: saha vattatīti sasaddhamma gaṇuttamo. Sammāsambuddho. Na hi paranimmitena saddhammena
analyzed: saha vattati iti sa saddhamma gaṇuttamaḥ sammāsambuddhaḥ na hi para nimmitena saddhammena

original: gaṇuttamena ca sahitā sāvakā sasaddhammāti ca sagaṇuttamāti ca vuccanti. Na ca attanoeva
analyzed: gaṇuttamena ca sahitā sāvakā sa saddhammā ati ca sa gaṇuttamā ati ca vuccanti na ca attano eva

original: saraṇabhūtena saddhammena sabrahmacārigaṇuttamena ca sahitā paccekabuddhā tathā thomanaṃ
analyzed: saraṇa bhūtena saddhammena sabrahmacāri gaṇuttamena ca sahitā paccekabuddhā tathā thomanam

original: arahantīti, tasmā idaṃpi satthu asādhāraṇaguṇapadameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: arahanti iti tasmai idam pi satthu asādhāraṇa guṇa padam eva hoti iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Tattha dhāretīti dhammo. Ke dhāreti, attānaṃ dhārente. Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti
analyzed: tattha dhāreti iti dhammaḥ ke dhāreti attānam dhārente dhammaḥ have rakkhati dhamma cārin ti

original: hi vuttaṃ. Kathañca dhāreti, catūsu apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesuca apatamāne karonto. Kiñca
analyzed: hi vuttam katham ca dhāreti catūsu apāyesu vaṭṭa dukkhesu ca a patamāne karontaḥ kiñca

original: dhāraṇaṃnāma, yesaṃ vasena sattā apāyesuvā vaṭṭadukkhesuvā patanti, tesaṃ kilesānaṃ
analyzed: dhāraṇam nāma yesam vasena sattāḥ apāyesu vā vaṭṭa dukkhesu vā patanti tesam kilesānam

original: ekadesenavā sabbasovā samucchindanaṃ. Imasmiṃ atthe cattāro ariyamaggā nibbānañca
analyzed: eka desena vā sabbasas vā samucchindanam imasmin atthe cattāro ariya maggāḥ nibbānañca

original: nippariyāyato dhammonāma. Ariyamaggā hi kilese samucchindantā nibbānena saheva hutvā
analyzed: nippariyāyataḥ dhammaḥ nāma ariya maggāḥ hi kilese samucchindantāḥ nibbānena saha iva hutvā

original: samucchindanti. Na vināti, tasmā teyeva pañca ekantato dhammonāmāti. Pariyattidhammo
analyzed: samucchindanti na tasmā teya iva pañca ekantataḥ dhammo nāma ati pariyatti dhammo

original: pana dhāraṇupāyoyeva hoti. Cattāri sāmaññaphalānica dhāraṇaphalāniyeva honti, kilesānaṃ
analyzed: pana dhāraṇa upāyaḥ yā iva hoti cattāri sāmañña phalāni ca dhāraṇa phalāniyā iva honti kilesānaṃ

original: paṭippassambhanavasena pavattattā dhāraṇānukūlappavattāni ca. Tasmā ete pañca pariyāyadhammāyevāti.
analyzed: paṭippassambhana vasena pavatta ttā dhāraṇa anukūla ppavattāni ca tasmai ete pañca pariyāya dhammāya eva ati

original: Athavā, dhārīyatīti dhammo. Dhāraṇārahoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo hi dhārentaṃ ekantena dukkhato
analyzed: athavā dhārīyati iti dhammaḥ dhāraṇā raho ti vuttam hoti yaḥ hi dhārentam ekantena dukkhato

original: moceti. Aggasukheca patiṭṭhāpeti. Soyeva dhāraṇārahattā idha dhammonāmāti. Kopana
analyzed: moceti agga sukhe ca patiṭṭhāpeti saḥ yā iva dhāraṇā raha ttā idha dhammonāma ati kopana

original: soti, yathā puttadhammāyeva. Tehi keci bhāvanā vasena keci sacchikiriyavasena keci
analyzed: saḥ ti yathā putta dhammāya iva tehi keci bhāvanā vasena keci sacchikiriya vasena keci

original: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāravasena keci uggaha dhāraṇavasena dhārīyanti. Te ca evaṃ dhārīyamānā
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra vasena keci uggaha dhāraṇa vasena dhārīyanti te ca evam dhārīyamānā

original: dhārentaṃ yathārahaṃ apāyadukkhato vaṭṭadukkhatoca mocenti, aggeca phalasukhevā nibbānasukhevā
analyzed: dhārentam yathāraham apāya dukkhataḥ vaṭṭa dukkhataḥ ca mocenti agge ca phala sukhā iva nibbāna sukhā iva

original: patiṭṭhāpentīti. Dhārentivā sappurisājanā apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesuca attānaṃ apata mānaṃ
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpenti iti dhārenti vā sappurisa ajanāḥ apāyesu vaṭṭa dukkhesu ca attānam apata mānam

original: vahanti etenāti dhammo. Dharantivā ettha dhammadīpā dhammappaṭisaraṇā janā laddhappatiṭṭhā
analyzed: vahanti etena ati dhammaḥ dharanti vā ettha dhamma dīpāḥ dhamma ppaṭisaraṇāḥ janāḥ laddha patiṭṭhā

original: hontīti dhammotipi yujjatiyeva. Kasmā panettha dhammo dasavidhova vutto. Nanu paṭipattidhammena
analyzed: honti iti dhammaḥ ti pi kasmā pana ittha dhammaḥ dasavidhaḥ iva vuttaḥ nanu paṭipatti dhammena

original: saha ekādasavidhova vattabboti. Saccaṃ. Sopana paṭipattidhammo maggassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāeva
analyzed: saha ekādasavidhaḥ va vattabbaḥ ti saccam so pana paṭipatti dhammo maggassa pubbabhāga paṭipadā eva

original: hotīti pubbacetanā viya dāne magge eva so saṅgahito. Tasmā dhammo dasavidhova sabbattha vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: hoti iti pubba cetanā viya dāne magge eva so saṅgahitaḥ tasmā dhammo dasavidhaḥ iva sabbattha vuttaḥ ti daṭṭhabbaḥ

original: Apica, yadaggena pariyattidhammo idha dhammasmiṃ saṅgahito. Tadaggena pariyattidhārakopi
analyzed: apica yad aggena pariyatti dhammo idha dhammasmim saṅgahito tad aggena pariyatti dhārakaḥ api

original: saṅghe vandaneyye saṅgahitoti yutto. Yadaggenaca puthujjanakalyāṇako saṅghe sekkhesu
analyzed: saṅghe vandaneyye saṅgahito ti yuttaḥ yad aggena ca puthujjana kalyāṇako saṅghe sekkhesu

original: saṅgahito. Tadaggena tassa kalyāṇahetubhūto paṭipatti dhammopi dhamme vandaneyye
analyzed: saṅgahitaḥ tad aggena tassa kalyāṇa hetu bhūto paṭipatti dhammaḥ api dhamme vandaneyye

original: saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo. So hi puthujjanabhūtopi yehi dhammehi samannāgatattā sekhe
analyzed: saṅgahito ti daṭṭhabbo saḥ hi puthujjana bhūtaḥ api yehi dhammehi samannāgata ttā sekhe

original: sotāpatti phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahito. Te pana dhammā sekkhe sotāpattimagge
analyzed: sotāpatti phala sacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahito te pana dhammā sekkhe sotāpatti magge

original: asaṅgahitāti nasakkā vattunti. Ettāvatā ye vadanti saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti, ettha
analyzed: a saṅgahitā ati na sakkā vattum ti ettāvatā ye vadanti saṅgham saraṇam gacchāmi iti ettha

original: puthujjana kalyāṇako saṅghe asaṅgahito. Na hi taṃsaraṇaṃ gacchantassa saraṇagamanaṃ
analyzed: puthujjana kalyāṇakaḥ saṅghe a saṅgahitaḥ na hi tat saraṇam gacchantassa saraṇa gamanam

original: sampajjatīti. Tesaṃ taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hoti. Evaṃ pana vattabbo, yo vo ānanda mayā
analyzed: sampajjati iti tesam tam paṭikkhittam hoti evam pana vattabbo yaḥ vaḥ ānanda mayā

original: dhammoca vinayoca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthāti evaṃ satthuṭhāne thapetvā
analyzed: dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto saḥ vaḥ mamaccayena satthā ti evam satthu ṭhāne thapetvā

original: bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇito pariyattidhammo dhammasaraṇe saṅgahitoti yutto, taṃ dhārentopana
analyzed: bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitaḥ pariyatti dhammaḥ dhamma saraṇe saṅgahitaḥ iti yuttaḥ tam

original: kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitopi atthi. Aṭṭhitopi atthi. Yo aṭṭhito, so attanopi saraṇaṃ
analyzed: kalyāṇa ppaṭipattiyam ṭhitaḥ api atthi a ṭhitaḥ api atthi yaḥ a ṭhitaḥ saḥ attanaḥ pi saraṇam

original: nahoti. Kuto parassa. Satthārā ca anekesu suttasahassesu so garahito. Tasmā so saṅghasaraṇe
analyzed: na hoti kutas parassa satthārā ca anekesu sutta sahassesu saḥ garahitaḥ tasmā so saṅgha saraṇe

original: asaṅgahito. Itarova saṅgahitoti yuttoti.
analyzed: a saṅgahitaḥ saṅgahitaḥ iti yuttaḥ iti

original: Santānaṃ dhammoti saddhammo. Samitakilesānaṃ tatoyeva pasatthānaṃ pūjitānaṃ sappurisānaṃ
analyzed: santānam dhammo ti saddhammo samita kilesānam tatas yeva pasatthānam pūjitānam sappurisānam

original: paṇḍitānañca dhammoti attho. Yoca santānaṃ dhammo, sopi ekantena santoyeva hotīti
analyzed: paṇḍitānam ca dhammo ti attho yaḥ ca santānam dhammo saḥ api ekantena santaḥ yā iva hoti iti

original: santo dhammotipi saddhammo. Pasattho pūjito dhammoti attho. Sacco vā. Ayañhi aññatitthiyadhammo
analyzed: santaḥ dhammo tipi sat dhammo pasattho pūjitaḥ dhammo ti attho saccaḥ vā ayam hi añña titthiya dhammo

original: viya dhārentaṃ navisaṃvādeti. So hi ayaṃ me hitoti dhārentassa ahitoyeva sampajjati.
analyzed: viya dhārentam so hi ayam me hitaḥ iti dhārentassa sampajjati

original: Ayaṃ pana tathādhārentassa hitoyeva sampajjatīti. [Saddhammapadaṃ]. Gaṇuttamapade
analyzed: ayam pana tathā ādhārentassa hitoyā iva sampajjati iti saddhammapadam gaṇuttama pade

original: loke samāna diṭṭhisīlānaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ samūho gaṇoti vuccati. Idha pana uttamehi
analyzed: loke diṭṭhi sīlānam sahadhammikānam samūhaḥ gaṇaḥ ti vuccati idha pana uttamehi

original: sīlādiguṇehi yutto bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho uttamoca so gaṇocāti atthena uttamagaṇonāma.
analyzed: sīla ādi guṇehi yuttaḥ bhagavato sāvaka saṅghaḥ uttamaḥ ca saḥ atthena uttama gaṇaḥ nāma

original: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati yathā muniseṭṭho munivaroti.
analyzed: idha gaṇuttamo ti vuccati yathā muni seṭṭhaḥ muni varaḥ ti

original: [11] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Gaṇānaṃ gaṇesuvā devamanussādisamūhesu uttamo gaṇuttamo”ti ca vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
analyzed: gaṇānam gaṇesu vā deva manussa ādi samūhesu uttamaḥ gaṇuttamaḥ ti ca vuttam tam na sundaram

original: Etasmiñhi atthe sati uttamasaddo padhānabhūto hoti. Soca guṇamhiyeva pavattatīti
analyzed: etasmin hi atthe sati uttama saddo padhāna bhūtaḥ hoti saḥ ca guṇamhiyā iva pavattati iti

original: tena idha ariyasaṅgho vuttoti nasijjhatīti. Etthaca gaṇoti saṅghoyeva vuccati. Soca
analyzed: tena idha ariya saṅghaḥ vutto ti ettha ca gaṇaḥ iti saṅghaḥ yā iva vuccati saḥ ca

original: saṅgho duvidho sammutisaṅgho, dakkhiṇeyyasaṅghoti. Tattha samaggena saṅghena kataṃ
analyzed: saṅghaḥ duvidhaḥ sammuti saṅghaḥ dakkhiṇeyya saṅghaḥ ti tattha samaggena saṅghena katam

original: upasampadākammaṃ sammutināma. Tāya sammutiyā upasampannabhūmiṃ patvā ṭhito bhikkhusaṅgho
analyzed: upasampadā kammam sammuti nāma tāya sammutiyāḥ upasampanna bhūmim patvā ṭhitaḥ bhikkhu saṅghaḥ

original: sammutisaṅghonāma. So vinayakammesu pasiddho. Dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho nāma aṭṭha ariyapuggalasamūho.
analyzed: sammuti saṅghaḥ nāma so vinaya kammesu pasiddhaḥ dakkhiṇeyya saṅghaḥ nāma aṭṭha ariya puggala samūho

original: Sopana kiñcāpi sammutisaṅghepi antogadhoyeva hoti. Tathāpi saraṇagamana vandanā māna
analyzed: kiñca api sammuti saṅghe pi tathā api saraṇa gamana vandanā

original: pūjāsakkārānussatiṭṭhānesu anuttara puññakkhetta vise sapariggahatthaṃ bhagavatā
analyzed: pūjā sakkāra anussati ṭṭhānesu anuttara puññakkhetta vise sa pariggaha ttham bhagavatā

original: tathā tathā saṃvaṇṇetvā so visuṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Puthujjanasaṅghohi puññakkhettaṃ
analyzed: tathā tathā saṃvaṇṇetvā saḥ visum vuttaḥ iti daṭṭhabbaḥ puthujjana saṅghaḥ hi puñña kkhettam

original: samānopi anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ nahoti. Kasmā. Sālikkhette tiṇānaṃ viya khettaduṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: samānaḥ api anuttaram puññakkhettam kasmā sāli khette tiṇānam viya khetta duṭṭhānam

original: sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchānusayānaṃ sabbhāvāti. Puññakkhettabhāvo panassa purime saddhammapade
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā anusayānam sabbhāvā ti puñña khetta bhāvaḥ panassa purime saddhamma pade

original: vuttanayena veditabboti. [Sasaddhammagaṇuttamapadaṃ]
analyzed: vutta nayena veditabbaḥ iti sa saddhamma gaṇa uttama padam

original: 8. Abhivādiyāti visesato vanditvā. Ettha ca ayaṃ loke sīlādiguṇayutto seṭṭho vandaneyyoti
analyzed: visesataḥ vanditvā ettha ca ayam loke sīla ādi guṇa yuttaḥ seṭṭhaḥ vandaneyyaḥ ti

original: evaṃ seṭṭha cittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vandanto visesato vandatīti vuccati. Vandanā
analyzed: evam seṭṭha cittam paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vandantaḥ visesataḥ vandati iti vuccati vandanā

original: pana tividhā kāyavandanādivasena. Yathāha –
analyzed: tividhā kāya vandanā ādi vasena yathā āha

original: Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā, katamā tisso. Kāyena vandati, vācāya vandati, manasā vandatīti.
analyzed: tissaḥ imāḥ bhikkhave vandanā katamāḥ tissaḥ kāyena vandati vācāya vandati manasā vandati iti

original: Tattha seṭṭhacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā jāṇudvaya kapparadvaya nalāṭa saṅkhātāni pañca
analyzed: tattha seṭṭha cittam paccupaṭṭhāpetvā pañca

original: aṅgāni bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vandaneyyānaṃ abhimukhaṃ nippajjanto kāyena vandatināma.
analyzed: aṅgāni bhūmiyam patiṭṭhāpetvā vandaneyyānam abhimukham nippajjanto kāyena

original: Yaṃ sandhāya pañcappatiṭṭhitena vanditvāti tattha tattha vuttaṃ. Yāyaca avandiyaṭṭhānesu
analyzed: yam sandhāya pañca ppatiṭṭhitena vanditvā iti tattha tattha vuttam a vandiya ṭṭhānesu

original: vandantassa āpatti hotīti. Guṇapadāni vācāya pavattento vācāya vandatināma. Namo
analyzed: vandantassa āpatti hoti iti guṇa padāni vācāya pavattentaḥ vācāya

original: buddhassa, namatthu buddhassa, namo vimuttiyā, namo vimuttānaṃ, vipassissa namatthūti
analyzed: buddhassa namatthu buddhassa namaḥ vimuttiyāḥ namaḥ vimuttānam vipassissa namatthu uti

original: evamādīsupi vācā vandanāyeva. Guṇapadāni anugantvā guṇe anussaranto manasā vandatināmāti.
analyzed: evamādīsu pi vācā vandanāya iva guṇa padāni anugantvā guṇe anussarantaḥ manasā

original: 9. Bhāsissanti kathessāmi. Kāmañca thero imaṃ saṅgahaṃ racayanto potthakāruḷhaṃ katvāva
analyzed: bhāsissanti kathessāmi kāmam ca theraḥ imam saṅgaham racayantaḥ potthaka āruḷham katvā ava

original: racayissati. Ganthakammaṃ nāma vācākammesu pasiddhanti katvā bhāsissanti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: racayissati gantha kammam nāma vācā kammesu pasiddhan ti katvā bhāsissanti vuttan ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 10. Abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti pade abhidhamme vuttā atthā abhidhammatthā. Te saṅgayhanti
analyzed: abhidhamma attha saṅgahanti pade abhidhamme vuttāḥ atthāḥ abhidhamma atthā te saṅgayhanti

original: ettha etenātivā abhidhammatthasaṅgaho. Saṅgayhantitica therena saṃkhipitvā gayhanti
analyzed: ettha abhidhamma attha saṅgahaḥ therena saṃkhipitvā gayhanti

original: kathīyantīti attho. Abhidhammeti cettha abhiatireko abhivise soca dhammo abhidhammo.
analyzed: kathīyanti iti atthaḥ abhidhamma iti ca ittha abhiatirekaḥ so ca dhammo abhidhammaḥ

original: Dhammoti ca vinayapāḷito aññaṃpāḷi dvayaṃ vuccati. Yo vo ānanda mayā dhammoca vinayoca
analyzed: dhammo ti ca vinaya pāḷitaḥ aññaṃpāḷi dvayam vuccati yaḥ vaḥ ānanda mayā

original: desito paññattoti hi vuttaṃ. Tañca pāḷidvayaṃ āṇāvidhānasaṅkhātaṃ vinayana kiccaṃ
analyzed: desito paññatto ti hi vuttam tat ca pāḷi dvayam āṇā vidhāna saṅkhātam vinayana kiccaṃ

original: vajjetvā kusalādike yathāpavatte paramatthadhamme eva dīpetīti. Evaṃ dīpentesuca
analyzed: vajjetvā kusala ādike yathā pavatte paramattha dhamme eva dīpeti iti evam dīpentesu ca

original: tesu dvīsu dhammesu yo itarato atirekoca hoti visesoca. Ayameva abhidhammo nāma.
analyzed: tesu dvīsu dhammesu yaḥ itaratas hoti visesaḥ ca ayam eva abhidhammaḥ nāma

original: Itaropana dhammoyeva. Evañca katvā dhammo abhidhammo vinayo abhivinayoti idaṃ catukkaṃ
analyzed: evam ca katvā dhammaḥ abhidhammaḥ vinayaḥ abhivinayo ti idam catukkam

original: veditabbaṃ. Tattha dhammonāma suttantapiṭakaṃ. Abhidhammonāma yattapakaraṇāni. Vinayonāma
analyzed: veditabbam tattha dhammaḥ nāma suttanta piṭakam abhidhammaḥ nāma yatta pakaraṇāni vinayaḥ nāma

original: ubhato vibhaṅgo, abhivinayonāma khandhakaparivārāti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Atirekavisesatā

original: Yato sabbaññubuddhā imaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ devesueva desenti. Na hi manussā evarūpaṃ

Dutīyagāthā-paramatthadīpanī
11. Evaṃ ādigāthāyataṃtaṃ payojana sahite pañca atthe dassetvā idāni te abhidhammatthe

original: catudhā hontīti yojanā. Etthaca -
analyzed: catudhā honti iti yojanā ettha ca

original: [12] Ṭīkāyaṃ tāva

original: [13] Ṭīkāsu
analyzed: ṭīkāsu

original: Sabbathā vuttāti yojanāpi paṭikkhittā hoti.

original: gaṇhāpeti. Sakkāyadiṭṭhi dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhi tividhamicchādiṭṭhīnaṃ vatthu hutvā bālajanānaṃ

original: Paramatthasaccaṃpana duvidhaṃ sabhāvasaccaṃ ariyasaccanti. Tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiādīsu

original: Taṃ pana ariyasaccaṃ patvā kiñci asaccaṃpi hotiyeva. Tathāhi anubhavanabhedamattaṃ

original: Sabbehi pana aniccatā saṅkhatatādīhi anekasatehi ākārehi sabbāpi vedanā dukkhāeva.

analyzed: tam sampayutta dhammā api ārammaṇam gaṇhantā tassa vasena iva gaṇhanti iti cintana mattam vā

original: cittaṃ. Sabbepi hi dhammā taṃtaṃ kriyāmattāva honti. Na tesu dabbaṃvā saṇṭhānaṃ vā

original: viggahovā upalabbhati. Paccayāyatta vuttino ca honti. Na te attano thāmenavā balenavā

original: vasenavā sattiyāvā uppajjituṃpi sakkonti. Pageva cintetuṃvā phusetuṃvāti. Khaṇamattaṭṭhāyinoca

analyzed: honti na kadāci kassaci vase vattitum sakkonti iti tasmā tesu idam dabbam ayam satti

analyzed: ekam bhāva sādhanam eva padhānataḥ labbhati pariyāyataḥ uva labbhanti iti

analyzed: veditabbam ettha ca dabba ādi vasena abhedassa cintanassa attha visesa ñāpana attham vibhāga

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Tasmā cintanakicce attappadhānatā dīpanatthaṃ taṃ kattubhāvaṃ citte āropetvā cintetīti cittanti vuttaṃ.

original: Api cettha cittasaddo vicitratthavācako daṭṭhabbo. Vuttañhe taṃ saṃyuttake –

original: Diṭṭhaṃ vo bhikkhave caraṇaṃnāma cittanti. Evaṃ bhante. Tampi kho bhikkhave caraṇaṃ

original: cittaṃ citteneva cintitanti. Tenāpi kho bhikkhave caraṇena cittena cittaññeva cittataranti,
analyzed: cittam cittena iva cintitanti tena api kho bhikkhave caraṇena cittena cittaññā iva cittatarān ti

original: tiracchānagatā pāṇā. Tepi kho bhikkhave tiracchānagatā pāṇā citteneva cittikatā.

original: Tehipi kho bhikkhave tiracchāna gatehi pāṇehi cittaññeva cittataranti.

analyzed: kammāni vicittāni kamma vicitta tāya yoniyaḥ vicittāḥ yoni vicitta tāya tesam tiracchā

analyzed: na gatānam vicitta tā veditabbā vacana attho

analyzed: cetasikanti ettha cetasi bhavam tad āyatta vutti tāya ati cetasikam phassa ādi dhamma jātam

original: Na. Cittasseva jeṭṭhakattā. Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayāti hi vuttaṃ.

original: Pañcaviññāṇa cittañhitehi kehici vitakkādīhi vinā uppajjatīti. Tasmā tesaññeva tadāyatta

original: [15] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

analyzed: cetasika dhammā ati cetasikam

original: 15. Rūpanti ettha ruppatīti rūpaṃ. Sītuṇhādīhi virodhi paccayehi visama pavatti vasena vikāraṃ āpajjati, tehi vā vikāraṃ āpādīyatīti attho. Yathāha –

original: Yadievaṃ sukhumarūpānaṃ arūpatāpatti siyāti. Nasiyā. Oḷārikarūpehi samānagati kattā.

original: Kuppati bhijjatīti hi vuttaṃ. Etthaca kuppatīti khobhati cañcalati, bhijjatīti vikāraṃ

analyzed: āpajjati yasmin khaṇe virodhi paccaya samāgamam labhanti tatas paṭṭhāya vikāra pattā

analyzed: loka upacārena vinā na sijjhati tasmā

original: Yasmā ca brahmaloke brahmānaṃ kāyavikāra vacīvikārā ca iddhivikuppanāvasappavattā

analyzed: nānā rūpa vikārāca te ca ekena pariyāyena ruppana ākārā eva nāma honti tasmā

analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Anuggāhakānaṃ sītādīnaṃ vasena taṃ sabhāvā nātivattana vasenaca tattha rūpatāsiddhi
analyzed: anuggāhakānam sītā ādīnam vasena tam vasena ca tattha

17. Idāni uddesakkamena cittaṃ tāva niddisanto tattha cittantiādimāha. Tatthāti tesu catūsu abhidhammatthesu. Tāva pathamaṃ. Cattāro vidhā pakārā yassa taṃ catubbidhaṃ.
analyzed: idāni uddesa kkamena cittam tāva niddisantaḥ tattha citta nti ādim āha tattha ati tesu catūsu abhidhamma atthesu tāva pathamam cattāro vidhāḥ pakārāḥ yassa tam catubbidham

original: 18. Kāmāvacaranti ettha kāmīyatīti kāmo. Kāmentivā ettha sattā avikkhambhitakāmarāgattā

original: kāmaratiyāeva ramanti. Na uparibhūmīsu viya jhānaratiyāti kāmo. Ekādasavidhā kāmabhūmi.

original: Nanu cettha jhānalābhinopi santīti. Na na santi. Tepana kadāci devāti natthettha

analyzed: hoti tassa ācariya brāhmaṇā samīpe brahma lokam bho gaccha ati vadanti

original: avīciniraye aggijālā upaṭṭhahanti. Tadā so bho ācariyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā paññāyantīti

original: Evaṃ nimittassādavasena te kāmīyanti. Tattha uppannānaṃpi bhavanikantināma hotīti.
analyzed: evam te kāmīyanti tattha uppannānam pi bhava nikanti nāma hoti iti

original: Apica, tattha uppannā avikkhambhitakāmarāgāeva honti, okāse sati kāmaratiyā ramissanti

analyzed: atthaḥ na gahetabbo saḥ hi atthaḥ hoti iti yam etasmin

original: Yadica so attho gahito siyā. Evañca sati tasmiṃ kāme ye mahaggata lokuttaradhammā

analyzed: uppajjanti tesam pi āpajjati ye ca

original: hoti. Yathā vanacarako saṅgāmāvacaroti. Tasmā idhapi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ attano attano

original: deve anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare. La. Ime dhammā arūpāvacarāti.

original: [19] Ṭīkāsu pana

original: Yathāvuttaṃ suvisadaṃ pāḷinayaṃ aggahetvā aññathā vacanatthāca vinicchayāca ettha vuttā. Sabbe te sārato na paccetabbāti.

original: 32. Etthaca cakkhussa asambhinnatā, āloka sannissayappaṭilābho, rūpānaṃ āpātāgamanaṃ,
analyzed: ettha ca cakkhussa asambhinna tā āloka sannissaya ppaṭilābhaḥ rūpānaṃ āpāta āgamanaṃ

original: manasikāroti cattāro paccayā cakkhuviññāṇassa uppattikāraṇāni. Sotassa asambhinnatā
analyzed: manasikāro ti cattāro paccayāḥ cakkhu viññāṇassa uppatti kāraṇāni sotassa asambhinna tā

original: ākāsasannissayappaṭilābho, saddānaṃ āpātāgamanaṃ manasikāroti sotaviññāṇassa. Ghānassa
analyzed: ākāsa sannissaya paṭilābho saddānam āpāta āgamanam manasikāro ti sota viññāṇassa ghānassa

original: asambhinnatā, vāsusannissayappaṭilābho, gandhānaṃ āpātāgamanaṃ manasikāroti ghānaviññāṇassa.
analyzed: asambhinna tā vāsu sannissaya paṭilābhaḥ gandhānaṃ āpāta āgamanam manasikāraḥ ti ghāna viññāṇassa

original: Jivhāya asambhinnatā āposannissayappaṭilābho. Rasānaṃ āpātāgamanaṃ, manasikāroti
analyzed: jivhāya a sambhinna tā āpo sannissaya paṭilābhaḥ rasānaṃ āpāta āgamanam manasikāraḥ ti

original: jivhāviññāṇassa. Kāyassa asambhinnatā, pathavisannissayappaṭilābho, tiṇṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbānaṃ
analyzed: jivhā viññāṇassa kāyassa asambhinna tā pathavi sannissaya paṭilābhaḥ tiṇṇam phoṭṭhabbānam

original: aññatarassa āpātāgamanaṃ, manasikāroti kāyaviññāṇassāti. Etthaca āloka ākāsādīnaṃ
analyzed: aññatarassa āpāta āgamanam manasikāro ti kāya viññāṇassa ati ettha ca āloke ākāsa ādīnam

original: sannissayānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tehi vinā rūpādīnaṃ pasādesu āpātāgamanasseva abhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
analyzed: sannissayānam gahaṇam tehi vinā rūpa ādīnam pasādesu āpāta āgamanassa iva abhāvato ti daṭṭhabbam

original: na hi āloke sati rūpāni sannihitānipi cakkhumhi āpātamāgacchanti. Esanayo sesesupīti.
analyzed: na hi āloke sati rūpāni sannihitāni pi cakkhumhi āpātam āgacchanti sesesu pi iti

original: Yaṃpana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ -
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam

original: Cakkhusmiṃpana asambhinnepi bahiddhārūpārammaṇe āpātaṃ anā gacchante cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati. Tasmiṃ pana āpātaṃ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati nuppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cakkhusmim pana asambhinne api bahiddhā rūpa ārammaṇe āpātam anā gacchante cakkhu viññāṇam nuppajjati tasmin pana āpātam āgacchante api āloka sannissaye asati nuppajjati iti vuttam

original: Taṃ vinā ālokena viññāṇuppattiyā abhāvadassanaparaṃ. Napana āpākāgamanaṃnāma āloke
analyzed: tam vinā ālokena viññāṇa uppattiyāḥ abhāva dassana param āpāka āgamanaṃ nāma āloke

original: asatipi sambhavatīti dassanaparanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itarathā rattandhakārepi rūpāni cakkhumhi
analyzed: asati api sambhavati iti dassana paran ti daṭṭhabbam itarathā ratta ndhakāre pi rūpāni cakkhumhi

original: āpātaṃ āgacchantīti āpajjatīti. Akusalassa vipākāni akusala vipākāni.
analyzed: āpātam āgacchanti iti āpajjati iti akusalassa vipākāni akusala vipākāni

original: 33. Etthā kenaṭṭhena vipākaṃnāmāti. Vipaccanaṭṭhena. Kiñca vipaccananti. Yathā loke
analyzed: etthā kenaṭṭhena vipākaṃnāma ati vipad canaṭṭhena kiñca yathā loke

original: ambaphalādīnaṃ taruṇabhāvaṃ atikkamma pariṇatabhāvappattivipaccananti vuccati. Evamevaṃ
analyzed: amba phala ādīnam taruṇa bhāvam atikkamma pariṇata bhāva ppatti vipaccanam ti vuccati evam evam

original: idhapi vipaccanaṃ veditabbanti. Ayañca attho catūhi samaṅgītāhi dīpetabbo. Catassohi
analyzed: idh api vipaccanam veditabbanti ayam ca atthaḥ catūhi samaṅgītāhi dīpetabbo

original: samaṅgītānāma cetanāsamaṅgitā, kammasamaṅgitā, upaṭṭhānasamaṅgitā, vipākasamaṅgitāti.
analyzed: samaṅgītā nāma cetanā samaṅgi tā kamma samaṅgi tā upaṭṭhāna samaṅgi tā vipāka samaṅgi tā ati

original: Tattha pubbe taṃ taṃ kammāyūhanakāleyā kusalākusalacetanāya khaṇattayasamaṅgitā.
analyzed: tattha pubbe tam tam kamma āyūhana kāleyā kusala akusala cetanāya khaṇa ttaya samaṅgi tā

original: Ayaṃ cetanāsamaṅgītānāma. Sāpana cetanā nirujjhamānā sabbaso abhāvaṃ patvā nanirujjhati.
analyzed: ayam sā apana cetanā nirujjhamānā sabbasas abhāvam patvā

original: Āyatiṃpana vipākapātubhāvāya attano sabbākāraparipūraṃ kriyāvisesaṃ tasmiṃ cittasantāne
analyzed: āyatim pana vipāka pātubhāvāya attano sabba ākāra paripūram kriyā visesam tasmim citta santāne

original: nidahitvāva nirujjhati. Soca kriyāviseso yāva okāsaṃ nalabhati. Tāva kappasaṃtasahassaṃpi
analyzed: nidahitvā ava nirujjhati saḥ ca kriyā visesaḥ yāva okāsam na labhati tāva kappa saṃta sahassam pi

original: taṃsantānaṃ anugatoyeva hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya dhammapade –
analyzed: tad santānam hoti yam sandhāya dhamma pade

original: Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajjukhīraṃva muccati;
analyzed: na hi pāpam katam kammam sajju khīram iva muccati

original: Dahantaṃ bālamanveti, bhasmā channova pāvakoti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dahantam bālam anveti bhasmā channaḥ iva pāvakaḥ iti vuttam

original: Sopana visuṃ eko paramatthadhammotipi saṅkhyaṃ nagacchati, anusayadhātuyoviyāti.
analyzed: visum saṅkhyam na gacchati

original: Ayaṃ kammasamaṅgitānāma. Sopana yadā attano anurūpe paccaye labhati. Tadā vipaccanatthāya
analyzed: ayam yadā attanaḥ anurūpe paccaye labhati tadā vipaccana tthāya

original: okāsaṃ karoti. Kathaṃ karotīti. So āsannamaraṇassa sattassa attānaṃvā paccupaṭṭhāpeti.
analyzed: okāsam karoti katham karoti iti so āsanna maraṇassa sattassa attānam vā paccupaṭṭhāpeti

original: Attano nimittaṃvā paccupaṭṭhāpeti. Gatinimittaṃvā paccupaṭṭhāpeti. Soca satto taṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ nimittam vā paccupaṭṭhāpeti gati nimittam vā paccupaṭṭhāpeti saḥ ca satto tam

original: amuñcamāno yadi gaṇhāti. Tadā okāsaṃ labhati. Ayaṃ upaṭṭhānasamaṅgitānāma. Taṃ amuñcitvā
analyzed: a muñcamānaḥ yadi gaṇhāti tadā okāsam labhati ayam upaṭṭhāna samaṅgi tā nāma tam a muñcitvā

original: cutassapana cutianantarameva so kammasaṅkhāto kriyā viseso visuṃ eko sasampayutto
analyzed: cutassa pana cuti anantaram eva so kamma saṅkhāto kriyā visesaḥ visum ekaḥ sa sampayutto

original: paramatthadhammarāsi hutvā ekaṃ bhavaṃ pūrayamāno vipaccati, ekaṃ bhavaṃ pūrayamānotica
analyzed: paramattha dhamma rāsi hutvā ekam bhavam pūrayamānaḥ vipaccati ekam bhavam pūrayamānaḥ uti ca

original: yāva tāyukaṃ bhavaṅgakiccaṃ chasu dvāresu taṃ taṃ dvārikavipākakiccāni pariyosāne
analyzed: yāva tāyukam bhavaṅga kiccam chasu dvāresu tam tam dvārika vipāka kiccāni pariyosāne

original: cutikiccañca sādhayamānoti attho. Tattha purimā tisso samaṅgītā taruṇā vatthānāma
analyzed: cuti kiccam ca sādhayamānaḥ ti attho tattha purimā tissaḥ taruṇā vatthā nāma

original: honti. Pacchimā vipākasamaṅgītā pariṇatāvatthānāmāti veditabbā. Iti vipaccantīti
analyzed: honti pacchimāḥ vipāka samaṅgītā veditabbāḥ iti vipaccanti iti

original: vipākāni mudutaruṇāvatthaṃ atikkamitvā pariṇakāvatthasaṅkhātaṃ vipakkabhāvaṃ āpajjantīti
analyzed: vipākāni mudu taruṇa avattham atikkamitvā pariṇaka avattha saṅkhātam vipakka bhāvam āpajjanti iti

original: evamettha attho veditabbo. Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ kusalākusalakammasamuṭṭhānānaṃpi
analyzed: evam ettha atthaḥ veditabbo evam ca katvā pāḷiyam kusala akusala kamma samuṭṭhānānam pi

original: kaṭattārūpānaṃ vipākapade aggahaṇaṃ hotīti. Tānihi kammasantānato visuṃ siddhattā
analyzed: vipāka pade aggahaṇam hoti iti tāni hi kamma santānataḥ visum

original: visuṃ kammato jātāniyeva nāma honti, navipakkāni nāmāti. Aññaṃhi arūpadhammānaṃ santānaṃ.
analyzed: visum kammataḥ jātāniyā iva nāma honti na vipakkāni nāma ati aññam hi arūpa dhammānam santānam

original: Aññaṃ rūpadhammānanti. Ayamettha vipākapade paramatthadīpanā.
analyzed: aññam rūpa dhammānan ti ayam ettha vipāka pade paramattha dīpanā

original: Yepana arūpabhāvena sārammaṇabhāvenaca kammena sadisa tāmattaṃ gahetvā arūpadhammānameva
analyzed: arūpa bhāvena sa ārammaṇa bhāvena ca kammena gahetvā arūpa dhammānam eva

original: vipākattaṃ sādhenti. Tesaṃ vipākasaddo arūpadhammesu ruḷhīvasena pavattoti āpajjatīti.
analyzed: vipāka attam sādhenti tesam vipāka saddaḥ arūpa dhammesu ruḷhī vasena pavatto ti āpajjati iti

original: Yañca tattha sālibījanibbattesu nāḷapattapupphaphalesu bījasadisānaṃ phalānameva
analyzed: yat ca tattha sāli bīja nibbattesu nāḷa patta puppha phalesu bīja sadisānam phalānam eva

original: sāliphalasālipakkanāmaṃ siddhaṃ viyāti upamaṃ dassenti, sāpi nasameti. Na hi phalānipi
analyzed: sāliphala sālipakka nāmam siddham viyāti upamam dassenti sā api na sameti na hi phalāni pi

original: taruṇakāle pākanāmaṃ labhanti. Naca nāḷapattapupphānipi pariṇatakāle pākanāmaṃ nalabhantīti.
analyzed: taruṇa kāle pāka nāmam labhanti na ca nāḷa patta pupphāni pi pariṇata kāle pāka nāmam na labhanti iti

original: Tāni pihi tadā nāḷaṃ pakkaṃ, pattaṃ pakkaṃ, pupphaṃ pakkanti na navuccantīti. Sukhayatīti
analyzed: tāni pihi tadā nāḷam pakkam pattam pakkam puppham pakkam nti na na vuccanti iti sukhayati iti

original: sukhaṃ, sampayuttadhamme taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃvā laddhasātaṃ karotīti attho.
analyzed: sukham sampayutta dhamme tad samaṅgī puggalam vā laddha sātam karoti iti attho

original: 34. Suṭṭhuvā khanati kāyikadukkhaṃ. Sukhenaca khamitabbaṃ. Sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etassātivā
analyzed: suṭṭhuvā khanati kāyika dukkham sukhena ca khamitabbam sukaram okāsa dānam etassa ativā

original: sukhaṃ. Kusalassa vipākāni sampayutta hetuvirahato ahetukānicāti kusalavipākā hetuka cittāni.
analyzed: sukham kusalassa vipākāni sampayutta hetu virahataḥ ahetukāni ca ati kusala vipākā hetuka cittāni

original: [36] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Pubbakammasahajātena nibbattakahetunāpi idha vipākassa sahetukatāpasaṅgokato. So na sundaro.
analyzed: pubba kamma sahajātena nibbattaka hetunā api idha vipākassa sa hetuka tā apasaṅgokato so na sundaraḥ

original: Na hi abhidhamme katthaci pubbakammasahajātena nibbattakahetunā vipākassa sahetukāhetukatā
analyzed: na hi abhidhamme katthaci pubba kamma sahajātena nibbattaka hetunā vipākassa sa hetuka ahetuka tā

original: sambhavonāma atthi. Asatica sambhave byabhicārassapi abhāvato so pasaṅgo niratthakovāti.
analyzed: sambhavaḥ nāma atthi asati ca sambhave byabhicārassa api abhāvato so pasaṅgaḥ niratthakā vā ati

original: Tattha byabhicārassāti pasaṅgassa iccevattho. Etthaca akusalavipākānaṃ sayaṃ abyākatadhammattā
analyzed: tattha byabhicārassa ati pasaṅgassa ettha ca akusala vipākānam sayam abyākata dhamma ttā

original: lobhādīhi akusalahetūhica sayaṃ akusalavipākattā alobhādīhi anavajjahetūhica sahetukatā
analyzed: lobha ādīhi akusala hetūhi ca sayam akusala vipāka ttā alobha ādīhi anavajja hetūhi ca sa hetuka tā

original: sambhavo natthi. Asati ca taṃ sambhave tesaṃ ahetukabhāvo abyabhicāroyeva hotīti
analyzed: sambhavaḥ natthi asati ca tam sambhave tesam ahetuka bhāvaḥ hoti iti

original: tattha ahetukaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ. Kusalavipākānaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalavipākattāyeva alobhādīhi
analyzed: tattha ahetuka ggahaṇam na katam kusala vipākānam pana sayam kusala vipāka ttāya iva alobha ādīhi

original: kusalā byākatayogīhi anavajjahetūhi sahetukatā sambhavo atthiyeva. Satica tasmiṃ
analyzed: kusalā byākata yogīhi anavajja hetūhi sa hetuka tā sambhavaḥ sati ca tasmin

original: sambhave tesaṃ ahetukabhāvo byabhicārasahito hotīti tattheva ahetukaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: sambhave tesam ahetuka bhāvaḥ byabhicāra sahitaḥ hoti iti tattha iva ahetuka ggahaṇam katam ti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: 35. Cakkhādike pañcadvāre uppannaṃ āvajjanaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ, tañhi pañcadvāre
analyzed: cakkhu ādike pañca dvāre uppannam āvajjanam pañca dvāra āvajjanam tat hi pañca dvāre

original: ghaṭṭitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjanaṃ uppajjatīti. Bhavaṅgasaṅkhāte manodvāre uppannaṃ
analyzed: ghaṭṭitam ārammaṇam gahetvā āvajjanam uppajjati iti bhavaṅga saṅkhāte manodvāre uppannam

original: āvajjanaṃ manodvārāvajjanaṃ. Tañhi tasmiṃ āpātaṃ āgacchantaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjantaṃ
analyzed: āvajjanam manaḥ dvāra āvajjanam tat hi tasmin āpātam āgacchantam ārammaṇam gahetvā āvajjantam

original: pavattatīti. Etthaca manodvāranti sakalaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: pavattati iti ettha ca manaḥ dvāram ti sakalam bhavaṅga cittam daṭṭhabbam

original: [37] Yaṃpana ṭīkāyaṃ
analyzed: ṭīkā ayam

original: Tāva “manodvāranti ettha āvajjanassa anantara paccayabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ manoti vuccati. Tadeva dvāraṃ āvajjanajavanādi thicitta pavattiyā mukhattā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: manaḥ dvāram ti ettha āvajjanassa anantara paccaya bhūtam bhavaṅga cittam manoti vuccati tat eva dvāram āvajjana javana ādi pavattiyāḥ mukhattā ati vuttam

original: Yañca vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yañca vibhāvaniyam

original: “Āvajjanassa anantara paccayabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ manodvāraṃ, pīthicittānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃpi na yujjatiyeva.
analyzed: āvajjanassa anantara paccaya bhūtam bhavaṅga cittam manaḥ dvāram pīthi cittānam pavatti mukha bhāvato ti vuttam tat sabbam api na yujjati eva

original: Yadihi yassa bhavaṅgassa anantaraṃ vīthicittāni pavattanti. Tadeva ekantena tesaṃ
analyzed: yadi hi yassa bhavaṅgassa anantaram vīthi cittāni pavattanti tat eva ekantena tesam

original: pavattimukhattā manodvāraṃnāma hoti. Na tato purimānīti ayamattho siyā. Evañcasati
analyzed: pavatti mukhattā manodvāraṃnāma hoti na tatas purimāni iti ayam atthaḥ siyā evam ca sati

original: yesu cakkhādīsu rūpā dīnaṃ ghaṭṭitattā āvajjanādīni vīthicittāni pavattanti. Tāneva
analyzed: yesu cakkha ādīsu rūpā āvajjana ādīni vīthi cittāni pavattanti tān eva

original: ekantena tesaṃ pavattimukhattā dvārānināma honti. Na tato aññānīti ayamattho āpajjati.
analyzed: ekantena tesam pavatti mukha ttā honti na tatas aññāni iti ayam atthaḥ āpajjati

original: Naca tāni cakkhādīni nāma atthi. Yāni cakkhādīni dvārarūpānināma na hontīti. Sabbametaṃ
analyzed: na ca tāni cakkha ādīni nāma atthi yāni cakkha ādīni dvāra rūpāni nāma na honti iti sabbam etam

original: upari dvāra saṅgahe āvibhavissatīti. Hasanaṃ hasitaṃ. Mukhassa pahaṭṭhākārappavatti.
analyzed: upari dvāra saṅgahe āvibhavissati iti hasanam hasitam mukhassa pahaṭṭha ākāra ppavatti

original: Taṃ uppādeti janetīti hasituppādo. Taṃvā uppādenti khīṇāsavā etenāti hasibhuppādo.
analyzed: tam uppādeti janeti iti hasituppādo tam vai uppādenti khīṇa āsavāḥ etena ati hasibhuppādo

original: Taṃvā uppajjati etenāti hasituppādo. Soeva cittanti samāso. Khīṇāsavānaṃ anoḷārikesu
analyzed: tam vā uppajjati etena ati hasita uppādaḥ saḥ eva cittam ti samāsaḥ khīṇa āsavānam anoḷārikesu

original: ārammaṇesu yena cittena sitaṃ pātukaronti, tassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Na hi khīṇāsavā lokiya
analyzed: ārammaṇesu yena cittena sitam pātukaronti tassa etam nāmam na hi khīṇa āsavāḥ

original: mahā janāviya rajjanīyādi bhāvena oḷārikesu hasaniya vatthūsu hasantīti. Ṭīkāsu pana
analyzed: mahā janāviya rajjanīya ādi bhāvena oḷārikesu hasaniya vatthūsu hasantīti ṭīkāsu pana

original: cittaṃ apekkhitvā hasituppādanti niddiṭṭhaṃ siyāti. Vuttanayena ahetukānica tāni
analyzed: cittam apekkhitvā hasita uppādan ti niddiṭṭham siyā iti vutta nayena ahetukāni ca tāni

original: vipaccana vipākuppādana kiccarahitattā taṃ taṃ kriyāmattabhūtāni cittānicāti ahetukakriyacittāni.
analyzed: tam tam kriyā matta bhūtāni ahetuka kriya cittāni

original: Etthaca vīthimuttacittāni kiccadubbalattā pañcaviññāṇāni vatthudubbalattā sampaṭicchanādīnica
analyzed: ettha ca vīthi mutta cittāni kicca dubbala ttā pañca viññāṇāni vatthu dubbala ttā sampaṭicchana ādīni ca

original: kiccaṭṭhānadubbalattā attano ussāhena vinā kevalaṃ vipaccanamattena pavattantīti
analyzed: kicca ṭṭhāna dubbala ttāḥ attanaḥ ussāhena vinā kevalam pavattanti iti

original: tāni sabbāni vipākānieva honti. Yānipana balavakiccattā attano ussāhena pavattanti.
analyzed: tāni sabbāni vipākāni eva honti yāni pana balava kicca ttā attanaḥ ussāhena pavattanti

original: Āyatiṃca vipākuppādanatthaṃ ussāhasahitāni honti. Tāni kusalākusalānināma honti.
analyzed: āyatim ca vipāka uppādana tham ussāha sahitāni honti tāni kusala akusalāni nāma honti

original: Yāni pana cittāni vipaccanamattaṃ atikkamma attano ussāheneva pavattanti. Tesu āvajjanadvayaṃ
analyzed: yāni pana cittāni vipaccana mattam atikkamma attanaḥ ussāhena iva pavattanti tesu āvajjana dvayam

original: Ahetukacittassa paramatthadīpanā.

analyzed: tam samuṭṭhāpeti tadā asaṅkhārena uppannam asaṅkhārikam sa saṅkhārena

original: Sutacintāpasutātipivattuṃ yujjati. Yānicadhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa kāraṇāni aṭṭhakathāsu

original: 42. Aṭṭhapīti ettha pisaddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena imesaṃ idha vuttappakārato aññehi
analyzed: aṭṭha pi iti ettha pi saddaḥ sampiṇḍana atthaḥ tena imesam idha vutta ppakārataḥ aññehi

original: pakārehi anekavidhataṃ sampiṇḍeti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo. Imāni aṭṭhacittāni dasahi puññakriyāvatthūhi
analyzed: pakārehi sampiṇḍeti tatra ayam nayaḥ imāni aṭṭhacittāni dasahi puñña kriyā vatthūhi

original: guṇitāni asīti honti. Puna tāni chahi ārammaṇehi guṇitāni cattārisatāniceva asīti
analyzed: guṇitāni asīti honti puna tāni chahi ārammaṇehi guṇitāni asīti

original: ca honti. Puna tāni tīhi kammehi guṇitāni sahassaṃ cattāri satāni cattālīsaṃca honti.
analyzed: ca honti puna tāni tīhi kammehi guṇitāni sahassam cattāri satāni cattālīsam ca honti

original: Puna tāni tīhi hīnamajjhimapaṇītehi guṇitāni cattāri sahassāni tīṇi satāni vīsatica
analyzed: puna tāni tīhi hīna majjhima paṇītehi guṇitāni cattāri sahassāni tīṇi satāni vīsati ca

original: honti. Tāni imāni suddhikānīti katvā dvīsu ṭhānesu thapetabbāni. Tato ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: honti tāni imāni suddhikāni iti katvā dvīsu ṭhānesu thapetabbāni tatas ekam ṭhānam

original: gahetvā dvidhā karontassa ñāṇasampayuttāni dvesahassāni sataṃ saṭṭhica honti. Tathā
analyzed: gahetvā dvidhā karontassa ñāṇa sampayuttāni dve sahassāni satam honti tathā

original: ñāṇavippayuttānīti. Puna tattha ñāṇasampayuttāni catūhi adhipatīhi guṇitāni aṭṭhasahassāni
analyzed: ñāṇa vippayuttāni iti puna tattha ñāṇa sampayuttāni catūhi adhipatīhi guṇitāni aṭṭha sahassāni

original: chasatāni cattālīsaṃca honti. Ñāṇavippayuttānipana vīmaṃsāvajjitehi tīhi adhipatīhi
analyzed: cha satāni cattālīsam ca honti ñāṇa vippayuttāni pana vīmaṃsa āvajjitehi tīhi adhipatīhi

original: guṇitāni chasahassāni cattārisatāni asītica honti. Puna tadubhayāni sampiṇḍitāni
analyzed: guṇitāni cha sahassāni cattāri satāni asīti ca honti puna tad ubhayāni sampiṇḍitāni

original: dasasahassaṃ pañcasahassāni sataṃ vīsatica honti. Puna tāni pubbe visuṃ thapitehi
analyzed: dasa sahassam pañca sahassāni satam vīsati ca honti puna tāni pubbe visum thapitehi

original: suddhikehi sampiṇḍitāni dasasahassaṃ navasahassāni cattāri satāni cattālīsañca hontīti.
analyzed: suddhikehi sampiṇḍitāni dasa sahassam nava sahassāni cattāri satāni cattālīsam ca honti iti

original: Yaṃpana ṭīkāyaṃ idha vuttanayena suddhikānica ñāṇavippayuttāni ca visuṃ akatvā sabbāni
analyzed: yaṃ pana ṭīkā ayam idha vutta nayena suddhikāni ca ñāṇa vippayuttāni ca visum a katvā sabbāni

original: puññakriyādīhi samaṃ guṇitāni sattarasa sahassāni dve satāni asītica hontīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: puñña kriyā ādīhi samam guṇitāni sattarasa sahassāni dve satāni asīti ca honti iti vuttam

original: [40] Yañca vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yañca vibhāvaniyam

original: Suddhikāni visuṃ akatvā ñāṇavippayuttānieva visuṃ katvā tathā guṇitāni vīsa satādhika pannarasa sahassāni hontīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ na yuttaṃ.
analyzed: suddhikāni visum a katvā ñāṇa vippayuttāni eva visum katvā tathā guṇitāni vīsa sata adhika pannarasa sahassāni honti iti vuttam tat sabbam na yuttam

original: Evañhi sati imāni kāmāvacarakusalāni niccaṃ sādhipatikāni hutvā niyatādhipatikānināma
analyzed: evam hi sati imāni kāmāvacara kusalāni niccam sa adhipatikāni hutvā

original: bhaveyyuṃ. Naca imāni upari mahaggata kusalāni viya lokuttarāni viya ca niyatā dhipatikāni
analyzed: bhaveyyum naca imāni upari mahaggata kusalāni viya lokuttarāni viya ca niyatā ādhipatikāni

original: hontīti. Ṭīkānayenapana ñāṇavippayuttānipi vīmaṃsāsahagatānīti āpajjatīti. Yathāvā
analyzed: honti iti ṭīkā nayena pana ñāṇa vippayuttāni api vīmaṃsā sahagatāni iti āpajjati iti yathāvā

original: kosallasambhūtaṭṭhena kusalātiettha ñāṇavippayuttānipi kosallena nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ
analyzed: kosalla sambhūta ṭṭhena ñāṇa vippayuttāni pi kosallena nānā vajjana vīthiyam

original: pavattena upanissayañāṇena sambhūtattā kusalāni eva nāma honti. Evamidhapi tāni teneva
analyzed: pavattena upanissaya ñāṇena sambhūta ttā kusalāni eva nāma honti evam idha api tāni tena iva

original: vīmaṃsādhipatibhūtena sambhūtattā vīmaṃsādhipateyyānipi nāma hontīti na nasakkā vattunti
analyzed: vīmaṃsā adhipati bhūtena vīmaṃsā ādhipateyyāni pi nāma honti iti na na sakkā vattunti

original: iminā adhippāyena tāni visuṃ akatāni siyunti. Evaṃsantepi kāmakusalānināma adhipativimuttāni
analyzed: iminā adhippāyena tāni visum a katāni siyunti adhipati vimuttāni

original: eva bahutarāni honti. Tasmā nasakkā sabbāni kāmakusalāni vīmaṃsādhipatimūlikāni bhavitunti.
analyzed: eva bahutarāni honti tasmā na sakkā sabbāni kāma kusalāni vīmaṃsā adhipati mūlikāni bhavitun ti

original: 43. Kāmāvacarānica tāni kusalāni cittānicāti viggaho. Tattha kenaṭṭhena kusalānīti.
analyzed: kāmāvacarāni ca tāni kusalāni cittāni ca ati viggahaḥ tattha kena ṭṭhena kusalāni iti

original: Ārogyaṭṭhena, sundaraṭṭhena, chekaṭṭhena, anavajjaṭṭena, sukhavipākaṭṭhenacāti. Rāgādayohi
analyzed: ārogya ṭṭhena sundara ṭṭhena cheka ṭṭhena anavajja ṭṭena sukha vipāka ṭṭhena ca ati rāga ādayaḥ hi

original: dhammā cittasantānassa rujjanaṭṭhena rogānāma. Ahitaṭṭhena asundarā nāma. Anipuṇaṭṭhena
analyzed: dhammā citta santānassa rujjana ṭṭhena rogā nāma ahita ṭṭhena asundarāḥ nāma anipuṇa ṭṭhena

original: achekānāma. Gārayhaṭṭhena vajjānāma. Aniṭṭha vipākaṭṭhena dukkhavipākānāma honti.
analyzed: achekānāma gārayha ṭṭhena vajjānāma dukkha vipākānāma honti

original: Imānipana tehi vuṭṭhitattā kusalānināma arogāni nāmāti attho. Tappaṭipakkhattāca
analyzed: imāni pana tehi vuṭṭhita ttā kusalāni nāma arogāni nāma ati attho tad paṭipakkha ttā ca

original: sundarāni chekāni anavajjāni sukhavipākāni ca nāma hontīti. Kucchite pāpadhamme salayanti
analyzed: sundarāni chekāni anavajjāni sukha vipākāni ca nāma honti iti kucchite pāpa dhamme

original: cālenti kampenti viddhaṃsentīti kusalāni. Kucchitenavā ākārena sattasantāne senti
analyzed: cālenti kampenti viddhaṃsenti iti kusalāni ākārena satta santāne senti

original: anusentīti kusā. Rāgādayo. Te lunanti chindantīti kusalāni. Kusaṃvā vuccati ñāṇaṃ
analyzed: anusenti iti kusāḥ rāga ādayaḥ te lunanti chindanti iti kusalāni vuccati ñāṇam

original: kucchitānaṃ sānaṭṭhena tanukaraṇaṭṭhena antakaraṇaṭṭhenavā. Kusena lātabbānīti kusalāni.
analyzed: kucchitānam sāna ṭhena tanu karaṇa ṭṭhena anta karaṇa ṭhena vā kusena lātabbāni iti kusalāni

original: Kusāviya hatthappadesaṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ lunantītivā kusalāni. Apica, kucchite pāpadhamme
analyzed: hattha ppadesam saṃkilesa pakkham lunanti iti vā kusalāni apica kucchite pāpa dhamme

original: saranti hiṃsantīti kusalāni. Rakārassa lakāro. Kosallasambhūtaṭṭhenavā kusalānīti.
analyzed: saranti hiṃsanti iti kusalāni rakārassa lakāro kosalla sambhūta ṭṭhenavā kusalāni iti

original: 44. Mahāvipākesu padatthato vattabbaṃ natthi. Vedanābhedo ārammaṇavasena vattabbo.
analyzed: mahā vipākesu padatthataḥ vattabbam na atthi vedanā bhedaḥ ārammaṇa vasena vattabbo

original: Tānihi atiiṭṭhe iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe yathākkamaṃ somanassena upekkhāya ca yuttānīti.
analyzed: tāni hi ati iṭṭhe iṭṭha majjhatte ca ārammaṇe yathākkamam somanassena upekkhāya ca yuttāni iti

original: Sampayogabhedo kammavasena javanavasenaca vattabbo. Tānihi balavakammena janitāni
analyzed: sampayoga bhedaḥ kamma vasena javana vasena ca vattabbo tāni hi balava kammena janitāni

original: ñāṇasampayuttāni honti. Dubbalakammena janitāni ñāṇavippayuttāni. Kadācipana tadārammaṇavasena
analyzed: ñāṇa sampayuttāni honti dubbala kammena janitāni ñāṇa vippayuttāni kadāci pana tad ārammaṇa vasena

original: pavattikāle yebhuyyena tihetukajavanānubandhāni ñāṇasampayuttāni honti. Itarajavanānubandhāni
analyzed: pavatti kāle yebhuyyena ti hetuka javana anubandhāni ñāṇa sampayuttāni honti itara javana anubandhāni

original: ñāṇavippayuttānīti. Saṅkhārabhedopi kehici ācariyehi kammavaseneva kathito. Asaṅkhārikakammajanitāni
analyzed: ñāṇa vippayuttāni iti saṅkhāra bhedaḥ api kehici ācariyehi kamma vasena iva kathitaḥ asaṅkhārika kamma janitāni

original: asaṅkhārikāni. Sasaṅkhārikakammajanitāni sasaṅkhārikānīti. Saṅgahakārenapana sannihitapaccayavasena
analyzed: asaṅkhārikāni sa saṅkhārika kamma janitāni sa saṅkhārikāni iti saṅgaha kārena pana sannihita paccaya vasena

original: vutto. Tānihi paṭisandhiyaṃ purimabhave maraṇāsannakāle ñātakādīhi tena tena payogena
analyzed: vuttaḥ paṭisandhiyam purima bhave maraṇa āsanna kāle ñātaka ādīhi tena tena payogena

original: upaṭṭhāpitāni kammādīni ārammaṇāni gahetvā pavattāni sasaṅkhārikānināma honti. Tādisena
analyzed: upaṭṭhāpitāni kamma ādīni ārammaṇāni gahetvā pavattāni honti tādisena

original: payogena vinā sayameva kammabalena upaṭṭhitāni gahetvā pavattāni asaṅkhārikānināma
analyzed: payogena vinā sayam eva kamma balena upaṭṭhitāni gahetvā pavattāni

original: honti. Tadārammaṇa kālepana asaṅkhārikajavanānubandhāni asaṅkhārikānināma. Sasaṅkhārika
analyzed: honti tad ārammaṇa ka ālepana asaṅkhārika javana anubandhāni sasaṅkhārika

original: javanānubandhāni sasaṅkhārikāni nāmāti. Etthapi sampiṇḍanattho visaddo. Tena ārammaṇachakka
analyzed: javana anubandhāni sasaṅkhārikāni nāma ati ettha api sampiṇḍana atthaḥ visaddaḥ tena

original: hīnattikavaseneva kāladesa santānādivasenaca tesaṃ anekabhedattaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Yasmā
analyzed: hīna ttika vasena iva santāna ādi vasena ca tesam sampiṇḍeti yasmāt

original: panetāni dānādivasena kāyakammādivasena chandādīni dhuraṃ katvā ca na pavattanti.
analyzed: pana etāni dāna ādi vasena kāya kamma ādi vasena chanda ādīni dhuram katvā ca na pavattanti

original: Tasmā tāni puññakriyāvatthūnaṃ kammādhipatīnañca vasena vaḍḍhanaṃ nalabhantīti.
analyzed: tasmā tāni puñña kriyā vatthūnam kamma adhipatīnam ca vasena vaḍḍhanam na labhanti iti

original: [41] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Imāni viññattisamuṭṭhāpanābhāvato kammadvāra vasena na pavattanti. Avipākasabhāvatoca kammavasena napavattantīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
analyzed: imāni viññatti samuṭṭhāpana abhāvato kamma dvāra vasena na pavattanti avipāka sabhāvato ca kamma vasena na pavattanti iti vuttam tat vicāretabbam

original: Heṭṭhāhi kusalesu kammattikavaseneva vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Napana visuṃ kammadvāravasena.
analyzed: heṭṭhā hi kusalesu kammattika vasena iva vaḍḍhanam vuttam na pana visum kamma dvāra vasena

original: Kammattikañcanāma tividha kammadvāra vaseneva siddhanti. Nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yohi
analyzed: tividha kamma dvāra vasena iva

original: kāmāvacarakusalesu kammadvāra kammapatha puññakriyāvatthubhedo vutto. So idha natthi.
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalesu kamma dvāra kamma patha puñña kriyā vatthu bhedo vutto saḥ idha natthi

original: Kasmā. Aviññattijanakato avipāka dhammato tathā appavattiyācāti vuttanti. Saccaṃ.
analyzed: kasmai a viññatti janakataḥ avipāka dhammataḥ tathā appavattiyā ca ati vuttanti saccam

original: Tattha pana aviññattijanakato kammadvāra bhedo idha natthīti etena kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ
analyzed: tattha pana a viññatti janakato kamma dvāra bhedaḥ idha natthi iti etena kāya kammam vacī kammam

original: manokammanti evaṃ bhedassa abhāvaṃ vadati. Avipākadhammato kammapathabhedo idha natthīti
analyzed: manaḥ kamman ti evam bhedassa abhāvam vadati avipāka dhammato kamma patha bhedaḥ idha natthi iti

original: etena dasavidhassa kammapathabhedassa abhāvaṃ vadati. Idhapana kusalesupi kammapathabhedaṃ
analyzed: etena dasavidhassa kamma patha bhedassa abhāvam vadati idha pana kusalesu pi kamma patha bhedam

original: aggahetvā tividhakammadvāra bhedabhinnaṃ kammattikameva gahitaṃ. Tañca viññatti samuṭṭhāpanā
analyzed: aggahetvā tividha kamma dvāra bheda bhinnam kammattikam eva gahitam tat ca viññatti samuṭṭhāpanā

original: bhāvato tividhakammadvāravasena napavattantīti imināva siddhaṃ. Yadica heṭṭhā kusalesupi
analyzed: bhāvataḥ tividha kamma dvāra vasena siddham yadi ca heṭṭhā kusalesu pi

original: dasavidhakammapathabhedavasena visuṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ siyā. Evaṃsati idhapi avipākasabhāvato
analyzed: dasavidha kamma patha bheda vasena visum vaḍḍhanam vuttam siyā evam sati idha api avipāka sabhāvato

original: kammapathavasena napavattantīti idaṃ vattabbamevāti.
analyzed: kammapatha vasena na pavattanti iti idam vattabbam eva ati

original: 45. Mahākriyacittesupi mahāvipākesuviya ārammaṇa vaseneva vedenābhedo upari sayameva
analyzed: ārammaṇa vasena iva vedena abhedaḥ upari

original: vakkhati. Ñāṇasampayutta, vippayutta, asaṅkhārika, sasaṅkhārikabhedopana yathārahaṃ
analyzed: yathāraham

original: kusalesu vuttanayena veditabbo.
analyzed: kusalesu vutta nayena veditabbaḥ

original: [42] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Tathā avicāretvā kriyacittānaṃpi kusale vuttanayena yathārahaṃ somanassa sahagatāditā veditabbāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
analyzed: tathā a vicāretvā kusale vutta nayena yathāraham somanassa sahagata ādi tā veditabbā ti vuttam tat na yujjati

original: Iccevaṃ sabbathāpīti padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Sahetuka kāmāvacara kusala vipāka
analyzed: icc evam sabbathā api iti padānam attho heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yeva sa hetuka kāmāvacara kusala vipāka

original: kriya cittānīti ettha sahetu kaggahaṇaṃ kusala sadda sambandhe bhūtakathana visesanaṃ.
analyzed: kriya cittāni iti ettha sahetuka ggahaṇam kusala sadda sambandhe bhūtakathana visesanam

original: Tenevahi taṃ kusalacittānaṃ cūḷanigamena gahitaṃ. Vipāka kriya saddasambandhepana
analyzed: tena ivahi tam cūḍa nigamena gahitam

original: byavacchedakavisesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[43] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Sakkharakathalikaṃpi macchagumbaṃpi tiṭṭhantaṃpi carantaṃpi passatīti suttapade viya
analyzed: sakkhara kathalikam pi maccha gumbam pi tiṭṭhantam pi carantam pi passati iti sutta pade viya

original: idha yathālābha yojanāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sameti. Tatthahi sakkharakathalikaṃnāma nacaratīti
analyzed: idha vuttam tam na sameti tattha hi na carati iti

original: yuttaṃ. Idhapana kusalaṃ sahetukaṃ nahotīti nayuttametanti.
analyzed: yuttam idha pana kusalam sa hetukam na hoti iti na yuttam etat ti

original: 46. Saṅgahagāthāyaṃ vedanā ñāṇa saṅkhāra bhedenāti vedanābhedena, ñāṇabhedena, saṅkhārabhedenaca.
analyzed: saṅgaha gāthā ayam vedanā ñāṇa saṅkhāra bhedena ati vedanā bhedena ñāṇa bhedena saṅkhāra bhedena ca

original: Tattha vedanā bhedenāti vedanābhedasiddhena cittabhedena, ñāṇabhedenāti ñāṇayogā
analyzed: tattha vedanā bhedena ati vedanā bheda siddhena citta bhedena ñāṇa bhedena ati ñāṇa yogā

original: yogasiddhenacittabhedena. Saṅkhārabhedenāti saṅkhārena vinā sahaca pavattapaccayagaṇabhedasiddhena
analyzed: yoga siddhena citta bhedena saṅkhāra bhedena ati saṅkhārena vinā saha ca pavatta paccaya gaṇa bheda siddhena

original: cittabhedenāti attho. Idañhi samāsapadānaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ, yadidaṃ suviññātānaṃ nānāppakārānaṃ
analyzed: citta bhedena ati atthaḥ idam hi samāsa padānam sāmatthiyam yat idam su viññātānam nānā appakārānam

original: padatthānaṃ appakena byañjanena dīpanasamatthatāti.
analyzed: padatthānam appakena byañjanena dīpana samattha tā ati

original: [44] Etena vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: etena

original: Sayaṃ abhinnānaṃ ñāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ bhedavacane cittassa bhedakara bhāve ca codanāya anokāsatā sādhitā hotīti.
analyzed: sayam abhinnānam ñāṇa saṅkhārānam bheda vacane cittassa bheda kara bhāve ca codanāya anokāsa tā sādhitā hoti iti

original: Tatrāyaṃ yojanā. Sahetu kāmāvacara puññapākakriyā vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedena yathākkamaṃ chaca dvādasaca catuvīsati ca matāti. Etthaca –
analyzed: tatra ayam yojanā ettha ca

original: Vedanāñāṇasaṅkhāra, bhedenetāni aṭṭhadhā;
analyzed: vedanā ñāṇa saṅkhāra bhedena itāni aṭṭhadhā

original: Puññapākakriyābhedā, catuvīsatividhā makā tipi.
analyzed: puñña pāka kriyā bhedā catuvīsatividhā makā tipi

original: Vattabbā. Evañhi sati atthagatica visadā hoti. Upari vakkha, mānāhica saṅgahagāthāhi saddhiṃ sametīti.
analyzed: vattabbā evam hi sati attha gati ca visadā hoti upari vakkha mānāhi ca saṅgaha gāthāhi saddhim sameti iti

original: 47. Kāmetiādi sabbesaṃ kāmacittānaṃ saṅgahagāthā. Tattha kāme kāmabhūmiyaṃ pākāni
analyzed: kāma iti ādi sabbesam kāma cittānam saṅgaha gāthā tattha kāme kāma bhūmiyam pākāni

original: sahetukāhetukavasena sabbāni vipākacittāni tevīsa. Puññāpuññāni kusalākusalacittānica

analyzed: yañca tattha

analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Vedanāya uppādo paññāyati. Vayo paññāyati. Ṭhikāya aññatthaṃ paññāyati. Saññāya.

original: Saṅkhārānaṃ. Viññāṇassa. La. Paññāyatīti vuttaṃ. Tathā yo bhikkhave pathavidhātuyā
analyzed: saṅkhārānam viññāṇassa paññāyati iti vuttam tathā yaḥ bhikkhave pathavi dhātuyā

original: uppādo ṭhitiabhinibbatti pātubhāvo. Dukkhasseso uppādo rogānaṃ ṭhiti jarā maraṇassa
analyzed: uppādaḥ ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvaḥ dukkhassa esaḥ uppādaḥ rogānaṃ ṭhiti jarā maraṇassa

original: pātubhāvo. Yo bhikkhave āpodhātuyā. Yo bhikkhave tejo dhātuyā. Yo bhikkhave vāyodhātuyā.
analyzed: pātubhāvaḥ yaḥ bhikkhave āpaḥ dhātuyā yaḥ bhikkhave tejaḥ dhātuyā yaḥ bhikkhave vāyaḥ dhātuyā

original: Yo bhikkhave cakkhussa.La. Manassa uppādo.La. Jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvoti.
analyzed: yaḥ bhikkhave jarā maraṇassa pātubhāvaḥ

original: Vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itarathā jīvitindriyādīnapi ekasmiṃ kalāpe bahubhāvo vattabbo
analyzed: vuttam ti daṭṭhabbam itarathā jīvitindriya ādīn api ekasmin kalāpe bahu bhāvaḥ vattabbaḥ

original: siyā. Yo arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhiti avaṭṭhitīti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā vikārarūpānaṃ.

original: dvidhā bhinditvā vuttā. Soca atthavisesoupari āvi bhavissatīti. Ayametthaparamatthadīpanā.

original: [72] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ “yadi ekuppādamatteneva cetoyuttāti adhippetā.
analyzed: imam attham a sat lakkhetvā yam vuttam yadi eka uppāda mattena iva cetaḥ yuttā iti adhippetā

original: Tadā cittena saha uppajjamānānaṃ rūpadhammānampi cetoyuttatā āpajjeyyāti eka nirodhaggahaṇaṃ.

original: cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirujjhamānānampi rūpadhammānanti ekālambaṇaggahaṇaṃ. Ye evaṃ

original: Alamatipapañcenā”ti. Sabbaṃ taṃ niratthakameva.
analyzed: alam atipapañcena ati sabbam tam niratthakam eva

original: 69. Kathañca dvipaññāsa hontīti pucchitvā pathamaṃ dvipaññāsa sarūpaṃ tīhi rāsīhi
analyzed: kathañca dvipaññāsa honti iti pucchitvā pathamam dvipaññāsa sarūpam tīhi rāsīhi

original: vibhajitvā dassento kathantiādimāha. Tattha phusatīti phasso. Phusanti sampayuttakā

original: dhammā etenāti phasso. Phusanamattamevavā etanti phasso. Phusanañcettha ārammaṇassa

original: iṭṭhāniṭṭharasaṃ āhacca upahacca gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yato tadanubhavanti vedanā pātubhavati.
analyzed: iṭṭha aniṭṭha rasam āhacca upahacca gahaṇam daṭṭhabbam yatas tat anubhavanti vedanā pātubhavati

original: Phassapaccayā vedanāti hi vuttaṃ. Svāyaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo. Nanucāyaṃ arūpadhammo.
analyzed: phassa paccayā vedanā ti hi vuttam svāyam phusana lakkhaṇaḥ nanu ca ayam arūpa dhammo

original: Naca arūpadhammā appaṭighasabhāvā kiñci phusantīti. Saccaṃ, ayaṃpana phusanā kārenaca

original: pavattati. Yañca phusantehi sādhetabbaṃ. Tañca kiccaṃ sādheti. Tasmā ayaṃ phassotica

original: phusanalakkhaṇotica vutto. Kiṃpana sādhetīti. Ārammaṇarasānurūpaṃ cittassa vikārapatti.
analyzed: phusana lakkhaṇaḥ ti ca vuttaḥ sādheti iti ārammaṇa rasa anurūpam cittassa vikāra patti

original: Vedanāvisesuppattiṃvā. Ayañca attho ambilakhādādike disvā aparassa kheḷuppādādīsu pākaṭoti.

original: [73] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Kheḷuppādādiviya daṭṭhabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Evañcasati idaṃ upamā mattaṃ siyā. Atipākaṭāyapana phassappavattiyā dassana midanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: kheḷuppāda ādi viya daṭṭhabbaḥ ti vuttam evam ca sati idam upamā mattam siyā phassa pavattiyā dassana midam ti daṭṭhabbam

original: 70. Vedayatīti vedanā. Ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati. Aviditaṃvā ārammaṇarasaṃ sampayuttānaṃ

original: taṃsamaṅgipuggalānaṃ vā viditaṃpākaṭaṃ karotīti attho. Vindantiva etāya sattā sātaṃvā

original: asātaṃvā labhantīti vedanā. Vedayitamattamevavā etanti vedanā. Pāḷiyaṃpana –

original: Vedayati vedayatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā vedanāti vuccati. Kiñca vedayati, sukhaṃpi vedayati. Dukkhaṃpi vedayati. Adukkhamasukhaṃpi vedayatīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vedayati vedayati iti kho bhikkhave tasmā vedanā ati vuccati kiñca vedayati sukham pi vedayati dukkham pi vedayati adukkham asukham pi vedayati iti vuttam

original: Nanu sabbepi cittacetasikā dhammā ārammaṇarasānubhavanappa katikāevāti tepi vedanānāma
analyzed: nanu sabbe pi citta cetasikāḥ dhammāḥ ārammaṇa rasa anubhavana ppa katikā eva ati te pi vedanā nāma

original: siyunti. Nasiyuṃ. Tehi kiccantarabyāvaṭā honti. Ārammaṇarasaṃ ujuṃ anubhavituṃ nasakkonti.
analyzed: siyunti na siyum tehi kicca antara byāvaṭāḥ honti ārammaṇa rasam ujum anubhavitum na sakkonti

original: Attano attano kiccaṃ karontāva ekadesamattena anubhavanti. Vedanāyevapana anaññakiccatāya
analyzed: attano attano kiccam eka desam attena anubhavanti anañña kicca tāya

original: anubhavanakicce ādhipaccayogatāyaca issarabhāvena anubhavatīti sāeva vedanānāma bhavituṃ

original: arahatīti. Evañcakatvā rājaggabhojana rasānubhavane tesaṃ sūdasadisatā vedanāyaevaca
analyzed: arahati iti evam ca katvā vedanāya eva ca

original: rājasadisatā vuttāti.
analyzed: rāja sadisa tā vuttā ati

original: 71. Sañjānātīti saññā. Puna jānanatthaṃ saññāṇaṃ karotīti attho. Ayañhi pubbe gahitasaññānena

original: buddhehipi bodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyye karotīti. Tathāhi sā puna sañjānanatthaṃ nimittakaraṇe

original: dārutacchakasadisātica. Yathāgahita nimittavasena abhinivesakaraṇe hatthidassaka
analyzed: yathā gahita nimitta vasena abhinivesa karaṇe hatthi dassaka

original: andhasadisātica. Upaṭṭhitavisayaggahaṇe tiṇapurisakesu migapotakasadisātica vuttāti. Pāḷiyaṃpana –

original: Sañjānāti sañjānātītikho bhikkhave tasmā saññāti vuccati. Kiñca sañjānāti. Nīlaṃpi sañjānāti. Pītakaṃpi sañjānātītiādi vuttanti.
analyzed: sañjānāti sañjānāti iti kho bhikkhave tasmā saññā iti vuccati kiñca sañjānāti nīlam pi sañjānāti pītakam pi sañjānāti itiādi vuttanti

original: 72. Cetayatīti cetanā. Sampayuttadhamme tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇevā kiccevā abhisandahati
analyzed: cetayati iti cetanā sampayutta dhamme tasmin tasmin ārammaṇā iva abhisandahati

analyzed: pakappeti vā te saṃvidahati ārammaṇa paṭilābhāya vā kamma siddhiyai abhisaṅkharoti

analyzed: āyūhati vā te ārammaṇe sampiṇḍeti ekatas samaḥ sarante karoti iti tathā hi sā

original: pavattamānāya taṃ sampayuttāpi attano attano kiccaṃ kurumānā tasmiṃ tatheva pavattantīti.
analyzed: pavattamānāya tam sampayuttā api attano attano kiccam kurumānā tasmin tathā iva pavattanti iti

original: Teneva sā sakicca parakicca sādhaka jeṭṭhasissa mahāvaḍḍhaki ādisadisāti vuttāti.
analyzed: tena iva sā ādi sadisā ati vuttā ati

original: [74] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Ceteti saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇe byāpāramāpajjatīti vatvā tadatthasādhanatthaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ

original: 73. Ekattārammaṇasaṅkhāto aggo koṭṭhāso koṭi vā etassāti ekaggaṃ. Cittaṃ, tassa bhāvo

original: vikkhepaṃ apatvā ekasmiṃ sabhāve khaṇamattaṃpi pavattassa cittassa yoniccalākāro
