original: nahotīti navattabboti hi dvārakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañca attho pathamajjhānassa saddo
analyzed: na hoti iti hi dvāra kathā ayam vuttam ayam ca attho pathama jhānassa saddo

original: kaṇṭakoti iminā pāṭhena dīpetabbo. Pathamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa hi saddo sotamhi ghaṭṭetvā
analyzed: kaṇṭakaḥ iti iminā pāṭhena dīpetabbo pathama jhānam samāpannassa hi saddaḥ sotamhi ghaṭṭetvā

original: jhānacittasaṅkhāte manodvāre āpātamāgacchati. Tadā jhānacitta santati calitvā vocchijjati.
analyzed: jhāna citta saṅkhāte manaḥ dvāre āpātam āgacchati tadā calitvā vā ucchijjati

original: Jhānā vuṭṭhāti. Bhavaṅgapāto hoti. Taṃ saddārammaṇaṃ vīthicittaṃ pavattatīti. Dutīyajjhānādīni
analyzed: jhānā vuṭṭhāti bhavaṅga pāto hoti tam sadda ārammaṇam vīthi cittam pavattati iti dutīya jhāna ādīni

original: samāpajjanto pana appakena saddena navuṭṭhāti. Adhimattasaddena pana vuṭṭhātiyeva.
analyzed: samāpajjanto pana appakena saddena na vuṭṭhāti adhimatta saddena pana vuṭṭhātiyā iva

original: Na hi tāni āneñjapattānināma honti. Arūpajjhānānieva pana āneñjapattānināma honti.
analyzed: na hi tāni āneñjapattānināma honti arūpajjhānāni eva pana āneñjapattānināma honti

original: Tasmā tāni samāpajjanto adhimattasaddenapi navuṭṭhātiyevāti. Tesu pana tathā āpātamāgatesu
analyzed: tasmā tāni samāpajjantaḥ adhimatta saddena api tesu pana tathā āpātam āgatesu

original: tadārammaṇāni vīthicittāni pavattantiyevāti navattabbaṃ. Bhavaṅga santatiyāvā javanasantatiyāvā
analyzed: tad ārammaṇāni vīthi cittāni pavattanti yeva ati

original: vocchinnāya pavattanti. Avocchinnāya napavattanti. Pavattamānānipi ārammaṇā dhimattādivasena
analyzed: vocchinnāya pavattanti avocchinnāya na pavattanti pavattamānāni pi ārammaṇāḥ dhimatta ādi vasena

original: laddhapaccayavisese ekekasmiṃ ārammaṇeeva pavattanti. Na ekakkhaṇe pañcasūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: laddha paccaya visese ekekasmin ārammaṇe eva pavattanti na eka kkhaṇe pañcasu iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Etthaca atthavasā vibhatti pariṇāmoti katvā ekacittakkhaṇātītāni ṭhitipattāneva pañcā
analyzed: ettha ca attha vasā vibhatti pariṇāmaḥ ti katvā eka cittakkhaṇa atītāni ṭhiti pattāni eva pañca

original: lambaṇāni ekacittakkhaṇātīte ṭhitippatte eva pañcadvāre bahu cittakkhaṇātītāni bahucittakkhaṇātīteti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: lambaṇāni eka citta khaṇa atīte ṭhiti ppatte eva pañca dvāre citta khaṇa atītāni bahu citta khaṇa atīta iti yojetabbam

original: [127] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Te pana pasādā bhavaṅgacalanassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgena saddhiṃ uppannā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: te pana pasādāḥ bhavaṅga calanassa anantara paccaya bhūtena bhavaṅgena saddhim uppannā iti vuttam

original: Evaṃ pana sati bahucittakkhaṇātītānipi pañcālambaṇāni ekacittakkhaṇātīteeva pañcadvāre
analyzed: evam pana sati bahu citta kkhaṇa atītāni pi pañca ālambaṇāni eka citta kkhaṇa atīte eva pañca dvāre

original: āpātamāgacchantīti āpajjati. Eta rahi pana ekakkhaṇe sahuppannānaññeva vatthārammaṇānaṃ
analyzed: āpātam āgacchanti iti āpajjati eta rahi pana eka kkhaṇe sahuppannānaṃ aññeva vattha ārammaṇānam

original: ghaṭṭanaṃ icchanti. Sahuppannānivā pana hontu nānuppannānivā, balavabhāvoyeva pamaṇanti
analyzed: ghaṭṭanam icchanti sahuppannāni iva pana hontu na anuppannāni iva

original: amhākaṃ khanti. Sabbaṃ vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: amhākam khanti sabbam vicāretvā gahetabbam

original: [128] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Āvajjanena saddhiṃ uppannāti apare”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
analyzed: āvajjanena saddhim uppannā ati aparā iti vuttam tat na yujjati

original: Evañhi sati aññadeva pañcārammaṇānaṃ āpātāgamanavatthu. Aññadeva pañcaviññāṇānaṃ
analyzed: evam hi sati aññadeva pañca ārammaṇānaṃ āpāta āgamana vatthu aññadeva pañca viññāṇānaṃ

original: nissayavatthūti evaṃ viruddhassa atthassa āpajjanatoti. Evaṃ pañcadvāre visayapavattiyā
analyzed: nissaya vatthū ti evam viruddhassa atthassa āpajjanato ti evam pañca dvāre visaya pavattiyā

original: ādilakkhaṇaṃ dassetvā idāni sabbapāripūraṃ visayapavattivibhāgaṃ vīthicittapavattiñca
analyzed: ādi lakkhaṇam dassetvā idāni sabba pāripūram visaya pavatti vibhāgam vīthi citta pavattiñca

original: dassento tasmātiādimāha. Tatoti tasmā cakkhussa āpātāgamanapaccayā. Cakkhussa āpātāgamanena
analyzed: dassentaḥ tasmā tiādim āha tatas ti tasmā cakkhussa āpāta āgamana paccayā cakkhussa āpāta āgamanena

original: saheva bhavaṅgassapi āpātaṃ āgacchatiyevāti vuttaṃ dvikkhattuṃbhavaṅgecaliteti. Calanañcettha
analyzed: sahā iva bhavaṅgassa api āpātam āgacchatiyā iva ati vuttam dvi khattum bhavaṅge calitā iti calanam ca ittha

original: yathā gahitaṃ kammādi ārammaṇaṃ muñcitvā idāni attani āpātaṃ āgacchantaṃ abhinavārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: yathā gahitam kamma ādi ārammaṇam muñcitvā idāni attani āpātam āgacchantam abhinava ārammaṇam

original: gahetuṃ ussāhajātassa viya bhavaṅgasantānassa vikārappatti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etthaca cakkhussa
analyzed: gahetum ussāha jātassa viya bhavaṅga santānassa vikāra ppatti daṭṭhabbam ettha ca cakkhussa

original: āpātāgamanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇuppattiyā eva kāraṇaṃ. Na āvajjanuppattiyā. Bhavaṅgassa
analyzed: āpāta āgamanam cakkhu viññāṇa uppattiyāḥ eva kāraṇam na āvajjan uppattiyāḥ bhavaṅgassa

original: āpātāgamanameva pana āvajjanuppattiyāpi kāraṇaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: āpāta āgamanam eva pana āvajjan uppattiyā api kāraṇam hoti iti daṭṭhabbam

original: [129] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Manodvārepi āpātāgamanaṃ visuṃ apatvā rūpādīnaṃ cakkhādisu ghaṭṭanaṃnāma yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pi āpāta āgamanam visum a patvā rūpa ādīnam cakkha ādisu ghaṭṭanam nāma yogya desa avaṭṭhānam

original: eva. Tamevaca bhavaṅgu pacchedassapi kāraṇaṃ hotīti katvā “pañcasu hi pasādesu yogyadesāvaṭṭhāna
analyzed: eva tam eva ca bhavaṅgu pacchedassa api kāraṇam hoti iti katvā pañcasu hi pasādesu

original: vasena ārammaṇe ghaṭṭite pasādaghaṭṭanānubhāvena bhavaṅgasantati vocchijjamānātiādi”
analyzed: vasena ārammaṇe ghaṭṭite pasāda ghaṭṭana anubhāvena bhavaṅga santati

original: vuttaṃ. Taṃ tathā na daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam tam tathā na daṭṭhabbam

original: Na hi yogyadesāvaṭṭhānameva ghaṭṭananti sakkā vattuṃ. Yogyadesepana ṭhatvā nimittaghaṭṭanavasena
analyzed: na hi yogya desa avaṭṭhānam eva sakkā vattum nimitta ghaṭṭana vasena

original: vatthughaṭṭanavasenaca asani nipātoviya pasādesu yujjhanaṃ manthanaṃ khobhakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: vatthu ghaṭṭana vasena ca pasādesu yujjhanam manthanam khobha karaṇam

original: ghaṭṭananti ca āpātāgamananti ca vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayañca attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.
analyzed: ghaṭṭananti ca āpāta āgamananti ca vuccati iti daṭṭhabbam ayam ca atthaḥ heṭṭhā vuttaḥ yeva

original: Etthaca ayaṃpi eko dhammaniyāmoyevāti katvā nānā ṭhāniyesu dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu saheva
analyzed: ettha ca ayam pi ekaḥ katvā nānā ṭhāniyesu dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu saha iva

original: āpātāgamanaṃ paccetabbaṃ. Rūpādinā pasāde ghaṭṭite taṃ nissitasseva pañcaviññāṇassa
analyzed: āpāta āgamanam paccetabbam rūpa ādinā pasāde ghaṭṭite tam nissitassa iva pañca viññāṇassa

original: calanaṃ siyā. Kathaṃ pana hadayavatthunissitassa bhavaṅgassāti na codetabbanti.
analyzed: calanam siyā katham pana hadaya vatthu nissitassa bhavaṅgassa ati na codetabbanti

original: [130] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Tameva codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā taṃ pariharanto “santati vasena ekābaddhattā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: tam eva codanam samuṭṭhāpetvā tam pariharantaḥ santati vasena

original: Tattha santativasenāti navattabbaṃ. Saṇṭhānavasenāti pana vattabbaṃ. Sabbañcetaṃ
analyzed: tattha santati vasena ati na vattabbam saṇṭhāna vasena ati pana vattabbam sabbam ca itam

original: sārato na paccetabbaṃ.
analyzed: sārataḥ na paccetabbam

original: Kasmā, tādisassa anukkamacalanassa aṭṭhakathāyameva daḷhaṃ paṭikkhittattā. Vuttañhi
analyzed: kasmā tādisassa anukkama calanassa aṭṭhakathā ayam eva daḷham paṭikkhitta ttā vuttam hi

original: tattha ekekaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpātamāgacchatīti. Rūpārammaṇañhi cakkhupasādaṃ
analyzed: tattha ekekam ārammaṇam dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu āpātam āgacchati iti rūpa ārammaṇam hi cakkhu pasādam

original: ghaṭṭetvā taṅkhaṇeyeva manodvāre āpātaṃ āgacchati. Bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayo hotīti
analyzed: ghaṭṭetvā manodvāre āpātam āgacchati bhavaṅga calanassa paccayo hoti iti

original: attho. Sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabbesupi eseva nayo. Yathā hi sakuṇo ākāsenāgantvā
analyzed: attho sadda gandha rasa phoṭṭhabbesu pi esa iva nayaḥ yathā hi sakuṇaḥ ākāsena āgantvā

original: rukkhagge nilīyamānova rukkhasākhañca ghaṭṭeti. Chāyācassa pathaviyaṃ paṭihaññati.
analyzed: rukkha agge nilīyamānaḥ iva rukkha sākham ca ghaṭṭeti chāyācassa pathaviyam paṭihaññati

original: Sākhāghaṭṭana chāyāpharaṇāni apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva bhavanti. Evaṃ paccuppannarūpādīnaṃ
analyzed: sākhā ghaṭṭana chāyā pharaṇāni apubbam acarimam eka khaṇe iva bhavanti evam paccuppanna rūpa ādīnam

original: cakkhupasādādighaṭṭanañca bhavaṅgacālana samatthatāyamanodvāreāpātāgamanañcaapubbaṃ
analyzed: cakkhu pasāda ādi ghaṭṭanam ca bhavaṅga cālana samattha tā yamanaḥ dvāre āpāta āgamanañca apubbam

original: acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva hotīti. Evaṃ sakuṇopamāya sahataṅkhaṇeyevāti ca apubbaṃacarimaṃ
analyzed: acarimam hoti iti evam sakuṇa upamāya ca apubbam acarimam

original: ekakkhaṇe yevātica vatvā daḷhaṃ paṭibhiddhattā taṃ anukkamacalanaṃ acintetvā dhammaniyāmavasena
analyzed: eka khaṇe yeva ati ca vatvā daḷham tam anukkama calanam a cintetvā dhamma niyāma vasena

original: ekappahāracalanameva paccetabbanti. Bhavaṅgasotaṃvocchinditvāti bhavaṅgapavāhaṃ sabbaso
analyzed: eka ppahāra calanam eva paccetabbanti bhavaṅga sotam vā ucchinditvā ati bhavaṅga pavāham sabbaso

original: avacchinnaṃ katvā. Āvajjantanti adisvāva kiṃnāmetanti āvajja mānaṃ. Passantanti atta
analyzed: avacchinnam katvā āvajjantanti kiṃnāmetanti āvajja mānam passantanti

original: paccakkhaṃ kurumānaṃ. Sampaṭicchantanti muñcituṃ adatvā yathādiṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ paṭi gaṇhantaṃ.
analyzed: paccakkham kurumānam sampaṭicchantam anti muñcitum a datvā yathādiṭṭham rūpam paṭi gaṇhantam

original: Santīrayamānanti suṭṭhu tīrentaṃvicārentaṃ. Vavatthapentanti suṭṭhu asaṅkarato thapentaṃ
analyzed: suṭṭhu tīrentam vicārentam suṭṭhu asaṅkarataḥ thapentam

original: sallakkhentanti attho. Yonisomanasikārādivasena laddhopaccayo yenāti laddhapaccayaṃ.
analyzed: atthaḥ yoniso manasikāra ādi vasena laddha upaccayaḥ yena ati laddha paccayam

original: Yaṃkiñci javanaṃ javatīti sambandho. Taṃ pana javanaṃ ārammaṇassa dubbalakālevā mucchā
analyzed: yaṃ kiñci javanam javati iti sambandho tam pana javanam ārammaṇassa mucchā

original: maraṇāsannakālesuvā chakkhattuṃ vā pañcakkhattumevavā javatīti vuttaṃ yebhuyyenāti.
analyzed: maraṇa āsanna kālesu vā cha khattum vā pañca khattum eva vā javati iti vuttam yebhuyyena ati

original: Javatīti asaninipātasadisena javena pavattati. Tattha pathamajavanaṃ aladdhā sevanattā
analyzed: javati iti asani nipāta sadisena javena pavattati tattha pathama javanam aladdhā

original: sabbadubbalaṃ hoti. Tato dutīyaṃ balavaṃ. Tato tatīyaṃ. Tato catutthaṃ. Idaṃ pana
analyzed: sabba dubbalam hoti tatas dutīyam balavam tatas tatīyam tatas catuttham idam pana

original: sabbabalavaṃ muddhapattaṃ hoti. Ito paṭṭhāya anukkamena parihāyamānaṃ pavattati.
analyzed: sabba balavam muddha pattam hoti itas paṭṭhāya anukkamena parihāyamānam pavattati

original: Sattamavāre gate parikkhīṇajavaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ. Javanā nubandhāniti yathā paṭisotaṃ
analyzed: sattama vāre gate parikkhīṇa javam hoti iti veditabbam javanā yathā paṭisotam

original: gacchantiṃ nāvaṃ udakaṃ thokaṃ anubandhati anugacchati. Evaṃ javanaṃ anubandhāni.
analyzed: gacchantim nāvam udakam thokam anubandhati anugacchati evam javanam anubandhāni

original: Dve tadārammaṇapākānīti dvikkhattuṃ tadārammaṇakiccāni vipākacittāni pavattanti.
analyzed: dve tad ārammaṇa pākāni iti dvi kkhattum tad ārammaṇa kiccāni vipāka cittāni pavattanti

original: Yathārahanti ārammaṇajavana sattānurūpaṃ. Bhavaṅgapātoti imasmiṃ atihantārammaṇe
analyzed: yathā ārahanti imasmin atihanta ārammaṇe

original: āvajjanato pathamabhavaṅgacalanatoyevavā paṭṭhāya uṭṭhitaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃ cittasantānaṃ
analyzed: āvajjanāt paṭṭhāya uṭṭhitam samuṭṭhitam citta santānam

original: yāvacatutthajavanā samuṭṭhahitvā pañcamajavanato paṭṭhāya patitameva hoti. Evaṃ santepi
analyzed: yāva catuttha javanā samuṭṭhahitvā pañcama javanataḥ paṭṭhāya patitam eva hoti evam sante pi

original: samuṭṭhitavegassa sabbaso aparikkhīṇatāya patitanti navuccati. Dutīyatadārammaṇato

original: paraṃ pana samuṭṭhitavegassa sabbaso parikkhīṇattā tadā eva taṃcittasantānaṃ patitaṃnāma
analyzed: param pana samuṭṭhita vegassa sabbaso parikkhīṇa ttā tadā eva tat citta santānam patitam nāma

original: hoti. Tasmā patanaṃ pāto. Bhavaṅgabhāvenacittasantānassa pāto bhavaṅgapāto, bhavaṅgaṃ
analyzed: hoti tasmā patanam pātaḥ bhavaṅga bhāvena citta santānassa pātaḥ bhavaṅga pātaḥ bhavaṅgam

original: hutvā pātoti attho daṭṭhabbo. Bhavaṅgakicce bhavaṅgaṭṭhāne bhavaṅgārammaṇeca pāto
analyzed: hutvā pāto ti atthaḥ daṭṭhabbo bhavaṅga kicce bhavaṅga ṭṭhāne bhavaṅga ārammaṇe ca pāto

original: bhavaṅgapātotivā. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne dovārikopamā, gāmillopamā, ambopamāca vattabbā. Tāsabbāpi
analyzed: imasmin ṭhāne dovārika upamā gāmilla upamā ambā upamā ca vattabbā

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ gahetabbā. Ettāvatā sattarassa cittakkhaṇāni paripūrepāti sambandho.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā ayam gahetabbā ettāvatā sattarassa cittakkhaṇāni sambandho

original: Etthaca chachakkayojanā vattabbā. Yattha hi rūntī rammaṇaṃ ghaṭṭeti. Taṃ cakkhuvatthuṃ
analyzed: ettha ca cha chakka yojanā vattabbā yattha hi rūntī rammaṇam ghaṭṭeti tam cakkhu vatthum

original: nissāya tattha ghaṭṭitaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ ārabbha cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjati. Itarāni pana
analyzed: nissāya tattha ghaṭṭitam rūpa ārammaṇam ārabbha cakkhu viññāṇam uppajjati itarāni pana

original: āvajjanādīni mano viññāṇāni attano attano atītānantaracittena sahuppannaṃ hadayavatthuṃ
analyzed: āvajjana ādīni manaḥ viññāṇāni attanaḥ attanaḥ atīta anantara cittena sahuppannam hadaya vatthum

original: nissāya tamevārammaṇaṃ ārabbha uppajjanti. Cakkhudvāra manodvārāni sabbesaṃpi vīthicittānaṃ
analyzed: nissāya tam eva ārammaṇam ārabbha uppajjanti cakkhu dvāra manaḥ dvārāni sabbesaṃ pi vīthi cittānaṃ

original: dvārakiccaṃ sādhenti. Ayañca vīthi cakkhudvāre uppannattā cakkhudvāravīthīti. Cakkhuviññāṇena
analyzed: dvāra kiccam sādhenti ayam ca vīthi cakkhu dvāre uppanna ttā cakkhu dvāra vīthi iti cakkhu viññāṇena

original: upalakkhitattā cakkhuviññāṇavīthītica vuccati. Ekacittakkhaṇaṃ atikkamma ghaṭṭanasamatthe
analyzed: upalakkhita ttā cakkhu viññāṇa vīthī iti ca vuccati eka citta kkhaṇam atikkamma ghaṭṭana samatthe

original: atibalavā rammaṇe uppannattā atimahantārammaṇa vīthītica vuccatīti. Etthaca yattakāni
analyzed: ati balavā ārammaṇe uppanna ttā ati mahantā ārammaṇa vīthī iti ca vuccati iti ettha ca yattakāni

original: rūpārammaṇāni cakkhupathe uppajjitvā ṭhitippattāni honti. Tāni tattakāni ṭhitippattesu
analyzed: rūpa ārammaṇāni cakkhu pathe uppajjitvā ṭhiti pattāni honti tāni tattakāni ṭhiti ppattesu

original: pubbāparabhūtesu ekūna paññāsaparimāṇesu cakkhupasādesu kismiṃci naghaṭṭentīti navattabbāni.
analyzed: pubba apara bhūtesu ekūna paññāsa parimāṇesu cakkhu pasādesu kismiṃci na ghaṭṭenti iti na vattabbāni

original: Tesu pana yadeva ekaṃ cakkhu imissā vīthiyā yathārahaṃ vatthubhāvaṃ dvārabhāvañca
analyzed: tesu pana yat eva ekam cakkhu imissā vīthiyāḥ yathāraham vatthu bhāvam dvāra bhāvañca

original: sādheti. Yatthaca ghaṭṭitaṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha ayaṃ vīthi pavattati. Etadeva kicca sādhanaṃ

original: nāma hoti. Yaṃ majjhimāyukanti vadanti, itarāni pana mogha vatthūnināma honti, yānimandāyukānītiamandāyukānītica
analyzed: nāma hoti yam majjhima āyukanti vadanti itarāni pana mogha honti yāni manda āyukāni iti a manda āyukāni iti ca

original: vadanti. Tānipana yathāvutta kicca sādhanato purimāni pacchimānīti duvidhāni honti,
analyzed: vadanti tāni pana yathāvutta kicca sādhanato purimāni pacchimāni iti duvidhāni honti

original: tadubhayānipi cakkhuviññāṇassa uppādakkhaṇe ṭhitibhāvena labbhamānāni aṭṭhacattālīsamattāni
analyzed: tad ubhayāni pi cakkhu viññāṇassa uppāda kkhaṇe ṭhiti bhāvena labbhamānāni aṭṭha cattālīsa mattāni

original: veditabbānīti. Avasesāni pana tato purimatarāni pacchimakarānica laddhaghaṭṭanānipi
analyzed: veditabbāni iti avasesāni pana tatas purimatarāni pacchima karāni ca laddha ghaṭṭanāni pi

original: vatthudvārakiccasiddhibhāve anāsaṅkitabbattā idha nagahitānīti. Ettha siyā imāya
analyzed: vatthu dvāra kicca siddhi bhāve an āsaṅkitabba ttā idha na gahitāni iti ettha siyā imāya

original: vīthiyā uppattisamaye so puggalo ahaṃ idaṃ nāma passāmīti jānāti, na jānātīti. Najānāti.
analyzed: vīthiyāḥ uppatti samaye saḥ puggalaḥ aham idam nāma passāmi iti jānāti na jānāti iti na jānāti

original: Kadā pana jānātīti. Sallakkhaṇavīthiyā pavattamānāya. Tathā hi sabbapathamaṃ cakkhudvāravīthi
analyzed: kadā pana jānāti iti sat lakkhaṇa vīthiyā pavattamānāya tathā hi sabba pathamam cakkhu dvāra vīthi

original: pavattati. Tato tadanuvattikā manodvāravīthi. Tato samudāyagāhikā. Tato vaṇṇasallakkhaṇā.
analyzed: pavattati tatas tad anuvattikā manaḥ dvāra vīthi tatas samudāya gāhikā tatas vaṇṇa sat lakkhaṇā

original: Tato vatthugāhitā. Tato vatthusallakkhaṇā tato nāmagāhikā. Tato nāmasallakkhaṇāti.
analyzed: tatas vatthu gāhitā tatas vatthu sallakkhaṇā tatas nāmagāhikā tatas nāma sallakkhaṇā ati

original: Tattha vaṇṇasallakkhaṇāya pavattamānāya ahaṃ nīlavaṇṇaṃ passāmītiādinā vaṇṇaṃ sallakkheti.
analyzed: tattha vaṇṇa sallakkhaṇāya pavattamānāya aham nīla vaṇṇam passāmi iti ādinā vaṇṇam sat lakkheti

original: Vatthusallakkhaṇāya saṇṭhānaṃ sallakkheti. Nāma sallakkhaṇāya nāmaṃ sallakkhetīti.
analyzed: vatthu sallakkhaṇāya saṇṭhānam sallakkheti nāma sallakkhaṇāya nāmam sallakkheti iti

original: Iti taṃtaṃ sallakkhaṇavīthi yā pavattamānāyaeva taṃtaṃpassāmīti jānātīti. Etthaca
analyzed: iti taṃ tam sat lakkhaṇa vīthi yā pavattamānāya eva taṃ taṃ passāmi iti jānāti iti ettha ca

original: alātacakkassa gāhikāviya purimāhi dvīhi vīthīhi punappunaṃ gahitānaṃ rūpānaṃ samudāyato
analyzed: alāta cakkassa purimāhi dvīhi vīthīhi punappunam gahitānam rūpānam samudāyataḥ

original: gāhikā tatīyā manodvāravīthi samudāya gāhikānāma, na hi samudāyagahaṇena vinā paribyattavaṇṇagahaṇaṃ
analyzed: gāhikā tatīyā manaḥ dvāra vīthi gāhikā nāma na hi samudāya gahaṇena vinā paribyatta vaṇṇa gahaṇam

original: sambhavatīti. Yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pana appahontātītakanti dvikkhattuṃ yāva tadārammaṇuppādā
analyzed: sambhavati iti yāva tad ārammaṇa uppādā pana dvi kkhattum yāva tad ārammaṇa uppādā

original: pavattituṃ appahontaṃ hutvā atītadvatticittakkhaṇikaṃ. Yassa hi dvevā tīṇivā cittakkhaṇāni
analyzed: pavattitum appahontam hutvā atīta dvatti cittakkhaṇikam yassa hi dve vā tīṇi vā cittakkhaṇāni

original: atītāni honti. Taṃ yāva tadārammaṇuppādā pavattituṃ nappahoti na sakkoti. Evaṃ appahontaṃ
analyzed: atītāni honti tam yāva tad ārammaṇa uppādā pavattitum na pahoti na sakkoti evam a pahontam

original: hutvā atītakanti attho. Apātamāgatanti cakkhudvāre manodvāreca āpātaṃ āgataṃ. Natthi
analyzed: hutvā atītakanti attho apātam āgatanti cakkhu dvāre manaḥ dvāre ca āpātam āgatam natthi

original: tadārammaṇuppādoti ettha yassa tīṇi cittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti. Tassa cuddasa cittakkhaṇāyukāvase
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa uppādaḥ ti ettha yassa tīṇi cittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti tassa cuddasa cittakkhaṇa āyukā vase

original: sassa ārammaṇassa sattamajavanena saheva niruddhattā tasmiṃ natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti
analyzed: sassa ārammaṇassa sattama javanena saha iva niruddha ttā tasmin natthi tad ārammaṇa uppādo ti

original: yuttametaṃ. Na hi ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ cittāni dhammavasena viya kālavasenāpi nānārammaṇāni
analyzed: yuttam etam na hi eka āvajjana vīthiyam cittāni dhamma vasena viya kāla vasena api nānā ārammaṇāni

original: icchanti aṭṭhakathācariyāti. Yassa pana dve cittakkhaṇāni atītāni. Tasmiṃ sattamajavanato
analyzed: icchanti aṭṭhakathā cariyā ti yassa pana dve cittakkhaṇāni atītāni tasmim sattama javanato

original: paraṃ ekacittakkhaṇāyukāvasese ārammaṇe ekena tadārammaṇena uppajjitabbanti ce.Na.
analyzed: param eka citta khaṇa āyuka avasese ārammaṇe ekena tad ārammaṇena uppajjitabbanti

original: Na hi tādisaṃ nirodhā sannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ekavāraṃpi tadārammaṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ
analyzed: na hi tādisam nirodhā sannam ārammaṇam eka vāram pi tad ārammaṇa uppattiyāḥ paccayaḥ bhavitum

original: sakkotīti. Tathā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vipākuddhāre cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ tadārammaṇāni
analyzed: sakkoti iti tathā hi mahā aṭṭhakathā ayam vipākuddhāre citta ppavatti gaṇanāyam tad ārammaṇāni

original: dveti dveeva tadārammaṇa vārā āgatāti.
analyzed: dve iti dve eva tad ārammaṇa vārā āgatā ati

original: Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Dvikkhattumeva hi tadārammaṇuppatti pāḷiyaṃ niyamitā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha pāḷiyanti
analyzed: dvi kkhattum eva hi tad ārammaṇa uppatti pāḷiyam niyamitā iti vuttam tattha pāḷiyam ti

original: aṭṭhakathātantiṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Na hi sā nāma pāḷi atthi, yattha dvikkhattuṃ

original: tadā rammaṇuppatti niyamitāti.
analyzed: tadā rammaṇa uppatti niyamitā ati

original: Majjhimabhāṇakāpana tadārammaṇaṃ ekaṃpi icchanti. Saṅgahakārena pana taṃ paṭisiddhanti
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam icchanti saṅgaha kārena pana tam

original: idhapi taṃ therena paṭikkhittanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā paramatthavinicchaye
analyzed: idha api tam therena paṭikkhittanti daṭṭhabbam yadi evam kasmai paramattha vinicchaye

original: sakiṃdvevā tadālambanti therena vuttanti. Majjhimabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttanti daṭṭhabbanti.
analyzed: therena vuttan ti majjhima bhāṇakānam matena vuttan ti daṭṭhabbanti

original: Ācariyānandatthero pana ekaṃpi icchatiyeva. Yathā hi āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ ekaṃ pavattati.
analyzed: ācariya ānanda tthero pana yathā hi āgantuka bhavaṅgam ekam pavattati

original: Tathā tadārammaṇaṃpi ekaṃ napavattatīti nasakkā vattuṃ. Yañca cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ
analyzed: tathā tad ārammaṇam pi ekam na pavattati iti na sakkā vattum yat ca

original: tadārammaṇāni dveti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena vuttanti, na nasakkā vattunti.
analyzed: tad ārammaṇāni dve ti vuttam tat pi ukkaṭṭha pariccheda vasena vuttan ti na na sakkā vattunti

original: Yāva javanuppādāpi pavattituṃ appahontātītakanti sambandho. Yassa hi ārammaṇassa
analyzed: yāva javan uppādā api pavattitum sambandhaḥ yassa hi ārammaṇassa

original: cattāri pañca cha satta aṭṭhanava vā cittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti. Taṃ yāva javanuppādā
analyzed: cattāri pañca cha satta aṭṭhanava vā cittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti tam yāva javanuppādā

original: pavattituṃ nappahoti. Evaṃ appahontaṃ hutvā atītakanti attho. Javanaṃpi anuppajjitvāti
analyzed: pavattitum na pahoti evam appahontam hutvā atītakam ti attho javanam pi an uppajjitvā iti

original: javanassapi anuppajjanato. Ayañhi tvāpaccayo bhāvattheeva daṭṭhabbo. Na kattuatthe.
analyzed: an uppajjanataḥ ayam hi tvā paccayaḥ bhāva tthe eva daṭṭhabbaḥ na kattu atthe

original: Kasmā. Attano padhānakriyāya samānakattukatāya abhāvatoti.
analyzed: kasmai padhāna kriyāya samāna kattuka tāya

original: [131] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Hetumhicāyaṃ tvāpaccayo”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
analyzed: hetumhi ca ayam vuttam tam na sundaram

original: Na hi bāhiratthabhūto hetuattho kitakapaccayānaṃ visayo hotīti. Tasmā idha bhāvattheeva
analyzed: na hi bāhirattha bhūtaḥ hetu atthaḥ kitaka paccayānam visayaḥ hoti iti tasmai idha bhāva tthe eva

original: tvāpaccayo. Tatoca hetuatthe paccattavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etena yā lakkhaṇe hetumhicamānantapaccayānaṃpi
analyzed: tvā paccayaḥ tatas ca hetu atthe paccatta vacanan ti daṭṭhabbam etena yā lakkhaṇe

original: pavatti katthaci vuttā. Sāpipaṭikkhittā hoti. Nahi bāhiratthabhūtā lakkhaṇahetuyo
analyzed: pavatti katthaci vuttā sā api paṭikkhittā hoti nahi bāhirattha bhūtāḥ lakkhaṇa hetuyo

original: tesaṃ visayā hontīti. Etthaca yassa ārammaṇassa navacittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti.
analyzed: tesam visayāḥ honti iti ettha ca yassa ārammaṇassa nava cittakkhaṇāni atītāni honti

original: Tassa avasesa aṭṭhacittakkhaṇā yukassa dutīya voṭṭhabbanena saheva niruddhattā tasmiṃ
analyzed: tassa avasesa aṭṭha cittakkhaṇā dutīya voṭṭhabbanena saha iva tasmin

original: javanaṃpi anuppajjitvāti yuttametaṃ. Kāraṇaṃ vuttameva. Yassa pana cattāri.La. Aṭṭhavā
analyzed: javanam pi an uppajjitvā ti yuttam etam kāraṇam vuttam eva yassa pana

original: cittakkhaṇāni atītāni. Tasmiṃ javanena uppannena bhavitabbanti ce.Na. Avasesachacittakkhaṇāyukaṃpi
analyzed: citta khaṇāni atītāni tasmin javanena uppannena bhavitabbanti cena avasesa cha citta kkhaṇa āyukaṃ pi

original: hi ārammaṇaṃ javanuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti. Javanañhi uppajjamānaṃ sattakkhattuṃ
analyzed: hi ārammaṇam javan uppattiyā paccayaḥ bhavitum na sakkoti javanam hi uppajjamānam satta kkhattum

original: pavattituṃ pahonake ārammaṇe eva uppajjati. Pakatiniyāmena javanassa sattakkhattu
analyzed: pavattitum pahonake ārammaṇe eva uppajjati pakati niyāmena javanassa satta kkhattu

original: paramatāya sambhavatoti. Ettha pana yathā visaññikāla mucchākāla maraṇakālesu vatthussa
analyzed: parama tāya sambhavato ti ettha pana yathā vatthussa

original: avisadatāya dubbalatā yaca javanaṃ chapañcavārepi pavattati. Tathā pakatikālepi ārammaṇassa
analyzed: dubbala tā ya ca javanam cha pañca vāre pi pavattati tathā pakati kāle pi ārammaṇassa

original: dubbalabhāve sati chapañcavārepi pavattatiyevāti. Dvattikkhattunti dvikkhattuṃvā
analyzed: dubbala bhāve sati cha pañca vāre pi pavattatiyā iva ati dvatti kkhattum ti dvi kkhattum vā

original: tikkhattuṃvā. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ voṭṭhabbane ṭhatvā ekaṃvā dvevā cittāni pavattanti.
analyzed: tikkhattum vā tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyam voṭṭhabbane ṭhatvā ekam vā dve vā cittāni pavattanti

original: Tato āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā puna bhavaṅgaṃ otaratīti vuttaṃ. Ettha
analyzed: tatas āsevanam labhitvā javana ṭṭhāne ṭhatvā puna bhavaṅgam otarati iti vuttam ettha

original: hi tato āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvāti etena tatīyassa voṭṭhabbanassa pavattiṃ
analyzed: hi tatas āsevanam labhitvā javana ṭṭhāne ṭhatvā iti etena tatīyassa voṭṭhabbanassa pavattim

original: dasseti. Itarathā ekaṃvā dvevā cittāni pavattanti. Tato bhavaṅgaṃ otaratīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: dasseti itarathā ekam vā dve vā cittāni pavattanti tatas bhavaṅgam otarati iti vuttam

original: siyāti. Ekaṃvāti pana vācā siliṭṭhamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā diratta tirattaṃti. Athavā,
analyzed: siyā ti ekaṃvā ti pana vācā daṭṭhabbam yathā athavā

original: tatoti ekacittatovā dvicittatovāti attho. Tattha pathamena dvikkhattuṃ dutīyena tikkhattuṃ
analyzed: tatas ti eka cittataḥ vā dvi cittataḥ vā ti attho tattha pathamena dvi khattum dutīyena ti khattum

original: voṭṭhabbanassa uppatti vuttā hotīti. Āsevanaṃ labhitvāti idaṃ pana upacāravacanamattaṃ
analyzed: voṭṭhabbanassa uppatti vuttā hoti iti āsevanam labhitvā iti idam pana upacāra vacana mattam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanatā paṭṭhāne vuttāti. Ācariyānandattherena
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam na hi voṭṭhabbanassa āsevana tā paṭṭhāne vuttā iti ācariya ānanda therena

original: panettha voṭṭhabbanato paraṃ catupañca cittakkhaṇāvasese ārammaṇe catupañcajavanuppattiyā
analyzed: pana ittha voṭṭhabbanato param catu pañca cittakkhaṇa avasese ārammaṇe catu pañca javan uppattiyā

original: eva parittārammaṇavāro icchito. Na voṭṭhabbana pariyosānavasena. Paṭṭhānehi bhavaṅgaṃ
analyzed: eva paritta ārammaṇa vāro icchitaḥ na voṭṭhabbana pariyosāna vasena paṭṭhānehi bhavaṅgam

original: āvajjanāya anantarapaccayena paccayo tvevavutto. Na pana vutto āvajjanā bhavaṅgassa
analyzed: āvajjanāya anantara paccayena paccayaḥ tu eva vuttaḥ na pana vuttaḥ āvajjanā bhavaṅgassa

original: anantarapaccayena paccayoti. Yathā ca mucchāmaraṇakālesu vatthudubbalatāya cha pañcajavanavārā
analyzed: anantara paccayena paccayo ti yathā ca mucchā maraṇa kālesu vatthu dubbala tāya cha pañca javana vārā

original: icchitabbā. Tathā idhapi ārammaṇadubbalatāyāti na na sakkā vattunti. Ettha ca santīraṇato
analyzed: icchitabbā tathā idha api ārammaṇa dubbala tāya ati na na sakkā vattun ti ettha ca santīraṇato

original: paraṃ ekacittakkhaṇā vasese ārammaṇe ekaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ dvicittakkhaṇāvasese dve taduttari
analyzed: param eka citta kkhaṇa avasese ārammaṇe ekam voṭṭhabbanam dvi citta kkhaṇa avasese dve tad uttari

original: tīṇīti yuttaṃ siyā. Etarahi pana dvivoṭṭhabbanikā chaparittārammaṇavīthiyoti voṭṭhabbanikā
analyzed: tīṇi iti yuttam siyā etarahi pana dvi voṭṭhabbanikā cha paritta ārammaṇa vīthiyaḥ ti voṭṭhabbanikā

original: pañcāti yojesuṃ. Evaṃ sante kīdise parittārammaṇe dvivoṭṭhabbanikā, kīdise tivoṭṭhabbanikāti
analyzed: pañca iti yojesuṃ evam sante kīdise paritta ārammaṇe dvi voṭṭhabbanikā kīdise ti voṭṭhabbanikā ati

original: vicāretabbā siyunti. Yaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ dvattikkhattuṃvoṭṭhabbanuppattiyā appahonakaṃ
analyzed: vicāretabbā siyuḥ ti yam pana ārammaṇam dvatti khattuṃ voṭṭhabba anuppattiyāḥ appahonakam

original: hoti. Taṃ āvajjanappattiyāpi paccayo na hotīti vuttaṃ tattha bhavaṅgacalanameva hoti.
analyzed: hoti tam āvajjana ppattiyā api paccayaḥ na hoti iti vuttam tattha bhavaṅga calanam eva hoti

original: Natthi vīthicittuppādoti. Tattha bhavaṅgacalanamevāti dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅgassa calanamattameva
analyzed: natthi vīthi cittuppādo ti tattha bhavaṅga calanam eva ati dvi khattum bhavaṅgassa calana mattam eva

original: hoti. Iccevaṃ cakkhudvāreti iti evaṃ yadi ekacittakkhaṇātītakaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa
analyzed: hoti iti ca evam cakkhu dvārā iti iti evam yadi eka citta khaṇa atītakam rūpa ārammaṇam cakkhussa

original: apātamāgacchatītiādinā vuttanayena cakkhudvāre catunnaṃ vārānaṃ vasena catudhā visayappavatti
analyzed: apātam āgacchati iti ādinā vutta nayena cakkhu dvāre catunnam vārānam vasena catudhā visaya ppavatti

original: veditabbā, tathā sotadvārādīsu cātiyojanā. Sabbathāpi catudhā veditabbāti sambandho.
analyzed: veditabbā tathā sotadvāra ādīsu ca atiyojanā sabbathā api catudhā veditabbā iti sambandho

original: Atiparittārammaṇaṃpi āpātāgatamattena moghavārassa ārammaṇaṃnāma hoti. Na ārammaṇakaraṇavasena.
analyzed: ati paritta ārammaṇam pi āpāta āgata mattena moghavārassa ārammaṇam nāma hoti na ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena

original: Itarāni pana ubhayathāpi itaresaṃ vārānaṃ ārammaṇānināma hontīti vuttaṃ catunnaṃ
analyzed: itarāni pana ubhayathā api itaresam vārānam ārammaṇāni nāma honti iti vuttam catunnam

original: vārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāti.
analyzed: yathākkamam ārammaṇa bhūtā ati

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Ārammaṇabhūtāti imassa atiparittārammaṇaṃ sandhāya paccayabhūtāti attho vutto. Tañhi moghavāra paññā panāya paccayo hotīti.
analyzed: ārammaṇa bhūtā ti imassa ati paritta ārammaṇam sandhāya paccaya bhūtā ti atthaḥ vutto tat hi moghavāra paññā panāya paccayaḥ hoti iti

original: Pañcadvārevīthicittāni yathārahaṃ kiccavasena satteva. Cittuppādā cittānaṃ uppattikhaṇavasena
catuddasa. Vitthārā cittasarūpavitthārato catupaññāsāti yojanā. Etthāti parittajavanavāre.
analyzed: catuddasa vitthārā citta sarūpa vitthārato catupaññāsā ati yojanā ettha ati paritta javana vāre

original: 137. Manodvāre pana ārammaṇadhammā parittakhaṇāpi atītānāgatāpi kālavimuttāpi āpātaṃ
analyzed: manaḥ dvāre pana ārammaṇa dhammā paritta khaṇā api atīta anāgatā api kāla vimuttā api āpātam

original: āgacchantiyeva. Tasmā tattha ekacittakkhaṇātītānivā bahucittakkhaṇātītānivā ṭhitippattāneva
analyzed: āgacchantiyā iva tasmā tattha eka citta kkhaṇa atītāni iva bahu citta kkhaṇa atītāni iva ṭhiti ppattāni eva

original: āpātamāgacchantīti idaṃ vidhānaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ manodvārepana yadivibhūtamālambaṇaṃ
analyzed: āpātam āgacchanti iti idam vidhānam na atthi iti vuttam

original: āpātamāgacchatīti. Tattha manodvāreti suddhamanodvāre. Cakkhādīsu hi ghaṭṭanena saheva
analyzed: āpātam āgacchati iti tattha manaḥ dvāra iti suddha manaḥ dvāre cakkha ādīsu hi ghaṭṭanena saha iva

original: yattha apātamāgacchati. Taṃ missakadvāranti vuccati. Idha pana suddhamevā dhippetanti.
analyzed: yattha apātam āgacchati tam missakadvāram ti vuccati idha pana

original: Taṃpi pañcadvārānubandhakaṃ visuṃ siddhanti duvidhaṃ hoti. Tattha yathā ghaṇḍe daṇḍakena
analyzed: pañca dvāra anubandhakam duvidham hoti tattha yathā ghaṇḍe daṇḍakena

original: ekavāraṃ pahaṭe ghaṇḍasarīrabhūtā rūpa kalāpā ciraṃpi kālaṃ aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭetvā
analyzed: eka vāram pahaṭe ghaṇḍa sarīra bhūtāḥ rūpa kalāpāḥ kālam aññam aññam ghaṭṭetvā

original: anuravasaddasantānaṃ pavattenti. Tathā pañcadvāre ārammaṇena ekavāraṃ ghaṭṭite pañca
analyzed: anurava sadda santānam pavattenti tathā pañca dvāre ārammaṇena eka vāram ghaṭṭite pañca

original: dvārikavīthiyā niruddhāyapi atītaṃ pañcālambaṇaṃ manodvāre yathā pātāgatameva hutvā

original: anekasahassānipi manodvārikavīthicitta santānāni pavattetiyeva. Tesaṃ pana dvārabhūtaṃ
analyzed: aneka sahassāni api manodvārika vīthi citta santānāni tesam pana dvāra bhūtam

original: bhavaṅgasantānaṃ anubandhakaṃnāma hoti. Tānica cittāni anubandhakavīthicittānināma
analyzed: bhavaṅga santānam anubandhakam nāma hoti tāni ca cittāni

original: honti. Yattha pana pañcadvāraghaṭṭanā nubandhabhāvena vinā kevalaṃ tathā tathā chaḷārammaṇadhammā
analyzed: honti yattha pana pañca dvāra ghaṭṭanā nubandha bhāvena vinā kevalam tathā tathā chaṭ ārammaṇa dhammā

original: āpātaṃ āgacchanti. Taṃ visuṃ siddhaṃ nāma hoti. Kathaṃ pana tasmiṃ visuṃ siddhe manodvāre
analyzed: āpātam āgacchanti tam visum siddham nāma hoti katham pana tasmin visum siddhe manaḥ dvāre

original: ārammaṇa dhammā āpātaṃ āgacchantīti. Vuccate. Diṭṭhato diṭṭhasambandhato sutato sutasambandhato
analyzed: ārammaṇa dhammā āpātam āgacchanti iti vuccate diṭṭhataḥ diṭṭha sambandhataḥ sutataḥ suta sambandhataḥ

original: saddhāya ruciyā ākāraparivitakkena diṭṭhinijjhānakhantiyā nānākammabalena nānāiddhibalena
analyzed: saddhāya ruciyā ākāra parivitakkena diṭṭhi nijjhāna khantiyā nānā kamma balena nānā iddhi balena

original: dhātukkhota vasena devatopasaṃhāravasena anubodhavasena paṭivedhavasenāti evamādīhi
analyzed: vasena devatā upasaṃhāra vasena anubodha vasena paṭivedha vasena ati evamādīhi

original: kāraṇehi āpātaṃ āgacchantīti. Tattha diṭṭhaṃnāma pubbe pañcahidvārehi gahitaṃ pañcālambaṇaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇehi āpātam āgacchanti iti tattha diṭṭham nāma pubbe pañca hi dvārehi gahitam pañca ālambaṇam

original: Taṃpi kālantare kāraṇalābhe sati suddhe manodvāre āpātaṃ āgacchatiyeva. Diṭṭhasambandhaṃnāma
analyzed: kāla antare kāraṇa lābhe sati suddhe manodvāre āpātam āgacchatiyā iva diṭṭhasambandham nāma

original: diṭṭhasadisaṃ vuccati. Pubbe hi kiñci disvā aññaṃ yaṃkiñci anumānentassa adiṭṭhaṃpi
analyzed: diṭṭha sadisam vuccati pubbe hi kiñci disvā aññam yaṃ kiñci anumānentassa adiṭṭham pi

original: taṃsadisaṃ atītaṃpi anāgataṃpi paccuppannaṃpi bahuāpātaṃ āgacchatiyeva. Sutaṃnāma
analyzed: taṃ sadisam atītam pi anāgatam pi paccuppannam pi bahu āpātam sutam nāma

original: parato sutvā gahitaṃ chaḷārammaṇaṃ. Taṃ pana mahāvisayaṃ hoti. Sabbaññudesanaṃ sutvā
analyzed: paratas sutvā gahitam chaṭ ārammaṇam tam pana mahā visayam hoti sabbaññu desanam sutvā

original: gahitaṃ na kiñci anārammaṇaṃnāma atthīti. Sutasambandhaṃnāma sutasadisaṃ. Saddhānāma
analyzed: gahitam na kiñci anārammaṇam nāma atthi iti suta sambandham nāma suta sadisam saddhā nāma

original: parassa saddahanā. Rucināma attano mati. Ākāra parivitakko nāma atthacchāyaṃ byañjanacchāyaṃ
analyzed: parassa ruci nāma mati ākāra parivitakkaḥ nāma attha chāyam byañjana chāyam

original: kāraṇacchāyañca nissāya tathā tathā parivitakkanaṃ. Diṭṭhinijjānakhantināma paññāyavā
analyzed: kāraṇa chāyañca nissāya tathā tathā parivitakkanam diṭṭhi nijjāna khanti nāma paññāya vā

original: attano laddhiyāvā punappunaṃ upaparikkhitvā evamevāti sanniṭṭhānaṃ pāpetvā gahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: attanaḥ laddhi yāvā punappunam upaparikkhitvā evam eva ati sanniṭṭhānam pāpetvā gahaṇam

original: Sesaṃ pākaṭameva. Etthaca anantarūpanissaya paccayabhāvonāma cittasantānassa mahāvipphāro
analyzed: sesam pākaṭam eva ettha ca ananta rūpa nissaya paccaya bhāvaḥ nāma citta santānassa mahā vipphāro

original: hoti. Sakiṃpi ārammaṇaṃ suṭṭhu āsevitvā niruddhakālato paṭṭhāya vassasatepi vassasahassepi
analyzed: hoti sakiṃpi ārammaṇam suṭṭhu āsevitvā niruddha kālataḥ paṭṭhāya vassa sate pi vassa sahasse pi

original: bhavantarepi taṃārammaṇaṃ paṭicca bhavaṅga calanassa paccayo hoti. Cittañcanāma diṭṭhādīhi
analyzed: bhavantare pi tam ārammaṇam paṭicca calanassa paccayaḥ hoti diṭṭha ādīhi

original: yathāvuttakāraṇehi saṃvaddhitaṃ mahāvipphāraṃ hoti. Kiñci nimittaṃ labhitvā ekasmiṃ
analyzed: yathā vutta kāraṇehi saṃvaddhitam mahā vipphāram hoti kiñci nimittam labhitvā ekasmin

original: khaṇe anekasahassesupi diṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇesu pharamānaṃ pavattati. Tehica kāraṇehi
analyzed: khaṇe aneka sahassesu pi diṭṭha ādīsu ārammaṇesu pharamānam pavattati tehi ca kāraṇehi

original: niccaṃ codīyamānaṃ cittasantānaṃ kāyagelaññādike cittadubbalapaccaye asati niccakālaṃpi
analyzed: niccam codīyamānam citta santānam kāya gelañña ādike citta dubbala paccaye asati nicca kālam pi

original: bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhātuṃ ajjhāsayayuttaṃ hoti. Na hi cittaṃnāma avibhūte ārammaṇe ramati.
analyzed: bhavaṅgataḥ vuṭṭhātum ajjhāsaya yuttam hoti na hi cittam nāma avibhūte ārammaṇe ramati

original: Vibhūteeva ramati. Tasmā bhavaṅgasampayutto manasikāro punappunaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ cāletvā
analyzed: ramati tasmai bhavaṅga sampayuttaḥ manasikāraḥ punappunam bhavaṅgam cāletvā

original: laddhapaccayesu ārammaṇesu punappunaṃ āvajjanaṃ niyojetiyeva. Tadā tāni ārammaṇāni
analyzed: laddha paccayesu ārammaṇesu punappunam āvajjanam tadā tāni ārammaṇāni

original: tadabhininnākāra pavattamanasikāra sampayuttassa bhavaṅga cittassa āpātaṃ āgacchanti.
analyzed: tad abhininna ākāra pavatta manasikāra sampayuttassa bhavaṅga cittassa āpātam āgacchanti

original: Na hi aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā pavattamānassa cittassa ārammaṇantare abhininnākāronāma
analyzed: na hi aññam ārammaṇam gahetvā pavattamānassa cittassa ārammaṇa antare abhininna ākāraḥ nāma

original: natthīti sakkā vattunti. Tadārammaṇapākāni pavattantīti idaṃ kāmasattavasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: natthi iti sakkā vattunti tad ārammaṇa pākāni pavattanti iti idam kāma satta vasena vuttam

original: Rūpārūpasattānaṃ pana vibhūtārammaṇepi tadārammaṇuppādo natthiyeva. Yathā cettha.
analyzed: rūpa arūpa sattānam pana vibhūta ārammaṇe pi tad ārammaṇa uppādaḥ yathā ca ittha

original: Evaṃ pañcadvārepi rūpasattānaṃ atimahantārammaṇesu tadārammaṇuppādo natthīti. Avibhūte
analyzed: evam pañca dvāre pi rūpa sattānam ati mahanta ārammaṇesu tad ārammaṇa uppādaḥ natthi iti avibhūte

original: panā lambaṇe javanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hotīti idañca ukkaṭṭha paricchedavasena
analyzed: lambaṇe javana avasāne iti idam ca ukkaṭṭha pariccheda vasena

original: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ñāṇavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana dvattikkhattuṃ voṭṭhabbanappavattivasena
analyzed: vuttam ti daṭṭhabbam ñāṇa vibhaṅga ṭṭhakathāyam pana dvatti kkhattum voṭṭhabbana ppavatti vasena

original: avibhute ālambaṇe voṭṭhabbanavāropi āgato. Yoca pañcadvārebhavaṅgacalanamattavasena
analyzed: avibhute ālambaṇe āgataḥ pañca dvāra ibha vaṅga calana matta vasena

original: moghavāro nāma catuttho vāro vutto. Sopi idha laddhuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Suddhamanodvārepi
analyzed: moghavāraḥ nāma catutthaḥ vāro vutto saḥ api idha laddhum vaṭṭatiyā iva suddha manodvāre pi

original: hi ārammaṇe āpātamāgate vīthicittaṃ anuppajjitvā dvikkhattuṃ bhavaṅge calite nivattanakavārānaṃ
analyzed: hi ārammaṇe āpātam āgate vīthi cittam an uppajjitvā dvi khattum bhavaṅge calite

original: pamāṇaṃ nabhavissatiyeva, visayeca āpātāgate bhavaṅgeca calite sati visayappavattināma
analyzed: pamāṇam visaye ca āpāta āgate calite sati visaya ppavatti nāma

original: na na hotīti. Iti imasmiṃ manodvārepi tadārammaṇa javana voṭṭhabbana moghavāra saṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: na na hoti iti iti imasmin manaḥ dvāre pi

original: catunnaṃ vārānaṃ yathākkamaṃ āraṇabhūtā visayappavatti catudhā veditabbāti. Tattha
analyzed: catunnam vārānam yathākkamam āraṇa bhūtā visaya ppavatti catudhā veditabbā ati tattha

original: tadārammaṇavārassa ārammaṇabhūtā abhivibhūtānāma javana vārassa vibhūtānāma. Voṭṭhabbanavārassa
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa vārassa ārammaṇa bhūtāḥ abhivibhūtānāma javana vārassa vibhūtānāma voṭṭhabbana vārassa

original: avibhūtānāma. Moghavārassa ārammaṇabhūtā atiavibhūtānāmāti yojetabbā.
analyzed: avibhūtā nāma moghavārassa ārammaṇa bhūtā ati avibhūtā nāma ati yojetabbā

original: Etthaca ārammaṇassavā cittassavā atibalavatāya abhivibhūtatā veditabbā. Dubbalepi
analyzed: ettha ca ārammaṇa ssavā citta ssavā ati balava tāya abhivibhūta tā veditabbā dubbale pi

original: hi citte pathavipabbatādivasena atibalavantaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ativibhūtaṃnāma hoti. Atibalavante
analyzed: hi citte pathavi pabbata ādi vasena ati balavantam ārammaṇam hoti ati balavante

original: ca citte atisukhumaṃpi nibbānaṃ ativibhūtaṃnāma hotīti. Evaṃ sesesupīti. Vārabhedo
analyzed: ca citte nibbānam hoti iti evam sesesu pi iti vāra bhedaḥ

original: panettha anubandhako, visuṃ siddhoti duvidho. Tattha anubandhako cakkhudvārānubandhakādivasena
analyzed: pana ittha anubandhakaḥ visum siddho ti duvidho tattha anubandhako cakkhu dvāra anubandhaka ādi vasena

original: pañcavidho. Ekekasmiñcettha atītagahaṇaṃ, samudāya gahaṇaṃ, vatthugahaṇaṃ, nāmagahaṇanti
analyzed: pañcavidhaḥ eka ekasmin ca itthā atīta gahaṇam samudāya gahaṇam vatthu gahaṇam nāma gahaṇanti

original: cattāro cattāro vārā. Tesuca tadārammaṇavārādayo yathārahaṃ yojetabbā. Visuṃ siddho
analyzed: cattāro cattāro vārā tesu ca tad ārammaṇa vāra ādayaḥ yathāraham yojetabbāḥ visum siddhaḥ

original: pana diṭṭha vāro, diṭṭhasambandhavāro, sutavāro, sutasambandhavāro, viññātavāro,
analyzed: pana diṭṭha vāro diṭṭha sambandha vāro sutavāro suta sambandha vāro viññātavāro

original: viññātasambandhavāroti chabbidho hoti. Etthaca saddhā ruci ākāra parivitakkādi vasena
analyzed: viññāta sambandha vāro ti chabbidhaḥ hoti ettha ca saddhā ruci ākāra parivitakka ādi vasena

original: pavattavārā viññātavāro, viññāta sambandhavāroti vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
analyzed: pavatta vārā viññātavāro viññāta sambandhavāro ti vuttā ati daṭṭhabbā aṭṭhasāliniyam

original: pana saddhāruciyādiva senagahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tathāpi hoti. Aññathāpi hoti. Tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: pana saddhā ruciyāt iva sena gahitam ārammaṇam tathā api hoti aññathā api hoti tasmai aṭṭhakathāyam

original: na gahitanti vuttaṃ. Tathāvā hotu aññathāvā. Vīthicittapavattiyā sati gahetabbameva.
analyzed: na gahitanti vuttam tathāvā hotu aññathāvā vīthi citta pavattiyā sati gahetabbam eva

original: Tattha ekekasmiṃvāre tadārammaṇavārādivasena cattāro cattāro vārā. Tesuca kāma mahaggatā
analyzed: tattha eka ekasmin vāre tad ārammaṇa vāra ādi vasena cattāro cattāro vārā tesu ca kāma mahaggatā

original: nuttara paññatti vasena paccuppannātītānāgatakāla vimuttavasenaca ārammaṇadhammā
analyzed: nuttara paññatti vasena paccuppanna atīta anāgata kāla vimutta vasena ca ārammaṇa dhammā

original: yathārahaṃ yojetabbāti. Etarahi pana atītabhavaṅgavasena tadārammaṇavasena ca vārabhedaṃ
analyzed: yathāraham etarahi pana atīta bhavaṅga vasena tad ārammaṇa vasena ca vāra bhedam

original: kappenti. Tattha atītabhavaṅgavasena vārabhedakappanaṃ niratthakaṃ. Na hi manodvāre
analyzed: kappenti tattha atīta bhavaṅga vasena vāra bheda kappanam niratthakam na hi manaḥ dvāre

original: pañcadvāre viya ārammaṇānaṃ khaṇavasena balava dubbalatā sambhavo atthi. Tadā avijjamānānaṃpi
analyzed: pañca dvāre viya ārammaṇānam khaṇa vasena atthi tadā avijjamānānam pi

original: atītānāgatānaṃ kālavimuttānañca tattha āpātāgamanatoti. Ettha siyā, ekāvajjanavīthiyā
analyzed: atīta anāgatānam kāla vimuttānam ca tattha āpāta āgamanato ti ettha siyā eka āvajjana vīthiyā

original: ārammaṇaṃnāma dhammatoca kālatoca abhinna meva icchanti aṭṭhakathācariyā. Imeca sattā
analyzed: ārammaṇam nāma dhammatoca kālatoca abhinnam eva icchanti aṭṭhakathā cariyāḥ ime ca sattā

original: taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā aññamaññassa cittaṃ jānantiyeva. Paracittaviduniyo pana
analyzed: tam tam ākāram sallakkhetvā añña maññassa cittam jānantiyā iva para citta viduniyā pana

original: devatā ākārasallakkhaṇena vināpi jānanti. Tattha paccuppannaṃ parassa cittaṃ jānanakāle
analyzed: devatāḥ ākāra sallakkhaṇena vinā api jānanti tattha paccuppannam parassa cittam jānana kāle

original: āvajjanaṃ bhāvayaṃ parassa cittaṃ attanā sahuppannaṃ. Taṃ vā āvajjati. Udāhu parato
analyzed: āvajjanam bhāvayam parassa cittam attanā sahuppannam tam vai āvajjati udāhu paratas

original: taṃ taṃ javanena sahuppannaṃvā. Javanānica yaṃ āvajjanena sahuppannaṃ taṃ vā jānanti,
analyzed: tam tam javanena sahuppannam vā javanāni ca yam āvajjanena sahuppannam tam vā jānanti

original: paccekaṃ attanā sahuppannaṃvāti. Kiñcettha, yadi tāva āvajjanena sahuppannaṃ āvajjati
analyzed: paccekam attanā kiñca ittha yadi tāva āvajjanena sahuppannam āvajjati

original: jānantica. Evaṃ sati dhammato abhinnaṃ hoti. Kālato bhinnaṃ. Tañhi cittaṃ āvajjanassa
analyzed: jānanti ca evam sati dhammataḥ abhinnam hoti kālataḥ bhinnam tat hi cittam āvajjanassa

original: paccuppannaṃ hoti. Javanānaṃ pana atītanti. Atha paccekaṃ attanā sahuppannaṃ āvajjati
analyzed: paccuppannam hoti javanānam pana atha paccekam attanā sahuppannam āvajjati

original: jānantica. Evañca sati kālato abhinnaṃ hoti. Dhammato bhinnameva. Athapi yaṃ paccekaṃ
analyzed: jānanti ca evam ca sati kālataḥ abhinnam hoti dhammataḥ bhinnam eva atha api yam paccekam

original: sahuppannaṃ jānanti. Tadeva āvajjati. Evaṃpi bhinnameva hotīti. Ettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: sahuppannam jānanti tat eva āvajjati bhinnam eva hoti iti ettha aṭṭhakathā ayam

original: tāva yaṃ āvajjanena sahuppannaṃ. Tadeva āvajjati jānanticāti dhammato abhinnaṃ vatvā
analyzed: tāva yam āvajjanena sahuppannam tat eva āvajjati jānanti ca ati dhammataḥ abhinnam vatvā

original: taṃ cittaṃ niruddhaṃpi addhāvasena santativasenaca gahitaṃ javanānaṃpi paccuppannameva
analyzed: tam cittam niruddham api addhā vasena santati vasena ca gahitam paccuppannam eva

original: hotīti vinicchitaṃ. Ācariyānandamatena pana parassa taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ sallakkhetvā taṃ
analyzed: hoti iti vinicchitam ācariya ānanda matena pana parassa tam tam ākāram sallakkhetvā tam

original: taṃ adhippāyajānanakāle āvajjanajavanāni paccekaṃ attanā sahuppannaṃ cittaṃ āvajjati
analyzed: tam adhippāya jānana kāle āvajjana javanāni paccekam attanā sahuppannam cittam āvajjati

original: jānanti ca. Na cettha dhammato kālatoca bhinnaṃnāma hoti. Sabbesaṃpi hi ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: jānanti ca na ca ittha dhammataḥ kālataḥ ca bhinnam nāma hoti sabbesam pi hi ārammaṇam

original: cittameva hoti paccuppannañcāti. Naca javanāni nirāvajjanānināma honti. Āvajjanenapi
analyzed: cittam eva hoti paccuppannam ca ati na ca javanāni honti āvajjanena pi

original: hi cittanteva āvajjitaṃ hoti. Javanānica cittanteva jānantīti. Yadi pana āvajjane
analyzed: hi cittantā iva āvajjitam hoti javanāni ca cittantā iva jānanti iti yadi pana āvajjane

original: na cittanti āvajjite javanāni rūpanti jānanti. Rūpantivā āvajjite cittanti jānanti,
analyzed: na cittanti āvajjite javanāni rūpanti jānanti āvajjite cittanti jānanti

original: nīlantivā āvajjite pītanti jānanti. Evaṃ sati javanāni dhammato nirāvajjanāni nāma
analyzed: āvajjite pītanti jānanti evam sati javanāni dhammataḥ nirāvajjanāni nāma

original: honti. Tathā atītanti āvajjite paccuppannanti. Evañca sati tāni kālato nirāvajjanānināma
analyzed: honti tathā āvajjite paccuppannanti evam ca sati tāni kālataḥ

original: hontīti. Yasmā ca atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayoti
analyzed: honti iti yasmā ca atītaḥ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantara paccayena paccayo ti

original: paṭṭhāne vutto. Tasmā idha khaṇavaseneva paccuppannaṃ vattuṃ yuttaṃ. Na addhāsantati
analyzed: paṭṭhāne vuttaḥ tasmai idha khaṇa vasena iva paccuppannam vattum yuttam na addhā santati

original: vasenāti. Itarathā sabba vīthicittavāresupi ārammaṇānaṃ atītādibhāvo addhāsantativaseneva
analyzed: vasena āti itarathā ārammaṇānam atīta ādi bhāvaḥ addhā santati vasena iva

original: vattabbo siyāti. Gāthāyaṃ tīṇevāti kiccavasena tīṇi eva. Cittuppādā daseritāti cittuppattikkhaṇavasena
analyzed: vattabbaḥ siyā iti gāthāyam tīṇi eva ati kicca vasena tīṇi eva cittuppādāḥ dasa īritā ti cittuppatti kkhaṇa vasena

original: dasa īritāni kathitāni. Vitthā renāti cittasarūpavitthārena. Etthāti manodvāre. Ekacattālīsāti
analyzed: dasa īritāni kathitāni vitthā rena ati citta sarūpa vitthārena ettha iti manaḥ dvāre ekacattālīsā ati

original: pañcaviññāṇamanodhātūhi vajjitānaṃ kāmāvacaracittānaṃ vasena ekacattālīsaṃ. Etthāti
analyzed: pañca viññāṇa manaḥ dhātūhi vajjitānam kāmāvacara cittānam vasena ekacattālīsam ettha ati

original: parittajavanavāre. [Parittavāro]
analyzed: paritta javana vāre

original: 138. Vibhūtāvibhūtabhedo natthi ekaṃ vibhūtameva labbhatīti adhippāyo. Na hi avibhūte
analyzed: vibhūta avibhūta bhedaḥ na atthi ekam vibhūtam eva labbhati iti adhippāyaḥ na hi avibhūte

original: ārammaṇe appanānāma sambhavatīti. Tathā tadārammaṇuppādoca natthi. Na hi atisantataraṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇe appanā nāma sambhavati iti tathā tad ārammaṇa uppādo ca natthi na hi atisantataram

original: appanājavanaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ anubandhatīti. Tattha hi chabbīsati mahaggata lokuttara
analyzed: appanā javanam tad ārammaṇam anubandhati iti tattha hi chabbīsati mahaggata lokuttara

original: javanesu yaṃkiñci javanaṃ appanāvīthimotaratīti sambandho. Ñāṇarahitaṃ dvihetukajavanaṃ
analyzed: javanesu yaṃ kiñci javanam appanā vīthim otarati iti sambandhaḥ ñāṇa rahitam dvi hetuka javanam

original: athirasabhāvattā appanāya anantarūpanissayo nahotīti vuttaṃ ñāṇasampayutta kāmāvacarajavanānamaṭṭhannanti.
analyzed: athi rasa bhāva ttā appanāya ananta rūpa nissayaḥ nahoti iti vuttam ñāṇa sampayutta kāmāvacara javanānam aṭṭhannam ti

original: Parikammopacārānulomagotratunāmenāti ettha indriyasamatādīhi paritobhāgehi appanā
analyzed: ettha indriya samatā ādīhi paritobhāgehi appanā

original: karīyati sajjīyati etenāti parikammaṃ. Appanaṃ upecca caratīti upacāro. Samīpacāroti
analyzed: karīyati sajjīyati etena ati parikammam appanam upecca carati iti upacāro samīpacāro ti

original: attho. Samīpacaraṇañcettha āsannekāle appanāvahasamatthabhāvena daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yassa
analyzed: atthaḥ samīpa caraṇam ca ittha āsanne kāle appanā vaha samattha bhāvena daṭṭhabbam yassa

original: pavattiyā aciraṃ kālaṃ appanā sambhavo hotīti. Anulomanti appanāpavattiyā paccanīkadhammavidhamanena
analyzed: pavattiyāḥ aciram kālam appanā sambhavaḥ hoti iti anulomanti appanā pavattiyā paccanīka dhamma vidhamanena

original: appanāya anukūlaṃ appanāhitaṃ appanā vahanticceva attho, yassa pavattiyā appanā vibandhako
analyzed: appanāya anukūlam appanā āhitam appanā vahanti icca iva atthaḥ yassa pavattiyā appanā vibandhakaḥ

original: paccanī konāma natthīti. Gamīyati bujjhīyati attho etenātivo. Abhidhānaṃ buddhica.
analyzed: paccanī ko nāma natthi iti gamīyati bujjhīyati atthaḥ abhidhānam buddhi ca

original: Taṃ duvidhaṃpi gavaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti gottaṃ. Paritta jātisaṅkhāto anvayo. Gottaṃ
analyzed: tam duvidham pi gavam tāyati rakkhati iti gottam paritta jāti saṅkhātaḥ anvayaḥ gottam

original: abhibhuyyati chijjati etthāti gotrabhu. Ettha ca cattāripi javanāni parikammajavanānīti
analyzed: abhibhuyyati chijjati ettha ati gotrabhu ettha ca cattāri pi javanāni parikamma javanāni iti

original: vā upacārajavanānitivā anulomajavanānītivā vuccantiyeva. Gotrabhūti pana pacchimasseva
analyzed: vā anuloma javanāni iti vā pana

original: nāmaṃ. Idha pana catunnaṃpi nāmānaṃ saṅgahaṇatthaṃ parikammo pacārānuloma gotrabhunāmenāti
analyzed: nāmam idha pana catunnam pi nāmānam saṅgahaṇa attham

original: evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca katvā kasmā pathamameva parikammaṃnāma. Nanu itarānipi
analyzed: evam vuttam ti daṭṭhabbam evam ca katvā kasmā pathamam eva nanu itarāni pi

original: appanaṃ parisaṅkharontiyevāti evamādikā codanā anokāsā hotīti. Catukkhattuṃ tikkhattumevavāti
analyzed: appanam eva ati evamādikā codanā anokāsā hoti iti catu khattum ti khattum eva vā ati

original: catukkhattumevavā tikkhattumevavā. Tattha pathamena eva saddena pañcamaṃ gotrabhusambhavo
analyzed: catukkhattum eva vā tikkhattum eva vā tattha pathamena eva saddena pañcamam

original: paṭikkhitto hoti. Tadā hi javanaṃ patitaṃnāma hoti. Pavedhati kampati. Kāmagottaṃ
analyzed: paṭikkhittaḥ hoti tadā hi javanam patitaṃnāma hoti pavedhati kampati kāma gottam

original: abhikkamitvā uparibhūmantarappattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotīti. Dutīyena dutīyaṃ
analyzed: abhikkamitvā upari bhūma antara ppattiyā paccayaḥ bhavitum na sakkoti iti dutīyena dutīyam

original: gotrabhu sambhavo paṭikkhitto hoti. Tadā hi aladdhāsevanaṃ anulomaṃ attano anantare
analyzed: gotrabhu sambhavaḥ paṭikkhittaḥ hoti tadā hi a laddha āsevanam anulomam attanaḥ anantare

original: cittaṃ gotrabhubhāvaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkotīti. Eteneva pañcamato paraṃ catutthatoca
analyzed: cittam gotrabhu bhāvam pāpetum na sakkoti iti etena iva pañcamatas param

original: oraṃ appanāya asambhavo sādhito hotīti. Vāsaddena pana mandapaññassa catukkhattumeva.
analyzed: oram appanāya asambhavaḥ sādhitaḥ hoti iti vā saddena pana manda paññassa catu khattum eva

original: Na tikkhattuṃ. Tikkhapaññassa tikkhattumeva. Na catukkhattunti dassitaṃ hoti. Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
analyzed: na tikkhattum tikkhapaññassa tikkhattum eva na catukkhattum ti dassitam hoti aṭṭhasāliniyam

original: pana mandamajjhima mahāpaññavasena tidhā bhinditvā pañcakkhattuṃpi parikammajavanānaṃ
analyzed: pana manda majjhima mahā pañña vasena tidhā bhinditvā pañca khattuṃpi

original: uppatti anuññātā viya dissati. Itaraṭṭhakathāsu pana suṭṭhu vicāretvā paṭisiddhattā
analyzed: uppatti anuññātā viya dissati itara ṭṭhakathāsu pana suṭṭhu vicāretvā paṭisiddha ttā

original: sā na gahetabbāvāti.
analyzed: sā na gahetabbā avāti

original: Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Chaṭṭhaṃ sattamaṃ bhavaṅgassa āsannabhāvena papātāsannapuriso viya appanāvasena patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: chaṭṭham sattamam bhavaṅgassa āsanna bhāvena papāta āsanna purisaḥ viya appanā vasena patiṭṭhātum na sakkoti iti vuttam

original: Tattha bhavaṅgassa āsannabhāvenāti bhavaṅgabhāvassa āsanna bhāvenāti attho. Pañcamajavanato
analyzed: tattha bhavaṅgassa āsanna bhāvena ati bhavaṅga bhāvassa āsanna bhāvena ati attho pañcama javanato

original: hi paṭṭhāya javanasantānaṃ anupubbena parikkhīṇajavaṃ hoti. Bhavaṅgabhāvatthāya pariṇamatīti.
analyzed: hi paṭṭhāya javana santānam anupubbena parikkhīṇa javam hoti bhavaṅga bhāva tthāya pariṇamati iti

original: Evañca katvā papātāsannapurisopamāpi upapannā hotīti. Niruddhānantaramevāti niruddhe
analyzed: evam ca katvā papāta āsannapurisa upamā api upapannā hoti iti niruddha anantaram eva ati niruddhe

original: anantaramevāti padacchedo. Kassa anantaranti, aññassa asutattā niruddhassāti atthato
analyzed: anantaram eva ati padacchedaḥ kassa anantaram ti aññassa a suta ttā niruddhassa ati atthataḥ

original: laddhamevāti. Yasmā pana appanānāma uppajjamānā catutthatovā pañcamatovā paṭṭhāya
analyzed: laddham eva ati yasmā pana appanā nāma uppajjamānā catutthataḥ vā pañcamataḥ vā paṭṭhāya

original: uppajjati. Na chaṭṭhatovā sattamatovā. Sāhi vasībhūtāpi catuttha pañcamesu uppattiṃ
analyzed: uppajjati na chaṭṭhataḥ vā sattamataḥ vā sā hi vasībhūtā api catuttha pañcamesu uppattim

original: alabhamānā sabbaso nuppajjatiyeva. Labhamānā pana divasaṃpi nirantaraṃ pavattatiyeva.
analyzed: a labhamānā sabbasas nuppajjatiyā iva labhamānā pana divasam pi nirantaram pavattatiyā iva

original: Tasmā catutthaṃvā pañcamaṃvāti idaṃ ādimattaniyamanatthaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva
analyzed: tasmā catuttham vā pañcamam vā iti idam ādimatta niyamana attham vuttan ti daṭṭhabbam tena iva

original: hi appanāvīthimotaratīti ca tatoparaṃ appanāvasāne bhavaṅgapātova hotīti ca vakkhatīti.
analyzed: hi appanā vīthim otarati iti ca tatas uparam appanā avasāne bhavaṅga pāto va hoti iti ca vakkhati iti

original: Yadi pana pañcamato paṭṭhāya javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ sati kasmā tato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: yadi pana pañcamatas paṭṭhāya javanam patitam nāma hoti evam sati kasmā tatas paṭṭhāya

original: patanakhette appanājavanaṃ pavattatīti. Vuccate, hatthe thapitaleḍḍussa patanakhettaṃnāma
analyzed: patana khette appanā javanam pavattati iti vuccate hatthe thapita leḍḍussa patanakhettaṃnāma

original: hatthato muttamatte hoti. Evaṃ santepi hatthabalena khipitaṃ leḍḍu dūraṃpi gacchatiyeva.
analyzed: hatthataḥ mutta matte hoti evam sante pi hattha balena khipitam dūram pi

original: Ettha ca leḍḍussa javonāma hatthajavamūlako hoti. Hatthajavoca sarīrabalamūlako.
analyzed: ettha ca leḍḍussa javaḥ nāma hattha java mūlakaḥ hoti sarīra bala mūlakaḥ

original: Tattha leḍḍu viya appanājavanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Leḍḍussa patanakhettaṃ viya catutthato
analyzed: tattha leḍḍu viya appanā javanam daṭṭhabbam leḍḍussa patana khettam viya catutthato

original: pacchākālo. Hatthajavoviya gotrabhujavo. Sarīrabalaṃ viya purimānaṃ parikammajavanānaṃ
analyzed: pacchā kālaḥ hattha javaḥ viya gotrabhu javaḥ sarīra balam viya purimānam

original: balaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uttānaseyyassa bāladārakassa balaṃ viya ādikammikavīthiyaṃ kāmajavanānaṃ
analyzed: balam daṭṭhabbam uttānaseyyassa bāla dārakassa balam viya ādikammika vīthiyam kāma javanānam

original: balaṃ. Vuddhipattassa purisassabalaṃ viya samāpattivīthiyaṃ kāmajavanānaṃ balaṃ.
analyzed: balam vuddhi pattassa purisassa balam viya samāpatti vīthiyam kāma javanānam balam

original: Yathā ca bāladārakena khittaṃ leḍḍu hatthato muttamattepi patati. Evaṃ ādikammikavīthiyaṃ
analyzed: yathā ca bāla dārakena khittam leḍḍu hatthataḥ mutta matte pi patati evam ādikammika vīthiyam

original: appanājavanaṃ ekavāraṃ javitvā patati. Yathāvuddhipattena khittaṃ leḍḍu patanakhettepi
analyzed: eka vāram patati yathā vuddhi pattena khittam leḍḍu patana khette pi

original: apatitvā dūraṃpi dūrataraṃpi gacchati. Tathā samāpattivīthiyaṃ appanājavanaṃ ciraṃpi
analyzed: a patitvā dūram pi dūrataram pi gacchati tathā samāpatti vīthiyam appanā javanam ciram pi

original: cirataraṃpi pavattatīti. Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana appanājavanaṃ patanakhette pavattaṃpi bhūmantarapattiyāvā
analyzed: cirataram pi pavattati iti mūlaṭīkāyam pana appanā javanam patana khette pavattam pi

original: ārammaṇantaraladdhiyāvā patitaṃnāma nahotīti vuttaṃ. Ettha siyā, kasmā pañcamato
analyzed: ārammaṇa antara laddhi yāvā patitaṃnāma na hoti iti vuttam ettha siyā kasmā pañcamato

original: paṭṭhāya javanaṃ patitanti vuttaṃ. Nanu apati tattā eva suṭṭhu balavabhāvato sattamajavanacetanā
analyzed: paṭṭhāya javanam patitanti vuttam nanu a pati tad tā eva suṭṭhu balava bhāvato sattama javana cetanā

original: sīghaṃ anantare bhave vipākadāyinīca ānantariyakammañca hoti. Majjhe pañcacetanā
analyzed: sīgham anantare bhave vipāka dāyinī ca ānantariya kammañca hoti majjhe pañca cetanā

original: tathā balavabhāvābhāvato cirena tatīyabhavādīsu vipākadāyinīca honti, anantariyabhāvañca
analyzed: tathā balava bhāva abhāvataḥ cirena tatīya bhava ādīsu vipāka dāyinī ca honti

original: na gacchantīti. Nakho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yadi hi sīghaṃ vipākadānatāya balavatīnāma
analyzed: na gacchanti iti na kho pana itam evam daṭṭhabbam yadi hi sīgham vipāka dāna tāya balavatīnāma

original: siyā. Evaṃsati paṭhamacetanā sabbabalavatīnāma siyā. Sā hi imasmiṃyeva bhave vipākaṃ
analyzed: siyā evaṃsati paṭhama cetanā sabba balavatī nāma siyā sā hi imasmin yā iva bhave vipākam

original: detīti. Idaṃ panettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ. Eka vassajīvīnaṃ tiṇarukkhānaṃ pariṇāmoviya pathamacetanāya
analyzed: deti iti idam pana ittha sanniṭṭhānam tiṇa rukkhānam pathama cetanāya

original: pariṇāmo daṭṭhabbo. Dvivassajīvīnaṃ viya sattamacetanāya. Mahāsālānaṃ viya majjhimacetanānanti.
analyzed: pariṇāmaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ dvi vassa jīvīnam viya sattama cetanāya mahā sālānam viya

original: Tattha ekavassajīvino tiṇarukkhānāma asārā honti. Asārattāca dubbalā anaddhaniyā
analyzed: tattha eka vassa jīvinaḥ tiṇa rukkhā nāma asārāḥ honti asārattāḥ ca dubbalāḥ an addha niyā

original: aciraṭṭhikā. Tasmā tesaṃ sīghatarapariṇāmo hoti. Te hi sīghataraṃ ruhanti. Vuddhiṃ
analyzed: tasmā tesam sīghatara pariṇāmaḥ hoti te hi sīghataram ruhanti vuddhim

original: viruḷhiṃ āpajjanti. Sīghataraṃ pupphanti phalanti patanti antaradhāyanti. Ekaṃ nidāghasamayaṃ
analyzed: viruḷhim āpajjanti sīghataram pupphanti phalanti patanti antaradhāyanti ekam nidāgha samayam

original: atikkamituṃ nasakkonti. Dutīyaṃ vassaṃ na pāpuṇanti. Etthaca nidāghasamayo viya maraṇakālo
analyzed: atikkamitum na sakkonti dutīyam vassam na pāpuṇanti ettha ca nidāgha samayaḥ viya maraṇa kālaḥ

original: veditabbo. Dvivassajīvino pana thokaṃ sārabhūtā honti. Sārabhūtattāca thokaṃ balavantā
analyzed: veditabbaḥ dvi vassa jīvinaḥ pana thokam sāra bhūtāḥ honti sāra bhūta ttā ca thokam balavantā

original: addhaniyā. Tato yevacatesaṃ cirapariṇāmo hoti. Te hi pathamaṃ vassaṃ ruhanti vuddhiṃ
analyzed: cira pariṇāmaḥ hoti te hi pathamam vassam ruhanti vuddhim

original: viruḷhiṃ āpajjanti. Pupphituṃvā phalituṃvā nasakkonti. Dutīyavasseeva pupphanti phalanti
analyzed: viruḷhim āpajjanti pupphitum vā phalitum vā na sakkonti dutīya vasse eva pupphanti phalanti

original: patanti antaradhāyanti. Dutīyaṃ pana nidāgha samayaṃ atikkamituṃ na sakkonti. Tatīyaṃ
analyzed: patanti antaradhāyanti dutīyam pana nidāgha samayam atikkamitum na sakkonti tatīyam

original: vassaṃ na pāpuṇanti. Mahāsālā pana sabbasārabhūtā honti. Balavantā cirataraṭṭhāyino.
analyzed: vassam na pāpuṇanti mahā sālāḥ pana sabba sāra bhūtāḥ honti balavantā ciratara ṭṭhāyino

original: Tasmā te saṇikameva pariṇāmaṃ gacchanti. Te hi eka dve vassāni vidatthiratanamattāva
analyzed: tasmāt te saṇikam eva pariṇāmam gacchanti te hi dve vassāni

original: honti. Vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ nāpajjanti. Pupphituṃvā phalituṃvā na sakkonti. Aticiraṭṭhāyino
analyzed: honti vuddhim viruḷhim na āpajjanti pupphitum vā phalitum vā na sakkonti ati cira ṭṭhāyino

original: pana honti. Cha pañca vassasatāni ṭhatvāva patanti. Evameva pathamajavanacetanā sabbaso
analyzed: pana honti cha pañca vassa satāni ṭhatvā ava patanti evam eva pathama javana cetanā sabbaso

original: aladdhāsevanatāya asārā abalā hoti. Visuṃ ekaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetuṃ ekañca maraṇakālaṃ
analyzed: a laddha āsevana tāya asārā abalā hoti visum ekam bhavam nibbattetum ekam ca maraṇa kālam

original: atikkamituṃ na sakkoti. Imasmiṃ bhaveeva vipaccitvāvā avipaccitvāvā khiyyati. Sattama
analyzed: atikkamitum na sakkoti imasmin bhave eva a vipaccitvā vā a vipaccitvā vā khiyyati sattama

original: javanacetanā pana laddhāsevanatāya thokaṃ sārabhūtā hoti. Visuṃ ekaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetuṃ
analyzed: javana cetanā pana laddha āsevana tāya thokam sāra bhūtā hoti visum ekam bhavam nibbattetum

original: sakkoti. Sārabhūtattā yevaca saṇikameva pariṇāmaṃ gacchati. Imasmiṃ bhave vipaccituṃ
analyzed: sakkoti sāra bhūta ttā saṇikam eva pariṇāmam gacchati imasmin bhave

original: na sakkoti. Bhavantaraṃ patvāva vipaccati. Patitajavanesu pana antima javanatāya
analyzed: na sakkoti bhavantaram patvā ava vipaccati patita javanesu pana

original: dubbalattā dutīyaṃ maraṇakālaṃ atikkamituṃ na sakkoti. Dutīyabhaveeva vipaccitvāvā
analyzed: dubbala ttā dutīyam maraṇa kālam atikkamitum na sakkoti dutīya bhave eva

original: avipaccitvāvā khiyyati. Avasesānaṃ pana pañcannaṃ majjhimacetanānaṃ suṭṭhu laddhāsevanānaṃ
analyzed: a vipaccitvā vā khiyyati avasesānam pana pañcannam majjhima cetanānam suṭṭhu laddha āsevanānam

original: saṇika tara pariṇatabhāvo vuttanayānusārena veditabboti. Naṃ kevalañcettha tiṇa rukkho
analyzed: vutta naya anusārena veditabbaḥ ti naṃ kevalam ca ittha tiṇa rukkho

original: pamāya pāṇopamāyāpi ayamattho dīpetabbo. Yehikeci gabbhaseyyakā pāṇā appāyukajātikā
analyzed: pamāya pāṇa upamāya api ayam atthaḥ dīpetabbaḥ yehi keci gabbhaseyyakā pāṇāḥ appāyuka jātikā

original: honti. Te sīghataraṃ gabbhavāsaṃ vasanti, sīghataraṃ vijāyanti. Aṅgamaṅgānica nesaṃ
analyzed: honti te sīghataram gabbha vāsam vasanti sīghataram vijāyanti aṅgam aṅgāni ca

original: sīghataraṃ thāmagatāni honti. Indriyānica sīghataraṃ paripākagatāni honti. Tadaheva
analyzed: sīghataram thāma gatāni honti indriyāni ca sīghataram paripāka gatāni honti tat aha iva

original: uṭṭhahitvā gacchanti. Gocaraṃ gaṇhanti. Attano attano visaye sīghataraṃ viññuttaṃ
analyzed: uṭṭhahitvā gacchanti gocaram gaṇhanti attanaḥ attanaḥ visaye sīghataram viññuttam

original: āpajjanti. Sīghataraṃ jiṇṇā honti maranti. Dīghāyukajātikānaṃ pana gabbhavāsādīni
analyzed: āpajjanti sīghataram jiṇṇāḥ honti maranti dīgha āyuka jātikānam pana gabbha vāsa ādīni

original: sabbāni saṇika meva sijjhantīti. Etthaca mahaggata kusalāni sattama javanaṭṭhāne
analyzed: sabbāni saṇika meva sijjhanti iti ettha ca mahaggata kusalāni sattama javanaṭṭhāne

original: ṭhitānīti veditabbāni. Parikammajavanāni hi ciraṭṭhitikaṭṭhena supakka sālidhaññasadisāni.
analyzed: ṭhitāni iti veditabbāni parikamma javanāni hi ciraṭṭhitika ṭṭhena su pakka sāli dhañña sadisāni

original: Appanājavanāni aciraṭṭhitikaṭṭhena supakka sālibhattasadisānīti tānipi acirataraṭṭhitikānieva
analyzed: appanā javanāni acira ṭṭhitika ṭṭhena supakka sālibhatta sadisāni iti tāni pi aciratara ṭṭhitikāni eva

original: honti. Dutīye bhave vipaccitvāvā avipaccitvāvā khiyyanti. Imasmiṃ bhavepi appakena
analyzed: honti dutīye bhave a vipaccitvā vā khiyyanti imasmin bhave pi appakena

original: kāmacchandādinā paccanīkadhammena paṭibāhitāni sabbaso avipākabhāvaṃ āpajjanti. Tasmātāni
analyzed: kāmacchanda ādinā paccanīka dhammena paṭibāhitāni sabbasas avipāka bhāvam āpajjanti tasmā tāni

original: tena pariyāyena dubbalāni nāma hontīti.
analyzed: tena pariyāyena dubbalāni nāma honti iti

original: Yasmā ca ānantariyakammānaṃ phaladānaniyatatānāma kālaniyamena vinā na sambhavati.
analyzed: ca ānantariya kammānam kāla niyamena vinā na sambhavati

original: Kālaniyamocanāma ekantena sattamajavanasseva hoti. Na majjhimajavanānaṃ. Tesañhi
analyzed: ekantena sattama javanassa iva hoti na majjhima javanānam tesam hi

original: asukasmiṃ bhaveeva vipaccantīti evaṃ niyamo natthīti. Tasmā duvidhassa niyamassa
analyzed: asukasmim bhave eva vipaccanti iti evam niyamaḥ natthi iti tasmā duvidhassa niyamassa

original: siddhattā eva sattamajavanacetanāya anantariyakammatā siddhā hoti. Na balavataratāyāti
analyzed: siddha ttā eva sattama javana cetanāya anantariya kamma tā siddhā hoti na balavatara tāya ati

original: niṭṭhametthagantabbanti. Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana nanuca sattamajavanacetanāya balavatāya
analyzed: niṭṭham ettha gantabbanti mūla ṭīkā ayam pana nanu ca sattama javana cetanāya balavatāya

original: upapajjavedanīyabhāvo hoti ānantariyatāpīti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā tatthāyaṃ adhippāyo
analyzed: upapajja vedanīya bhāvaḥ hoti ānantariya tā api iti codanam samuṭṭhāpetvā tattha ayam adhippāyaḥ

original: siyā. Paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino vipākasantānassa anantarapaccayabhāvena
analyzed: siyā paṭisandhiyā anantara paccaya bhāvinaḥ vipāka santānassa anantara paccaya bhāvena

original: antimajavanacetanāya susaṅkhatattāsā sattamajaganacetanā upapajjavedanīyā ānantariyakāca
analyzed: antima javana cetanāya sattama jagana cetanā upapajja vedanīyā ānantariyakā ca

original: hoti. Na apatitajavanacetanā viya balavatāyāti uttaraṃ vadati. Taṃ yuttaṃ viya na
analyzed: na a patita javana cetanā viya balavatā āyāti uttaram vadati tam yuttam viya na

original: dissati. Evañhi sati pathamajavanacetanā kassa anantarapaccayabhāvena susaṅkhatattā
analyzed: dissati evam hi sati pathama javana cetanā kassa anantara paccaya bhāvena su saṅkhata ttā

original: diṭṭhadhammavedanīyānāma jātāti vattabbā hotīti. Mahāṭīkāyaṃ pana dubbalāpi antimajavana
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyā nāma jātā ati vattabbā hoti iti mahā ṭīkā ayam pana dubbalā api

original: cetanā sanniṭṭhānakiccavisesayuttatāya phalavipaccane sattivise sayuttā hotīti upapajjavedanīyā
analyzed: cetanā sanniṭṭhāna kicca visesa yutta tāya phala vipaccane satti vise sayuttā hoti iti upapajja vedanīyā

original: ānantariyakāca sā hotīti vuttaṃ. Yathārahanti taṃ taṃ puggalānurūpaṃ. Yathābhinīhāra
analyzed: ānantariyakā ca sā hoti iti vuttam yathā arahanti tam tam puggala anurūpam yathā abhinīhāra

original: Natthi tadārammaṇuppādoti adhippāyo.

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Katthaci appanāvāre sattajavana paripūraṇatthaṃ appanāvasānepi kāmāvacarajavanappavattiṃ vadantānaṃ nikāyantarikānaṃ vādo idha evasaddena nivattito”ti vuttaṃ.

original: Tatthāti tasmiṃ appanājavanavāre. Nirantarapavattānaṃ javanānaṃ bhinnavedanatānāma natthīti vuttaṃ somanassasahagata javanā nantarantiādi.

original: [132] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana

original: “Bhinnavedanānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvassa anuddhaṭattā”tikāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.

original: [133] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: viharati. Kathaṃ appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī viharati iṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ asubhāyavā

original: pharati. Aniccato vā upasaṃharati. Evaṃ appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī viharatītiādinā

original: paṭisambhidāmagganayena idha tathārūpo cittābhisaṅkhāro nāma veditabbo. Apare pana

original: vadanti-khīṇāsavā yadā devaccharā vaṇṇādikaṃ atiiṭṭhārammaṇaṃ āpātamā gacchati. Tadā

original: aniccalakkhaṇaṃvā upekkhā kriya javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Na atiiṭṭhārammaṇabhūtaṃ

original: devaccharāvaṇṇādikaṃ.
analyzed: deva charāvaṇṇa ādikam

analyzed: devaccharā vaṇṇa ādīsu an iṭṭhākārataḥ gahaṇam yat ca buddhavaṇṇa ādīsu ati iṭṭhākārataḥ gahaṇam

original: Tadubhayaṃpi paññābaleneva hotīti veditabbaṃ.

original: Yañca tattha
analyzed: yañca tattha

original: “Khīṇāsavānaṃ cittavipallāsābhāvena kriyajavanānipi yathārammaṇameva pavattantī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ vicāretabbameva.

analyzed: rūpā saddā gandhā rasā phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā

original: vipākesu ekamekena gahita paṭisandhikassa sattassa. Tadā rammaṇasambhavoti tadārammaṇuppatti
analyzed: vipākesu ekam ekena gahita paṭisandhikassa sattassa tad ārammaṇa sambhavo ti tad ārammaṇa uppatti

original: kāraṇaṃ. Tadārammaṇuppatti yevavā. Yaṃkiñcīti iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhūtesu rūpārammaṇādīsu
analyzed: kāraṇam tad ārammaṇa uppatti yeva vā yat kiñci iti iṭṭha aniṭṭha bhūtesu rūpa ārammaṇa ādīsu

original: yaṃkiñci. Paricitapubbanti imasmiṃ bhaveyeva taṅkhaṇato purimakhaṇesu gahaṇa bahulatā
analyzed: imasmin bhaveya iva tad khaṇataḥ purima khaṇesu

original: vasena paricitaṃ. Abhiṇhasevitanti attho. Parittārammaṇanti parittadhammabhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ.
analyzed: vasena paricitam abhiṇha sevitanti attho paritta ārammaṇanti paritta dhamma bhūtam ārammaṇam

original: Ārabbhāti ālambitvā. Upekkhāsahagata santīraṇanti dvīsu upekkhāsahagatasantī raṇesu
analyzed: ārabbha ati ālambitvā dvīsu upekkhā sahagata santī raṇesu

original: iṭṭhe kusalavipākaṃ aniṭṭhe akusalavipākaṃ upekkhā sahagata santīraṇaṃ. Yesaṃ pana
analyzed: iṭṭhe kusala vipākam aniṭṭhe akusala vipākam upekkhā sahagata santīraṇam yesam pana

original: pakatiyā itarāni cattāri upekkhāsahagata vipākāni bahulaṃ pavattanti. Tesaṃ tānipi
analyzed: pakatiyā itarāni cattāri upekkhā sahagata vipākāni bahulam pavattanti tesam tāni pi

original: āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ nahontīti na vattabbāni. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahādhammarakkhitattheravāde
analyzed: āgantuka bhavaṅgam nahonti iti na vattabbāni aṭṭhakathā ayam pana mahādhammarakkhita thera vāde

original: yebhuyyaniyamasote patitattā akusalajavanānurūpaṃ ahetukaṃ upekkhā santīraṇa dvaya
analyzed: yebhuyya niyama sote akusala javana anurūpam ahetukam upekkhā

original: meva vuttaṃ. Teneva hi parato theravādānaṃ vicāritaṭṭhāne akusalajavanānantaraṃ ahetuka
analyzed: vuttam tena iva hi paratas thera vādānam vicārita ṭṭhāne akusala javana anantaram ahetuka

original: tadārammaṇa meva dīpentassa tassa theravādassa aparipuṇṇavādabhāvaṃ dassetvā yadā
analyzed: tad ārammaṇam m eva dīpentassa tassa thera vādassa aparipuṇṇa vāda bhāvam dassetvā yadā

original: kusalajavanānaṃ antarantarā akusalaṃ javati, tadā kusalāvasāne āciṇṇa sadisameva
analyzed: antarantarā akusalam tadā kusala avasāne sadisam eva

original: akusalāvasāne sahetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ yuttanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tadārammaṇecayutte
analyzed: akusala avasāne sa hetukam tad ārammaṇam yuttan ti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam tad ārammaṇa ica yutte

original: etaṃpi yujjatiyeva. Tasmā chapi upekkhāsahagatavipākāni āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ hontiyevāti
analyzed: etam pi upekkhā sahagata vipākāni āgantuka bhavaṅgam honti eva ati

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etthaca upekkhāpaṭisandhikassa tāva atimahantāti vibhūtesupi buddhavaṇṇādīsu
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam ettha ca upekkhā paṭisandhikassa tāva vibhūtesu pi buddha vaṇṇa ādīsu

original: abhiiṭṭhārammaṇesu domanassaṃ uppādentassa tadārammaṇasambhavo natthīti domanassa
analyzed: abhiiṭṭha ārammaṇesu domanassam uppādentassa tad ārammaṇa sambhavaḥ natthi iti domanassa

original: javanānantaraṃ bhavaṅgapātova hoti. Somanassapaṭisandhikassa pana sabbesupi iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhūtesu
analyzed: javana anantaram bhavaṅga pāto va hoti somanassa paṭisandhikassa pana sabbesu pi iṭṭha aniṭṭha bhūtesu

original: mahantesu avibhūtesuca chaḷārammaṇesu domanassa uppādentassa neva tadārammaṇasambhavo
analyzed: mahantesu avibhūtesu ca chaṭṭha ārammaṇesu domanassa uppādentassa na iva tad ārammaṇa sambhavo

original: atthi. Nacamūlabhavaṅga sambhavoti katvā domanassānantaraṃ chasu upekkhāsahagatavipākesu
analyzed: atthi sambhavo ti katvā domanassa anantaram chasu upekkhā sahagata vipākesu

original: yathārahaṃ ekaṃ āgantuka bhavaṅgabhāvena pavattati. Tathā tasseva buddhavaṇṇādīsu
analyzed: yathāraham ekam āgantuka bhavaṅga bhāvena pavattati tathā tassa iva buddha vaṇṇa ādīsu

original: atiiṭṭhabhūtesu atimahantesu ativibhūtesuca chaḷārammaṇesuvā mahaggatapaññattīsuvā
analyzed: ati iṭṭha bhūtesu ati mahantesu ati vibhūtesu ca chaṭṭha ārammaṇesu vā mahaggata paññattīsu vā

original: domanassaṃ uppādentassāti. Ettha ca yasmā abhidhamme dhātuvibhaṅge sabbadhammesuvā
analyzed: domanassam uppādentassa ati ettha ca yasmai abhidhamme dhātu vibhaṅge sabba dhammesu vā

original: pana pathama samannāhāroti vuttaṃ. Mahāhatthipadopama sutteca ajjhatti kañceva āvuso
analyzed: pana samannāhāraḥ ti vuttam ajjhatti kañca iva āvuso

original: cakkhu aparibhinnaṃ hoti. Bāhirāca rūpāāpātaṃ āgacchanti. Noca tajjo samannāhāro
analyzed: cakkhu a paribhinnam hoti bāhirāḥ ca rūpa āpātam āgacchanti no ca tajjo samannāhāro

original: hoti. Neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti. Yatoca kho āvuso ajjhattikañceva
analyzed: hoti na iva tāva tajjassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti yatas ca kho āvuso ajjhattikam ca iva

original: cakkhu aparibhinnaṃ hoti. Bāhirāca rūpā āpāta māgacchanti. Tajjoca samannāhāro hoti.
analyzed: cakkhu a paribhinnam hoti bāhirāḥ rūpāḥ āpātam āgacchanti samannāhāro hoti

original: Evaṃ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti. Ajjhattikañceva āvuso sotaṃ.La. Ghānaṃ.La.
analyzed: evam tad jassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti ajjhattikam ca iva āvuso sotam la ghānam la

original: Jivhā.La. Kāyo.La. Mano aparibhinno hoti. Bāhirāca dhammā āpātaṃ āgacchanti. Noca
analyzed: a paribhinnaḥ hoti bāhirāḥ ca dhammāḥ āpātam āgacchanti no ca

original: tajjo samannāhāro hoti. Neva tāva tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hoti. Yatoca
analyzed: tajjo samannāhāro hoti na iva tāva tajjassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti yato ca

original: kho āvuso ajjhattikoceva mano aparibhinno hoti. Bāhirāca dhammā āpātaṃ āgacchanti.
analyzed: kho āvuso ajjhattikaḥ ca iva manaḥ a paribhinnaḥ hoti bāhirāḥ ca dhammāḥ āpātam āgacchanti

original: Tajjoca samannāhāro hoti. Evaṃ tajjassa viññāṇabhāgassa pātubhāvo hotīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: tad jo ca samannāhāraḥ hoti evam tad jassa viññāṇa bhāgassa pātubhāvaḥ hoti iti vuttam

original: Tasmā vīthicittānināma āvajjanenavinānauppajjanti. Sace āvajjanena dhammatovā kālabhovā
analyzed: tasmai sace āvajjanena

original: yaṃyaṃ niyametvā āvajjitaṃ hoti. Taṃ tadeva tānipi gaṇhanti. Yadi aniyametvā yaṃkiñci
analyzed: yaṃ yam niyametvā āvajjitam tam tat eva tāni api gaṇhanti yadi a niyametvā yaṃkiñcid

original: āvajjitaṃ hoti. Tānipi āvajji tappakārameva gaṇhanti. Na pana ekāvajjana vīthiyaṃ
analyzed: āvajjitam hoti tāni api tad pakāram eva gaṇhanti na pana ekāvajjana vīthiyam

original: sabbāni vīthicittāni āvajjanenavā aññamaññaṃvā dhammatovā kālatovā bhinnā lambaṇāni
analyzed: sabbāni vīthi cittāni āvajjanena vā aññam aññam vā dhammataḥ vā kālataḥ vā bhinnā lambaṇāni

original: hontīti veditabbanti.
analyzed: honti iti veditabbanti

original: Ettha siyā. Yadi ce taṃ āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ ādimhi āvajjanena āvajjitaṃ
analyzed: ettha siyā yadi ce tam āgantuka bhavaṅgam eka vīthiyam ādimhi āvajjanena āvajjitam

original: ārammaṇaṃ agahetvā aññaṃ yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ ārabbha uppajjati.
analyzed: ārammaṇam a gahetvā aññam yam kiñci paricita pubbam paritta ārammaṇam ārabbha uppajjati

original: Evaṃ sati nirāvajjanaṃnāma etaṃ siyā. Āvajjanādīhica saddhiṃ dhammato kālato ca bhinnārammaṇaṃnāma
analyzed: evam sati nirāvajjanam nāma siyā āvajjana ādīhi ca saddhim dhammataḥ kālataḥ ca bhinna ārammaṇam nāma

original: siyāti. Saccaṃ, yathā pana maggavīthiyaṃ gotrabhuvodānāni phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ
analyzed: siyā ati saccam yathā pana magga vīthiyam gotra bhuvaḥ dānāni phala samāpatti vīthiyam

original: phalāni nirodhato vuṭṭhahantassaca phalacittaṃ nirāvajjanameva honti bhinnārammaṇañca.
analyzed: phalāni nirodhataḥ vuṭṭhahantassa ca phala cittam nirāvajjanam eva honti bhinna ārammaṇam ca

original: Evametassapi natthi nirāvajjanatāya bhinnārammaṇatāyaca dosoti. Yañca ekasmiṃbhave
analyzed: evam etassa api natthi nirāvajjana tāya bhinna ārammaṇa tāya ca doso ti yat ca ekasmin bhave

original: bhavaṅgassa paṭisandhiyā saha dhammatoca ārammaṇa toca abhinnattaṃ tattha tattha
analyzed: bhavaṅgassa paṭisandhiyā saha dhamma toca ārammaṇa toca abhinna ttam tattha tattha

original: vuttaṃ. Taṃpi mūlabhavaṅgaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Idañca āgantukabhavaṅganti natthi dosoti.
analyzed: vuttam tat pi mūla bhavaṅgam sandhāya vuttam idam ca āgantuka bhavaṅgan ti natthi doso ti

original: Tamanantaritvāti taṃ āgantukabhavaṅgaṃ attano anantarapaccayaṃ katvā. Vadanti ācariyā.
analyzed: tam anantaritvā iti tam āgantuka bhavaṅgam attanaḥ anantara paccayam katvā vadanti ācariyā

original: Pāḷiyaṃ pana mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃca etaṃ vidhānaṃ natthīti adhippāyo. Kāmāvacarajavanāvasāneyeva

original: tadārammaṇaṃ icchanti. Na mahaggatānuttarajavanāvasāne. Kasmā iti ce. Kāmāvacara

original: javanānaṃ eva savipphandanattā. Itaresañca avipphandanattā.
analyzed: javanānam eva sa vipphandanattā itaresam ca a vipphandanattā

original: [136] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Kāmataṇhā nidāna kammanibbattattā”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ akāraṇaṃ.

original: Apica abhiññāvajjitāni mahaggatānuttarajavanāni aparittārammaṇāni honti. Tadārammaṇāni

analyzed: kānici paritta ārammaṇāni pi santatarāni honti iti tesam pi avasāne tad uppatti

original: [137] Etena
analyzed: etena

original: Ajanakattā janaka samānattābhāvatotiādipi paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ajanaka ttā janaka samāna ttā abhāvato ti ādi pi paṭikkhittam hoti

original: Kāmāvacarasattānaṃeva tadārammaṇaṃ icchanti. Na rūpārūpasattānaṃ. Na hi tesu uppannānaṃ

original: nissayassa kāma bhavaṅgassa abhāvato mahaggata bhavaṅgassa ca santa tarassa tadārammaṇa
analyzed: nissayassa kāma bhavaṅgassa abhāvataḥ mahaggata bhavaṅgassa ca santa tarassa tad ārammaṇa

original: kiccā bhāvatoti. Cakkhuviññāṇa sota viññāṇāni pana rūpasattānaṃ cakkhusotaindriya

original: pavattiānubhāvato sampaṭicchanasantīraṇānica dvāravīthibhede cittaniyamasiddhito
