original: evaṃ dvārena kammānaṃ nāmavavatthānaṃ asiddhaṃ siyā. Kathaṃ. Yadā hi purimāni dve
analyzed: evam dvārena kammānam nāma vavatthānam asiddham siyā katham yadā hi purimāni dve

original: āṇattivasena appakena vacīdvāre bhijjhanti. Tadā tāni kāyakammanti nāmaṃ jaheyyuṃ.
analyzed: āṇatti vasena appakena vacī dvāre bhijjhanti tadā tāni kāyakammanti nāmam jaheyyuṃ

original: Vacīkammanti saṅkhyaṃ gaccheyyuṃ kasmā vacīdvāre vuttito vacīkammaṃnāmāti vuttattā.
analyzed: saṅkhyam gaccheyyum kasmāt vacī dvāre vuttitaḥ vacī kammaṃ nāmā ati vutta ttā

original: Dvevā nesaṃ nāmāni bhaveyyuṃ. Ubhayadvāresupi sandissanato. Yadāpana majjhimāni cattāri
analyzed: dveva nesam nāmāni bhaveyyuṃ ubhaya dvāresu pi sandissanataḥ majjhimāni cattāri

original: hatthamuṭṭhādivasena appakena kāyadvāre sijjhanti. Tadā tānipi vacīkammanti nāmaṃ
analyzed: hattha muṭṭha ādi vasena appakena kāya dvāre sijjhanti tadā tāni pi vacīkammanti nāmaṃ

original: jaheyyuṃ. Kāyakammanti saṅkhyaṃ gaccheyyuṃ. Kasmā kāyadvāre vuttito kāyakammaṃnāmāti
analyzed: jaheyyum saṅkhyam gaccheyyum kasmā kāya dvāre vuttitaḥ kāya kammaṃ nāmā ti

original: vuttattā. Dvevā nesaṃ nāmāni bhaveyyuṃ. Ubhayadvāresupi sandissanato. Evañcasati
analyzed: vutta ttā dve vā nāmāni bhaveyyuṃ ubhaya dvāresu pi sandissanataḥ

original: pāṇātipāto.La. Micchācāroceti kāyakammaṃnāmāti idaṃ vavatthānameva niratthakaṃ siyā.
analyzed: idam vavatthānam eva niratthakam siyā

original: Tathā parato musāvādo.La. Ppalāpoceti vacīkammaṃnāmāti. Bāhullavuttitoti vuttepana
analyzed: tathā paratas bāhulla vuttitaḥ ti

original: ekamekena bāhullasaddena chabbidhāni tāni vajjāni vajjetvā vuttappakāraṃ dvārena
analyzed: ekam ekena bāhulla saddena chabbidhāni tāni vajjāni vajjetvā vutta ppakāram dvārena

original: kammavavatthānaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati. Yathā vanacarako saṅgāmāvacaroti.
analyzed: kamma vavatthānam siddham bhavati yathā vana carako saṅgāma avacaroti

original: Manokammāni pana dvārantaresu carantānipi caraṇamattāni eva honti. Na dvārantarāni
analyzed: manaḥ kammāni pana dvāra antaresu carantāni pi caraṇa mattāni eva honti na dvāra antarāni

original: tesaṃ kammasiddhiyā aṅgaṃ honti. Tasmā tāni visuṃ katānīti veditabbaṃ. Yasmā pana
analyzed: tesam kamma siddhiyāḥ aṅgam honti tasmā tāni visum katāni iti veditabbam yasmā pana

original: kāyadvārassa kāyoti nāmaṃ anekesu suttasahassesu sayameva siddhaṃ pākaṭañca. Tathā
analyzed: kāyadvārassa kāyo ti nāmam anekesu sutta sahassesu sayam eva siddham pākaṭam ca tathā

original: vacīdvārassa vācāti nāmaṃ. Kusalākusala javanacittasaṅkhākassa manodvārassaca manoti
analyzed: vacī dvārassa vācā ati nāmam kusala akusala javana citta saṅkhākassa manaḥ dvārassa ca

original: nāmaṃ. Tasmā sabbattha kāyadvāraṃ vacīdvāraṃ manodvāranti vutte kammena dvārassa
analyzed: nāmam tasmā sabbattha kāya dvāram vacī dvāram manaḥ dvāram iti vutte kammena dvārassa

original: vavatthāna kiccaṃnāma natthi. Yattha pana kāyakammadvāraṃ vacīkammadvāraṃ manokammadvāranti
analyzed: vavatthāna kiccaṃnāma natthi yattha pana kāya kamma dvāram vacī kamma dvāram manaḥ kamma dvāranti

original: āgataṃ. Tattheva dvārakathādīsu kammena dvāravavatthānaṃpi visuṃ vattabbaṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: āgatam tattha iva dvāra kathā ādīsu kammena dvāra vavatthānam pi visum vattabbam hoti iti daṭṭhabbam

original: [153] Etena yaṃ vuttaṃ vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: etena yam vuttam

original: “Kāyakammassaca pavattimukhabhūtaṃ kāyadvāranti vuccatīti”. Taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kāya kammassa ca pavatti mukha bhūtam kāyadvāranti vuccati iti tat paṭikkhittam hoti

original: [154] Yañca tattha
analyzed: yañca tattha

original: “Tathā musāvādādiṃ kāyavikārena karontassa vacīkammaṃ kāyadvārepi pavattatīti kammena dvāravavatthānaṃpi nasiyāti” vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjati.
analyzed: tathā musāvāda ādim kāya vikārena karontassa vacī kammam kāya dvāre pi pavattati iti kammena dvāra vavatthānam pi na siyā ti vuttam tat pi na yujjati

original: Na hi kāyavikārena karīyamānaṃ vacīkammaṃ kāyadvāre pavattamānaṃpi tassa dvārassa nāmaṃ bhindituṃvā attano nāmaṃ dātuṃvā sakkoti. Sabhāva siddhattā tassa nāmassāti.
analyzed: na hi kāya vikārena karīyamānam vacī kammam kāya dvāre pavattamānam pi tassa dvārassa nāmam bhinditum vā attanaḥ nāmam dātum vā sakkoti tassa nāmassa ati

original: [155] Eteneva yañca tattha
analyzed: etena iva yat ca tattha

original: Vuttaṃ “tathā kāyakammameva yebhuyyena kāyadvāre pavattati. Na itarāni. Tasmā kāyakammassa
analyzed: vuttam tathā kāya kammam eva yebhuyyena kāya dvāre pavattati na itarāni tasmā kāya kammassa

original: yebhuyyena ettheva pavattanato kāyakammadvārabhāvo siddho. Brāhmaṇagāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādi
analyzed: yebhuyyena ettha iva pavattanato kāya kamma dvāra bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ brāhmaṇa gāma ādīnam brāhmaṇa gāma ādi

original: bhāvoviyāti”. Taṃpi paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tat pi paṭikkhittam hoti

original: Na hi kāyakammadvāranti nāmaṃ idha vuttaṃ atthīti. [Kāyakammaṃ]
analyzed: na hi kāya kamma dvāran ti nāmaṃ idha vuttam atthi iti kāya kammaṃ

original: 149. Musāti abhūtatthe nipāto. Musā vadanti etenāti musāvādo. Visati paresaṃ aññamaññasammodabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: musā iti abhūta atthe nipātaḥ musā vadanti etena ati musāvādaḥ paresam aññamañña sammoda bhāva saṅkhātam

original: sāmaggirasaṃ saṃcuṇṇeti paribhindati mithu bhedaṃ karoti etāyāti pisuṇā. Attano piyabhāvaṃ
analyzed: sāmaggirasam saṃcuṇṇā iti paribhindati mithu bhedam karoti pisuṇā attanaḥ piya bhāvam

original: paresañca mittasuññabhāvaṃ karoti etāyātivā pisuṇā. Niruttinayena. Vadanti etāyāti
analyzed: paresam ca mitta suñña bhāvam karoti pisuṇāḥ nirutti nayena vadanti etāya ati

original: vācā. Pisuṇāca sā vācācāti pisuṇavācā. Yena suyyati, tassa hadayaṃ pharamānā usati
analyzed: vācā sā pisuṇa vācā yena tassa hadayam pharamānā usati

original: dahatīti pharusā. Pharusāca sā vācācāti pharusavācā. Sādhujanehi adhigantabbaṃ saṃsukhaṃ
analyzed: dahati iti pharusā pharusā ca sā pharusa vācā sādhu janehi adhigantabbam saṃsukham

original: hitañca phalati visarati vināseti hitasukhamaggaṃ bhindatīti samphaṃ. Taṃvā phalati
analyzed: hitam ca phalati visarati hita sukha maggam bhindati iti tam vā phalati

original: bhijjati etenāti samphaṃ. Atthadhammāpagatassa paṭibhāṇacittassa bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇā
analyzed: bhijjati etena ati attha dhamma apagatassa paṭibhāṇa cittassa bhārata yuddha sītā haraṇā

original: dikassa vācā vatthumattassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Yattha diṭṭhadhammahitabuddhiyāvā samparāyika
analyzed: dikassa vācā vatthumattassa etam nāmam diṭṭhadhamma hita buddhi yāvā

original: hitabuddhiyāvā upāyadīpakaṃ kiñci atthadhammavinayapadaṃ natthi. Samphaṃ palapantipakārena
analyzed: hita buddhi yāvā upāya dīpakam kiñci attha dhamma vinaya padam natthi

original: kathayanti etenāti sapphappalāpo. Tattha parassavisaṃ vādanapurekkhārena visaṃ vādaka
analyzed: kathayanti etena ati sappha ppalāpaḥ tattha parassa visam vādana purekkhārena visam

original: kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā akusalacetanā musāvādo. So parassa atthabhañjanakova kammapathabhedo.
analyzed: kāya vacī payoga samuṭṭhāpikā akusala cetanā musāvādaḥ so parassa attha bhañjanakaḥ uva kamma patha bhedo

original: Itaro kammameva. Ettha ca kamma pathoti paṭisandhijanakānaṃ kammānaṃ uṭṭhānamukhamaggo
analyzed: itaro kammam eva ettha ca kamma patho ti paṭisandhi janakānam kammānam uṭṭhāna mukha maggo

original: vuccati. Yathā hi rajānaṃ uṭṭhānapadeso rajapathoti vuccati. Tathā loke sandissamānesu
analyzed: vuccati yathā hi rajānam uṭṭhāna padeso raja pathaḥ ti vuccati tathā loke sandissamānesu

original: sattānaṃ kāyavacīcittābhisaṅkharaṇakiccesuyehi kiccehi paṭisandhijanakāni kammāni
analyzed: sattānam kāya vacī citta abhisaṅkharaṇa kiccesuyehi kiccehi paṭisandhi janakāni kammāni

original: uṭṭhahanti. Yesuvā kiccesu tāni uṭṭhahanti pavattanti. Tāni kāyavacīcittā bhisaṅkharaṇakiccāni
analyzed: uṭṭhahanti yesu vā kiccesu tāni uṭṭhahanti pavattanti tāni kāya vacī citta abhisaṅkharaṇa kiccāni

original: paṭisandhijanakānaṃ kammānaṃ uṭṭhānamukhamaggattā kammapathoti vuccanti. Katamāni
analyzed: paṭisandhi janakānam kammānam uṭṭhāna mukha magga ttā kamma patho ti vuccanti katamāni

original: pana tānīti. Aṅgasampannāni akusalesu pāṇaghāta kiccādīni kusalesu tabbiramaṇakiccādīni
analyzed: pana tāni iti aṅga sampannāni akusalesu pāṇa ghāta kicca ādīni kusalesu tad viramaṇa kicca ādīni

original: dasavidhāni kiccānīti. Kammāniyeva sugatiduggatīnaṃ taduppajjanakasukhadukkhānañca
analyzed: dasavidhāni kiccāni iti sugati duggatīnam tad uppajjanaka sukha dukkhānam ca

original: pathabhūtattā kammapathonāmātipi vadanti.
analyzed: vadanti

original: Parassa bhedapurekkhārena bhedakakāyagacīpayogasamuṭṭhā pikā saṃkiliṭṭhacetanā pisuṇāvācā.
analyzed: parassa bheda purekkhārena bhedaka kāya gacī payoga samuṭṭhā saṃkiliṭṭha cetanā pisuṇā vācā

original: Sāpi pare bhinneyeva kammapathabhedo. Abhinne kammameva. Parassa mammacchedakakāya
analyzed: sā api pare bhinneya iva kamma patha bhedaḥ abhinne kammam eva parassa

original: vacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā duṭṭhacetanā pharusavācā. Etthaca maranti sattā, maraṇamattaṃvā
analyzed: vacī payoga samuṭṭhāpikā duṭṭha cetanā pharusa vācā ettha ca maranti sattāḥ maraṇam attam vā

original: dukkhaṃ nigacchanti etasmiṃ ghaṭṭiyamāneti mammaṃ. Duṭṭhavaṇo. Mammaṃ chindati bhindati
analyzed: dukkham nigacchanti etasmin ghaṭṭiyamānā iti mammam duṭṭhavaṇaḥ mammam chindati bhindati

original: ghaṭṭetīti mammacchedako. Vaṇaghaṭṭanapayogo. Idha pana mammaṃviyāti mammaṃ. Jātiādīsu
analyzed: ghaṭṭeti iti mamma chedakaḥ vaṇa ghaṭṭana payogaḥ idha pana mammam viyāti mammam jāti ādīsu

original: dasasu akkosavatthūsu yaṃkiñci. Mammacchedakoti jātiādīsu ghaṭṭana vasena pavatto
analyzed: dasasu akkosa vatthūsu yaṃkiñci jāti ādīsu ghaṭṭana vasena pavattaḥ

original: pharusa kāyavacī payogo. Aya mattho sīlakkhandha ṭīkā vasena veditabbo. Athavā. Mamāyatīti
analyzed: pharusa kāyavacī payogaḥ aya mattho sīlakkhandha ṭīkā vasena veditabbaḥ athavā mamāyati iti

original: mamo. Mitto. Mamassa bhāvo mammaṃ. Mettācittaṃ. Mammaṃ chindatīti mammacchedako.
analyzed: mamaḥ mittaḥ mamassa bhāvaḥ mammam mettā cittam mammam chindati iti mamma chedakaḥ

original: Ayaṃpi akkositabbassa sammukhāeva kammapathabhedoti keci. Parammukhāpīti apare. Yathā
analyzed: ayam pi akkositabbassa sammukhā eva kamma patha bhedo ti keci parammukhā api iti apare yathā

original: pana paraṃ akkositvā khamāpentassa khamāpanakammaṃ parassa dūre ṭhitassapi matassapi
analyzed: pana param akkositvā khamāpentassa khamāpana kammam parassa dūre ṭhitassa api matassa api

original: sampajjati. Evaṃ akkosanakammaṃpīti dīghamajjhimaṭīkākārā icchanti. Akkosādhippāyena
analyzed: sampajjati evam akkosana kammaṃpi iti dīgha majjhima ṭīkākārāḥ icchanti akkosa adhippāyena

original: caṇḍā mahiṃsī taṃ anubandhatūtivā corā taṃ khaṇḍā khaṇḍikaṃ karontūtivā muddhā te
analyzed: caṇḍā mahiṃsī tam corā tam khaṇḍā khaṇḍikam karontu utivā muddhā te

original: phalatu sattadhātivā evamādinā nayena paraṃ abhisapantassapi kammapathabhedo hotiyevātica vadanti.
analyzed: phalatu evamādinā nayena param abhisapantassa api kamma patha bhedaḥ vadanti

original: Anatthaviññāpana kāyavacīpayoga samuṭṭhāpikā pāpacetanā samphappalāpo. Sopi bhāratayuddha
analyzed: samuṭṭhāpikā pāpa cetanā samphappalāpaḥ saḥ api bhārata yuddha

original: sītāharaṇādikesu paṭibhāṇacittesu vācāvatthumattesueva kammapathabhedo. Socakho pare
analyzed: sītā haraṇa ādikesu paṭibhāṇa cittesu kamma patha bhedo pare

original: taṃ anatthaṃ saccato gaṇhanteyeva. Agaṇhante pana kammameva. Tathā rājakathādīsu
analyzed: tam anattham saccataḥ gaṇhanteyeva a gaṇhante pana kammam eva tathā rāja kathā ādīsu

original: dvattiṃsa tiracchāna kathāpabhedesupi kammameva. Tañca kho tadassādavasena kathentasseva.
analyzed: kammam eva tat ca kho tad assāda vasena kathentassa iva

original: Atthadhammavinayanissitaṃ katvā kathentassa pana sabbaṃpi satthakameva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: attha dhamma vinaya nissitam katvā kathentassa pana sabbam pi satthakam eva hoti iti veditabbam

original: Vacīkammanti ettha vacīti vācāyeva. Sā catubbidhā saddavācā virativācā cetanāvācā
analyzed: vacīkammanti ettha vacī iti vācāya iva sā catubbidhā sadda vācā virati vācā cetanā vācā

original: copanavācāti. Idha pana saddasahitā vacīviññattisaṅkhātā copana vācā adhippetāti
analyzed: copana vācā ti idha pana sadda sahitā vacī viññatti saṅkhātā vācā adhippetā ati

original: vuttaṃ vacīviññattisaṅkhāteti. Copanavācā hi kadāci vācaṅgena attano adhippāyaṃ parassa
analyzed: vuttam vacī viññatti saṅkhātā iti copana vācā hi kadāci vācaṅgena attanaḥ adhippāyam parassa

original: viññāpanatthāyapi karīyatīti vacīviññattīti vuccatīti. Sāyevaca kammānaṃ pavatti
analyzed: viññāpana tthāya api karīyati iti vacīviññattī iti vuccati iti sāyeva ca kammānam pavatti

original: mukhattā dvāranti vacīdvāraṃ. Tāya hi taṃtaṃvacīpayogakiccena pavattamānāya eva visaṃvādanādikiccasiddhito
analyzed: vacī dvāram tāya hi taṃ taṃ vacī payoga kiccena pavattamānāya eva visaṃvādana ādi kicca siddhito

original: taṃsamuṭṭhāpakassa cetanādhammassa āyūhanakriyānibbattica vacīkammanāmalābhoca hotīti.
analyzed: tad samuṭṭhāpakassa cetanā dhammassa āyūhana kriyā nibbatti ca vacī kamma nāma lābhaḥ ca hoti iti

original: Tasmiṃ vacīdvāre. Yamettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ kāyakamme vuttamevāti. [Vacīkammaṃ]
analyzed: tasmin vacī dvāre yam ettha vattabbam tam kāya kamme vuttam eva ati vacī kammam

original: 150. Abhijjhāyanti assādamatte aṭṭhatvā parabhaṇḍassa attano pariṇāmanavasena atirekataraṃ
analyzed: abhijjhāyanti assāda matte a ṭhatvā parabhaṇḍassa attano pariṇāmana vasena atirekataram

original: jhāyanti nijjhāyanti etāyāti abhijjhā. Byāpādenti parasatte vināsaṃ āpanne katvā
analyzed: jhāyanti nijjhāyanti abhijjhāḥ byāpādenti para satte vināsam āpanne katvā

original: cintenti etenāti byāpādo. Micchādiṭṭhīti ettha micchāti viparītatthe nipāto. Atthidinnantiādinayapavattaṃ
analyzed: cintenti etena ati byāpādaḥ micchādiṭṭhī iti ettha micchā ati viparīta atthe nipātaḥ

original: sabbaṃ sappurisa maggaṃ sappurisapaññattaṃ bhinditvā natthi dinnantiādinayena tabbiparī
analyzed: sabbam sappurisa maggam sappurisa paññattam bhinditvā natthi dinna nti ādi nayena tad biparī

original: tato passanti etāyāti micchādiṭṭhi. Tattha parasantakaṃ disvā kevalaṃ assādanābhinandanarajjanamattesu
analyzed: tatas passanti etāya ati micchādiṭṭhi tattha para santakam disvā kevalam assādana abhinandana rajjana mattesu

original: aṭṭhatvā ahovata idaṃ mamassāti evaṃ attano katvā cittena pariṇāmentasseva abhijjhākammapathabhedo
analyzed: a ṭhatvā ahovata idam mama assa ati evam katvā cittena pariṇāmentassa iva abhijjhā kamma patha bhedaḥ

original: hoti. Parasantakabhāveyeva thapetvā lābhāvatime. Ye īdisaṃ paribhuñjanti. Ahovatāhaṃpi
analyzed: ye īdisam paribhuñjanti

original: tāvakālikaṃ paribhuñjeyyaṃ. Yācitvāvā kiṇitvāvā attano kareyyaṃ. Aññaṃvā īdisaṃ labheyyanti
analyzed: tāvakālikam paribhuñjeyyam yācitvā vā kiṇitvā vā attano kareyyam aññam vā īdisam labheyyanti

original: evaṃ assādentassa kammameva. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe
analyzed: evam assādentassa kammam eva vuttam ha etam aṭṭhakathāsu parabhaṇḍa vatthuke hi lobhe

original: uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti. Yāva na ahovata idaṃ mamassāti attano pariṇāmetīti.
analyzed: uppanne pi na tāva kamma patha bhedaḥ hoti yāva na ahovataḥ idam mamassa ati attano pariṇāmeti iti

original: Antamaso ḍaṃsamakasādikepi ārabbha ime nassantu vinassantu. Ahovatime nasseyyuṃ vinasseyyuṃ.
analyzed: antamasaḥ ḍaṃsama kasādike pi ārabbha ime nassantu vinassantu ahovatime nasseyyum vinasseyyum

original: Avaḍḍhitāvā bhaveyyuṃ ciraṃvā natiṭṭheyyuṃ. Kadāvā nassanti vinassantīti evaṃ para
analyzed: bhaveyyum ciram vā natiṭṭheyyum kadāvā nassanti vinassanti iti evam para

original: sattassa khandhajīvavināsaṃ cintentasseva byāpādo. Itaro kammameva. Vuttañhetaṃ parasattavatthuke
analyzed: sattassa khandha jīva vināsam cintentassa iva byāpādaḥ itaro kammam eva vuttam ha etam para satta vatthuke

original: hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti. Yāva na ahovatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vināseyyāti
analyzed: hi kodhe uppanne pi na tāva kamma patha bhedaḥ hoti yāva na ucchijjeyya vināseyya ati

original: tassa vināsaṃ cintetīti. Kammassavā kammavipākassavā sabbaso paṭibāhikā natthikāhe
analyzed: tassa vināsam cinteti iti kamma ssavā kamma vipāka ssavā sabbaso paṭibāhikā

original: tukākriyavasena tividhā niyata micchādiṭṭhieva kammapathabhedo. Dasavatthukamicchādiṭṭhi
analyzed: tukā kriya vasena tividhā kamma patha bhedaḥ dasa vatthuka micchādiṭṭhi

original: pana natthikadiṭṭhipabhedāeva. Sabbaññudesanaṃ paṭibāhitvā pavattā ariṭṭhakaṇṭakādīnaṃ
analyzed: pana natthika diṭṭhi pabhedā eva sabbaññu desanam paṭibāhitvā pavattā ariṭṭha kaṇṭaka ādīnam

original: diṭṭhiyopi kammapathāevāti vadanti. Vīsativatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhivā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatānivākammamevāti.
analyzed: diṭṭhiyaḥ pi kamma pathā evā ti vadanti vīsati vatthukā sakkāyadiṭṭhi vā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhi gatāni iva akammam evā ti

original: Niyatāti cettha yathā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni yattakaṃ passitvā saddhādhimokkhena sanniṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: niyatā ati ca ittha yathā tīṇi lakkhaṇāni yattakam passitvā saddhā adhimokkhena sanniṭṭhānam

original: gacchantassa cittuppādo attano anantaraṃ phaladānaniyamena niyato hoti. Tattakaṃ
analyzed: gacchantassa cittuppādaḥ attanaḥ anantaram phala dāna niyamena niyataḥ hoti tattakam

original: passanto kusalesu dhammesu niyāmaṃ okkamatīti vutto. Tathādiṭṭhiṭṭhā nāni kāraṇa
analyzed: passantaḥ kusalesu dhammesu niyāmam okkamati iti vuttaḥ

original: paṭirūpakāni yattakaṃ passitvā micchādhimokkhena sanniṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa cittuppādocutianantarephaladānaniyamena
analyzed: paṭirūpakāni yattakam passitvā micchādhimokkhena sanniṭṭhānam gacchantassa cittuppāda ucuti anantare phala dāna niyamena

original: niyato hoti. Tattakaṃ passitvā sanniṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto akusalesu dhammesu niyāmaṃ
analyzed: niyataḥ hoti tattakam passitvā sanniṭṭhānam gacchantaḥ akusalesu dhammesu niyāmam

original: okkamati, atekicchonāma hoti. Tathā pana apassitvā kevalaṃ micchādhimokkhamattena
analyzed: okkamati atekiccho nāma hoti tathā pana a passitvā kevalam micchā adhimokkha mattena

original: evameva bhavissatīti sanniṭṭhānaṃ gantvā sakaṃ ācariyakaṃ samayaṃ paggaṇhitvā ṭhito
analyzed: evam eva bhavissati iti sanniṭṭhānam gantvā sakam ācariyakam samayam paggaṇhitvā ṭhitaḥ

original: atekicchonāma nahoti. Kasmā, phaladāna niyamābhāvāti. Ayañca attho micchattattikena
analyzed: atekicchonāma kasmā ayam ca atthaḥ micchattattikena

original: dīpetabbo. Tattha hi phaladāna niyamavaseneva ubhinnaṃpi sammattamicchattadhammānaṃ
analyzed: dīpetabbo tattha hi phala dāna niyama vasena iva ubhinnam pi sammatta micchatta dhammānam

original: niyatasaññāpaṭilābho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoti. Suttantasaṃvaṇṇanāsu pana gahaṇaniyamavasenāpi
analyzed: niyata saññā paṭilābho aṭṭhakathā ayam vutto ti suttanta saṃvaṇṇanāsu pana gahaṇa niyama vasena api

original: tassā niyatabhāvo vuttoti.
analyzed: tassā niyata bhāvo vutto ti

original: Aññatrāpiviññattiyāti viññattidvayena vināpi. Viññattidvayaṃ asamuṭṭhāpetvāpīti attho.
analyzed: aññatra api viññattiyā ti viññatti dvayena vinā api viññatti dvayam a samuṭṭhāpetvā api iti attho

original: Apisaddena pana viññattidvayena sahāpīti dasseti. Imāni hi tīṇi kammāni yadā kāyaṅgavā
analyzed: api saddena pana viññatti dvayena saha api iti dasseti imāni hi tīṇi kammāni yadā

original: caṅgāni acopetvā manasmiṃeva sijjhanti. Tadāviññattiyā vināva pavattanti. Yadā pana
analyzed: caṅgāni a ca upetvā manasmin eva sijjhanti tadā viññattiyā vinā ava pavattanti yadā pana

original: tāni copetvā kāyavacīdvāresu sijjhanti, tadā viññattiyā saheva pavattantīti. Etena
analyzed: tāni ca upetvā kāya vacī dvāresu sijjhanti tadā viññattiyā saha iva pavattanti iti etena

original: imesaṃ tīsupi dvāresu pavattiṃ dīpeti. Evaṃsantepi imāni manodvāreeva bahulaṃ pavattanti.
analyzed: imesam tīsu pi dvāresu pavattim dīpeti evam sante pi imāni manaḥ dvāre eva bahulam pavattanti

original: Kāyavacīdvāresu pana appakameva pavattantīti vuttaṃ manasmiṃyevabāhullavuttitoti.
analyzed: kāya vacī dvāresu pana appakam eva pavattanti iti vuttam

original: Tattha manasmiṃ yevāti kusalā kusalajavanacittasaṅkhāte manodvāreeva. Etena purimesupi
analyzed: tattha manasmim kusalā kusala javana citta saṅkhāte manaḥ dvāre eva etena purimesu pi

original: kāyadvāre vacīdvāreti padesu evasaddasambhavo dīpito hoti. Evañhi sati tatthapi dvārena
analyzed: kāya dvāre vacī dvāra iti padesu eva sadda sambhavaḥ dīpitaḥ hoti evam hi sati tattha api dvārena

original: kammavavatthānaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ upapannaṃ hotīti. Itarathā upalakkhaṇādivasena atthantarapasaṅgopi
analyzed: kamma vavatthānam suṭṭhutaram upapannam hoti iti itarathā upalakkhaṇa ādi vasena attha antara pasaṅgaḥ api

original: siyāti. Apica, idha evasaddena ayaṃpi visesattho dīpito hoti. Pāṇavadhādīsu hi vadhāmi
analyzed: siyā iti api ca idha eva saddena ayam pi visesa atthaḥ dīpitaḥ hoti pāṇa vadha ādīsu hi vadhāmi

original: naṃ avaharāmi na ntiādinā saṃvidhānākārena pavattā cetayitakriyāeva padhānaṃ hoti.
analyzed: avaharāmi na nti ādinā saṃvidhāna ākārena pavattā cetayita kriyā eva padhānam

original: Sāca kāyavacīpayogehi vinā nasijjhati. Tasmā tesu kāya vacī payogā kammasiddhiyā
analyzed: sā ca kāya vacī payogehi vinā tasmā tesu kāya vacī payogā kamma siddhiyā

original: ekaṃ aṅgaṃ honti. Taṃ sahajātāca abhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikāeva hutvā abbohārikattaṃ
analyzed: ekam aṅgam honti tam sahajātāḥ ca abhijjhā ādayo cetanā pakkhikāḥ eva hutvā abbohārika ttam

original: gacchanti. Parabhaṇḍā bhijjhāyanādīsu pana abhijjhādīnaṃ attapadhānānaṃ kāyavacīdvāresu
analyzed: gacchanti parabhaṇḍāḥ bhijjhāyana ādīsu pana abhijjha ādīnam atta padhānānam kāya vacī dvāresu

original: pavattānaṃpi kāya vacīpayogākammasiddhiyā aṅgameva nahonti. Tathā cintāpavatti matteneva
analyzed: aṅgam eva na honti tathā cintā pavatti mattena iva

original: tattha kammasiddhito. Iti imesu kammesu kāya vacīdvārānaṃ sabbenasabbaṃ aṅgabhāvapaṭikkhipanatthaṃ
analyzed: tattha kamma siddhitaḥ iti imesu kammesu kāya vacī dvārānam sabbena sabbam aṅga bhāva paṭikkhipana attham

original: manasmiṃ yevāti eva gahaṇaṃ idheva katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tesu pana dvāresu pavattimatta
analyzed: eva gahaṇam idha iva katam ti daṭṭhabbam tesu pana dvāresu

original: sabbhāvaṃ sandhāya bāhullasaddopi idha gahitoti.
analyzed: sabbhāvam sandhāya bāhulla saddaḥ api idha gahitaḥ iti

original: [156] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Viññattisamuṭṭhāpaka cittasampayuttācettha abhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikāva hontīti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha na yujjati.
analyzed: viññatti samuṭṭhāpaka citta sampayuttāḥ ca ittha abhijjhā ādayo cetanā pakkhikāḥ va honti iti vuttam tat idha na yujjati

original: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakacittasampayuttāpi kevalaṃ manokamma kiccavisesena pavattamānā abhijjhādayo cetanāpakkhikā honti. Cetanāeva pana abhijjhādipakkhikā hotīti. [Manokammaṃ]
analyzed: na hi viññatti samuṭṭhāpaka citta sampayuttā api kevalam manaḥ kamma kicca visesena pavattamānāḥ abhijjhā ādayaḥ cetanā pakkhikāḥ honti cetanā eva pana abhijjhā ādi pakkhikā hoti iti manaḥ kammam

original: 151. Ettha ca dasannaṃpi imesaṃ kammapathānaṃ pubbāparacetanāyo paṭisandhiākaḍḍhane
analyzed: ettha ca dasannam api imesam kammapathānam pubba apara cetanāyo paṭisandhi ākaḍḍhane

original: anekantikapakkhaṃ gatāti paṭisambhidā maggaṭīkāyaṃ vuttā. Tasmā tāpi imaṃ sattaṃ
analyzed: aneka antika pakkham gatā ti paṭisambhidā magga ṭīkāyam vuttā tasmā imam sattam

original: māressāmi imaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyissāmītiādinā nayena ādito paṭṭhāya pavattā balavapaccaye
analyzed: māressāmi imam bhaṇḍam adinnam ādiyissāmi itiādinā nayena āditaḥ paṭṭhāya pavattā balava paccaye

original: laddhā paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhanti. Aladdhā nākaḍḍhantīti yuttā. Yāni pana kusalākusalāni
analyzed: laddhā paṭisandhim ākaḍḍhanti aladdhā na ākaḍḍhanti iti yuttāḥ yāni pana kusala akusalāni

original: kammapathabhedaṃ appattāni honti. Tāni kāyadvāre dissamānāni kāyakammānināma honti.
analyzed: kamma patha bhedam appattāni honti tāni kāya dvāre dissamānāni honti

original: Vacīdvāre dissamānāni vacīkammānināma. Suddhe manodvāre dissamānāni manokammānināmāti
analyzed: vacī dvāre dissamānāni vacī kammānināma suddhe manaḥ dvāre dissamānāni manaḥ kammānināma ati

original: veditabbānīti. Dosamūlenāti dosasaṅkhātamūlena dosamūlakacittenāti dvidhā attho.
analyzed: veditabbāni iti dosa mūlena ati dosa saṅkhāta mūlena dosa mūlaka cittena ati dvidhā atthaḥ

original: Tattha purimo byāpādavajjehi dvīhi yujjati, pacchimo tīhipi. Lobhamūlenāti ettha
analyzed: tattha purimaḥ byāpāda vajjehi dvīhi yujjati pacchimaḥ lobha mūlena ati ettha

original: esanayo. Tatthāpiti purimo abhijjhāvajjehi dvīhi yujjati. Pacchimo tīhīti. Dvīhi
analyzed: tattha ap iti purimaḥ abhijjhā vajjehi dvīhi pacchimaḥ tīhi iti dvīhi

original: mūlehīti kadāci dosamūlena kadāci lobhamūlenāti evaṃ dvīhi mūlehi sambhavanti. Moho
analyzed: mūlehi iti kadācid dosa mūlena kadācid lobha mūlena ati evam dvīhi mūlehi sambhavanti mohaḥ

original: pana sabbasādhāraṇattā visesakaro na hotīti idha na gahito.
analyzed: pana sabba sādhāraṇa ttā visesa karaḥ na hoti iti idha na gahito

original: [157] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Nidhipāṭhakapamāṇato duṭṭhaniggahatthaṃ parasantakaṃ harantānaṃ rājūnaṃ brāhmaṇānañca
analyzed: nidhi pāṭhaka pamāṇataḥ duṭṭha niggahattham para santakam harantānam rājūnam brāhmaṇānam ca

original: sabbamidaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ rājūhi dinnaṃ. Tesaṃ pana sabbadubbalabhāvena aññe bhuñjanti.
analyzed: sabbam idam brāhmaṇānam rājūhi dinnam tesam pana sabba dubbala bhāvena aññe bhuñjanti

original: Attasantakameva brāhmaṇā paribhuñjantīti evamādīni vatvā sakasaññāya eva yaṃkiñci
analyzed: atta santakam eva brāhmaṇāḥ paribhuñjanti iti evamādīni vatvā saka saññāyaḥ eva yaṃkiñcid

original: harantānaṃ kammaphalasambandhāpavādīnañca mohamūlenā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha na yujjati.
analyzed: harantānam kamma phala sambandha apavādīnam ca moha mūlena ati vuttam tam idha na yujjati

original: Sahajātamūlañhi idha adhippetaṃ asādhāraṇabhūtañca. Tesañca tathāharantānaṃ haraṇaṃ
analyzed: sahajāta mūlam hi idha adhippetam asādhāraṇa bhūtam ca tesam ca haraṇam

original: haraṇakāle kadācidosamūlena kadāci lobhamūlenāti evaṃ dvīhi mūlehi eva sambhavatīti.
analyzed: haraṇa kāle kadācid dosa mūlena kadācid lobha mūlena ati evam dvīhi mūlehi eva sambhavati iti

original: Yo pana moho mahāsammatādīnaṃdhammikarājūnaṃ kāle pavattaṃ porāṇaka nidhisatthaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ pana mohaḥ mahāsammata ādīnam dhammika rājūnam kāle pavattam porāṇaka nidhi sattham

original: thapetvā pacchā adhammikānaṃrājūnaṃ kāle pavattesu yebhuyyena adhammikesu dhammasattha
analyzed: thapetvā pacchā adhammikānam rājūnam kāle pavattesu yebhuyyena adhammikesu dhammasattha

original: rājasattha saṅkhātesu nidhipāṭhesu dhammikasaññīnaṃ rājūnaṃ uppanno. Yoca rājūnaṃ
analyzed: rāja sattha saṅkhātesu nidhi pāṭhesu dhammika saññīnam rājūnam uppannaḥ yaḥ ca rājūnam

original: abhisekakāle dinnaññevasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃtiṇakaṭṭhodakanti vacanaṃ upādāya sabbamidaṃ
analyzed: abhiseka kāle vacanam upādāya sabbam idam

original: brāhmaṇānaṃ rājūhi dinnanti evaṃ saññīnaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ uppanno. Yoca natthi sukata
analyzed: brāhmaṇānam rājūhi dinnanti evam saññīnam brāhmaṇānam uppannaḥ yaḥ ca natthi

original: dukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākoti evaṃ diṭṭhikānaṃ kammaphalasambandhā pavādīnaṃ
analyzed: dukkaṭānam kammānam phalam vipāko ti evam diṭṭhikānam kamma phala sambandhā pavādīnam

original: uppanno. Sosabbopi upanissayamoho nāma hoti. So idha nādhippeto. Itarathā lobho nidānaṃ
analyzed: uppannaḥ upanissaya mohaḥ nāma hoti saḥ idha na adhippetaḥ itarathā lobhaḥ nidānam

original: kammānaṃ samudayāya. Doso nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya. Moho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāyāti
analyzed: kammānam samudayāya dosaḥ nidānam kammānam samudayāya mohaḥ nidānam kammānam samudayāya ati

original: vacanato sabbepi akusalakamma pathāti mūlakāeva idha vattabbā siyunti. Evaṃpanettha
analyzed: vacanato sabbe pi akusala kamma pathā ti mūlakāḥ eva idha vattabbā siyun ti evam pana ittha

original: vattabbaṃ siyā, kammesuca kammaphalesuca sañjātakaṅkhānaṃ janānaṃ kaṅkhā pariyuṭṭhāna
analyzed: vattabbam siyā kammesu ca kamma phalesu ca sañjāta kaṅkhānam janānam kaṅkhā pariyuṭṭhāna

original: cittenasahevatadanurūpāniadinnādānādīni cattārikammāni karontānaṃ tāni kammāni suddhena
analyzed: cittena saha iva tad anurūpāni adinnādāna ādīni cattāri kammāni karontānam tāni kammāni suddhena

original: mohamūlena jāyantīti. Evañhi sati parato vicikicchā cetanāya paṭisandhijanakesu gahaṇaṃpi
analyzed: moha mūlena jāyanti iti evam hi sati paratas vicikicchā cetanāya paṭisandhi janakesu gahaṇam pi

original: upapannaṃ hotīti. [Akusalakammaṃ].
analyzed: upapannam hoti iti akusala kammaṃ

original: 152. Kāmāvacarakusalaṃpi kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kāya kammanti ettha dve pariyāyā veditabbā.
analyzed: kāmāvacara kusalam pi kāya dvāre pavattam kāya kammanti ettha dve pariyāyā veditabbā

original: Kathaṃ, vakkhamānesu hi puññakriyavatthūsu yaṃkiñci puññakriyavatthuṃ kāyaṅgaṃ copetvā
analyzed: katham vakkhamānesu hi puñña kriya vatthūsu yaṃkiñci puñña kriya vatthum kāyaṅgam ca upetvā

original: pavattitaṃ kāyakammaṃ nāma. Vācaṅgaṃ copetvā pavattitaṃ vacīkammaṃ nāma. Kāyaṅga
analyzed: pavattitam kāya kammam nāma vācaṅgam ca upetvā pavattitam vacī kammam nāma kāyaṅga

original: vācaṅgāni acopetvā manodvāreeva pavattitaṃ manokammaṃ nāmāti ayameko pariyāyo. Ayaṃ
analyzed: vācaṅgāni manaḥ dvāre eva pavattitam manokammam nāma ati ayam ekaḥ pariyāyaḥ ayam

original: pana mettaṃ kāyakammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āviceva raho ca. Mettaṃ
analyzed: pana mettam kāya kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvicā iva raho ca mettam

original: vacīkammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti sabrahmacārīsu āviceva rahoca. Mettaṃ manokammaṃ paccupaṭṭhitaṃ
analyzed: vacī kammam paccupaṭṭhitam hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvicā iva raho ca mettam manaḥ kammam paccupaṭṭhitam

original: hoti sabrahmacārīsu āviceva rahocātica. Sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattaṃ.
analyzed: hoti sabrahmacārīsu āvicā iva raho ca atica sabbam kāya kammam ñāṇa pubbaṅgamam ñāṇa anuparivattam

original: Sabbaṃ vacīkammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivattaṃ. Sabbaṃ manokammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ
analyzed: sabbam vacī kammam ñāṇa pubbaṅgamam ñāṇa anuparivattam sabbam manaḥ kammam ñāṇa pubbaṅgamam

original: ñāṇānuparivattanti ca.
analyzed: ñāṇā anuparivattanti ca

original: Padakkhiṇaṃ kāyakammaṃ, vācākammaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
analyzed: padakkhiṇam kāya kammam vācā kammam padakkhiṇam

original: Padakkhiṇaṃ manokammaṃ, paṇīhite padakkhiṇe tica.
analyzed: padakkhiṇam manokammam paṇīhite padakkhiṇe ti ca

original: Evamādīsu suttapadesu āgato. Apica, aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ sakalāya navakammadvārakathāya
analyzed: evamādīsu sutta padesu āgataḥ api ca aṭṭhasāliniyam sakalāya nava kamma dvāra kathāya

original: ayamattho dīpetabbo. Tattha hi dānamayaṃpi kāyavacī manokammavasena tidhā vibhattaṃ.
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ dīpetabbo tattha hi kāya vacī manaḥ kamma vasena tidhā vibhattam

original: Tathā sīlamayaṃ bhāvanāmayañcāti. Yasmiṃ pana dussilye pavattamāne kāyo aparisuddho
analyzed: tathā sīla mayam bhāvanā mayam ca ati yasmin pana dussilye pavattamāne kāyaḥ a parisuddhaḥ

original: hoti. Kāyasaṃvaro bhijjati. Yaṃ pana kusalaṃ pavattamānaṃ tadaṅgapahānādivasena taṃ
analyzed: hoti kāya saṃvaraḥ bhijjati yam pana kusalam pavattamānam tad aṅga pahāna ādi vasena tam

original: dussilyaṃ pajahitvā kāyadvāraṃ sodhayamānaṃ kāyasaṃvaraṃ pūrayamānaṃ pavattati. Taṃ
analyzed: dussilyam pajahitvā kāya dvāram sodhayamānam kāya saṃvaram pūrayamānam pavattati tam

original: kāyacopana rahitaṃpi kāyaṅga saṃvaraṇa kiccattā kiccasīsena kāyadvāre pavattaṃ kāyakammaṃnāma.
analyzed: kāya dvāre pavattam

original: Kāyasucaritantipi vuccati. Etthaca taṃ dussilyaṃ pajahitvāti yasmiṃ citte uppajjamāne
analyzed: vuccati ettha ca tam dussilyam pajahitvā ati yasmin citte uppajjamāne

original: pāṇaghātādikaṃ kāyadussilyaṃ uppajjeyya. Tassa cittassa uppajjituṃ appadānavasena
analyzed: pāṇa ghāta ādikam kāya dussilyam uppajjeyya tassa cittassa uppajjitum appadāna vasena

original: taṃ kāyadussilyaṃ pajahitvā. Kāyadvāraṃ sodha yamānanti yasmiṃ dussilye uppajjamāne
analyzed: tam kāya dussilyam pajahitvā kāya dvāram sodha yasmin dussilye uppajjamāne

original: kāyaṅgaṃ asuddhaṃ hoti. Tassa uppajjituṃ appadānavasena kāyadvāraṃ sodhayamānaṃ.
analyzed: kāya aṅgam asuddham hoti tassa uppajjitum appadāna vasena kāya dvāram sodhayamānam

original: Kāyasaṃvaraṃ pūrayamānanti sayaṃ kāyaṅgasaṃvaraṇakiccasampādanena kāyasaṃvaraṃ pūrentanti
analyzed: kāya saṃvaram pūrayamānanti sayam kāyaṅga saṃvaraṇa kicca sampādanena kāya saṃvaram

original: attho. Vacīkammepi eseva nayo. Avayesaṃ pana sabbaṃpi kalyāṇakammaṃ tīsu dvāresu
analyzed: atthaḥ vacī kamme pi esa iva nayaḥ avayesam pana sabbam pi kalyāṇa kammam tīsu dvāresu

original: pavattaṃpi manodvāraṃeva sodhayamānaṃ manosaṃvaraṃeva pūrayamānaṃ pavattatīti manodvāre
analyzed: manaḥ dvāram eva sodhayamānam manaḥ saṃvaram eva pūrayamānam pavattati iti manaḥ dvāre

original: pavattaṃ manokammaṃnāma. Manosucaritantipi vuccati. Ayameko pariyāyo. Ayaṃ pana anekasatesu
analyzed: pavattam manokammaṃ nāma manosucaritanti pi vuccati ayam ekaḥ pariyāyaḥ ayam pana aneka satesu

original: kammapathasuttesu āgato. Apica, aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ sakalāya dvārakathāka ayamattho dīpetabboti.
analyzed: kammapatha suttesu āgataḥ apica aṭṭhasāliniyam sakalāya ayam attho dīpetabbo ti

original: Imesu pana dvīsu pariyāyesu sattusāsane kalyāṇadhammapūraṇaṃnāma yāvadeva pāpadhammapahānatthāya
analyzed: imesu pana dvīsu pariyāyesu sattu sāsane kalyāṇa dhamma pūraṇam nāma yāvat eva pāpa dhamma pahāna atthāya

original: eva hotīti pacchimoyeva padhānanti veditabboti. Diyyati etenāti dānaṃ. Vatthupariccāgacetanā.
analyzed: eva hoti iti pacchimo yā iva padhānanti veditabbo ti diyyati etena ati dānam vatthu pariccāga cetanā

original: Sīlayatīti sīlaṃ. Kāya vacīkammāni sāvajjāni nīvāretvā anavajjāni susamāhitāni katvā
analyzed: sīlayati iti sīlam kāya vacī kammāni sāvajjāni nīvāretvā anavajjāni su samāhitāni katvā

original: sammādahati thapeti, uparime kusaladhammeca upadhāreti. Tesaṃ patiṭṭhā hutvā dhāretīti
analyzed: sammā ādahati thapeti uparime kusala dhamme ca upadhāreti tesam patiṭṭhā hutvā dhāreti iti

original: attho. Bhāventi etāyāti bhāvanā. Adhikusaladhamme anuppannevā uppādenti uppannevā
analyzed: atthaḥ bhāventi etāya ati bhāvanā adhi kusala dhamme anuppannā iva uppādenti uppannā iva

original: vaḍḍhentīti attho. Apacāyanti etenāti apacāyanaṃ. Pūjenti kāyavācāhi attānaṃ nīcavuttiṃ dassentīti attho.
analyzed: vaḍḍhenti iti atthaḥ apacāyanti etena ati apacāyanam pūjenti kāya vācāhi attānam nīca vuttim dassenti iti atthaḥ

original: Visesena āvaranti ussukkaṃ āpajjantīti byāvaṭānaṃ bhāvo kammaṃvā veyyāvaccaṃ. Pajjitthāti
analyzed: visesena āvaranti ussukkam āpajjanti iti byāvaṭānam bhāvaḥ kammaṃ vā veyyāvaccam pajjittha ati

original: patti. Attani laddhapuññakoṭṭhāsassa nāmaṃ. Pāpīyatītivā patti. Parehi anumodantehi
analyzed: patti attani laddha puñña koṭṭhāsassa nāmam pāpīyati itivā patti parehi anumodantehi

original: laddhabbassa puññānisandassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Pattiṃ dadanti etenāti pattidānaṃ. Tadeva
analyzed: laddhabbassa puññānisandassa etam nāmam pattim dadanti etena ati patti dānam tat eva

original: parehi dinnaṃ anumodanti. Sādhukāraṃ dadanti etenāti pattānumodanaṃ. Dhammaṃ suṇanti
analyzed: parehi dinnam anumodanti sādhukāram dadanti etena ati patta anumodanam dhammam suṇanti

original: etenāti dhammasavanaṃ. Dhammaṃ desenti etāyāti dhammadesanā. Atthi dinnaṃ, atthi
analyzed: etena ati dhamma savanam dhammam desenti etāya ati dhamma desanā atthi dinnam atthi

original: yiṭṭhaṃ, atthi hutaṃ, atthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākotiādinā dasavatthukaṃ
analyzed: atthi hutam atthi su kata dukkaṭānam kammānam phalam vipāka uti ādinā dasa vatthukam

original: sammādiṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karonti etenāti diṭṭhijukammaṃ. Sabbāni pana tāni punenti cittasantānaṃ
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhim ujum karonti etena ati diṭṭhi ju kammam sabbāni pana tāni punenti citta santānam

original: sodhenti etehīti puññāni. Pūjanīyabhāvaṃ nibbattentīti puññānītipi vadanti. Tānieva
analyzed: sodhenti etehi iti puññāni pūjanīya bhāvam nibbattenti iti puññāni iti pi vadanti tāni eva

original: avassaṃ kattabbaṭṭhena kriyānicāti puññakriyāni. Tāniyeva sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
analyzed: avassam kattabba ṭṭhena puñña kriyāni tāni yeva sukha visesānam adhiṭṭhāna ṭṭhena

original: vatthūnicāti puññakriyavatthūnīti. Ettha ekamekaṃ tividhaṃ hoti purimaṃ majjhimaṃ
analyzed: vatthūni ca ati puñña kriya vatthūni iti ettha ekam ekam tividham hoti purimam majjhimam

original: pacchimanti. Tattha dāne tāva paṭiggāhakassa pariccāgakaraṇaṃ majjhimaṃnāma. Tato
analyzed: pacchiman ti tattha dāne tāva paṭiggāhakassa pariccāga karaṇam majjhimam nāma tatas

original: pubbe iminā paccayena dānamayaṃ puññaṃ pavattayissāmīti evaṃ paccayuppādanato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: pubbe iminā paccayena dāna mayam puññam pavattayissāmi iti evam paccaya uppādanataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: dānaṃ ārabbha dānaṃ uddissa tīsu dvāresu pavattā kusalacetanā purimaṃnāma. Pacchā
analyzed: dānam ārabbha dānam uddissa tīsu dvāresu pavattā kusala cetanā purimaṃnāma pacchā

original: bhāge pana attanā dinnadānaṃ ārabbha punappunaṃ attamanacittaṃ uppādentassa pavattā
analyzed: bhāge pana attanā dinna dānam ārabbha punappunam atta mana cittam uppādentassa pavattā

original: kusalacetanā pacchimaṃnāmaṃ. Sabbaṃpi cetaṃ akusale vuttanayena balavapaccaye laddhā
analyzed: kusala cetanā pacchimaṃnāmam sabbam pi cetam akusale vutta nayena balava paccaye laddhā

original: paṭisandhiṃ deti. Aladdhā na detīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭisandhim deti aladdhā na deti iti veditabbam

original: Puna hīna majjhimapaṇītavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tattha hīnena chandena cittena vīriyena
analyzed: puna hīna majjhima paṇīta vasena tividham hoti tattha hīnena chandena cittena vīriyena

original: vīmaṃsāyavā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ, majjhimena chandādinā pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ, paṇītena
analyzed: pavattitam hīnam majjhimena chanda ādinā pavattitam majjhimam paṇītena

original: paṇītaṃ. Yasakāmatāyavā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ. Puññaphalakāmatāyavā pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ.
analyzed: paṇītam yasa kāma tā yavā pavattitam hīnam puñña phala kāma tā yavā pavattitam majjhimam

original: Kattabbame vidanti ariyabhāvaṃ nissāya pavattitaṃ paṇītaṃ. Attukkaṃsana paravambhanādīhi
analyzed: vidanti ariya bhāvam nissāya pavattitam paṇītam attukkaṃsana paravambhana ādīhi

original: upakkiliṭṭhaṃvā hīnaṃ. Anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ lokiyasukhabhāgitāya pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ.
analyzed: upakkiliṭṭham vā hīnam an upakkiliṭṭham lokiya sukha bhāgi tāya pavattitam majjhimam

original: Maggaphalasukhabhāgitāya pavattitaṃ paṇītaṃ. Taṇhāvasenavā bhavabhogatthāya pavattitaṃ
analyzed: magga phala sukha bhāgi tāya pavattitam paṇītam taṇhā vasena vā bhava bhoga tthāya pavattitam

original: hīnaṃ. Attano vimokkhatthāya pavattitaṃ majjhimaṃ. Sabbasattavimokkhatthāya pavattitaṃ
analyzed: hīnam attanaḥ vimokkha atthāya pavattitam majjhimam sabba satta vimokkha atthāya pavattitam

original: pāramitādānaṃ paṇītanti ayamattho visuddhimagge sīlaniddesaṃ nissāya veditabboti.
analyzed: pāramitā dānam paṇītanti ayam attho visuddhi magge sīla niddesam nissāya veditabbaḥ ti

original: Yathā cettha, evaṃ sesesupiyathā sambhavaṃ tikadvayaṃ vibhajitvā vattabbanti. Tattha
analyzed: yathā ca ittha evam sesesu pi yathā sambhavam tika dvayam vibhajitvā vattabbanti tattha

original: sīlaṃ nāmabhikkhusīlaṃ, bhikkhunisīlaṃ, sāmaṇerasīlaṃ, gahaṭṭhasīlanti catubbidhaṃ
analyzed: sīlam nāma bhikkhu sīlam bhikkhuni sīlam sāmaṇera sīlam gahaṭṭha sīlanti catubbidham

original: hoti. Tattha purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ samādānakiccaṃ kammavācāya siddhaṃhoti. Antimavatthuajjhāpannenavā
analyzed: hoti tattha purimānam dvinnam samādāna kiccam kamma vācāya siddham hoti antima vatthu ajjhāpannena vā

original: sikkhāpaccakkhānenavā kammavācāya bhinnāya sabbaṃ samādānaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti. Sabbāni
analyzed: sikkhā paccakkhānena vā kamma vācāya bhinnāya sabbam samādānam bhinnam hoti sabbāni

original: upasampanna sīlāni bhinnāni honti. Tadā bhikkhupaṭiññaṃ avijahitvā ṭhito dussīlonāma
analyzed: upasampanna sīlāni bhinnāni honti tadā bhikkhu paṭiññam a vijahitvā ṭhitaḥ dussīlaḥ nāma

original: hoti. Thapetvāpana antimavatthuṃ aññasikkhā padāni vītikkamantassa yaṃ vītikkamati.
analyzed: hoti antima vatthum añña sikkhā padāni vītikkamantassa yam vītikkamati

original: Tasmiṃyeva saṃvarabhedo hoti. Na samādāna bhedo. Na hi taṃ puna kammavācāya samādātabbanti
analyzed: saṃvara bhedaḥ hoti na samādāna bhedaḥ na hi tam puna kamma vācāya samādātabbanti

original: atthīti. Paṭikammaṃ karontassa pana saṃvaro pākatiko hoti. Sañcicca vītikkamantovā
analyzed: atthi iti paṭikammam karontassa pana saṃvaraḥ pākatikaḥ hoti sañcicca vītikkamanto vā

original: paṭikammaṃ akarontovā alajjīnāma hoti. Na dussīloti. Esanayo sāmaṇerasīlepi. Tattha
analyzed: paṭikammam a karontaḥ vā alajjī nāma hoti na dussīlaḥ ti esa nayo sāmaṇera sīle pi tattha

original: pana saraṇagamaneneva samādānaṃsiddhaṃ hoti. Liṅganāsanaṅgaṃ katvā saraṇagamane bhinne
analyzed: pana saraṇa gamanena iva samādānam siddham katvā saraṇa gamane bhinne

original: sabbaṃ samādānaṃ bhijjati. Itaresu pana yaṃ vītikkamati, tasmiṃyeva saṃvarabhedo hotīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sabbam samādānam bhijjati itaresu pana yam vītikkamati saṃvara bhedaḥ hoti iti veditabbam

original: Gahaṭṭhasīle pana pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ gahaṇavaseneva samādānaṃ siddhaṃ hoti. Tasmā
analyzed: gahaṭṭha sīle pana pakati gahaṭṭhānam gahaṇa vasena iva samādānam siddham tasmā

original: ekatogaṇhante sabbāni samādinnāni honti. Ekasmiṃca bhinne sabbāni bhinnāni honti.
analyzed: ekatas gaṇhante sabbāni samādinnāni honti ekasmin ca bhinne sabbāni bhinnāni honti

original: Sabbāni puna samādātabbāni. Visuṃ visuṃ gaṇhante pana yaṃ vītikkamati, etadevabhijjati.
analyzed: sabbāni puna samādātabbāni visum visum gaṇhante pana yam vītikkamati etat eva bhijjati

original: Tadeva puna samādātabbaṃ hotīti. Paricchinnakālā tikkamane pana sabbaṃ samādānaṃ
analyzed: tat eva puna samādātabbam hoti iti paricchinna kālā tikkamane pana sabbam samādānam

original: vūpasammatiyeva. Dussīlabhāvo panettha pañcannaṃ niccasīlānaṃ bhedena veditabbo.
analyzed: vūpasammatiyā iva dussīla bhāvaḥ pana ittha pañcannam nicca sīlānam bhedena veditabbo

original: Niccāniccesu pana yaṃ niccameva vaṭṭati. Aniccaṃ navaṭṭati sāvajjaṃ hoti. Taṃ niccasīlaṃ
analyzed: nicca aniccesu pana yam niccam eva vaṭṭati aniccam na vaṭṭati sa āvajjam hoti tam nicca sīlam

original: nāma. Yaṃ pana niccaṃpi vaṭṭati. Mahantaṃ puññābhisandaṃ hoti. Aniccaṃpi vaṭṭati
analyzed: nāma yam pana niccam pi vaṭṭati mahantam puñña abhisandam hoti aniccam pi vaṭṭati

original: sāvajjaṃ na hoti. Taṃ aniccasīlaṃnāma. Tattha bhikkhu bhāve ṭhitassa bhikkhusīlaṃ
analyzed: sāvajjam na hoti tam anicca sīlaṃ nāma tattha bhikkhu bhāve ṭhitassa bhikkhu sīlam

original: sāmaṇerabhāve ṭhitassa sāmaṇerasīlaṃ pakatigahaṭṭhānaṃpañcasīlaṃ pabbajitasaṅkhepagatānaṃ
analyzed: sāmaṇera bhāve ṭhitassa sāmaṇera sīlam pakati gaha ṭṭhānam pañca sīlam pabbajita saṅkhepa gatānam

original: upāsakānaṃ tāpasaparibbājakānañca dasasīlaṃ niccasīlaṃnāma. Tesañhi taṃ taṃ yathāsakaṃ
analyzed: upāsakānam tāpasa paribbājakānam ca dasa sīlam nicca sīlam nāma tesam hi tam tam yathāsakam

original: sīlaṃ niccaṃ suddhaṃ katvā rakkhitumeva vaṭṭati. Arakkhantānaṃ bhikkhubhāvādiko sāvajjo
analyzed: sīlam niccam suddham katvā rakkhitum eva vaṭṭati a rakkhantānam bhikkhu bhāva ādikaḥ sāvajjaḥ

original: hoti asuddho. Kasmā, attano anurūpassa ācārassa vipattito. Pakatigahaṭṭhānaṃ pana
analyzed: hoti asuddhaḥ kasmai attanaḥ anurūpassa ācārassa vipattitaḥ pakati gaha ṭṭhānam pana

original: aṭṭhaṅguposathasīlaṃ aniccasīlaṃnāma. Tañhi tesaṃ vuttanayena niccaṃpi vaṭṭati. Aniccaṃpi
analyzed: aṭṭhaṅgu posatha sīlam aniccasīlaṃnāma tat hi tesam vutta nayena niccam pi vaṭṭati aniccam pi

original: vaṭṭati. Tathā dasasīlañca. Tañhi pakati gahaṭṭhānaṃ aniccasīlameva hoti. Gihinivatthaṃ
analyzed: vaṭṭati tathā dasa sīlam ca tat hi pakati gaha ṭṭhānam anicca sīlam eva hoti gihi nivattham

original: pahāya kāsāyavatthadhāraṇena pabbajitasaṅkhepagatānaṃ eva niccasīlaṃ. Yathā hi pakatimanussānaṃ
analyzed: pahāya kāsāya vattha dhāraṇena pabbajita saṅkhepa gatānam eva nicca sīlam yathā hi pakati manussānam

original: pañcasīlaṃ samādinnaṃpi asamādinnaṃpi niccaṃ rakkhitumeva vaṭṭati. Vītikkamituṃ navaṭṭati.
analyzed: pañca sīlam samādinnam api a samādinnam pi niccam rakkhitum eva vaṭṭati vītikkamitum na vaṭṭati

original: Tathā pabbajitavesadhārīnaṃ dasasīlaṃ samādinnaṃpi asamādinnaṃpi niccaṃ rakkhitumeva
analyzed: tathā pabbajita vesa dhārīnam dasa sīlam samādinnam pi a samādinnam pi niccam rakkhitum eva

original: vaṭṭati. Vītikkamituṃ navaṭṭati. Vesadhāraṇena saha siddhattāti.
analyzed: vaṭṭati vītikkamitum na vaṭṭati vesadhāraṇena saha

original: Upari vuccamānā samathavipassanāvasena duvidhā bhāvanā bhāvanānāma. Sā idha appanaṃ
analyzed: upari vuccamānā samatha vipassanā vasena duvidhā bhāvanā bhāvanā nāma sā idha appanaṃ

original: apattāva adhippetā. Dhammavinayapari yattiyā saha anavajjakammasippavijjāṭhānesu
analyzed: apatta ava adhippetā dhamma vinaya pari yattiyā saha anavajja kamma sippa vijjā ṭhānesu

original: paricayakaraṇa cetanāpi ettheva saṅgayhati. Ratanattaye pana mātāpitūsu kulejeṭṭhesu
analyzed: paricaya karaṇa cetanā api etthā iva saṅgayhati ratanattaye pana mātā pitūsu

original: ācariyesu dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇesu aññesuca guṇavayavuddhesu yathārahaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: ācariyesu dhammika samaṇa brāhmaṇesu aññesu ca guṇa vaya vuddhesu yathāraham paccuṭṭhānam

original: vandanaṃ añjalikaraṇaṃ sāmicikaraṇaṃ vattapaṭivattakaraṇanti evamādisabbaṃ apacāyanaṃnāma.
analyzed: vandanam añjali karaṇam sāmici karaṇam vatta paṭivatta karaṇam ti evamādi sabbam apacāyanam nāma

original: Tesaññeva aññesañca āgantukagamikaaddhikānaṃ gilānānaṃ jiṇṇānaṃ kicca karaṇīyesu
analyzed: tesam eva aññesam ca āgantuka gamika addhikānam gilānānam jiṇṇānam kicca karaṇīyesu

original: sabrahmacārīnaṃ cīvarakammādīsu paresaṃ taṃtaṃpuñña kammesuca parisuddhena hitapharaṇacittena
analyzed: sa brahmacārīnam cīvara kamma ādīsu paresam kammesu ca parisuddhena hita pharaṇa cittena

original: attanokiccesu viya kāyavācāhi vāyāmakaraṇaṃ veyyāvaccaṃnāma. Attanā katassa yassakassaci
analyzed: attano kiccesu viya kāya vācāhi vāyāma karaṇam veyyāvaccaṃnāma attanā katassa yassa kassaci

original: puññassa parehi sādhāraṇakaraṇaṃ pattidānaṃnāma. Parehi dinnāya pattiyā anumodanaṃ
analyzed: puññassa parehi sādhāraṇa karaṇam patti dānaṃ nāma parehi dinnāya pattiyāḥ anumodanam

original: attamanatāpavedanaṃ pattā numodanaṃnāma. Adinnassa puññassa anumodanaṃ pana anumodanameva
analyzed: atta mana tā apavedanam anumodanam nāma adinnassa puññassa anumodanam pana anumodanam eva

original: hoti. Na pattānumodanaṃ. Pattiyāeva abhāvato. Pattica duvidhā uddisikā anuddisikāti.
analyzed: hoti na patta anumodanam pattiyā eva abhāvataḥ patti ca duvidhā uddisikā anuddisikā ati

original: Tattha attānaṃ uddisikaṃ anumodantasseva diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ jātanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: tattha attānam uddisikam anumodantassa iva diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam jātanti veditabbam

original: Idaṃ pana dvayaṃ dānapuññesueva visesato pākaṭaṃ. Tañhi uddisakaṃ katvā devatānaṃvā
analyzed: idam pana dvayam dāna puññesu eva visesataḥ pākaṭam tat hi uddisakam katvā

original: paradattupajīvipetānaṃvā vemānikapetānaṃvā vinipātikāsurānaṃvā dinnaṃ anumoditañca
analyzed: para datta upajīvi petānam vā vemānika petānam vā vinipātika asura anam vā dinnam anumoditam ca

original: tesaṃ taṅkhaṇeeva diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyaṃ jātanti. Atthahita paṭisaṃyuttāya dhammakathāya
analyzed: tesam taṅkhaṇe eva diṭṭhadhamma vedanīyam jātanti attha hita paṭisaṃyuttāya dhammakathāya

original: yoniso manasikāre ṭhatvā savanañca kathanañca dhammasavanaṃ dhamma desanācanāma.
analyzed: yonisaḥ manasikāre ṭhatvā savanam ca kathanam ca dhammasavanam dhamma desanā canāma

original: Niravajjakammasippavijjāṭhānānaṃ savanakathanacetanāca etthevasaṅgayhanti.
analyzed: niravajja kamma sippa vijjā ṭhānānam savana kathana cetanā ca

original: Natthi dinnaṃ natthiyiṭṭhantiādinayapavattāya dasavatthukāya micchā diṭṭhiyāvā issaranimmānādidiṭṭhiyāvā
analyzed: natthi dinnam issara nimmāna ādi diṭṭhi yāvā

original: diṭṭhamaṅgalādidiṭṭhiyāvā visuddhaṃ katvā tehi tehi vatthūhivā yuttīhivā kāraṇehivā

original: kammasakatā ñāṇasaṅkhātāya sammādiṭṭhiyā vodānakaraṇaṃ diṭṭhujukammaṃnāmāti. Yattha

original: pana tividhameva puññakriyavatthu āgataṃ. Tattha pattidānānumodanāni dāne saṅgayhanti.
analyzed: pana tividham eva puñña kriya vatthu āgatam tattha patti dāna anumodanāni dāne saṅgayhanti

original: Issāmaccherānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena taṃ sabhāvattā. Apacāyanaveyyāvaccāni sīle saṅgayhanti.
analyzed: paṭipakkha bhāvena tam sabhāvattā apacāyana veyyāvaccāni sīle saṅgayhanti

original: Tesaṃ cāritta sīlattā. Sesāni tīṇi bhāvanāmaye saṅgayhanti. Taṃ sabhāvattā. Kammaṭṭhānavinimutto
analyzed: tesam sīla ttā sesāni tīṇi bhāvanā maye saṅgayhanti tam sabhāva ttā kammaṭṭhāna vinimutto

original: dhammonāma natthīti hi vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhujukammañca ñāṇa vaḍḍhanamevāti. Tīsvevavā etaṃ
analyzed: dhammaḥ nāma natthi iti hi vuttam diṭṭhu ju kammam ca ñāṇa vaḍḍhanam eva ati tīsu eva vā etam

analyzed: saṅgayhati diṭṭhuju kammam sabbesam niyama lakkhaṇam titi aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam satiyā eva

original: kiccasiddhito manokammaṃeva.
analyzed: kicca siddhitaḥ manaḥ kammam eva

original: [158] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattā bhāvena kāya dvārādīsu appavattanatoti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
analyzed: viññatti samuṭṭhāpaka ttā bhāvena kāya dvāra ādīsu appavattanato ti vuttam tat na sundaram

original: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakaṃ abhiññākusalaṃ kāyadvārādīsu pavattamānaṃpi kāyavacīkammasaṅkhyaṃ

analyzed: gacchati kāya vācānam kamma patha aṅga bhāva asaṃbhavatī ti tat ca bhāvanām ayanti dāna sīla vasena

original: Tatīyena pītiyā. Catutthena sukhadukkhānaṃ pahānaṃ sīlaṃ. Veramaṇi sīlaṃ. Cetanā

analyzed: sīlam saṃvaraḥ sīlam avītikkamaḥ sīlanti vuttam tat pariyāyena vuttam iti veditabbam

original: Appanāpattanti bhāvanā balena ārammaṇe anupavisitvā acalaṭṭhitibhāvena pavattanato

analyzed: appanā pattam kammam hoti

original: [159] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Pubbabhāgapavattānaṃ kāmāvacarabhāvatoti” kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
analyzed: pubba bhāga pavattānam kāmāvacara bhāvato ti kāraṇam vuttam tat na sundaram

original: Jhānabhedenāti pana vattabbaṃ. Jhānaṅgabhedenātivā jhānaṅgasamudāyabhedenāti attho,

original: jhānabhedena icceva vuttaṃ hoti. Kusalakammaṃ
analyzed: jhāna bhedena iccā iva vuttam hoti kusala kammam

analyzed: ettha ati etasmin pākaṭṭhāna catukke uddhacca rahitam ti uddhacca sahagata cetanā vajjitam

original: ce. Dhammasaṅgahe dassanena pahātabbesu taṃ avatvā bhāvanāya pahātabbesu eva vuttattā.
analyzed: ce dhamma saṅgahe dassanena pahātabbesu tam a vatvā bhāvanāya pahātabbesu eva vutta ttā

original: Yathāha-cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā vicikicchāsahagato cittuppādo, ime

original: tabbātica, sesā pana cattāro diṭṭhigatavippayuttacittuppādā dve paṭighasampayuttacittuppādāca

original: Yo dassanenapahātabbesu na vutto, so akusaladhammo paṭisandhiṃ nākaḍḍhatīti. Paṭṭhāne

original: anuddhaṭattāti. Yathāha-sahajātā dassanenapahātabbā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ

analyzed: paccayaḥ ti ca na ca nānā kkhaṇika kamma paccaya sattiyā vinā vipāka uppādanam nāma atthi iti

original: Yadievaṃ sā pavattivipākaṃpi najanetīti sakkā vattuntice.Na. Paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge

analyzed: tassāḥ vipākassa yathā āha katame dhammāḥ akusalāḥ yasmin samaye akusalam

original: dhammā akusalā. Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā. Tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāti.
analyzed: dhammāḥ akusalāḥ imesu dhammesu ñāṇam dhamma paṭisambhidā tesam vipāke ñāṇam attha paṭisambhidā ti

original: Tenāha pavattiyaṃ pana sabbaṃpi dvādasavidhantiādi.
analyzed: tena āha pavattiyam pana sabbam pi dvādasavidha ntiādi

original: [160] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Adhimokkhavirahena sabbadubbalaṃpi vicikicchāsahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati. Adhimokkhasampayogena tato balavantaṃpi uddhaccasahagataṃ nākaḍḍhatīti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.

original: Tattha mahāvipākāni sugati kāmaloke ahetukāni aṭṭhapi sabbasmiṃ kāmaloke tesuca pañcacakkhuviññāṇa

original: Kusalaṃ duvidhaṃ sampajānakataṃ asampajānakatanti. Tattha kammā yūhanakāle antamaso

original: lābhā vata me. Naca vata me alābhā. Suladdhaṃ vata me. Naca vata me dulladdhaṃ. Yassa

original: suddhāvāsesu uppannā. Itarā kāci tāvatiṃsesu kāci paranimmitavasavattīsu uppannā
analyzed: suddhāvāsesu uppannā itarā kāci tāvatiṃsesu kāci paranimmitavasavattīsu uppannā

original: icceva udānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanti. Apicettha vehapphale akaniṭṭhe catutthāruppeti
analyzed: icca iva udāna ṭṭhakathāyam vuttanti api ca ittha vehapphale akaniṭṭhe catuttha āruppe ti

original: tīsu bhavaggesu nibbattā ariyā aññattha nuppajjanti. Sesabrahmalokesu nibbattā heṭṭhābhūmīsu

original: nuppajjantīti. [Kammacatukkaṃ].
analyzed: nuppajjanti iti kamma catukkam

original: 155. Āyukkhayena maraṇaṃ kammakkhayena maraṇantiādinā yojetabbaṃ. Tattha aparikkhīṇeyeva
analyzed: āyu kkhayena maraṇam kamma kkhayena maraṇa nti ādinā yojetabbam tattha

original: kammānubhāve tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye yathāniyamitassa āyuparimāṇassa parikkhayena
analyzed: kamma anubhāve tasmim tasmim satta nikāye yathā niyamitassa āyu parimāṇassa parikkhayena

original: paripuṇṇena maraṇaṃ āyukkhaya maraṇaṃnāma. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave dubbalena kammena

original: nibbattassa sattassa aparikkhīṇeyeva āyuparimāṇe kevalaṃ kammasattiparikkhayena antarāva
analyzed: nibbattassa sattassa a parikkhīṇe yeva āyu parimāṇe kevalam kamma satti parikkhayena

original: maraṇaṃ kammakkhaya maraṇaṃnāma. Tadubhayassa samaṃ parikkhayena maraṇaṃ ubhayakkhaya

original: maraṇaṃnāma. Dharamānepi tadubhaye purimabhavesuvā imasmiṃvābhave katena upaghātakakammena
analyzed: maraṇam nāma tat ubhaye imasmin vā abhave katena upaghātaka kammena

original: ajjhattabahiddhābhūte nānārogābādha pathavīpavesa asanipātādike jīvitantarāye samuṭṭhāpetvā

original: dussimārakalāburājādīnaṃviya antarāva uparodhita khandhasantānassa sattassa maraṇaṃ
analyzed: antarāva khandha santānassa sattassa maraṇaṃ

original: upacchedaka maraṇaṃnāma. Nanu cettha marantānaṃ nāma sabbesaṃpi taṃtaṃbhavaṃ janentaṃ

original: kammaṃ khiyyatiyeva. Athakasmā itarepi vuttāti. Vuccate, sarasavaseneva hi kammasāmatthiyassa
analyzed: kammam itare pi vuttā ati vuccate sa rasa vasena iva hi kamma sāmatthiyassa

original: khayo idha kammakkhayoti adhippeto. Ye pana dasavassa vīsativassa yāva asaṅkhyeyya
analyzed: khayaḥ idha kamma kkhayaḥ ti adhippeto ye pana dasa vassa vīsati vassa yāva asaṅkhyeyya

original: ṭhitikarā vuddhikarā hānikarācāti tividhā honti. Tattha akusalamūlesu vaḍḍhamānesu
analyzed: ṭhiti karāḥ vuddhi karāḥ hāni karāḥ ca ati tividhāḥ honti tattha akusala mūlesu vaḍḍhamānesu

analyzed: hāni karāḥ vaḍḍhanti kusala mūlesu vaḍḍhamānesu buddhi karāḥ vaḍḍhanti ubhaya mūlesu

analyzed: samam ṭhitesu ṭhiti karā samam pavattanti tesam vasena sattānam āyu kappo katthaci

original: sadā ṭhitibhāgo hoti. Katthaci kadāci hānibhāgo kadāci vuddhibhāgo hoti. Tayopi cete
analyzed: sadā ṭhiti bhāgaḥ hoti katthaci kadāci hāni bhāgaḥ kadāci vuddhi bhāgaḥ hoti tayo pi ca ite

original: ṭhitikarādayo taṃtaṃsattanikāyaṃ ajjhottharamānā āyuṃ paricchindantā pavattantīti

original: asaṅkhyeyyāyuka saṃvattanikaṃ cakkavattisampatti saṃvattanikañca kammaṃ dasavassike
analyzed: asaṅkhyeyya āyuka saṃvattanikam cakkavatti sampatti saṃvattanikam ca kammam dasa vassike

original: kāle vipaccamānaṃ tadanurūpaṃeva bhogañca issariyañca datvā dasavasena khiyyati.
analyzed: kāle vipaccamānam tad anurūpam eva bhogam ca issariyam ca da tvā dasa vasena khiyyati

original: Taṃ taṃ sattanikāya pariyāpannā sattā santānabhūtā rūpadhammā sabbaññu buddhānaṃ
analyzed: tam tam satta nikāya pariyāpannā sattā santāna bhūtā rūpa dhammā sabbaññu buddhānam

original: khandhasantāna bhūtāpi taggatikā tadanūvattikā eva hutvā pariṇamanti aññatra iddhimaya

original: Sabbepi sabbaññubuddhā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā. Kasmā te asaṅkhyeyyaṃ na aṭṭhaṃsūti. Utubhojanavipattiyā. Utubhojanavasena hi āyu hāyatipi vaḍḍhatipīti.
analyzed: sabbe api sabbaññu buddhāḥ asaṅkhyeyya āyukā kasmā te asaṅkhyeyyam na uti utu bhojana vipattiyā utu bhojana vasena hi āyu hāyati pi vaḍḍhati pi iti

original: Tasmā padhānanissayabhūtesu dvisamuṭṭhānika rūpadhammesu taṃ taṃ āyukappavasena pariṇamantesu

original: jiyyamānesu yāvamahantaṃpi kammaṃ attano vipākādhiṭṭhānassa abhāvā khiyyatiyeva.
analyzed: jiyyamānesu yāvamahantam pi kammam attanaḥ vipāka adhiṭṭhānassa abhāvā

original: Socassa khayo na sarasena hoti. Athakho āyusaṅkhāravipattiyā eva hotīti idha āyukkhayo
analyzed: socassa khayaḥ na sa rasena hoti athakho āyu saṅkhāra vipattiyai eva hoti iti idha āyu khayaḥ

original: visuṃ gahitoti. Esanayo upacchedakamaraṇepi netabbo. Tattha upacchedakamaraṇanti

original: akālamaraṇaṃ vuccati. Tañhipavattamānaṃ upacchedakakammunāvā pavattati. Aññehivā
analyzed: akāla maraṇam vuccati tat hi pavattamānam upacchedaka kammunā vā pavattati aññehi vā

original: aneka sahassehi kāraṇehi. Tāni pana pāḷiyaṃ mūlabhedato saṃkhipitvā aṭṭhadhā vuttāni.
analyzed: aneka sahassehi kāraṇehi tāni pana pāḷiyam mūla bhedato saṃkhipitvā aṭṭhadhā vuttāni

original: Katamāni pana tānīti. Atthi vātasamuṭṭhānā ābādhā. Atthi vittasamuṭṭhānā. Atthi semha
analyzed: katamāni pana tāni iti atthi vāta samuṭṭhānā ābādhā atthi vitta samuṭṭhānā atthi semha

analyzed: samuṭṭhānā atthi sannipātikā atthi utu samuṭṭhānā atthi visama parihāra jā atthi

original: opakkamikā. Atthi kammavipākajā ābādhāti. Tattha kammavipākajā keci upapīḷakakammajākeci
analyzed: opakkamikā atthi kamma vipāka jā ābādhā ti tattha kamma vipāka jā keci upapīḍaka kamma jā keci

analyzed: upacchedaka kamma jā yasmā pana vātaḥ kuppamāno sītuṇha ādīhi dasahi kāraṇehi kuppati

original: Tesuca ekameva kamma vipākajaṃ hoti. Sesāni pana akammavipākajānīti milinda pañhe
analyzed: tesu ca ekam eva kamma vipāka jam hoti sesāni pana a kamma vipāka jāni iti milinda pañhe

original: Tasmā keci vātasamuṭṭhānādayopi kammavipākajā hontiyevāti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: tasmā keci vāta samuṭṭhāna ādayaḥ api kamma vipāka jāḥ daṭṭhabbā

original: Tattha sannipātikāti vātādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃvā sannipatitānaṃ vasena pavattā. Ye
analyzed: tattha sannipātikā ati vāta ādīnam dvinnam tiṇṇam vā sannipatitānam vasena pavattāḥ ye

original: pana loke sattānaṃ payogamuttā sayaṃ jātā nānābhayupaddavā. Te utusamuṭṭhānesu saṅgahitāti

analyzed: daṭṭhabbā visama parihāra jāti anekavidhe visame vipatti mukhe attānam

original: payojantānaṃ tato tatovā tattha tattha vā patana pakkhalanādivasena pavattā. Opakkamikāti
analyzed: tatas tatas vā tattha tattha vā patana pakkhalana ādi vasena pavattā opakkamikā ti

analyzed: viya aneka sahassa ivāḥ vāḷa yakkhe vissajjanti vesāliyam viya rakkhasevāḥ vissajjanti

analyzed: aṅguttare yakkhāḥ vāḷe amanusse ossajjanti tena

original: bahumanussā kālaṃ karontīti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi yakkhāti yakkhādhipatino. Vāḷe amanusse

original: ossajjantīti caṇḍe yakkhe manussapathe vissajjanti. Te laddhokāsā mahājanaṃ jīvitakkhayaṃ
analyzed: ossajjanti iti caṇḍe yakkhe manussa pathe vissajjanti te laddha okāsāḥ mahājanam jīvita kkhayam

original: pāpentīti vuttaṃ. Tattha vissajjantīti visamācāra bahule manusse disvā bhinnasaddhā
analyzed: pāpenti iti vuttam tattha vissajjanti iti bahule manusse disvā bhinna saddhā

analyzed: yakkha senāpatino manussānam atthāya pubbeviya ārakkhaṃ na gaṇhanti iti atthaḥ janapada nagara nigama gāmesu ca iva

original: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ puggaleca vattabbameva natthi. Aṅguttare vuttā satthadubbhikkharoga
analyzed: tasmin tasmin vattabbam eva natthi aṅguttare vuttā

original: kappāpi idha vattabbāti. Kammavipākajāti upapīḷakopaghātakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipaccanavasena

original: pavattā ābādhāti attho. Evaṃ akālamaraṇaṃ upacchedakammunāvā aññehivā anekasahassehi
analyzed: evam akāla maraṇam aññehi vā aneka sahassehi

original: kāraṇehi hotīti. Yehi keci loke dissanti. Pāṇaharā jīvitavināsakā nānārogāvā nānābādhāvā
analyzed: kāraṇehi hoti iti yehi keci loke dissanti pāṇa harāḥ jīvita vināsakāḥ nānā rogāvā nānā bādhāvā

original: nānābhayā nivā nānā daṇḍāvā nānā upaddavu pasaggāvā. Sabbe te sakakamma samuṭṭhitāeva
analyzed: nānā bhayā nīvā nānā daṇḍāvā nānā upaddavu pasaggāvā sabbe te saka kamma samuṭṭhitā eva

analyzed: attano sādhāraṇā ti natthi para kamma samuṭṭhitā api attano sādhāraṇā eva saka kamma samuṭṭhitā api

original: paresaṃ sādhāraṇāeva. Kammena vinā yato kutoci samuṭṭhitāpi attano vā paresaṃvā sādhāraṇāeva.
analyzed: paresam kammena vinā yatas kutoci samuṭṭhitā api attanaḥ vā paresam vā

original: Sabbasādhāraṇakammasamuṭṭhitesu vattabbameva natthi. Yathāha-visuddhimagge.
analyzed: sabba sādhāraṇa kamma samuṭṭhitesu vattabbam eva na atthi yathā ha visuddhi magge

original: Yathā catumahāpathe thapite lakkhamhi sabbadisāhi āgatā sarasattitomarapāsāṇādayo nipatanti. Evaṃ kāyepi sabbupaddavā nipatantīti.
analyzed: yathā catu mahāpathe thapite lakkhamhi sabba disāhi āgatā sara satti tomara pāsāṇa ādayaḥ nipatanti evam kāye pi sabba upaddavāḥ nipatanti iti

original: Yesuca rajjaraṭṭhādīsu te uppajjanti. Tattha yejanā upāya kusalāvā na honti. Naca
analyzed: yesu ca rajja raṭṭha ādīsu te uppajjanti tattha na honti na ca

original: paṭikārakusalā. Nāpi parihāra kusalā. Kammañca yesaṃ dubbalaṃ hoti. Uppanno anattho
analyzed: paṭikāra kusalāḥ na api parihāra kusalāḥ kamman ca yesam dubbalam hoti uppannaḥ anattho

original: bala vā. Tejanā vināpi upacchedakakammunā tato na muccanti. Maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃvā
analyzed: vā tejanā vinā api upacchedaka kammunā tatas na muccanti maraṇam vā maraṇa mattam vā

original: dukkhaṃ pāpuṇantiyeva. Kalyāṇabhūtaṃpi hi kammaṃ attano balavataraṃ yatokutoci samuṭṭhitaṃ
analyzed: dukkham pāpuṇantiyā iva kalyāṇa bhūtam pi hi kammaṃ attanaḥ balavataram yatas kutoci samuṭṭhitam

original: rogaṃvā ābādhaṃ vā bhayaṃvā daṇḍaṃvā upaddavupasaggaṃvā paṭibāhituṃ nasakkoti. Rogādayoeva
analyzed: rogam vā ābādham vā bhayam vā daṇḍam vā upaddava upasaggam vā paṭibāhitum na sakkoti roga ādayaḥ eva

original: taṃkhepentā pavattanti. Yathā hi udakaṃ attano balavataraṃ aggiṃ paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti.
analyzed: pavattanti yathā hi udakam attanaḥ balavataram aggim paṭibāhitum na sakkoti

original: Aggieva taṃ khepento pavattatīti evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imesañca sattānaṃ
analyzed: aggi eva tam khepentaḥ pavattati iti evam sampadam idam daṭṭhabbam imesam ca sattānam

original: pakatiyāpi kammassa dubbalabhāvo mahāniddese jarā suttaniddesena visuddhi maggeca
analyzed: pakatiyā api kammassa dubbala bhāvaḥ mahāniddese jarā sutta niddesena visuddhi magge ca

original: maraṇassati niddese āyu dubbalatoti padassa niddese na dīpetabbo. Yathāha –
analyzed: maraṇassa ati niddese āyu dubbala toti padassa niddese na dīpetabbaḥ yathā āha

original: Āyunāmetaṃ abalaṃ dubbalaṃ. Tathā hi sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ assāsapassāsupanibandhañceva iriyāpathupanibandhañca sītuṇhu panibandhañca mahābhūtupanibandhañca āhārupanibandhañcātiādi.
analyzed: āyu nāmetam abalam dubbalam tathā hi sattānam jīvitam assāsa passāsa upanibandhañca iva iriyāpatha upanibandhañca sītuṇhu panibandhañca mahābhūta upanibandhañca āhāra upanibandhañca ati ādi

original: Tathā kāyabahusādhāraṇato animittatoti imesaṃ padānaṃ niddesenapi pākaṭoyeva. Kammanibbattassa
analyzed: tathā kāya bahu sādhāraṇataḥ animittato ti imesam padānam niddesena api kamma nibbattassa

original: hi āyuno tiṇagge ussāvabindusseva paridubbalabhāve pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathā yañca vutte
analyzed: hi āyunaḥ tiṇagge paridubbala bhāve pāḷiyam aṭṭhakathā yat ca vutte

original: kammasāpi tatheva paridubbalatā siddhā hotīti. Evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ. Itarathā
analyzed: kammasā api tathā iva paridubbala tā siddhā hoti iti evañca itam sampaṭicchitabbam itarathā

original: sabbaṃ pubbekatahetudiṭṭhināma siyā. Yathāha –
analyzed: sabbam pubbekata hetu diṭṭhi nāma siyā yathā āha

original: Idhekacco samaṇovā brāhmaṇovā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃ diṭṭhī. Yaṃ kiñcāyaṃpurisapuggalo paṭisaṃvedeti sukhaṃvā dukkhaṃvā adukkhamasukhaṃvā. Sabbaṃ taṃ pubbekatahetūti.
analyzed: idha ekaccaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā evaṃvādī hoti evam diṭṭhī yam kiñca ayam purisa puggalaḥ paṭisaṃvedeti sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā sabbam tam pubbekata hetu ti

original: Ayañca attho milindapañhe tīsu ṭhānesu vitthārato āgato. Yathāvuttehi pana anekasahassehi
analyzed: ayam ca atthaḥ milinda pañhe tīsu ṭhānesu vitthārataḥ āgataḥ yathā vuttehi pana aneka sahassehi

original: kāraṇehi pavattamaraṇaṃpi akālamaraṇatāsāmaññena idha upacchedakamaraṇe saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: kāraṇehi pavatta maraṇam api akāla maraṇa tā sāmaññena idha upacchedaka maraṇe saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam

original: samaye kālaṅkareyya, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati. Yaṃ dvinnaṃgatīnaṃ aññataragatiṃ gaccheyya,
analyzed: samaye kālaṅkareyya ṭhānam etam vijjati yam dvinnaṃgatīnam aññatara gatim gaccheyya

original: samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambantīti vuttaṃ. Tattha tānissāti assa puggalassa
analyzed: samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhippalambanti iti vuttam tattha tānissa ati assa puggalassa

analyzed: tassa citta santānam oṇamantam ajjhoṇamantam abhimukhībhūtam katvā lambanti

analyzed: palambanti bandhitvā ākaḍḍhantāni viya upaṭṭhahanti iti atthaḥ evam pana tesu tathā

original: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kilesabalavināmitaṃ sutvā tadevaṃ pavattamānaṃ taṇhāavijjānaṃ

original: [165] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Tatthoṇataṃvāti tasmiṃ upapajjitabbabhave oṇataṃ viya oṇataṃeva vā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
analyzed: tattha uṇatam vā ti tasmin upapajjitabba bhave oṇatam viya oṇatam eva vā ti vuttam tat aṭṭhakathāya na sameti

original: Abhiṇhanti nirantaraṃ. Tathāpavatti pana saṇikaṃ marantānaṃ eva labbhati. Lahuka maraṇena marantānaṃ pana na labbhatīti vuttaṃ. Bāhullenāti
analyzed: abhiṇhanti nirantaram tathāpavatti pana saṇikam marantānam eva labbhati lahuka maraṇena marantānam pana na labbhati iti vuttam bāhullena ati

original: [166] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: Na hi tasmiṃ vuttānaṃ asaññisattānaṃ cittasantānassa abhiṇhappagattipasaṅgonāma atthi.
analyzed: na hi tasmin vuttānam asaññi sattānam citta santānassa abhiṇha pagatti pasaṅgaḥ nāma atthi

original: Cittasantānasseva tesaṃ abhāvatoti. Idāni aparena pakārena kammu paṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: citta santānassa iva tesam abhāvato ti idāni aparena pakārena kammu paṭṭhānam dassetuṃ

original: tamevavā pana.La. Dvārapattaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha abhinavakaraṇavasena dvārappattaṃ

original: hotīti pubbe katasaññaṃ ajanetvā taṅkhaṇe eva karaṇākāraṃ janetvā attānaṃ abhinavaṃ

original: viya katvā manodvāre taṃsadisajavanappavattivasena pattaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotīti attho.
analyzed: viya katvā manaḥ dvāre taṃsa disa javana pavatti vasena pattam pātubhūtam hoti iti attho

original: Yathā hi imasmiṃbhavepavattaṃ kiñci pākaṭaṃ kammaṃ asukasmiṃ kāle idaṃnāmamayākatanti

original: evaṃ pubbekatasaññaṃ janetvāpi upaṭṭhāti. Na tathā bhavantare pavattaṃ bhavapaṭicchannaṃñca

original: imasmiṃ bhave pavattaṃ apākaṭañcāti. Apica, idhekacce buddhādīsu tīsu vatthusu dānapūjādivasena

analyzed: āciṇṇa bahulāḥ honti te ka ābādha balena visīda pattā kiñci dukkhaṃ a jānitvā

original: visīdantare pubbe viya bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ dentācetiyaṃ vandantā pūjaṃ karontā
analyzed: visīdantare pubbe viya bhikkhu saṅghassa dānam dentā ācetiyam vandantā pūjam karontā

original: vippasannacittā pamodacittā eva honti. Tabbiparītena pāpakammabahulāpi vattabbāti.
analyzed: vippasanna cittāḥ pamoda cittāḥ eva honti tad biparītena pāpa kamma bahulā api vattabbā ati

original: Idaṃpi dvārapattamevāti. Sabbañcetaṃ lakkhaṇa saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāya dīpetabbaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: idam pi dvāra pattam evā ti sabbam ca etam lakkhaṇa saṃyutta ṭṭhakathāya dīpetabbam tattha

original: asilomapetādi patthūsu tassa ukkhittāsikabhāvova nimittaṃ ahosīti ca. Tassa sattiyā

original: vijjhanaka bhāvova nimittaṃ ahosītica. Tassa usunā vijjhanakabhāvova nimittaṃ ahosītica.
analyzed: vijjhanaka bhāvaḥ uva nimittam ahosi iti ca tassa usunā vijjhanaka bhāvaḥ uva nimittam ahosi iti ca

original: Tassa patodasūciyā vijjhanakabhāvova nimittaṃ ahosītica. Tassa sūcīhi patodanadukkhaṃ

original: kammupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttanti. Tattha hi tassa ukkhittāsika bhāvova nimittaṃ ahosīti tassa

analyzed: niraye pacitvā puna āsanna maraṇassa tat kammam tadā tassa ukkhitta asika saññam janetvā

original: Vīthicittā vasānevāti kāmabhavato cavitvā kāmabhaveyeva uppajjamānānaṃ javana pariyosānānaṃvā
analyzed: vīthi cittā vasānā iva ati kāma bhavataḥ cavitvā uppajjamānānam

original: tadārammaṇa pariyosānānaṃvā vīthicittānaṃ avasāne. Itaresaṃ pana javanapariyosānānaṃeva

original: [167] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Aṭṭhakathāyañhi paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vutte kiṃaparipuṇṇāya dhammā nusāraṇiyāti. Bhavaṅgakkhayevāti

original: Tasmiṃniruddhāvasāneti tasmiṃ niruddhe tassa niruddhassa avasāne. Ye pana loke cuti

original: kusalābyākatacittasantānenapi aviruddhabhāvena anurūpaṃ. Anubandhamānovā seti, anuanuvānirantaraṃ

original: setīti anusayo. Anusayabhūtāya avijjāya parikkhittoti avijjānusayaparikkhitto. Taṇhānusayo
analyzed: seti iti anusayaḥ anusaya bhūtāya avijjāya parikkhitto ti avijjā anusaya parikkhitto taṇhā anusayo

original: Etthaca akusalakamma sahajātānaṃvā kammanikanti nimittanikanti sahajātānaṃvā vippaṭisāra

original: Taṃ sahajātaphassādidhammasamūhenapivā. Sopi hi upanissayabhāve na paṭisandhiṃ janetiyevāti.

original: Athavā, saṅkhārenāti maraṇasanna javanaviññāṇa sahajātena cetanāsaṅkhārena. Taṃ sahajāta
analyzed: athavā saṅkhārena ati sahajātena cetanā saṅkhārena tam sahajāta

original: phassādidhammasamūhenapivā. Tadubhayaṃpi hi kammādivisaye khipanaka saṅkhārabhāvena

original: paṭisandhiṃ janetīti. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṇhā avijjānaṃ appahīnattā avijjāya
analyzed: paṭisandhim janeti iti tathā hi aṭṭhakathā ayam taṇhā avijjānam appahīna ttā avijjāya

original: paṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ visaye taṇhā nāmeti. Sahajātasaṅkhārā khipantīti vuttaṃ.

original: nāmeti. Yathāvuttasaṅkhārā taṃ tattha khipanti. Tasmiṃ abhinava viññāṇapātubhāvaṃ

original: sādhentīti dassetīti.
analyzed: sādhenti iti

original: Sampayuttehi pariggayhamānanti phassādīhi sampayuttadhammehi parivāretvā gayhamānaṃ.
