original: “Upādāya pavattaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpanti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha na yujjati.
analyzed: upādāya pavattam rūpam upādārūpanti vuttam tat idha na yujjati

original: Na hi imasmiṃ pāṭhe katthaci yakāraviraho diṭṭho. Tathā hi mūlaṭīkāyaṃ upādāyati
analyzed: na hi imasmin pāṭhe katthaci yakāra virahaḥ diṭṭhaḥ tathā hi mūlaṭīkā ayam upādāyati

original: nissayatīti upādāyaṃ. Tameva rūpantipi vuttaṃ. Pathayatīti pathavī. Sahajātarūpānaṃ
analyzed: nissayati iti upādāyam tam eva vuttam pathayati iti pathavī sahajāta rūpānam

original: patiṭṭhāna bhāvena pakkhāyati upaṭṭhātīti attho. Puthu mahantī hutvā jāyatītipi pathavī.
analyzed: patiṭṭhāna bhāvena pakkhāyati upaṭṭhāti iti attho puthu mahantī hutvā jāyati itipi pathavī

original: Pakārena thavīyati sabbesaṃ rūpasambhārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānattā. Ayaṃ tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānā
analyzed: pakārena thavīyati sabbesam rūpa sambhārānam adhiṭṭhāna ttā ayam tesam adhiṭṭhānā

original: patiṭṭhānā vatthubhūtā bhūmi bhūtātiādinā nānāppakārena guṇapadena abhitthavīyatīti
analyzed: patiṭṭhānā vatthu bhūtā bhūmi bhūta ati ādinā nānā appakārena guṇa padena abhitthavīyati iti

original: pathavī. Sāeva nisattanijīvaṭṭhena dhātūti pathavīdhātu. Āpeti sahajātarūpāni byāpetvā
analyzed: pathavī sā eva nisatta nijīva ṭṭhena pathavī dhātu āpeti sahajāta rūpāni

original: tiṭṭhati, appāyati vā tāni suṭṭhu brūheti vaḍḍhetīti āpo. Tānivā avippakiṇṇāni katvā
analyzed: tiṭṭhati appāyati vā tāni suṭṭhu brūha iti vaḍḍheti iti āpaḥ a vippakiṇṇāni katvā

original: bhuso pāti rakkhati, pivativā vivanto viya tāni saṅgaṇhati sampiṇḍetīti āpo. Soyeva
analyzed: bhuso pāti rakkhati vivantaḥ viya tāni saṅgaṇhati sampiṇḍeti iti āpaḥ soyā iva

original: dhātūti āpodhātu. Te jati tikkhabhāvena samujjalanto viya sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhe
analyzed: dhātu uti āpodhātu te tikkha bhāvena samujjalantaḥ viya sahajāta dhammānam majjhe

original: pakāsati, tejetivā niseti sahajātadhamme tikkhathāma bale karoti, paripācetivā usmāpetīti
analyzed: pakāsati tejeti vā niseti sahajāta dhamme bale karoti paripāceti vā usmāpeti iti

original: tejo, so eva dhātūti tejodhātu. Vāyati samīreti desantaruppatti hetubhāvena bhūtasaṅghāṭaṃ
analyzed: tejaḥ saḥ eva tejaḥ dhātu vāyati samīreti hetu bhāvena bhūta saṅghāṭam

original: desantaraṃ gametīti vāyo. Vāyati vā sahajātadhamme apatamāne katvā vahatīti vāyo.
analyzed: desantaram gameti iti vāyo vāyati vā sahajāta dhamme a patamāne katvā vahati iti vāyo

original: Soeva dhātūti vāyodhātu. Tattha kakkhaḷalakkhaṇā pathavī. Ābandhanalakkhaṇo āpo.
analyzed: dhātu uti vāyu dhātu tattha kakkhaḷa lakkhaṇā pathavī ābandhana lakkhaṇaḥ āpo

original: Uṇhattalakkhaṇo tejo. Vitthambhanalakkhaṇo vāyo. Ettha siyā, kasmā pathavī kakkhaḷalakkhaṇāti
analyzed: uṇhatta lakkhaṇo tejaḥ vitthambhana lakkhaṇo vāyo ettha siyā kasmā pathavī kakkhaḷa lakkhaṇā ati

original: vuttā. Nanu sā mudubhūtāpi hotīti. Saccaṃ, mudubhūtāpi pana sā sesabhūtattayaṃ upādāya
analyzed: vuttā nanu sā mudu bhūtā api hoti iti saccam mudu bhūtā api pana sā sesa bhūtattayam upādāya

original: kakkhaḷā tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Aññamaññaṃ upādāyeva pana ayaṃmudu ayaṃ kakkhaḷāti
analyzed: kakkhaḷā tu eva saṅkhyam gacchati aññam aññam upādāya iva pana ayam mudu ayam kakkhaḷā ati

original: bhavati. Teneva mudukakkhaḷānaṃ dīgharassānaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānatā hoti. Mudubhūtāpi
analyzed: bhavati tena iva mudu kakkhaḷānam dīgha rassānam viya anavaṭṭhāna tā hoti mudu bhūtā api

original: hi tato mudutaraṃ patvā kakkhaḷānāma jātā. Kakkhaḷāpi kakkhaḷataraṃ patvā mudubhūtānāma
analyzed: hi tatas mudutaram patvā kakkhaḷā nāma jātā kakkhaḷā api kakkhaḷataram patvā mudubhūtā nāma

original: jātāti. Ābandhanalakkhaṇo āpoti vutto. Soca pakatiudake adhimattoti pakatiudakaṃ
analyzed: jātā ati ābandhana lakkhaṇo āpo ti vutto so ca pakati udake adhimatto ti pakati udakam

original: baddhaṃ ghanībhūtameva siyāti ce. Na. Ābandhitabbāya pathaviyā tattha paridubbalattāti,
analyzed: baddham ghanībhūtam eva siyā ati ce na ābandhitabbāya pathaviyā tattha paridubbala ttā ati

original: yattha pana pathavī balavatī hoti tattheva so baddhataraṃ ābandhatīti. Uṇhatta lakkhaṇo
analyzed: yattha pana pathavī balavatī hoti tattha iva so baddhataram ābandhati iti uṇhatta lakkhaṇo

original: tejoti vutto. Evañcasati sītabhāvo tejoyeva na siyāti ce. Na. Usati dahati paripāceti
analyzed: tejaḥ ti vuttaḥ na siyāti ce na usati dahati paripāca iti

original: pariṇa tabhāvaṃ gametīti uṇhonāma. Sītabhāvoca dahati paripāceti tabbhāvaṃ gametiyevāti.
analyzed: pariṇa ta bhāvam gama iti iti dahati paripāca iti tad bhāvam

original: Vuttañca mūlaṭīkāyaṃ tejoeva hi sītaṃ. Himapātasamayādīsu sītassa paripācakatādassana
analyzed: vuttam ca mūla ṭīkāyam hi sītam hima pāta samaya ādīsu sītassa

original: toti. Vitthambhana lakkhaṇo vāyoti vutto. So pana ghana thaddhesu silāthambhādīsu
analyzed: toti vitthambhana lakkhaṇo vāyo ti vutto so pana ghana thaddhesu silā thambha ādīsu

original: nalabbhatīti ce. Na. Tattha hi pathavī attanā sahajātavāyuvitthambhanaṃ labhitvā
analyzed: na labbhati iti ce na tattha hi pathavī sahajāta vāyu vitthambhanam labhitvā

original: thāmappattā thiratarappattāca hutvā vahatīti. Cakkhatīti cakkhu. Samavisamaṃ ācikkhati
analyzed: thāma ppattā thiratara ppattā ca hutvā vahati iti cakkhati iti cakkhu sama visamam ācikkhati

original: samavisamajānanassa tammūlakattā. Rūpaṃvā assādeti āpātaṃ āgatāgatassa rūpassa anirākaraṇato.
analyzed: sama visama jānanassa tad mūlakattā rūpam vā assādeti āpātam āgata āgatassa rūpassa a nirākaraṇato

original: Taṃvā vibhāvetīti attho. Suṇātīti sotaṃ. Suṇanti suyyantivā ete nāti sotaṃ. Ghāyatīti
analyzed: tam vā vibhāveti iti attho suṇāti iti sotam suṇanti ete na ati sotam ghāyati iti

original: ghānaṃ. Ghāyanti ghāyiyantivā etenāti ghānaṃ. Jīvitanimittaṃ raso jīvitanti vuccati.
analyzed: ghānam ghāyanti etena ati ghānam jīvita nimittam rasaḥ jīvitanti vuccati

original: Tasmiṃ ninnatāya taṃ avhāyatīti jivhā. Athavā. Jīvitaṃ vahati etāyavā taṃ vahanti
analyzed: tasmin ninna tāya tam avhāyati iti jivhā athavā jīvitam vahati tam vahanti

original: pavattenti jīvitavuttisampādanattāti jivhā. Jītivā jayo parājayovā vuccati. Tadubhayaṃ
analyzed: pavattenti jīvita vutti sampādana ttā ati jivhā jītivā vuccati tat ubhayam

original: vahati vahantivā etāyāti jivhā. Sasambhārajivhā. Yathāha –
analyzed: vahati vahantivā etā āyāti jivhā sa sambhāra jivhā yathā āha

original: Purisassa hi jātassa, kudārī jāyate mukhe;
analyzed: purisassa hi jātassa kudārī jāyate mukhe

original: Yāya chindati attānaṃ, naro dubbhāsitaṃ bhaṇanti.
analyzed: yāya chindati attānam naraḥ dubbhāsitam bhaṇanti

original: Idha pana taṃ sahacaritattā jivhāti pasādarūpamo vuccati. Kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ pāpadhammānañca
analyzed: idha pana tam sahacarita ttā jivhāti pasāda rūpamaḥ vuccati kucchitānam kesa ādīnam pāpa dhammānam ca

original: āyo uppattiṭṭhānanti kāyo. Sasambhārakāyo. Idha pana taṃ sahacarito pasāda kāyoeva
analyzed: āyo uppatti ṭṭhāna nti kāyo sa sambhāra kāyo idha pana tam sahacaritaḥ pasāda kāyo eva

original: adhippeto. Pasīdantīti pasādā. Pasīdanti vā ettha candamaṇḍalādīni ārammaṇanimittāni
analyzed: pasīdanti iti pasādā pasīdanti vā ettha canda maṇḍala ādīni ārammaṇa nimittāni

original: tattha saṃsīdamānāni viya sarūpato sandissantīti pasādā, suparisuddhaādāsamaṇḍasadisā
analyzed: tattha saṃsīdamānāni viya sarūpataḥ sandissanti iti pasādā su parisuddha ādāsa maṇḍa sadisā

original: kammajamaṇḍā. Ime pana pañca daṭṭhukāmatādi nidāna kammasamuṭṭhāna bhūtapasāda lakkhaṇā
analyzed: kamma ja maṇḍāḥ ime pana pañca daṭṭhu kāma tā ādi nidāna kamma samuṭṭhāna bhūta pasāda lakkhaṇā

original: rūpādi abhighātāraha bhūtapasādalakkhaṇā vā cakkhupasādādayo daṭṭhabbā. Tattha cakkhu
analyzed: rūpa ādi bhūta pasāda lakkhaṇā vā cakkhu pasāda ādayaḥ daṭṭhabbā tattha cakkhu

original: tāva setamaṇḍala parikkhittassa kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe ūkāsirapamāṇe atimukhe ṭhitānaṃ
analyzed: tāva seta maṇḍala parikkhittassa kaṇha maṇḍalassa majjhe atimukhe ṭhitānam

original: sarīrasaṇṭhānuppatti padesabhūte diṭṭhamaṇḍale telamiva sattapicupaṭalāni sattaakkhipaṭalāni
analyzed: sarīra saṇṭhāna uppatti padesa bhūte diṭṭha maṇḍale telam iva satta picu paṭalāni satta akkhi paṭalāni

original: byāpetvā tiṭṭhati. Sotaṃ sotabilabbhantare aṅguliveṭhanākāraṃ upacitatanutambalomaṃ
analyzed: byāpetvā tiṭṭhati sotam sota bila bbhantare aṅguliveṭhana ākāram upacita tanu tamba lomam

original: padesaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhati. Ghānaṃ nāsikabbhantare ajapadasaṇṭhānaṃ padesaṃ byāpetvā
analyzed: padesam byāpetvā tiṭṭhati ghānam nāsikā abbhantare aja pada saṇṭhānam padesam byāpetvā

original: tiṭṭhati. Jivhā sasambhāra jivhāmajjhe uppala dalagga saṇṭhānaṃ padesaṃ byāpetvā
analyzed: tiṭṭhati jivhā sa sambhāra jivhā majjhe uppala dalagga saṇṭhānam padesam byāpetvā

original: tiṭṭhati. Kāyo pana mahanti yā kappāsa paṭalavaṭṭiyaṃ āsittatelaṃviya thapetvā pācaka
analyzed: tiṭṭhati kāyo pana mahanti yā thapetvā

original: tejassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ kesagga lomagga nakhagga sukkhacammānica avasesaṃ sakalasarīraṃ
analyzed: tejassa patiṭṭhāna ṭhānam avasesam sakala sarīram

original: byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti. Te pana pañca yathārahaṃ pañcadvārikacittānaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ
analyzed: byāpetvā tiṭṭhati iti te pana pañca yathāraham pañcadvārika cittānam vatthu dvāra bhāvam

original: sādhenti. Tesuca ekekassa catasso catasso dhātuyo sandhāraṇaābandhana paripācana
analyzed: sādhenti tesu ca ekekassa catassaḥ catassaḥ dhātuyaḥ sandhāraṇa ābandhana paripācana

original: samudīraṇa kiccehi upakāraṃ karonti. Yathākhatti yakumārassa catasso dhātiyo dhāraṇa
analyzed: samudīraṇa kiccehi upakāram karonti yathākhatti ya kumārassa catassaḥ dhātiyaḥ dhāraṇa

original: nahāpana maṇḍana bījana kiccehīti. Utucittāhārāca naṃ upatthambhenti. Yathā taṃ khattiyakumāraṃ
analyzed: nahāpana maṇḍana bījana kiccehi iti utu citta āhārāḥ ca naṃ upatthambhenti yathā tam khattiya kumāram

original: pitu jeṭṭhabhātu jeṭṭhabhaginiyoviya. Āyuca naṃ suṭṭhu anupāleti. Yathā taṃ khattiyakumāraṃ
analyzed: jeṭṭha bhātu jeṭṭha bhaginiyo viyaḥ nam suṭṭhu anupāleti yathā tam khattiya kumāram

original: disāpāmokkho rājasammato mahābhisakkoviya. Vaṇṇādayoca naṃ parivārenti. Yathā taṃ
analyzed: disāpāmokkhaḥ rāja sammataḥ vaṇṇa ādayaḥ ca nam parivārenti yathā tam

original: khattiyakumāraṃ sahajātā amaccaputtā viyāti. Yasmā pana sattānaṃ cittaṃ nāma vicittaṃ
analyzed: khattiya kumāram sahajātāḥ amacca puttāḥ viyāti yasmā pana sattānam cittam nāma vicittam

original: hoti. Cittavicittatāya saññāvicittā. Saññāvicittatāya taṇhāvicittā. Taṇhāvicitta
analyzed: hoti citta vicitta tāya saññā vicittā saññā vicitta tāya taṇhā vicittā taṇhā vicitta

original: tāya kammāni vicittāni. Kammavicittatāya kammasamuṭṭhānāni bhūtāni vicittāni. Bhūtavicittatāya
analyzed: tāya kammāni vicittāni kamma vicitta tāya kamma samuṭṭhānāni bhūtāni vicittāni bhūta vicitta tāya

original: ime pasādā vicittā. Aññamaññaṃ asadisā honti. Tehi pasādamaṇḍabhūtāpi samānā keci
analyzed: ime pasādāḥ vicittāḥ aññam aññam asadisāḥ honti tehi pasāda maṇḍa bhūtā api samānā keci

original: rūpasseva abhighātārahā honti, na saddādīnaṃ. Keci saddādīnaṃ eva, na rūpassāti.
analyzed: rūpassa iva abhighāta arahāḥ honti na sadda ādīnam keci sadda ādīnam eva na rūpassa ati

original: Tasmā tesaṃ aññamaññañca aññarūpehica lakkhaṇato asaṃmissatā veditabbāti.
analyzed: tasmā tesam aññam aññam ca añña rūpehi ca lakkhaṇato a saṃmissa tā veditabbā ati

original: Rūpayatīti rūpaṃ. Vaṇṇavisesaṃ āpajjitvā hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāseti. Pakatiyāpi vā
analyzed: rūpayati iti rūpam vaṇṇa visesam āpajjitvā hadayaṅgata bhāvam pakāseti vā

original: yaṃkiñcidabbaṃ samavisamaṃvā pakāse tīti attho. Sappati sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gacchatīti
analyzed: yat kiñcid abbam sama visamam vā pakāse ti iti attho sappati sota viññeyya bhāvam gacchati iti

original: saddo. Saddayatīti saddo. Taṃ taṃ atthaṃvā attano vatthuṃvā ācikkhatīti attho. Sadativā
analyzed: saddo saddayati iti saddo tam tam attham vā attanaḥ vatthum vā ācikkhati iti attho sadati vā

original: taṃ taṃ disaṃvā desaṃvā khaṇena vissarati vippharatīti saddo. Gandhayatīti gandho.
analyzed: tam tam disam vā desam vā khaṇena vissarati vippharati iti saddaḥ gandhayati iti gandhaḥ

original: Attano vatthuṃsūcetīti attho. Gacchatīti go. Vāto. Tena dhārīyatīti gandho. Rasīyati
analyzed: attanaḥ vatthuṃsūceti iti atthaḥ gacchati iti goḥ vāto tena dhārīyati iti gandhaḥ rasīyati

original: assādīyatīti raso. Rasantivā taṃ assādentīti raso. Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ. Phusanañcettha
analyzed: assādīyati iti rasaḥ tam assādenti iti rasaḥ phusīyati iti phoṭṭhabbam phusanam ca ittha

original: pasādena saha ghaṭṭanaṃ kalāpantarabhūtehi saddhiṃ paṭihananañca veditabbaṃ. Tadubhayaṃpi
analyzed: pasādena saha ghaṭṭanam kalāpa antara bhūtehi saddhim paṭihananañca veditabbam tat ubhayam pi

original: āpo dhātuyā natthīti vuttaṃ āpodhātuvivajjitanti. Kasmā pana taṃ tassā natthi. Nanu
analyzed: āpaḥ dhātuyā natthi iti vuttam āpaḥ dhātu vivajjitan ti kasmā pana tam tassā natthi nanu

original: sītatāvā dravatāvā phusitvā gayhatīti. Vuccate, sītatā hi tejoyeva, na āpo. Yadi
analyzed: sīta tāvā drava tāvā phusitvā gayhati iti vuccate sīta tā hi na āpaḥ yadi

original: hi sā āpoyeva siyā. Pakkumite santatte loharasepissa sītatā labbhamānā siyā. So hi
analyzed: hi sā siyā pakku mite santatte loha rase pi sīta tā labbhamānā siyā saḥ hi

original: raso āpādhiko hotīti. Evaṃ pana nalabbhati. Tasmā sā tejoyeva, na āpoti. Apica, sītuṇhānaṃ
analyzed: rasaḥ hoti iti evam pana na labbhati tasmā sā tejoyā iva na āpo ti apica

original: ekasmiṃ kalāpe saha appavattanato orapārānaṃ viya tesaṃ anavaṭṭhānatoca viññāyati.
analyzed: ekasmin kalāpe saha appavattanato viya tesam anavaṭṭhānato ca viññāyati

original: Na hi sītakalāpe uṇhaṃ, uṇhakalāpevā sītaṃ saha pavattati. Yasmiṃca vatthumhi pubbe
analyzed: na hi sīta kalāpe uṇham uṇha kalāpe vā sītam saha pavattati yasmin ca vatthumhi pubbe

original: sītasaññā saṇṭhāti. Pacchā tato sītatare āgate tasmiṃyeva puna uṇhasaññā saṇṭhāti.
analyzed: sīta saññā saṇṭhāti pacchā tatas sītatare āgate tasmin yeva puna uṇha saññā saṇṭhāti

original: Pubbe uṇhasaññāyaṃpi eseva nayo. Tathā uṇhe mande sītasaññā saṇṭhāti. Sīte mande uṇhasaññāti.
analyzed: pubbe uṇha saññāyam pi esa iva nayo tathā uṇhe mande sīta saññā saṇṭhāti sīte mande uṇha saññā ati

original: Atha pana dravabhāvabhūto āpo phusitvā gayhati. Ayo piṇḍādīsu ābandhanabhūtopi phusitvāva
analyzed: atha pana drava bhāva bhūtaḥ āpaḥ phusitvā gayhati piṇḍa ādīsu ābandhana bhūtaḥ api

original: gayheyya. Evañca sati yathā tesu itarāni tīṇi bhūtāni vinā itarītarena visuṃ visuṃ
analyzed: evam ca sati yathā tesu itarāni tīṇi bhūtāni vinā itarītarena visum visum

original: kāyika sukhadukkhānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtāni honti. Tathā sopi vinā itarehi visuṃ kāyikasukhadukkhānaṃ
analyzed: kāyika sukha dukkhānaṃ ārammaṇa bhūtāni honti tathā saḥ api vinā itarehi visum kāyika sukha dukkhānaṃ

original: ārammaṇabhūtoeva siyā. Na pana hoti. Yañhi tāni ayopiṇḍādīni phusantānaṃ kāyikaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇa bhūtaḥ eva siyā na pana hoti yat hi tāni ayaḥ piṇḍa ādīni phusantānam kāyikam

original: sukhaṃvā dukkhaṃvā uppajjati, taṃ saṇhathaddhatā vasenavā uppajjati. Sītuṇhatāvasenavā
analyzed: sukham vā dukkham vā uppajjati tam saṇhathaddha tā vasena vā uppajjati sītuṇha tā vasena vā

original: abbhantarathambhanassa mandagāḷhatāvasenavā. No aññathāti. Tasmā purimabhāge tīṇi
analyzed: abbhantara thambhanassa no aññathā ati tasmā purima bhāge tīṇi

original: bhūtāni phusitvāvā vaṇṇaṃ disvāvā pacchā bhāge suddhena mano viññāṇasantānena dīgharassādisaṇṭhānaṃvā
analyzed: bhūtāni phusitvā vā vaṇṇam disvā vā pacchā bhāge suddhena manaḥ viññāṇa santānena dīgha rassa ādi saṇṭhānam vā

original: rattiyaṃ alātacakkaṃ vā taṃtaṃchiddavivaraṃvā jānantā viya pathamaṃ dravatāsahitāni
analyzed: rattiyam alāta cakkam vā pathamam drava tā sahitāni

original: vilīnāni mudūni tīṇi bhūtāni pathaviṃ eva vā phusitvā pacchā suddhena mano viññāṇasantānena
analyzed: vilīnāni mudūni tīṇi bhūtāni pathavim eva vā phusitvā pacchā suddhena manaḥ viññāṇa santānena

original: visuṃ dravabhāvaṃ addatintabhāvaṃ jānanti. Evaṃ santepi taṃ phusitvā jānantā icceva
analyzed: visum drava bhāvam jānanti evam sante api tam phusitvā jānantāḥ iccā iva

original: maññanti avisesavidunoti. Gunnaṃ abhiṇhaṃ caraṇaṭṭhānaṃ gocaro. Gocarasadisattā idha
analyzed: maññanti gunnam abhiṇham caraṇa ṭhānam gocaraḥ gocara sadisa ttā idha

original: gocaro. Gotivā idha cakkhādīni indriyāni vuccanti. Tāni viññāṇādhiṭṭhitāni hutvā
analyzed: gocaraḥ gotivā idha cakkha ādīni indriyāni vuccanti tāni viññāṇa dhiṭṭhitāni hutvā

original: etesu caranti. Etānivātesu caranti pavattanti ghaṭṭentīti gocarā. Teyeva idha ekattaṃ
analyzed: etesu caranti caranti pavattanti ghaṭṭenti iti gocarā teyā iva idha ekattam

original: upanetvā gocararūpanti vuttaṃ. Imānipana pañca yathākkamaṃ cakkhādīsu paṭihanana
analyzed: upanetvā gocara rūpan ti vuttam imāni pana pañca yathākkamam cakkha ādīsu

original: lakkhaṇāni rūpādīnīti veditabbāni.
analyzed: lakkhaṇāni rūpa ādīni iti veditabbāni

original: Itthī vuccati avisadākārasaṇṭhitaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ. Yassa pana dhammassa ānubhāvena
analyzed: itthī vuccati a visada ākāra saṇṭhitam khandha pañcakam yassa pana dhammassa ānubhāvena

original: taṃ tathā saṇṭhāti pavattati. So itthi yā bhāvoti itthattaṃ. Puriso vuccati visadākārasaṇṭhitaṃ
analyzed: tam tathā pavattati saḥ bhāvo ti itthattam puriso vuccati visada ākāra saṇṭhitam

original: khandhapañcakaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Tattha itthiliṅga itthinimitta itthi kutta
analyzed: khandha pañcakam sesam vutta nayam eva tattha itthi liṅgaḥ itthi nimittaḥ itthi kutta

original: itthākappānaṃ hetubhāva lakkhaṇaṃ itthattaṃ. Purisaliṅga purisanimitta purisakutta
analyzed: itthā kappānam hetu bhāva lakkhaṇam itthattam purisa liṅga purisa nimitta purisa kutta

original: purisākappānaṃ hetubhāva lakkhaṇaṃ purisattaṃ. Tattha liṅganti padhānaṅgabhūtaṃ mahāsaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: hetu bhāva lakkhaṇam purisattam tattha liṅganti mahā saṇṭhānam

original: Nimittanti paccaṅgabhūtaṃ khuddakasaṇṭhānaṃ. Kuttanti kīḷālilādi kriyāviseso. Ākappoti
analyzed: nimittam ti paccaṅga bhūtam khuddaka saṇṭhānam kuttam ti kīḷālila ādi kriyā visesaḥ ākappo ti

original: gamanādiko ākāravikāro. Sabbepete khandhapañcakassa pavattivisesāeva. Ye saddasatthesu
analyzed: gamana ādikaḥ ākāra vikāraḥ ye sadda satthesu

original: liṅganti vuccanti. Yesañca vasena ayaṃ itthīeva, na puriso. Ayaṃ purisoeva, na itthīti
analyzed: liṅganti vuccanti vasena ayam itthī eva na purisaḥ ayam purisaḥ eva na itthī iti

original: sañjānanti. Yasmā panettha saṇṭhānādīnaṃ avisadādibhāvoeva atthato itthipurisatā
analyzed: sañjānanti yasmā pana ittha saṇṭhāna ādīnam atthataḥ itthi purisa tā

original: hoti. Tadubhayamuttabhāvoca napuṃsakatā. Soca akkharapada saṅkhātesu vacanesu ca
analyzed: napuṃsaka tā akkhara pada saṅkhātesu vacanesu ca

original: vacanatthesuca yathārahaṃ sandissatiyeva. Tasmā indriyarahitesupi padesuca rukkhādīsu
analyzed: vacana atthesu ca yathāraham tasmai indriya rahitesu pi padesu ca rukkha ādīsu

original: padatthesuca pariyāyena itthipumanapuṃsakatāsiddhi veditabbāti.
analyzed: pada atthesu ca pariyāyena itthi puma napuṃsaka tā siddhi veditabbā ati

original: [178] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Itthīnaṃ aṅgajātaṃ itthiliṅga”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
analyzed: itthīnam aṅga jātam vuttam tam na sundaram

original: Na hi katthaci pāḷiyaṃ aṭṭhakathāsuca nimittasaddoviya liṅgasaddo aṅgajāte pākaṭo diṭṭhoti.
analyzed: na hi katthaci pāḷiyam aṭṭhakathāsu ca liṅga saddo aṅga jāte pākaṭaḥ diṭṭho ti

original: [179] Yañca tattha
analyzed: yañca tattha

original: “Itthisaṇṭhānaṃ itthākappo”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
analyzed: itthi saṇṭhānam itthākappo ti vuttam tat pi na sundaram

original: Na hi liṅgasaddo viya ākappasaddo saṇṭhāne pākaṭo diṭṭhoti. Sesaṃpana tattha vuttaṃ
analyzed: na hi liṅga saddaḥ viya ākappa saddaḥ saṇṭhāne pākaṭaḥ diṭṭhaḥ ti sesam pana tattha vuttam

original: yaṃkiñci aṭṭhakathāya asamentaṃpi tena pariyāyena yujjatiyeva. Bhavanti pavattanti
analyzed: yaṃ kiñci aṭṭhakathāya tena pariyāyena bhavanti pavattanti

original: taṃsahite khandhasantāne esā itthī, eso purisoti evaṃ pavattā sadda buddhiyo etenāti
analyzed: tad sahite khandha santāne esā itthī esaḥ puriso ti evam pavattā etena ati

original: bhāvo bhavantivā pātubhavanti taṃsahite khandhasantāne liṅgādīni etasmiṃ satīti bhāvo.
analyzed: bhāvaḥ bhavanti vā pātubhavanti tad sahite khandha santāne liṅga ādīni etasmin sati iti

original: So eva rūpanti bhāvarūpaṃ. Hadanti sattā taṃtaṃatthaṃvā anatthaṃvā pūrenti etenāti
analyzed: bhāva rūpam sattā taṃ taṃ attham vā anattham vā pūrenti etena ati

original: hadayaṃ. Hadantivā sattā ito nānāvikakke osajanti muñcantīti hadayaṃ. Harantivā pariharanti
analyzed: hadayam hadantivā sattāḥ itas nānā vikakke osajanti muñcanti iti hadayam harantivā pariharanti

original: taṃ sattā jīvitaṃviya dayanti rakkhanticāti hadayaṃ. Vasanti nivasanti cittaceta
analyzed: tam sattāḥ jīvitaṃviya dayanti rakkhanti ca ati hadayam vasanti nivasanti

original: sikādhammā etthāti vatthu. Hadayañca taṃ vatthucāti hadayavatthu. Dhātudvayanissayalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: sikā dhammāḥ ettha ati vatthu hadayam ca tam vatthu ca ati hadaya vatthu dhātu dvaya nissaya lakkhaṇam

original: vatthurūpaṃ. Taṃ pana hadayakosabbhantare aḍḍhapasatamattaṃ lohitaṃ byāpetvā tiṭṭhatīti
analyzed: vatthu rūpam tam pana hadaya kosabbhantare aḍḍha pasata mattam lohitam byāpetvā tiṭṭhati iti

original: veditabbaṃ. Dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ pana desanābhedarakkhanatthaṃ avatvā paṭṭhāneeva taṃ
analyzed: veditabbam dhammasaṅgaṇiyam pana desanā bheda rakkhana attham avatvā paṭṭhāne eva tam

original: vuttaṃ. Yathāha-vatthu kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo. Vatthu akusalānaṃ
analyzed: vuttam yathā āha vatthu kusalānam khandhānam nissaya paccayena paccayaḥ vatthu akusalānam

original: khandhānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayotiādi. Etthaca chahi vatthūhi aññaṃ vatthunāma
analyzed: khandhānam nissaya paccayena paccayaḥ ti ādi ettha ca chahi vatthūhi aññam vatthu nāma

original: natthi. Tesuca purimāni pañca kusalādīnaṃ nissayāeva na honti. Tasmā tesaṃ nissayabhāvena
analyzed: natthi tesu ca purimāni pañca kusala ādīnam nissayāḥ eva na honti tasmā tesam nissaya bhāvena

original: tattha vuttaṃ vatthunāma visuṃ ekaṃ vatthurūpamevāti siddhanti.
analyzed: tattha vuttam vatthu nāma visum ekam vatthu rūpam eva ati siddham ti

original: [180] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāyāti pāṭhassa uddhaṭattā rūpasāmaññapasaṅgo hotīti taṃ visodhetuṃ
analyzed: yam rūpam nissāya ati pāṭhassa uddhaṭa ttā rūpa sāmañña pasaṅgaḥ hoti iti tam visodhetum

original: yuttināma vuttā. Paṭṭhāne pana bahūsu anaññasādhāraṇesu ṭhānesu vatthunāmena visesetvā
analyzed: yutti nāma vuttā paṭṭhāne pana bahūsu anañña sādhāraṇesu ṭhānesu vatthu nāmena visesetvā

original: vuttattā sopasaṅgo natthiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: vutta ttā sa upasaṅgaḥ na atthiya iva āti daṭṭhabbam

original: Jīvanti sahajātadhammā yenāti jīvitaṃ. Tesaṃ jīvane ādhipaccayogena tesu indaṃ issaraṃ

original: attānaṃ karotīti indriyaṃ. Jīvitañca taṃ indriyañcāti jīvitindriyaṃ. Sahajātā nupālana
analyzed: attānam karoti iti indriyam jīvitam ca tam indriyam ca ati jīvitindriyam

original: lakkhaṇaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ. Yathā hi bījanibbattāni uppalādīni bījevinaṭṭhepi udakānupālitāni
analyzed: lakkhaṇam jīvitindriyam yathā hi bīja nibbattāni uppala ādīni udaka anupālitāni

original: ciraṃpi kālaṃ jīvanti. Evamevaṃ niruddha kammanibbattāni kammajarūpāni kamme asantepi
analyzed: ciram pi kālam jīvanti evam evam niruddha kamma nibbattāni kamma ja rūpāni kamme asante pi

original: jīvitānupālitāni santativasena vassasataṃpi vassasahassaṃpi kappaṃpi soḷasakappasahassānipi
analyzed: jīvita anupālitāni santati vasena vassa satam pi vassa sahassam kappam soḷasa kappa sahassāni pi

original: jīvantiyeva, tathā hi jīvitarahitāni itararūpāni jīvantānināma nahonti. Tāni hi yena
analyzed: tathā hi jīvita rahitāni itara rūpāni tāni hi yena

original: ekena cittenavā utunāvā āhārenavā jāyanti. Tasmiṃ niruddhe nirujjhanti, paraṃ muhuttamattaṃpi
analyzed: ekena cittenavā utunā vā āhārenavā jāyanti tasmin niruddhe nirujjhanti param

original: santānaṃ ghaṭetuṃ nasakkonti. Tesu hi cittajarūpānaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ ekavīthi
analyzed: santānam ghaṭetum na sakkonti tesu hi citta ja rūpānam santati paccuppannam eka vīthi

original: ekajavanavāra ekasamāpattivārena paricchinnaṃ hoti. Utujāhārajānañca sabhāgeka utuāhāra
analyzed: eka javana vāre eka samāpatti vārena paricchinnam sa bhāga ekaḥ utuāhāra

original: vasena paricchinnaṃ hoti. Kammajarūpānaṃ pana visuṃ santatipaccuppannaṃnāma natthi.
analyzed: vasena paricchinnam hoti kamma ja rūpānam pana visum santati paccuppannam nāma natthi

original: Tesaṃ ekabhavaparicchinnaṃ addhāpaccuppannameva hotīti. Yadi evaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ
analyzed: tesam eka bhava paricchinnam addhā paccuppannam eva hoti iti yadi evam arūpa dhammānam

original: kathanti. Tehi jīvitayogena jīvantāeva honti. Evaṃsantepi tesaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ
analyzed: kathanti tehi jīvita yogena jīvantā eva honti evaṃsante pi tesam santati paccuppannam

original: dissatīti. Vuccate, arūpadhammesu vipākāni tāva kammajarūpasadisāni. Tānipi hi asati
analyzed: dissati iti vuccate arūpa dhammesu vipākāni tāva kamma ja rūpa sadisāni tāni api hi asati

original: vīthicittuppāde yāvajīvaṃpi ekasantativasena pavattissantiyeva. Itarāni pana yassa
analyzed: vīthi cittuppāde yāvajīvam pi eka santati vasena itarāni pana yassa

original: ārammaṇassa āpātāgatattā uppajjanti. Tasmiṃ niruddhe tadabhāvepi tadārammaṇā bahū
analyzed: ārammaṇassa āpāta āgata ttāḥ uppajjanti tasmin niruddhe tad abhāve pi tad ārammaṇāḥ bahū

original: cittasantatiyo jīvitassaaddhānapharaṇānubhāvena pavattantiyeva. Apica, yāvakhandhaparinibbānā
analyzed: citta santatiyaḥ jīvita ssa addhāna pharaṇa anubhāvena apica yāva khandha parinibbānā

original: anantarapaccayupanibandhena abbocchinnaṃ pavattamānāya cittasantatiyāvasenapi ayamattho
analyzed: anantara paccaya upanibandhena abbocchinnam pavattamānāya ayam attho

original: vattabbo. Teneva hi kilesasīsaṃ avijjā. Pavattasīsaṃ jīvitindriyanti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vattabbaḥ tena iva hi kilesa sīsam avijjā pavatta sīsam jīvita indriyan ti vuttam

original: [181] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādiyeva uppattiyāpi ṭhitiyāpi kāraṇaṃ hoti. Kasmā, taṅkhaṇe dharamānattā.
analyzed: āhāra ja ādīnam āhāra ādiyā iva uppattiyā api ṭhitiyā api kāraṇam hoti kasmā

original: Kamma jānaṃ pana kammaṃ uppattiyāeva kāraṇaṃ, na ṭhitiyā. Kasmā, taṅkhaṇābhāvato.
analyzed: pana kammam uppattiyāḥ eva kāraṇam na ṭhitiyāḥ kasmā

original: Jīvitena pana anupālitattā eva tesaṃ khaṇaṭṭhiti siddhāti iminā dhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ

analyzed: yathāsakam hi sahajātānam pavatti hetu bhāvena anupālakam na

original: hi tesaṃ kammaṃyeva ṭhitikāraṇaṃ hoti. Āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya kammassa taṅkhaṇābhāva

original: toti”. Taṃ na yuttaṃ.
analyzed: tam na yuttam

original: Dhammānañhi khaṇaṭṭhitināma ekakalāpagatasahajātapaccayā yattāeva hoti. Na nānākalāpagatajanakapaccayāyattā.
analyzed: dhammānam hi khaṇa ṭṭhiti nāma eka kalāpa gata sahajāta paccayā yattā eva hoti na nānā kalāpa gata janaka paccaya āyattā

original: Itarathā uppādakkhaṇe labbhamānānaṃ upacayasantatīnaṃ viya ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhamānāya
analyzed: itarathā uppāda kkhaṇe labbhamānānam upacaya santatīnam viya ṭhiti kkhaṇe labbhamānāya

original: jaratāyapi kutocisamuṭṭhānatā pāḷiyaṃ vuttā siyāti. Apica, khaṇaṭṭhitināma sabhāvasiddhāeva.
analyzed: kutoci samuṭṭhāna tā pāḷiyam vuttā siyā ti apica khaṇaṭṭhiti nāma sa bhāva siddhā eva

original: Na hi uppannā dhammā paccayavekallena attano khaṇesu paripuṇṇaṃ aṭṭhatvā antarāva
analyzed: na hi uppannāḥ dhammā paccaya vekallena attano khaṇesu paripuṇṇam aṭṭhatvā

original: bhijjantīti atthi. Naca paccayādhimattena atire kataraṃ tiṭṭhantīti atthi. Tasmā
analyzed: bhijjanti iti atthi na ca paccaya adhimattena atire kataram tiṭṭhanti iti atthi tasmā

original: khaṇaṭṭhitiyaṃ upatthambhayamānāpi āhārādayo anupālayamānañca jīvitaṃ pacchā balavarūpasantati
analyzed: khaṇaṭṭhitiyam āhāra ādayaḥ anupālayamānam ca jīvitam pacchā balava rūpa santati

original: pavattiatthāyaeva upatthambhenti pāletica. Na khaṇaṭṭhitipavattiyāti. Ettāvatā sabbesaṃpi
analyzed: pavatti atthāya eva upatthambhenti pāleti ca na khaṇa ṭṭhiti pavattiyā ti ettāvatā sabbesam pi

original: khaṇaṭṭhitināma dharamānajanakāyattā vā jīvitāyattāvā nahotīti siddhaṃ hoti. Yadi
analyzed: khaṇaṭṭhiti nāma dharamāna janaka āyattā vā jīvita āyattā vā na hoti iti siddham yadi

original: pana taṃ santatipavattimeva sandhāya vuttaṃ siyā, evaṃsati yujjeyyāti. Aṭṭha kathāyaṃpi

original: santepica anupālana lakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ tedhamme pāletītiādivacane
analyzed: sante pi ca anupālana lakkhaṇa ādimhi vidhāne atthi kkhaṇe yā iva tam te dhamme pāleti iti ādi vacane

original: yathāsantatiṭṭhiti labbhati. Tathā vicāretvā gahetabbāti. Idaṃ pana pācakagginā saha

original: ajjhoharīyatīti āhāro. Kabaḷīkāroca so āhārocāti kabaḷīkārāhāro. Kabaḷīkāro āhārotipi
analyzed: ajjhoharīyati iti āhāro kabaḷīkāro saḥ āhāro cāti kabaḷīkāra āhāro kabaḷīkāro

original: pāṭho. Idañca savatthuka vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Athavā, kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhānaṃ sattānaṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam athavā kabaḷīkāra āhāra bhakkhānam sattānam

original: attabhāvaṃ bhuso harati addhānaṃ pavattetīti āhāro. Khajja bhojjādike kabaḷīkāre

original: āhāro tannissitattā tappariyā pannattācāti kabaḷīkārāhāro. Imasmiṃatthe sati nibbattita
analyzed: āhāraḥ tad nissita ttā tad pariyā panna ttā ca ati kabaḷīkāra āhāraḥ imasmin atthe sati

original: ojā eva labbhati. Atthato pana aṅgamaṅgānusārino rasassa sārabhūto upatthambhabalakāro
analyzed: ojā eva labbhati atthataḥ pana aṅgamaṅga anusārino rasassa sāra bhūtaḥ upatthambha bala kāro

original: bhūtanissito paramasiniddhasi neho idha āhārarūpaṃnāma. Tattha aṅgamaṅgānusārino
analyzed: bhūta nissitaḥ tattha

original: rasassāti ajjhoharitvā āmāsaye patiṭṭhitāni āhāravatthūni pācakatejena vivecitāni
analyzed: rasassa ati ajjhoharitvā āma āsaye patiṭṭhitāni āhāra vatthūni pācaka tejena vivecitāni

original: rasādibhāvena pañcadhā vibhāgaṃ gacchanti. Tattha paṇīta siniddha lahuka sineha koṭṭhāso
analyzed: rasa ādi bhāvena pañcadhā vibhāgam gacchanti tattha koṭṭhāso

original: rasonāma. Ye loke rasadhātūti vuccati. So pācaka tejabalena tato uttaritvā rasaharaṇidhamanijālānusārena
analyzed: rasaḥ nāma ye loke rasa dhātu uti vuccati saḥ pācaka teja balena tatas uttaritvā rasa haraṇi dhamani jāla anusārena

original: heṭṭhāca uddhañca sakalasarīre aṅgamaṅgāni anusaranto anupharanto aṅgamaṅgānusārīti
analyzed: heṭṭhā ca uddhan ca sakala sarīre aṅgam aṅgāni anusarantaḥ anupharantaḥ aṅgam aṅga anusārī iti

original: vuccati. Tassa sārabhūto upatthambhaṃ balaṃ karotīti upatthambhabalakāro. So hi āmāsaye
analyzed: vuccati tassa sāra bhūtaḥ upatthambham balam karoti iti upatthambha bala kāro saḥ hi āmāsaye

original: patiṭṭhita mattova sakalasarīre bhūtesu upatthambhakabalaṃ janetīti.
analyzed: patiṭṭhita mattaḥ uva sakala sarīre bhūtesu upatthambhaka balam janeti iti

original: [182] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Aṅgamaṅgā nasāri rasahara saṅkhātāti” pāṭho. So duppāṭho.
analyzed: aṅgam aṅgā nasāri rasahara saṅkhātā ati pāṭhaḥ saḥ duppāṭhaḥ

original: Taṃ pana sendriyakāyopatthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ āhārarūpaṃ. Ojālakkhaṇaṃ vā. Tattha udayati
analyzed: tam pana sa indriya kāya upatthambhana lakkhaṇam āhāra rūpam ojā lakkhaṇam vā tattha udayati

original: pasavatīti ojā. Avasaddovā rakkhaṇe. Rakkhaṇañcettha upatthambhanameva. Avati janeticāti
analyzed: pasavati iti ojā ava saddo vā rakkhaṇe rakkhaṇam ca ittha upatthambhanam eva avati janeti ca ati

original: ojā. Kiṃ avati. Attano nissayavatthuṃ. Kiṃca janeti. Āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ. Udayānantaraṃ
analyzed: ojā kim avati attanaḥ nissaya vatthum kiṃca janeti āhāra samuṭṭhāna rūpam udaya anantaram

original: rūpaṃ janetīti ojātipi vadanti. Aññāpadesarahitena kakkhaḷattādinā attano bhāvena
analyzed: rūpam janeti iti vadanti añña apadesa rahitena kakkhaḷa tta ādinā attanaḥ bhāvena

original: siddhaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvarūpaṃ. Uppādādinā aniccatādināca saṅkhahalakkhaṇena sahitaṃ
analyzed: siddham rūpam sa bhāva rūpam uppāda ādinā anicca tā ādinā ca saṅkhaha lakkhaṇena sahitam

original: rūpaṃ salakkhaṇarūpaṃ. Ujukatova kammādīhi paccayehi nipphāditaṃ rūpaṃ nipphannarūpaṃ.
analyzed: rūpam salakkhaṇa rūpam ujukataḥ va kamma ādīhi paccayehi nipphāditam rūpam nipphanna rūpam

original: Ruppanalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nippariyāyarūpaṃ rūparūpaṃ. Yathā dukkhadukkhaṃ ajjhattaajjhattanti.
analyzed: ruppana lakkhaṇa sampannam nippariyāya rūpam rūpa rūpam yathā dukkha dukkham ajjhatta ajjhattam ti

original: Saṅkhatalakkhaṇayutta tāya aniccatādikaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā sammasanārahaṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: tāya anicca tā ādikam lakkhaṇa ttayam āropetvā sammasana araham rūpam

original: sammasanarūpaṃ. Te te dabbasambhārāvā rūpakalāpāvā visuṃvisuṃ bhuso kāsanti pakāsanti
analyzed: sammasana rūpam te te dabba sambhārāvāḥ rūpa kalāpāvāḥ visum visum bhusaḥ kāsanti pakāsanti

original: etenāti ākāso. Nisatta nijīvaṭṭhena dhātu. Ākāsasaṅkhātā dhātūti ākāsadhātu. Parito
analyzed: etena ati ākāsaḥ nisatta nijīvaṭṭhena dhātu ākāsa saṅkhātā dhātu uti ākāsa dhātu paritas

original: samantato chindati kalāpantarabhūtāni kalāpantara bhūtehi saddhiṃ asaṃmissaṃ ekattaṃ
analyzed: samantataḥ chindati kalāpa antara bhūtāni kalāpa antara bhūtehi saddhim a saṃmissam ekattam

original: anupagamanaṃ karotīti paricchedo. Tehivā paricchindīyati attanovā paresaṃvā akatvāmajjhe
analyzed: an upagamanam karoti iti attanaḥ vā paresam vā a katvā majjhe

original: visuṃ thapīyati. Tesaṃvā chiddavivaramattabhūto. Na visuṃ eko uppādasahito sabhāvadhammo.
analyzed: visum chidda vivara matta bhūtaḥ na visum ekaḥ uppāda sahito sa bhāva dhammo

original: Nāpi kassaci rūpakalāpassa pakkhabhūtoti paricchedo. Vikāralakkhaṇarūpāni hi asabhāvadhammabhūtānipi
analyzed: nā api kassaci rūpa kalāpassa pakkha bhūto ti paricchedaḥ vikāra lakkhaṇa rūpāni hi a sabhāva dhamma bhūtāni pi

original: taṃtaṃ rūpakalāpesu sandissamānatā taṃtaṃrūpakalāpapakkhikānieva honti. Ayaṃ pana
analyzed: taṃ taṃ rūpa kalāpesu sandissamāna tā taṃ taṃ rūpa kalāpa pakkhikāni eva honti ayam pana

original: tehi rūpa kalāpehi sabbaso vimuttabhāvena bahibhūtattā kassaci rūpa kalāpassa pakkhabhūto
analyzed: tehi rūpa kalāpehi sabbasas vimutta bhāvena bahibhūta ttā kassaci rūpa kalāpassa pakkha bhūto

original: na hotīti. Asabhāvadhammattāca pana kenaci rūpena phusana pariyāyopi tassa sabbaso
analyzed: na hoti iti a sabhāva dhamma ttā ca pana kenacid rūpena phusana pariyāyaḥ api tassa sabbaso

original: natthīti katvā so asaṃphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti pāḷiyaṃ vutto. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: natthi iti katvā so asaṃphuṭṭham catūhi mahābhūtehi iti pāḷiyam vuttaḥ aṭṭhakathāyam

original: pana ghanapiṇḍavatthūsu paṭighaphoṭṭhabbasabhāvānaṃ nānā kalāpagatabhūtānaṃ aññamaññasaṃphuṭṭhatā
analyzed: pana ghana piṇḍa vatthūsu paṭigha phoṭṭhabba sabhāvānam nānā kalāpa gata bhūtānam aññamañña saṃphuṭṭha tā

original: atthīti katvā asaṃphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehīti etehi asaṃphuṭṭhaṃ ajaṭākāsaṃ kaṃthitanti
analyzed: atthi iti katvā asaṃphuṭṭham catūhi mahābhūtehi iti etehi asaṃphuṭṭham a jaṭā kāsam kaṃthitanti

original: vuttaṃ. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana ayaṃ niddeso ajaṭākāsaniddeso nahoti, paricchedarūpaniddesoyeva.
analyzed: vuttam ṭīkā ayam pana ayam niddesaḥ ajaṭā kāsa niddesaḥ pariccheda rūpa niddesaḥ yā iva

original: Soca ghanapiṇḍa vatthūsueva veditabbo. Tesuca bhūtānaṃ asaṃphuṭṭhatānāma natthi.
analyzed: so ca ghana piṇḍa vatthūsu eva veditabbo tesu ca bhūtānaṃ a saṃphuṭṭha tā nāma natthi

original: Tasmā bhūtānaṃ aññamaññaabyāpitā ekattaṃ anupagatatāeva. Tattha asaṃphuṭṭhatānāma
analyzed: tasmā bhūtānam aññamañña a byāpi tā ekattam an upagata tā eva tattha a saṃphuṭṭha tā nāma

original: yuttā siyāti adhippāyena abyāpikatā hi asaṃphuṭṭhatāti vuttaṃ. Atthato pana nānākalāpagatānaṃ
analyzed: yuttā siyā ti adhippāyena abyāpika tā hi asaṃphuṭṭha tā ti vuttam atthataḥ pana nānā kalāpa gatānam

original: bhūtānaṃ pariyantatā saṅkhāto antarāḷadhammo. Rūpaparicchedalakkhaṇaṃ paricchedarūpaṃ.
analyzed: pariyanta tā saṅkhātaḥ antarāḷa dhammaḥ rūpa pariccheda lakkhaṇam pariccheda rūpam

original: Yā pana calamānena kāyaṅgena attānañca attasamaṅgino puggalassa adhippāyañca paccakkhe
analyzed: yā pana calamānena kāyaṅgena attānam ca atta samaṅgino puggalassa adhippāyam ca paccakkhe

original: ṭhite jane viññāpeti pākaṭaṃ katvā dasseti. Sayañca tena kāyaṅgena tehi janehi viññāyati.
analyzed: ṭhite jane viññāpeti pākaṭam katvā dasseti sayam ca tena kāyaṅgena tehi janehi viññāyati

original: Sā kāyaviññattināma. Yā uccārīyamānena vācaṅgena saddena attānañca attasamaṅgino
analyzed: sā kāya viññatti nāma yā uccārīyamānena vācaṅgena saddena attā anañca atta samaṅgino

original: puggalassa adhippāyañca sotapathe ṭhite jane viññāpeti. Sayañca tenavācaṅgena tehi
analyzed: puggalassa adhippāyam ca sota pathe ṭhite jane viññāpeti sayam ca tena vācaṅgena tehi

original: janehi viññāyati. Sā vacīviññattināma. Athavā, viññāpenti janā viññāyantivā janehi
analyzed: janehi viññāyati sā vacīviññatti nāma athavā viññāpenti janāḥ viññāyanti vā janehi

original: aññamaññassa cittāni etāyāti viññatti. Sasambhāre aṅgapaccaṅgabhūte kāye pavattā
analyzed: aññamaññassa cittāni etāyāti viññatti sa sambhāre aṅga paccaṅga bhūte kāye pavattā

original: viññatti kāyaviññatti. Copana kāyasaṅkhāto kāyo evavā viññatti kāyaviññatti. Cittajasaddasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: viññatti kāya viññatti kāya saṅkhāto kāyo evavā viññatti kāya viññatti citta ja sadda saṅkhātāya

original: vācāya pavattā viññatti vacīviññatti. Copanavācā saṅkhātā vācā evavā viññatti vacīviññatti.
analyzed: vācāya pavattā viññatti vacī viññatti ca upana vācā saṅkhātā vācā evavā viññatti vacī viññatti

original: Tattha cittavasena yaṃkiñci kāyaṅgavikāraṃ karontassa taṃtaṃaṅgaṃ santambhantā sandhārentā
analyzed: tattha citta vasena yaṃ kiñci kāyaṅga vikāram karontassa taṃ taṃaṅgam santambhantā sandhārentā

original: cālentā aṅgamaṅgānusārisaṅkhātā cittajavātakalāpā taṃtaṃaṅgaṃ pūretvā uppajjanti.
analyzed: cālentā aṅgam aṅga anusāri saṅkhātā citta ja vāta kalāpā taṃ taṃ aṅgam pūretvā uppajjanti

original: Uppajjantāca yathāvā tathāvā anuppajjitvā yassa tehi cittajavātakalāpeti sahajātassa
analyzed: uppajjantā ca yathāvā tathāvā an uppajjitvā yassa tehi citta ja vāta kalāpā iti sahajātassa

original: copanakāyassa ānubhāvena sabbe te kalāpā yathādhippetadisābhimukhāeva uppajjanti.
analyzed: copana kāyassa ānubhāvena sabbe te kalāpāḥ yathā adhippeta disa abhimukhāḥ eva uppajjanti

original: Ayaṃ copanakāyasaṅkhāto ākāravikāro kāyaviññatti nāma. Niyāmakasadisī hi ayaṃ kāyaviññatti.
analyzed: ayam copana kāya saṅkhātaḥ ākāra vikāro kāya viññatti nāma niyāmaka sadisī hi ayam kāya viññatti

original: Teca nāvāsadi sāti. Yathā hi niyāmako nāvāya mūlabhāge ṭhatvā ekaṃ mahāphiyaṃ daḷhaṃ
analyzed: te ca nāvā āsadi yathā hi niyāmakaḥ nāvāya mūla bhāge ekam mahā phiyam daḷham

original: gahetvā nadisote cāretvā sakalaṃ mahānāvaṃ icchitadisābhimukhaṃ niyojeti. Na yaṃvā
analyzed: sakalam mahā nāvam icchita disa abhimukham niyoja iti na yaṃvā

original: taṃvā disaṃ gantuṃ deti. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekacittakkhaṇikā hi viññatti
analyzed: taṃvā disam gantum deti evam sampadam idam daṭṭhabbam eka citta khaṇikā hi viññatti

original: tesaṃ mūlabhāgeeva labbhamānā te yathādhippetadisābhimukhe evaṃ katvā niyojetīti
analyzed: tesam mūla bhāge eva labbhamānā te yathā adhippeta disa abhimukhe evam katvā niyojeti iti

original: sā niyāmakasadisī hotīti. Etthaca yadetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu
analyzed: sā niyāmaka sadisī hoti iti ettha ca yat etam aṭṭhakathā ayam eka javana vīthiyam sattasu

original: javanesu pathama javanasamuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu attanā sahajātarūpakāyaṃ saṃthambhetuṃ
analyzed: javanesu javana samuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu sahajāta rūpa kāyam saṃthambhetum

original: sandhāretuṃ sakkoti. Aparāparaṃ pana cāletuṃ nasakkoti. Dutīyādīsupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: sandhāretum sakkoti apara aparam pana cāletum na sakkoti dutīya ādīsu pi esā iva nayo

original: Sattamacittena pana samuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā chahicittehi samuṭṭhitaṃ vāyodhātuṃ
analyzed: sattama cittena pana samuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā chahi cittehi samuṭṭhitam vāyodhātum

original: upatthambhanapaccayaṃ labhitvāattanāsahajātaṃ rūpakāyaṃ saṃthambhetuṃ sandhāretuṃ
analyzed: upatthambhana paccayam labhitvā attanā sahajātam rūpa kāyam saṃthambhetum sandhāretum

original: cāletuṃ abhikkamāpetuṃ sakkotīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ abhikkamāmīti kāyaṃ paggaṇhantānaṃ anekasahassesu
analyzed: cāletum abhikkamāpetum sakkoti iti vuttam tam abhikkamāmi iti kāyam paggaṇhantānam aneka sahassesu

original: javana vāresu pavattamānesu yasmiṃvāre calanasaṅkhātaṃ desantarapāpanaṃ jāyati, taṃ
analyzed: vāresu pavattamānesu yasmin vāre calana saṅkhātam desantara pāpanam jāyati taṃ

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Na hi katipayajavanavārehi calanaṃ jāyati. Yadi jāyeyya, iddhimantānaṃ
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam na hi katipaya javana vārehi calanam jāyati yadi jāyeyya iddhimantānam

original: iddhiyāgamanaṃ viya sabbesaṃpi sīghataraṃ gamanaṃ paññāyeyya. Kasmā, ekaccharakkhaṇepi
analyzed: iddhiyā gamanam viya sabbesam pi sīghataram gamanam paññāyeyya kasmai ekaccha rakkhaṇe pi

original: anekakoṭisatasahassacikkapavattiyā sambhavato. Ayañca attho upari akkharuppattivicāraṇāyaṃ
analyzed: aneka koṭi sata sahassa cikka pavattiyā sambhavataḥ ayam ca atthaḥ upari akkhara uppatti vicāraṇā ayam

original: pākaṭo bhavissatīti. Tasmā tato purimavāresu saṃthambhanasandhāraṇānieva sampajjantīti
analyzed: pākaṭaḥ bhavissati iti tasmā tatas purima vāresu saṃthambhana sandhāraṇāni eva sampajjanti iti

original: veditabbaṃ. Yā cettha sattayugasakaṭopamā vuttā, sāpi nānājavanavīthīsu samuṭṭhitānaṃ
analyzed: veditabbam yā ca ittha satta yuga sakaṭa upamā vuttā sā api nānā javana vīthīsu

original: vāyodhātūnaṃ aparāparaṃ upatthambhaneca yujjatiyeva. Tathā hi calanacittajarūpasantatiyaṃ
analyzed: vāyu dhātūnam apara aparam upatthambhanā ica tathā hi

original: pavattāni utujarūpasaṅghāṭānipi viññattisahitāni viya tadākāravantāni savegāni savipphārānieva
analyzed: pavattāni utu ja rūpa saṅghāṭāni pi viññatti sahitāni viya tad ākāravantāni sa vegāni sa vipphārāni eva

original: pavattanti. Tasmā pubbāparapavattānaṃ nānā javanavīthīnaṃ antarantarā bhavaṅgasamayesupi
analyzed: pavattanti tasmā pubba apara pavattānam nānā javana vīthīnam antar antarā bhavaṅga samayesu pi

original: abhikkamanādikaṃ calanaṃ sampajjatiyeva. Ekābaddhapavattānica catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānināma
analyzed: abhikkamana ādikam calanam sampajjati yeva eka ābaddha pavattāni ca catu samuṭṭhānika rūpāni nāma

original: ekassa visaye itarāni ekasamuṭṭhānāni viya sabbaso tadanu parivattīni hontīti cittaje
analyzed: ekassa visaye itarāni eka samuṭṭhānāni viya sabbaso tadanu parivattīni honti iti citta je

original: calante itarānipi calanti yevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Calanañcettha pacchimapacchimānaṃ rūpakalāpasaṅghāṭānaṃ
analyzed: calante itarāni api calanti yeva ati daṭṭhabbam calanam ca ittha pacchima pacchimānam rūpa kalāpa saṅghāṭānam

original: purima purimānaṃ uppannadesato desantare yathāpavattasannivesākārena aparāparaṃ uppajjamānaṃ
analyzed: uppanna desataḥ desa antare yathā pavatta sannivesa ākārena apara aparam uppajjamānam

original: veditabbaṃ. Na hi rūpārūpadhammānaṃ uppanna dese anirujjhitvā kesaggamattaṃpi desantara
analyzed: veditabbam na hi rūpa arūpa dhammānam uppanna dese a nirujjhitvā

original: saṅkamanaṃnāma atthi. Itarathā khaṇikadhammatā abyāpāradhammatā avasavattitāca tesaṃ
analyzed: saṅkamanam nāma atthi itarathā khaṇika dhamma tā abyāpāra dhamma tā avasavatti tā ca tesam

original: nasiyāti. Yaṃkiñci vacībhedaṃ karontassa kaṇṭhaṭṭhānādi gataupādinnaka pathavīdhātūsu
analyzed: nasiyā ati yaṃkiñci vacī bhedam karontassa kaṇṭha ṭṭhāna ādi pathavī dhātūsu

original: calamānakaṇṭhapadesādigatacittaja pathavīdhātūnaṃ saṅghaṭṭanasaṅkhātena ṭhānakaraṇasannipātena
analyzed: saṅghaṭṭana saṅkhātena ṭhāna karaṇa sannipātena

original: sahevayo vacīghosasaṅkhāto cittajasaddo jāyati. So yena attanā saha jātena ākāravikārena
analyzed: vacī ghosa saṅkhāto citta ja saddo jāyati saḥ yena attanā saha jātena ākāra vikārena

original: yathādhippāyaṃ taṃtaṃ vaṇṇavisesattaṃ upagacchati. Yenaca suṇantānaṃ taṃtaṃatthajotako
analyzed: yathā adhippāyam taṃ taṃ vaṇṇa visesa ttam upagacchati yena ca suṇantānam taṃ taṃ attha jotakaḥ

original: akkharasannipātabhūto padabyañjanaviseso upalabbhati. So copanavācāsaṅkhāto ākāravikāro
analyzed: akkhara sannipāta bhūtaḥ pada byañjana viseso upalabbhati saḥ ca upana vācā saṅkhātaḥ ākāra vikāro

original: vacīviññattināma. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tassā pana cittasamuṭṭhānāya pathavīdhātuyā
analyzed: vacī viññatti nāma aṭṭhakathāyam pana tassā pana citta samuṭṭhānāya pathavī dhātuyā

original: upādinnaghaṭṭanassa paccayabhūto eko ākāravikāro vacī viññattināmāti vuttaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: upādinna ghaṭṭanassa paccaya bhūtaḥ ekaḥ ākāra vikāraḥ vacī viññatti nāmā ti vuttam tattha

original: upādinnaghaṭṭanassa paccayabhūtoti kammajabhūtāya catujabhūtāyaevavā upādinnapathavīdhātuyā
analyzed: upādinna ghaṭṭanassa paccaya bhūto ti kamma ja bhūtāya catuja bhūtāya eva vā upādinna pathavī dhātuyā

original: sahaghaṭṭanaṃ paṭicca saddavisesapavattiyā paccayabhūtoti attho. Ghaṭṭanassa paccayo
analyzed: saha ghaṭṭanam paṭicca sadda visesa pavattiyā paccaya bhūto ti atthaḥ ghaṭṭanassa paccayaḥ

original: pana calamānakaṇṭhapadesādivikārabhūto kāyaṅgavisesoeva siyā. Vikāradvayañca asaṃmissaṃ
analyzed: pana calamāna kaṇṭha padesa ādi vikāra bhūtaḥ siyā vikāra dvayam ca a saṃmissam

original: katvā veditabbanti. Etthaca upādinnakapathavīhi saha ghaṭṭanaṃ cittajapathavīnaṃ
analyzed: katvā veditabbanti ettha ca upādinnaka pathavīhi saha ghaṭṭanam citta ja pathavīnam

original: kiccaṃ. Yaṃ pana tāsaṃ yathāvā tathāvā aghaṭṭetvā yathā icchitakkharaṃ sampajjati.
analyzed: kiccam yam pana tāsam yathāvā tathāvā a ghaṭṭetvā yathā icchita kharam sampajjati

original: Tathā ghaṭṭanapakāravidhānaṃ. Idaṃ kāyaviññattiyā kiccaṃ. Ghaṭṭanena saheva uppannasaddānaṃ
analyzed: tathā ghaṭṭana pakāra vidhānam idam kāya viññattiyā kiccam ghaṭṭanena saha iva uppanna saddānam

original: taṃtaṃvaṇṇatta pattiyā vidahanameva vacīviññattiyā kiccaṃ. Kumbhathunatalaṃ viyaca
analyzed: pattiyā vidahanam eva vacī viññattiyā kiccam kumbhathuna talam

original: upādinnakapathavī. Paharaṇahattho viya cittajapathavī. Hatthapari vattana vikāro
analyzed: upādinnaka pathavī paharaṇa hatthaḥ viya citta ja pathavī hattha pari vikāro

original: viya kāyaviññatti. Saddavikāro viya vacīviññatti. Kumbhathunassa nānāsaddapabhedoviya
analyzed: viya kāya viññatti sadda vikāraḥ viya vacī viññatti kumbhathunassa nānā sadda pabhedaḥ viya

original: nānāvaṇṇabhedoti. Etthaca yadetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ idaṃ vakkhāmi etaṃ vakkhāmīti uppajjamānaṃ
analyzed: nānā vaṇṇa bhedaḥ ti ettha ca yat etam aṭṭhakathāyam idam vakkhāmi etam vakkhāmi iti uppajjamānam

original: cittaṃ aṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti. Tesaṃ abbhantare citta samuṭṭhānā pathavīdhātu upādinnakaṃ
analyzed: cittam aṭṭharūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti tesam abbhantare citta samuṭṭhānā pathavī dhātu upādinnakam

original: ghaṭṭayamānāva uppajjati. Tena dhātughaṭṭanena saheva saddo uppajjatītica purimacittasamuṭṭhā
analyzed: uppajjati tena dhātu ghaṭṭanena saha iva saddaḥ uppajjati iti ca purima citta samuṭṭhā

original: nāya upatthambhanakiccaṃpi natthītica vuttaṃ. Taṃpi anekasatesu javanavāresu pavattamānesu
analyzed: upatthambhana kiccaṃpi natthi iti ca vuttam tat pi aneka satesu javana vāresu pavattamānesu

original: yasmiṃvāre paribyattaṃ akkharaṃ pavattati, taṃ sandhāya vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Teneva
analyzed: yasmin vāre paribyattam akkharam pavattati tam sandhāya vuttam ti gahetabbam tena iva

original: hi mūla ṭīkāyaṃ upatthambhanakiccaṃ natthi laddhāsevanena citteneva ghaṭṭanassa balavabhāvatoti
analyzed: upatthambhana kiccam natthi laddha āsevanena cittena iva ghaṭṭanassa balava bhāvato ti

original: vuttaṃ. Etthaca laddhāsevanenāti etena pubbabhāge nānājavanavīthīhi laddhāsevanabhāvaṃ
analyzed: vuttam ettha ca laddha āsevanena ati etena pubba bhāge nānā javana vīthīhi laddha āsevana bhāvam

original: dasseti. Pathama javanacittassapi laddhāsevanatāya adhippetattā. Naca ekajavana vāramattena
analyzed: dasseti pathama javana cittassa api laddha āsevana tāya adhippeta ttā na ca eka javana vāra mattena

original: paribyattaṃ ekakkharaṃ sampajjatīti sakkā viññātuṃ. Kasmā, tassa ekadviaccharakkhaṇamattena
analyzed: paribyattam eka kkharam sampajjati iti sakkā viññātum kasmā tassa eka dvi accha rakkhaṇa mattena

original: kālena vattabbattā ekaccharakkhaṇeca anekasatasahassānaṃ javanavīthīnaṃ pavattisambhavato. Vuttañca –
analyzed: kālena vattabbattā ekaccha rakkhaṇe ca aneka sata sahassānam javana vīthīnam pavatti sambhavataḥ vuttam ca

original: Ekamattā tayo rassā, dvimattā dīghamuccare;
analyzed: eka mattā tayoḥ rassāḥ dvi mattāḥ dīgham uccare

original: Timatto tu gīto ñeyyo, byañjanā aḍḍhamattikāti.
analyzed: timattaḥ tu gītaḥ ñeyyaḥ byañjanā aḍḍhamattikā ati

original: Milindapañheca sādhike vīhivāhasate vīhibījāni ekaccharakkhaṇe uppannassa cittassa
analyzed: sādhike vīhi vāha sate vīhi bījāni ekaccha rakkhaṇe uppannassa cittassa

original: kalaṃpi naupenti. Kalabhāgaṃpi naupentīti dīpitaṃ. Ekakkharaṃ uccārentassaca tattakaṃpi
analyzed: kalam pi na upenti kalabhāgam pi na upenti iti dīpitam ekakkharam uccārentassa ca

original: kālaṃ uccāraṇacittabyāpāro sandissatiyeva. Naca paramatthato ekameva saddaṃ uccāremītivā
analyzed: kālam uccāraṇa citta byāpāraḥ sandissatiyā iva na ca paramatthataḥ ekam eva saddam uccāremi iti vā

original: suṇomītivā sakkā niyametvā uccāretuṃ sotuñca. Tathā niyamentassapi saddānaṃ pubbāparato
analyzed: suṇomi iti vā sakkā niyametvā uccāretum sotum ca tathā niyamentassa api saddānam pubba aparato

original: anekasatasahassasseva uccāraṇa savana sambhavato. Ekamevāti abhimāno pana samūhaghana
analyzed: aneka sata sahassassa iva uccāraṇa savana sambhavato ekam eva ati abhimānaḥ pana samūha ghana

original: santatighanehi paṭicchannattāeva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesamettha kāyaviññattiyaṃ vuttana
analyzed: santati ghanehi paṭicchanna ttā eva hoti iti daṭṭhabbam sesam ettha kāya viññattiyam

original: yena yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbanti. Etthaca viññattisaddo kāyena viññāpeti vācāya viññāpetītiādisu
analyzed: yena yathāsambhavam veditabbam ti ettha ca viññatti saddo kāyena viññāpeti vācāya viññāpeti itiādisu

original: bodhanattho. Sudinna kaṇḍe tikkhattuṃ viññāpetītiādīsu pavattanattho. Idha pana duvidhopi
analyzed: bodhana atthaḥ sudinna kaṇḍe tikkhattum viññāpeti iti ādīsu pavattana atthaḥ idha pana duvidhaḥ api

original: yujjati. Evañhi sati paraṃ bodhetukāmatārahi tesu sabbesu kāyaṅgavācaṅgacopanesupi
analyzed: yujjati evam hi sati param bodhetu kāma tā rahi tesu sabbesu kāyaṅga vācaṅga copanesu pi

original: pavattakaviññattiyā labbhamānatā veditabbā hotīti. Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana paraṃ bodhetukāmatāya
analyzed: pavattaka viññattiyāḥ labbhamāna tā veditabbā hoti iti mūla ṭīkā ayam pana param bodhetu kāma tāya

original: vināpi abhikkamanādipavattanena so citta sahabhūvikāro adhippāyaṃ viññāpeti. Sayañca
analyzed: vinā api abhikkamana ādi pavattanena so citta sahabhūvikāraḥ adhippāyam viññāpeti sayam ca

original: viññāyatīti dvidhāpi viññattiyevāti vuttaṃ, tattha dvīsu bodhanaviññattīsu purimā
analyzed: viññāyati iti dvidhā api viññattiyā iva ati vuttam tattha dvīsu bodhana viññattīsu purimā

original: kāyaviññatti aṅgapaccaṅgassa calamānavaṇṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā calamānaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ
analyzed: kāya viññatti aṅga paccaṅgassa calamāna vaṇṇam cakkhu viññāṇa vīthiyā calamāna aṅga paccaṅgam

original: kāyaviññāṇavīthiyā gahetvā pacchā suddhena manodvārikajavanenaeva viññāyati pacchimāca
analyzed: kāya viññāṇa vīthiyā gahetvā pacchā suddhena manodvārika javanena eva viññāyati pacchimā ca

original: vacīviññatti uccāriyamānaṃ saddaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā gahetvā pacchā suddhena manodvārikajavanenaeva
analyzed: vacī viññatti uccāriyamānam saddam sota viññāṇa vīthiyā gahetvā pacchā suddhena manodvārika javanena eva

original: viññāyati, na pañcadvārikajavanena. Sā hi attānaṃ jānanteeva parasatte attanā samaṅgino
analyzed: viññāyati na pañcadvārika javanena sā hi attānam jānantā eva para satte attanā samaṅginaḥ

original: puggalassa cittaṃ viññāpeti, na ajānante. Ñāpaka hetu hi nāma attānaṃ jānanteeva
analyzed: puggalassa cittam viññāpeti na a jānante ñāpaka hetu hi nāma attānam jānante eva

original: ñāpetabbaṃ ñāpeti, no ajānante. Evañca katvā kāyaṅga copanaṃ disvāvā parāmasitvāvā
analyzed: ñāpetabbam ñāpeti no a jānante evañca katvā kāyaṅga copanam disvā vā parāmasitvā vā

original: saddaṃ sutvāvā parassa taṃtaṃadhippāyaṃ jānantānaṃ tiracchāna gatānaṃpi pathadhaṃ
analyzed: saddam sutvā vā parassa taṃ taṃ adhippāyam jānantānam tiracchāna gatānam pi

original: viññattijānanaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati. Taṃjānanena vinā adhippāyajānanassa asambhavato.
analyzed: viññatti jānanam siddham bhavati tad jānanena vinā adhippāya jānanassa asambhavato

original: Viññattiṃ jānantānaṃca purimasiddhasaṅketa sambandha jānanena vinā adhippāyajānanaṃ
analyzed: viññattim jānantānam ca purima siddha saṅketa sambandha jānanena vinā adhippāya jānanam

original: na sambhavatīti majjhe visuṃ pubbasaṅketa sambandhagahanaṃpi icchanti, dvīsu pana
analyzed: na sambhavati iti majjhe visum pubba saṅketa sambandha gahanam pi icchanti dvīsu pana

original: pavattakaviññattīsu paraṃ abhikkamantaṃ cakkhuviññāṇavīthiyā disvā abhikkamanaviññattiñca
analyzed: pavattaka viññattīsu param abhikkamantam cakkhu viññāṇa vīthiyā disvā abhikkamana viññattiñca

original: abhikkamanacittañca manoviññāṇavīthiyā jānanti. Esanayo paṭikkamanādīsu. Tathā parassa
analyzed: abhikkamana cittam ca manaḥ viññāṇa vīthiyā jānanti esanayo paṭikkamana ādīsu tathā parassa

original: kathaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā sutvā kathanaviññattiñca kathanacittañca manoviññāṇavīthiyā
analyzed: katham sota viññāṇa vīthiyā sutvā kathana viññattim ca kathana cittam ca manaḥ viññāṇa vīthiyā

original: jānanti. Paraṃ rattacittena kāyaṅgaṃ cālentaṃ disvā calanaviññattiñca rāgacittañca
analyzed: jānanti param ratta cittena kāyaṅgam cālentam disvā calana viññattim ca rāga cittam ca

original: jānanti. Rattassa kathaṃ sutvā kathana viññattiñca rāgacittañca jānanti. Esanayo
analyzed: jānanti rattassa katham sutvā kathana viññattiñca rāga cittañca jānanti esanayo

original: sabbāsu kāyikavācasikakriyāsūti. Lahuno bhāvo lahutā. Muduno bhāvo mudutā. Kammani
analyzed: sabbāsu kāyika vācasika kriyāsu iti lahunaḥ bhāvaḥ lahu tā mudunaḥ bhāvaḥ mudu tā kammani

original: sādhu kammaññaṃ. Kammayogyanti attho. Kammaññassa bhāvo kammaññatā.
analyzed: sādhu kammaññam kamma yogyanti atthaḥ kammaññassa bhāvaḥ kammañña tā

original: Adandhatālakkhaṇā rūpassa lahutā. Athaddhatā lakkhaṇā rūpassa mudutā. Sarīrakriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā
analyzed: adandha tā lakkhaṇā rūpassa lahu tā athaddha tā lakkhaṇā rūpassa mudu tā sarīra kriyā anukūla kammañña bhāva lakkhaṇā

original: rūpassa kammaññatā. Aññamaññaṃ avijahantiyopi etā viruddhapaccayasappāya paccayānaṃ
analyzed: rūpassa kammañña tā aññamaññam a vijahantiyaḥ api etāḥ viruddha paccaya sappāya paccayānam

original: vasena asaṃmissato veditabbā. Tathā hi attano kāyaviruddhaṃ utuṃvā āhāraṃvā cittakriyaṃvā
analyzed: vasena a saṃmissataḥ veditabbā tathā hi attanaḥ kāya viruddham utum vā āhāram vā citta kriyam vā

original: sevantānaṃ sarīragatā dhātuyo kadāci sakalasarīraṃvā sarīrekadesaṃvā khobhetvā visesato
analyzed: sevantānam sarīra gatāḥ kadācid sakala sarīram vā sarīra eka desam vā khobhetvā visesataḥ

original: pūtimukha sappasaṅkhātaāpo pariyuṭṭhānaṃ katvā kāyaṃ asayhabhāraṃ viya garuṃ bhāriyaṃ
analyzed: pūti mukha pariyuṭṭhānam katvā kāyam a sayha bhāram viya garum bhāriyam

original: karonti. Iriyā pathaparivattane kāyabhāriyanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādenti. Tadārūpassa
analyzed: karonti iriyā patha parivattane kāya bhāriya nimittam dukkham uppādenti tadārūpassa

original: lahutā napavattati. Puna attano sarīrasappāyaṃ utuṃvā āhāraṃvā cittakiriyaṃvā sevantānaṃ
analyzed: lahu tā na pavattati puna attano sarīra sappāyam utum vā āhāram vā citta kiriyam vā sevantānam

original: so dhātukkhobho vūpasammati. Kāyo sallahuko hoti. Iriyāpathaparivattane kāya bhāriyanimittaṃ
analyzed: saḥ dhātu khobhaḥ vūpasammati kāyaḥ sat lahukaḥ hoti iriyāpatha parivattane kāya bhāriya nimittam

original: dukkhaṃnāma natthi. Tadā sā pavattati. Esanayo sesāsupi. Visesanato panettha mudubhāyaṃ
analyzed: dukkhaṃ nāma natthi tadā sā pavattati sesāsu pi visesanato pana ittha

original: kaṭṭhamukhasappasaṅkhāta pathavīpariyuṭṭhānaṃ katvā sukkhakaṭṭhaṃviya kāyaṃ thaddhaṃ
analyzed: kaṭṭha mukha sappa saṅkhāta pathavī pariyuṭṭhānam katvā sukkha kaṭṭham viya kāyam thaddham

original: kakkhaḷaṃkaronti. Iriyāpathaparivattane aṅgamaṅgānaṃchijjanabhijjanākārapattaṃ thaddhaṃ
analyzed: kakkhaḷaṃkaronti iriyāpatha parivattane thaddham

original: kakkhaḷanimittaṃ dukkhaṃ uppādentīti vattabbaṃ. Kammaññatāyaṃ satthamukhasappasaṅkhāta
analyzed: kakkhaḷa nimittam dukkham uppādenti iti vattabbam kammañña tā ayam sattha mukha sappa saṅkhāta

original: vāyo pariyuṭṭhānaṃ vāyovisamaṃ katvā dāmarikacorapariyuṭṭhitaṃ paccantaraṭṭhaṃ viya
analyzed: vāyo pariyuṭṭhānam vāyo visamam katvā dāmarika cora pariyuṭṭhitam paccantaraṭṭham viya

original: kāyaṃ vivaṭṭamānaṃ karonti, sabbairiyāpathesu sukhaṃnāma natthīti vattabbaṃ. Tejodhātu
analyzed: kāyam vivaṭṭamānam karonti sa bairiyāpathesu sukham nāma natthi iti vattabbam tejaḥ dhātu

original: pana tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃpi mūlabhūtā hotīti veditabbā.
analyzed: pana tāsam sabbāsam pi mūla bhūtā hoti iti veditabbā

original: Imā pana arogino kallabhāvoviya suparimadditacammassa mudubhāvoviya sudandhasuvaṇṇassa
analyzed: imā pana arogino su parimaddita cammassa mudu bhāvo viya su dandha suvaṇṇassa

original: kammakkhamabhāvoviya rūpakāyassa iriyāpathaparivattane sallahukatādivasena sandissamānā
analyzed: rūpa kāyassa iriyāpatha parivattane sallahuka tā ādi vasena sandissamānā

original: visesākārā hontīti katvā vikārarūpaṃ nāma. Cayanaṃ cayo. Piṇḍavasena abhinibbattīti
analyzed: visesa ākārāḥ honti iti katvā vikāra rūpam nāma cayanam cayaḥ piṇḍa vasena abhinibbatti iti

original: attho. Ādito uparitoca cayo upacayo. Pathamābhinibbatti uparuparivaḍḍhicāti attho.
analyzed: atthaḥ āditas uparitas ca cayaḥ upacayaḥ pathama abhinibbatti upari upari vaḍḍhi ca ati atthaḥ

original: Ayañhi upasaddo upaññattantiādīsu viya pathamattho upasittantiādīsu viyaca upari
analyzed: ayam hi upasaddaḥ upaññattanti ādīsu viya pathama atthaḥ upasittanti ādīsu upari

original: atthoti. Vuttañca mūlaṭīkāyaṃ upasaddo pathamattho upariatthoca hotīti. Tenevahi
analyzed: atthaḥ iti vuttam ca mūla ṭīkāyam upasaddo pathama atthaḥ upari atthaḥ ca hoti iti tena iva hi

original: pāḷiyaṃ yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo, so rūpassa upacayo. Yorūpassa upacayo, sā rūpassa santatīti
analyzed: pāḷiyam yaḥ āyatanānaṃ ācayo saḥ rūpassa upacayaḥ yaḥ rūpassa upacayo sā rūpassa santati iti

original: vuttaṃ. Tananaṃ vitthāraṇaṃ tati. Sambandhā tati punappunaṃvā tati santati. Yathā
analyzed: vuttam tananam vitthāraṇam tati sambandhā tati punappunaṃvā tati santati yathā

original: pavattānaṃ āyatanānaṃ addhānapūraṇavasena pavattīti attho. Tattha gabbhaseyyakānaṃ
analyzed: pavattānam āyatanānam addhāna pūraṇa vasena pavatti iti attho tattha gabbhaseyyakānam

original: sattānaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpānaṃ uppādo pathamānibbattiatthena upacayonāma. Tato
analyzed: sattānam paṭisandhi khaṇe rūpānam uppādaḥ pathamā nibbatti atthena upacayaḥ nāma tatas

original: paraṃ yāva sabbapathamaṃ uppannānaṃ cakkhu sota ghānajivhānaṃ uppādo, etthantare
analyzed: param yāva sabba pathamam uppannānam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhānaṃ uppādo etthantare

original: rūpānaṃ uppādo upari vaḍḍhiatthena upacayonāma. Tato paraṃ yāvajīvaṃ catusantatirūpānaṃ
analyzed: rūpānaṃ uppādo upari vaḍḍhi atthena upacayo nāma tato param yāvajīvam catu santati rūpānaṃ

original: uppādo santatināma. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nadītīre nikhātakūpasmiṃ udakuggamanakāloviya
analyzed: uppādo santati nāma vuttam ha etam aṭṭhakathāyam nadī tīre nikhāta kūpasmim

original: ācayo nibbatti. Paripuṇṇakāloviya upacayo vaḍḍhi. Ajjhottharitvā gamanakālo viya santati pavattīti.
analyzed: ācayaḥ nibbatti paripuṇṇa kālo viya upacayaḥ vaḍḍhi ajjhottharitvā gamana kālo viya santati pavatti iti

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāvacakkhādi dasakānaṃ uppatti. Etthantare rūpuppādo upacayonāma. Tato paraṃ santati nāmāti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi tena pariyāyena yujjatiyeva.
analyzed: paṭisandhitaḥ paṭṭhāya yāvacakkhādi dasakānam uppatti ettha antare rūpa uppādo upacayaḥ nāma tatas param santati nāma ati vuttam tat pi tena pariyāyena yujjati yeva

original: Saṃsedajopavātikānaṃ pana paṭisandhikkhaṇe rūpānaṃ uppādo pathamā bhinibbatti atthena
analyzed: saṃseda ja upavātikānam pana paṭisandhi khaṇe rūpānam uppādaḥ pathamā abhinibbatti atthena

original: paripuṇṇa vaḍḍhi atthenaca upacayo nāma, tato paraṃ rūpānaṃ uppādo santatināma. Apica,
analyzed: upacayaḥ nāma tato param uppādo santati nāma apica

original: tisamuṭṭhānika rūpānaṃpi visuṃ visuṃ santatipaccuppannaṃnāma atthi. Tassaca ekekassa
analyzed: ti samuṭṭhānika rūpānaṃ pi visum visum santati paccuppannaṃ nāma atthi tassa ca ekekassa

original: nibbatti vaḍḍhi pavatti vasena tisso tissoavatthā honti. Tattha ekekasantatiyaṃ ādimhi
analyzed: nibbatti vaḍḍhi pavatti vasena tissaḥ tisso avatthā honti tattha ekeka santatiyam ādimhi

original: santatisīsarūpānaṃ sabbapathamaṃ uppādo nibbattināma. Tato vaḍḍhanarūpānaṃ uppādo
analyzed: santati sīsa rūpānam sabba pathamam uppādaḥ nibbatti nāma tatas vaḍḍhana rūpānam uppādaḥ

original: vaḍḍhīnāma. Vaḍḍhane samatte avaḍḍhitvā pabandhaṭṭhitivasena vattanavasenauppādopavattināma.
analyzed: vaḍḍhī nāma vaḍḍhane samatte a vaḍḍhitvā pabandha ṭṭhiti vasena vattana vasena auppādopavatti nāma

original: Tattha ca nibbattivaḍḍhiyo upacayonāma. Pavattisantati nāma. Saṅkhepato pana loke
analyzed: tattha ca nibbatti vaḍḍhiyaḥ upacayaḥ nāma pavatti santati nāma saṅkhepato pana loke

original: sabbāsu indriyānindriyabaddharūpapavattīsu sandissamāne jāyana vaḍḍhana pavattanasaṅkhāte
analyzed: sabbāsu indriya anindriya baddha rūpa pavattīsu sandissamāne jāyana vaḍḍhana pavattana saṅkhāte

original: avatthābhede disvā upacayasanta tiyo veditabbā. Tatrāyaṃ nayo-rukkhatiṇādīnivā sākhā

original: pattapupphaphalādīnivā ādimhi jāyanti. Jāyitvā vaḍḍhanti. Vaḍḍhane samatte avaḍḍhitvā
analyzed: ādimhi jāyanti jāyitvā vaḍḍhanti vaḍḍhane samatte a vaḍḍhitvā

original: pabandhavasena pavattitvā bhijjantīti. Jīraṇaṃ jarā, jīranti jiṇṇabhāvaṃ gacchanti
analyzed: bhijjanti iti jīraṇam jarāḥ jīranti jiṇṇa bhāvam gacchanti

analyzed: etā āyāti jarā sā āyā iva jaratā uppāda jarā bhaṅgehi niccalati na kampati iti niccaḥ

original: dhammo. Na nicco anicco, saṅkhatadhammo. Aniccassa bhāvo aniccatā, bhaṅgo.
analyzed: dhammaḥ na niccaḥ aniccaḥ saṅkhata dhammaḥ aniccassa bhāvaḥ anicca tā bhaṅgo

original: [183] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Niccadhuvabhāvena na iccaṃ anugantabbanti anicca”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.

original: Niccasaddo hi sāsane lokeca pākaṭo. So eva idha nakārayutto aniccoti vuttoti. Lakkhīyanti

original: sallakkhīyanti vinicchīyanti dhammā ime saṅkhatāti etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ. Saṅkhata bhāvajānananimitanti
analyzed: sallakkhīyanti vinicchīyanti dhammā ime saṅkhatā ati etena ati lakkhaṇam saṅkhata bhāva jānana nimitanti

original: attho. Yathāha- aṅguttare tīṇi māni bhikkhave saṅkhatassa saṅkhatalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni
analyzed: atthaḥ yathā āha aṅguttare tīṇi māni bhikkhave saṅkhatassa saṅkhata lakkhaṇāni katamāni

analyzed: jāti nāma āgatā tasmā sā api idha vattabbā ati vuttam jāti rūpam eva ātiādi ettha ati rūpa samuddese

original: Jananaṃ pātubhavanaṃ jāti. Jāyantivā etāyāti jāti, upacaya santati nāmenapavuccati
analyzed: jananam pātubhavanam jāti jāyantivā

original: tassājātiyātathā avatthābhedayogatoti adhippāyo. Sā hi ādito paṭisandhirūpāni pātubhavantāni

original: supākaṭattāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha-aṭṭhārasavidhanti.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam tena āha aṭṭhārasavidham ti

original: Cattāri bhūtāni pañcapasādā agahitagahaṇena cattāro visayā gocarā. Duvidho bhāvo.
analyzed: cattāri bhūtāni pañca pasādāḥ agahita gahaṇena cattāro visayāḥ gocarāḥ duvidhaḥ bhāvo

original: Ekaṃ hadayaṃ. Iti idaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitāhārarūpehi saha aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ hoti

original: Etthaca pacchimāni dasarūpāni sabhāvato anupalabbhamānattā paccayehi nipphāditāni

original: rūpāni na hontīti anipphannāni nāma. Api cettha abhidhamme visuṃ uddiṭṭhāni niddiṭṭhānica

original: etāni sabhāvato anupalabbhamānānīti vā paramatthato avijjamānānītivā nasakkā vattuṃ.

original: Vohārasiddha mattabhāvaṃ atikkamma tādisena suddhadhammagatiyā siddhena paramattha
analyzed: vohāra siddha matta bhāvam atikkamma tādisena suddha dhamma gatiyā siddhena paramattha

original: lakkhaṇena upaladdhattā. Itarathā nibbattilakkhaṇarahitaṃ asaṅkhata nibbānaṃpi sabhāvato
analyzed: lakkhaṇena itarathā nibbatti lakkhaṇa rahitam asaṅkhata nibbānam api sabhāvato

original: anupalabbhamānaṃ paramatthato avijjamānañca nāma siyāti. Tasmā nibbatti lakkhaṇarahitattāeva
analyzed: anupalabbhamānam paramatthataḥ avijjamānam ca nāma siyāti tasmā nibbatti lakkhaṇa rahita ttā eva

analyzed: etāni na sabhāvataḥ anupalabbhamāna ttā ati yuttam siyā iti rūpa samuddesaḥ

original: 157. Rūpavibhāgesabbañca pana etaṃ yathāsamuddiṭṭhaṃ aṭṭhavīsati vidhaṃ rūpaṃ ahetukaṭṭhena
analyzed: pana etam yathā samuddiṭṭham aṭṭhavīsati vidham rūpam ahetuka ṭṭhena

original: ekavidhameva. Na sahetukā hetuka vasena duvidhaṃ. Tathāsappaccayaṭṭhena ekavidhameva.
analyzed: ekavidham eva na sa hetuka ahetuka vasena duvidham tathā sa paccaya ṭṭhena ekavidham eva

original: Na sappaccayāpaccaya vasena duvidhanti evaṃ pavattaṃ ekavidhanayaṃ tāva dassetuṃ

original: sabbañcātiādimāraddhaṃ.
analyzed: sabbañca ati ādim āraddham

original: [184] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Ekavidhanayopi rūpavibhāgoevāti katvā “yathā uddiṭṭha rūpānaṃ ekavidhādinayaṃ dassanatthaṃ sabbañca panetantiādi vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sameti.
analyzed: ekavidha nayaḥ api rūpa vibhāgaḥ eva iti katvā yathā ekavidha ādi nayam dassana ttham sabbam ca pana itantiādi vuttanti vuttam tam na sameti

original: Vakkhati hi –
analyzed: vakkhati hi

original: Ajjhattikādibhedena, vibhajanti yathārahanti.
analyzed: ajjhattika ādi bhedena vibhajanti yathārahanti

original: Etena ajjhattikādibhedo eva rūpavibhāgonāmāti viññāyati.

original: Tattha sabbaṃpi rūpaṃ hetusampayogā bhāvato ahetuka meva, na kiñci sahetukaṃ. Kiñci

original: sabhāgayugaḷasambhavatocāti. Itarāni pana pāḷikamena asamentānipi sabhāga yugaḷattā

original: bhāgato yuttānieva. Tattha attano janakena paccayena saheva vattatīti sapaccayaṃ.

analyzed: attanā gahitam kiñci assa ati anārammaṇam yaḥ dhammaḥ aññena payogena

original: pahīnopi samudayapahāne asati apahīnova hoti. Puna avassaṃ uppajjamānattā. Appahīnopi

original: appahātabbonāma. Rūpaṃpi edisameva hotīti vuttaṃ appahātabba mevāti. Aṭṭhānattā pahāna

original: vāyāmaṃ na arahatīti attho. Athavā, vinā samudayapahānena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho.
analyzed: vāyāmam na arahati iti attho athavā vinā samudaya pahānena pahātum asakkuṇeyyaḥ ti attho

original: Yadi evaṃ rūpaṃ bhikkhave na tumhākaṃ. Taṃ pajahatha. Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ dīgharattaṃ
analyzed: yadi evam rūpam bhikkhave na tumhākam tam pajahatha tam vaḥ pahīnam dīgharattam

original: atthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavissatīti idaṃ kathanti. Taṃpi tabbisayassa rāgassa pahānaṃ

original: sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha –

original: Rūpe kho rādha yo chando, yo rāgo, yānandī, yā taṇhā, taṃ pajahatha. Evaṃ taṃrūpaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati ucchinnamūlaṃ tālāvatthukataṃ anabhāvaṃkataṃ āyatiṃ anuppādadhammanti.
analyzed: rūpe kho rādha yaḥ chandaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ yā ānandī yā taṇhā tam pajahatha evam taṃrūpam pahīnam bhavissati ucchinna mūlam tālā vatthukatam anabhāvaṃkatam āyatim an uppāda dhammanti

original: Ayaṃ nayo aññesupi kusalādīsu appahātabbesu veditabboti. Evasaddo cettha purimapadesupi

analyzed: saṅgaṇhāti tassa tassa puggalassa atta bhāva pariyāpannaḥ dhamma samūhaḥ ajjhattam nāma

original: Tasmiṃpica yattha taṇhāya atirekataraṃ daḷhapariggaho hoti. So cakkhādiko cittena

original: saha chabbidho dhammo ajjhattiko nāma. Ajjhatte vidito pākaṭoti katvā. Tathā hi so

original: ajjhattajjhattantipi vutto. Itarāni pana rūpādini phassādīnica tadupādāya taṇhāpariggahassa
analyzed: vuttaḥ itarāni pana rūpa ādini phassa ādīni ca tat upādāya taṇhā pariggahassa

original: mandattā bāhirāni nāma. Yathā hi loke maṇivā suvaṇṇaṃvā rajataṃvā bahigehe nidahitvā

original: thapitaṃ hoti. Pacchivā suppaṃvā ghaṭovā sarāvovā anto gehe thapito. Tattha pacchimāni
analyzed: thapitam hoti pacchivā suppam vā ghaṭaḥ vā sarāvaḥ vā antar gehe thapitaḥ tattha pacchimāni

original: chaḍḍetvāpi purimāni rakkhanti. Tasmā tāneva taṇhāpariggahadaḷhatāya antoparibhogātveva
analyzed: chaḍḍetvā api purimāni rakkhanti tasmā tān eva taṇhā pariggaha daḷha tāya

original: vuccanti. Pacchimāni pana bāhira paribhogātveva. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Idhapi
analyzed: vuccanti pacchimāni pana evam sampadam idam daṭṭhabbam idha api

original: hi yadi sakkuṇeyya. Rūpādīni phassādinica sabbāni chaḍḍetvāpi cakkhādikaṃ chabbidhameva

original: avassaṃ rakkhissantīti. Iti taṇhā pariggahassa daḷhamandatā vaseneva tesaṃ dvinnaṃ

original: ajjhattika bāhiratā vuttā. Na pavattidesavasenāti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
analyzed: ajjhattika bāhira tā vuttā na pavatti desa vasena ati niṭṭham ettha gantabbam

original: [185] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Ajjhattikarūpaṃ atthabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattattā. Kāmaṃ

original: aññepi ajjhattasambhūtā atthi. Ruḷhīvasena pana cakkhādikameva ajjhattikanti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
analyzed: aññe pi ajjhatta sambhūtāḥ atthi ruḷhī vasena pana cakkha ādikam eva ajjhattikanti vuttam tat na sundaram

original: [186] Yañca tattha
analyzed: yañca tattha

original: “Attasaṅkhātaṃpā cittaṃ adhikicca tassa dvārabhāvena pavattatīthi ajjhattaṃ. Tadeva ajjhattikanti” vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.

original: Tasmiṃ atthe hi sati cittassa ajjhattatā na sampajjati. Ajjhattadhamma ajjhattikammonañca aviseso āpajjatīti.

original: Yaṃ pana tattha
analyzed: yam pana tattha

original: Athavā yadi mayaṃ na homa, tvaṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamo bhavissatīti vadantā viya attabhāvassa sātisayaṃ upakārakattā cakkhādineva visesato ajjhattikānīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ yuttataraṃ.

original: Tathā upakārātisayattāeva hi tesu sattānaṃ pariggaha daḷhatā hotīti. Sattavidhaṃpi

original: dvārarūpaṃnāma. Yathākkamaṃ vīthi cittānaṃ pāṇātipātādikammānañca pavattimukhattā.
analyzed: yathākkamam cittānam pāṇātipāta ādi kammānam ca pavatti mukha ttā

original: Tattha pana pañca vidhaṃ pasādarūpaṃ upapattidvāraṃnāma. Viññattidvayaṃ kammadvāraṃnāmāti
analyzed: tattha pana pañca vidham pasāda rūpam upapatti dvāram nāma viññatti dvayam kamma dvāram nāma ati

original: oḷārikarūpaṃ pakatiyā thūlasabhāvattā ghaṭṭanasaṅkhātassaca attano kiccassa oḷārikattā.
analyzed: oḷārika rūpam pakatiyā thūla sabhāvattā ghaṭṭana saṅkhātassa ca attano kiccassa oḷārika ttā

original: Santikerūpaṃ dūre pavattassapi sīghataraṃ ñāṇena gahaṇayogyattā. Sappaṭigharūpañcāti
