original: te pana kalāpā paramāṇuparimāṇā hontīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ dhātūnaṃ cuṇṇamanasikārānurūpamattavasena
analyzed: te pana kalāpā paramāṇu parimāṇāḥ honti iti vuttam tam dhātūnam cuṇṇa manasikāra anurūpa matta vasena

original: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Dutīyacittanti pathama bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Ṭhitikālanti paṭisandhi
analyzed: vuttanti gahetabbam dutīya cittanti bhavaṅga cittam ṭhiti kālanti paṭisandhi

original: cittassa ṭhitikālaṃ. Ojāpharaṇamupādāyāti gabbhaseyyakānaṃ tāva abbudabhāva pesibhāva
analyzed: cittassa ṭhiti kālam ojā pharaṇam upādāya ati gabbhaseyyakānam tāva abbuda bhāva pesi bhāva

original: ghanabhāvādi pattakāle mātuyā āmāsayagatāya ajjhohaṭāhāra sinehabhūtāya ojāya jalābumūlā
analyzed: ghana bhāva ādi patta kāle mātuyā sineha bhūtāya ojāya

original: nusārena vatthusmiṃ pharaṇakālaṃ upādāya, yathāha –
analyzed: anusārena vatthusmim pharaṇa kālam upādāya yathā āha

original: Yañcassa bhuñjati mātā, annaṃ pānañca bhojanaṃ;
analyzed: yat ca assa bhuñjati mātā annam pānam ca bhojanam

original: Tena so tattha yāpeti, mātukucchigato tiroti.
analyzed: tena saḥ tattha yāpeti mātukucchi gataḥ tiroti

original: Aṭṭhakathāyañca tena so tattha yāpetīti tassa hi nātito uṭṭhito nāḷo mātuudara paṭalena
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam ca tena so tattha yāpeti iti tassa hi uṭṭhitaḥ nāḷaḥ mātuudara paṭalena

original: ekābaddho hoti. So uppaladaṇḍako viya chiddo. Tena āhāraraso saṃsaritvā āhārasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ
analyzed: eka ābaddhaḥ hoti saḥ uppala daṇḍakaḥ viya chiddo tena āhāra rasaḥ saṃsaritvā āhāra samuṭṭhāna rūpam

original: samuṭṭhāpeti. Evaṃ so dasamāse yāpeti. Mātukucchigato tiroti mātuyā tiro kucchigato.
analyzed: samuṭṭhāpeti evam saḥ dasa māse yāpeti mātu kucchi gataḥ mātuyā tiras kucchi gataḥ

original: Mātukucchiyā abbhantaragatoti atthoti vuttaṃ. Tattha pana nābhināḷassa uṭṭhitakālaṃ
analyzed: mātukucchiyāḥ abbhantara gataḥ ti atthaḥ ti vuttam tattha pana nābhināḷassa uṭṭhita kālam

original: sandhāya nātito uṭṭhito nāḷoti vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Na hi abbudādikāle tassa nātināḷonāma
analyzed: sandhāya nātitas uṭṭhitaḥ nāḷo ti vuttanti gahetabbam na hi abbuda ādi kāle tassa na atināḷo nāma

original: uṭṭhito siyāti. Saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ pana yaṃkiñci laddhaṃvā attano kheḷaṃvā ajjhoharaṇakāle
analyzed: uṭṭhitaḥ siyāti saṃseda ja upapātikānam pana yaṃ kiñci laddham vā attano kheḷam vā ajjhoharaṇa kāle

original: ojāpharaṇaṃ upādāya. Tena vuttaṃ ojāpharaṇamupādāyaāhārasamuṭṭhānāti. Cuticittopari
analyzed: ojā pharaṇam upādāya tena vuttam ojā pharaṇam upādāya āhāra samuṭṭhānā ati cuti citta upari

original: sattarasamacittassāti cuticittato upari pubbakāle sattarasamassa bhavaṅgacittassa.
analyzed: sattarasama cittassa ati cuti cittato upari pubba kāle sattarasamassa bhavaṅga cittassa

original: Kammajarūpāni na uppajjanti tesaṃ tato paṭṭhāya anuppannattāyeva tato satta rasamaṃ
analyzed: kamma ja rūpāni na uppajjanti tesam tatas paṭṭhāya an uppanna ttāya iva tatas satta

original: cuticittaṃnāma hoti. No aññathāti. Puretaranti tassa sattarasamassa cittassa uppādakkhaṇaṃeva
analyzed: cuti cittaṃ nāma hoti no aññathā ati puretaran ti tassa sattarasamassa cittassa uppāda kkhaṇaṃ eva

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tatoparanti cuticittato parasmiṃ soḷasacittakkhaṇaparimāṇe khaṇe.
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam cuti cittataḥ parasmin soḷasa citta khaṇa parimāṇe khaṇe

original: Cittajāhārajarūpañcāti cittajarūpasantānaṃ āhāraja rūpasantānañca vocchijjati anupādinnakasantāne
analyzed: citta ja āhāra ja rūpam ca ati citta ja rūpa santānam āhāra ja rūpa santānam ca vā ucchijjati an upādinnaka santāne

original: tesaṃ uppattiyā asambhavato. Yamettha vattabbaṃ taṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāne vuttameva. Bhāvadasakaṃnāma
analyzed: tesam uppattiyāḥ asambhavataḥ yam ettha vattabbam tam rūpa samuṭṭhāne vuttam eva bhāvadasakam nāma

original: kāmarāganidānakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti tabbirāga bhāvanākammanibbatte rūpaloke tassa
analyzed: kāma rāga nidāna kamma samuṭṭhānam hoti iti tad virāga bhāvanā kamma nibbatte rūpa loke tassa

original: alābho vutto. Āhārajakalāpānica na labbhanti ajjhohaṭā hārā bhāvato, tatoyevaca sarīragatassa
analyzed: alābhaḥ vuttaḥ āhāra ja kalāpāni ca na labbhanti ajjhohaṭāḥ hārāḥ bhāvato sarīra gatassa

original: ajjhattāhārassapi rūpasamuṭṭhānā bhāvato. Ācariyānandatthero pana tattha labbhamāna
analyzed: ajjhatta āhārassa api rūpa samuṭṭhānā bhāvato ācariya ānanda thero pana tattha

original: rūpakalāpesupi gandharasānaṃ ojāyaca abhāvaṃ vaṇṇeti. Rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe
analyzed: rūpa kalāpesu pi gandha rasānaṃ ojāya ca abhāvam rūpadhātuyāḥ upapatti kkhaṇe

original: pañcāyatanāni pātubhavanti cakkhāyatanaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ, sotā yatanaṃ, manā yatanaṃ,
analyzed: pañca āyatanāni pātubhavanti cakkhāyatanam rūpa āyatanam sotā yatanam manā yatanam

original: dhammāyatananti ca, pañcadhātuyo pātubhavanti cakkhudhātu, rūpadhātu, sotadhātu,
analyzed: dhammāyatananti ca pañca dhātuyo pātubhavanti cakkhu dhātu rūpa dhātu sota dhātu

original: manoviññāṇa dhātu, dhammadhātūtica, tayo āhārā pātubhavanti phassāhāro, manosañcetanā
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu dhammadhātu uti ca tayo āhārā pātubhavanti phassa āhāraḥ manaḥ sañcetanā

original: hāro, viññāṇā hāroti ca vibhaṅgevuttattā. Etthaca pāḷiyaṃ rūpaloke phoṭṭhabbe paṭikkhittepi
analyzed: hāraḥ viññāṇā hāraḥ ti ca vibhaṅga iva utta ttā ettha ca pāḷiyam rūpa loke phoṭṭhabbe paṭikkhitte api

original: kiccantarasabbhāvā mahābhūtānaṃ tattha paṭilābho avārito eva hoti. Gandhādīnaṃ pana
analyzed: mahābhūtānam tattha paṭilābhaḥ a vāritaḥ eva hoti gandha ādīnam pana

original: kiccantarameva natthi. Yena te dhammamattabhāvepi tiṭṭheyyaṃ tasmā tesaṃ avacanaṃ
analyzed: kicca antaram eva natthi yena te dhamma matta bhāve pi tiṭṭheyyam tasmā tesam avacanam

original: tattha abhāvameva dīpetīti ācariyassa adhippāyo. Tathā pana bhūtacatukkaṃ tattha
analyzed: tattha abhāvam eva dīpeti iti ācariyassa adhippāyaḥ tathā pana bhūta catukkam tattha

original: atthiyeva, yathāha-asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtātiādi. Phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ
analyzed: ekam mahābhūtam paṭicca tayaḥ mahābhūta ati ādi phoṭṭhabba āyatanam

original: pana phoṭṭhabba dhātuca tattha paṭikkhittā. Tasmā sabbesaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ dhammabhāve
analyzed: pana phoṭṭhabba dhātu ca tattha paṭikkhittā tasmā sabbesam sabhāva dhammānam dhamma bhāve

original: samānepi yena kiccavisesena gandho raso phoṭṭhabbaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārotica vuccati. Tassa
analyzed: samāne pi yena kicca visesena gandhaḥ rasaḥ phoṭṭhabbam kabaḷīkāra āhāraḥ ti ca vuccati tassa

original: natthitāya tesaṃ tena nāme na tattha anupalabbhamānataṃ sandhāya vibhaṅge kathāvatthumhi
analyzed: tesam tena nāme na tattha anupalabbhamāna tam sandhāya vibhaṅge kathā vatthumhi

original: yamake sūti sabbattha tesaṃ tattha paṭikkhepo. Mahābhūtānaṃ pana nisanda dhammamattabhāvena
analyzed: yamake su ti sabbattha tesam tattha paṭikkhepaḥ mahābhūtānam pana nisanda dhamma matta bhāvena

original: vijjamānānaṃ tesaṃ dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu anupavesoti yutto siyāti vadanti. Tīṇidasakāni
analyzed: vijjamānānam tesam dhamma āyatana dhammadhātūsu anupavesaḥ ti yuttaḥ siyā ti vadanti tīṇidasakāni

original: jīvitanavakañcāti ettha ācariyānanda matiyā cakkhusattakaṃ sotasattakaṃ vatthusattakanti
analyzed: jīvita navakam ca ati ettha ācariya ānanda matiyā cakkhu sattakam sota sattakam vatthu sattakam ti

original: evaṃ tīṇi sattakāni jīvitachakkañcāti vattabbaṃ. Abhiricchatīti alabbhamāne pathamaṃ
analyzed: evam tīṇi sattakāni jīvita chakkam ca ati vattabbam abhiricchati iti a labbhamāne pathamam

original: vajjite tattha labbhamānatāvasena avasissati. Atirekaṃvā hotīti attho. Etthaca rūpaloke
analyzed: vajjite tattha labbhamāna tā vasena avasissati atirekam vā hoti iti atthaḥ ettha ca rūpa loke

original: viya kāmaloke jīvitanavakaṃ kasmā visuṃ na vuttanti. Rūpaloke pana āhārupatthambhakassa
analyzed: viya kāma loke jīvita navakam kasmā visum na vuttan ti rūpa loke pana āhāra upatthambhakassa

original: aññassaca sakalasarīrabyāpino anupālaka jīvitassa abhāvā etadeva tadubhayaṭṭhāne
analyzed: aññassa ca sakala sarīra byāpinaḥ jīvitassa abhāvā etat eva tad ubhaya ṭṭhāne

original: ṭhatvā sakalasarīraṃ anupāletīti pākaṭaṃ tattha jīvitanavakanti visuṃ vuttaṃ. Kāmaloke
analyzed: ṭhatvā sakala sarīram anupāleti iti pākaṭam tattha jīvita navakam ti visum vuttam kāmaloke

original: pana aññāni upatthambhakā nupālakāni bahūni pākaṭānica honti. Tasmā jīvitanavakaṃ
analyzed: pana aññāni upatthambhaka a nupālakāni bahūni pākaṭāni ca honti tasmā jīvita navakam

original: apākaṭanti katvā visuṃ na vuttaṃ siyā. Kāmalokepi pana etaṃ asitādipācakaggivasena
analyzed: apākaṭanti katvā visum na vuttam siyā kāmaloke pi pana etam asita ādi pācaka aggi vasena

original: tassevaca udayabhūtassa sakalasarī rānupālakassa usmāsaṅkhātassa kāyaggino vasena
analyzed: tassa iva ca udaya bhūtassa sakala sarīra anupālakassa usmā saṅkhātassa kāyagginaḥ vasena

original: pākaṭameva. Yaṃ sandhāya –
analyzed: pākaṭam eva yam sandhāya

original: Āyu usmāca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
analyzed: āyuḥ usmā ca viññāṇam yadā kāyam jahanti imam

original: Apaviddho tadā seti, niratthaṃva kaliṅgaranti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: apaviddhaḥ tadā sa iti vuttam

original: Tattha āyūti tesu dvīsu aggīsu patiṭṭhitaṃ jīvitameva vuccati. Usmāti te dve aggayo
analyzed: tattha āyu iti tesu dvīsu aggīsu patiṭṭhitam jīvitam eva vuccati te dve aggayo

original: vuccanti. Yesu tikkhamandavasena visama bhūtesu kāye nānābādhā uppajjanti. Yathāha-bahvābādho
analyzed: vuccanti yesu tikkha manda vasena bhūtesu kāye nānā ābādhāḥ uppajjanti

original: hoti bahvātaṅko. Visamavepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannā gato hoti atiuṇhāyaatisītalāyāti.
analyzed: hoti bahu ātaṅkaḥ visama vepākiniyā gahaṇiyā samannā gataḥ hoti ati uṇhāya ati sītalāya ati

original: Samabhūtesu pana sattā nirābādhā honti. Yathāha-appābādho hoti. Appātaṅko. Samavepākiniyāgahaṇiyā
analyzed: sama bhūtesu pana sattāḥ nirābādhāḥ honti yathā āha appa ābādhaḥ hoti appa ātaṅkaḥ

original: samannāgatohoti. Nātisītāya naccuṇhāya majjhimāya padhānakkhamāyāti. Keci pana asitādipācakaggismiṃ
analyzed: na ati sītāya na cuṇhāya majjhimāya padhāna kkhamāya ati keci pana asita ādi pācakaggismin

original: eva etaṃmaññanti. Therenacanāmarūpaparicchedejīvitanavakaṃ nāma, rūpaloke visuṃ siyāti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: eva etam maññanti therena ca nāma rūpa paricchede jīvita navakam nāma rūpa loke visum siyā ti vuttam

original: Visuddhimagge pana sesesu catusamuṭṭhānesu aṭṭhasu jīvitanava kañceva tīṇi ojaṭṭhamakāni
analyzed: visuddhi magge pana sesesu catu samuṭṭhānesu aṭṭhasu tīṇi oja ṭṭhamakāni

original: cāti tettiṃsa tettiṃsa rūpāni pākaṭāni hontīti vuttaṃ. Tattha aṭṭhasūti pācakaggiassāsa
analyzed: ca ati tettiṃsa tettiṃsa rūpāni pākaṭāni honti iti vuttam tattha aṭṭhasūti

original: passāsavajjitesu tīsu tejokoṭṭhāsesu pañcasu vāyo koṭṭhāsesūti aṭṭhasu. Iti kāmalokepi
analyzed: passāsa vajjitesu tīsu tejaḥ koṭṭhāsesu pañcasu vāyo koṭṭhāsesu uti aṭṭhasu iti kāmaloke pi

original: sakalasarīrabyāpīsu tejovāyo koṭṭhāsesu labbhamānattā etaṃ sakala sarīreeva daṭṭhabbanti.
analyzed: sakala sarīra byāpīsu etam daṭṭhabbanti

original: Ettha siyā, kasmā panettha kāmaloke viya rūpaloke rūpakalāpānaṃ nirodhakkamo na vuttoti.
analyzed: ettha siyā kasmā pana ittha kāma loke viya rūpa loke rūpa kalāpānam nirodha kkamaḥ na vuttaḥ ti

original: Visesābhāvato, rūpalokepi hi maraṇakāle pana cuticitto pari sattarasamacittassa ṭhitikāla
analyzed: visesa abhāvataḥ rūpa loke pi hi maraṇa kāle pana cuti cittaḥ pari sattarasama cittassa ṭhiti kāla

original: mupādāya kammajarūpāni nuppajjantītiādiko nirodhakkamo kāmalokasadisoyeva. Kevalaṃ
analyzed: m upādāya kamma ja rūpāni nu ppajjanti iti ādikaḥ nirodha kkamaḥ kāma loka sadisaḥ yā iva kevalam

original: panettha āhārajarūpa nirodhonāma natthi, tathā kaḷevara nikkhepoca. Tasmā tatthapi
analyzed: pana ittha āhāra ja rūpa nirodho nāma natthi tathā kaḷevara nikkhepo ca tasmā tattha pi

original: cuticittato paraṃ soḷasacittakkhaṇa parimāṇe ekasmiṃ khaṇe cittajarūpasantānaṃ vocchijjati.
analyzed: cuti cittataḥ param soḷasa citta kkhaṇa parimāṇe ekasmin khaṇe citta ja rūpa santānam vā ucchijjati

original: Tato paraṃ utusamuṭṭhānarūpaparaṃparā ekadviti accharākālamattaṃpi pavattitvā vocchijjatīti
analyzed: tatas param utu samuṭṭhāna rūpa paraṃparā pavattitvā vā ucchijjati iti

original: yuttaṃ. Naca ettakamattena kālena pavattamānāyapi rūpasantatiyā matakaḷevaraṃnāma
analyzed: yuttam na ca ettakam attena kālena rūpa santatiyā

original: sakkā laddhuṃ. Passantānaṃ ekakkhaṇena viya sarīrassa antaradhānassa paññāyanatoti.
analyzed: sakkā laddhum passantānam eka khaṇena viya sarīrassa antaradhānassa paññāyanato ti

original: Yathāca rūpaloke, tathā kāmalokepi upapattidevānaṃ aññesañca opapātikānanti. Tesañhi
analyzed: yathā ca rūpa loke tathā kāma loke pi upapatti devānam aññesam ca opapātikānan ti tesam hi

original: sarīrāni paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva sabbaso paripuṇṇena kammajakāyena nibbattattā kammajarūpehi
analyzed: sarīrāni paṭisandhi khaṇeya iva sabbaso paripuṇṇena kamma ja kāyena nibbatta ttā kamma ja rūpehi

original: ghanapūritāni sallahukabharāni ca honti. Itararūpāni kammajarūpesu patiṭṭhāya pavattanti.
analyzed: ghana pūritāni sat lahuka bharāni ca honti itara rūpāni kamma ja rūpesu patiṭṭhāya pavattanti

original: Tasmā tesaṃ cutikāle kammajarūpesu niruddhesu tāni tinna patiṭṭhāni hutvā ciraṃ santānaṃ
analyzed: tasmā tesam cuti kāle kamma ja rūpesu niruddhesu tāni tinna patiṭṭhāni hutvā ciram santānam

original: ghaṭṭetuṃ nasakkonti. Thokaṃ pavattitvā sabbaso nirujjhanti. Sarīranikkheponāma tesaṃ
analyzed: ghaṭṭetum na sakkonti thokam pavattitvā sabbaso nirujjhanti sarīra nikkhepaḥ nāma tesam

original: natthīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: na atthi iti daṭṭhabbam

original: [203] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Maraṇakāle pana brahmānaṃ sarīranikkhepābhāvato sabbesaṃpi tisamuṭṭhānāni dvisamuṭṭhānānica saheva nirujjhantī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
analyzed: maraṇa kāle pana brahmānam sarīra nikkhepa abhāvato sabbesam pi ti samuṭṭhānāni dvi samuṭṭhānāni ca saha iva nirujjhanti iti vuttam tat na sundaram

original: Evañhi sati sabbesaṃ rūpabrahmānaṃ maraṇāsannacittāni rūpaṃ nasamuṭṭhāpentīti āpajjati.
analyzed: evam hi sati sabbesam rūpa brahmānam maraṇa āsanna cittāni rūpam na samuṭṭhāpenti iti āpajjati

original: Na hi maraṇāsanna citta samuṭṭhitāni rūpāni kammajarūpehi saheva nirujjhantīti sakkā
analyzed: na hi maraṇa āsanna citta samuṭṭhitāni rūpāni kamma ja rūpehi saha iva nirujjhanti iti sakkā

original: vattunti. Yathācatāni kammajarūpanirodhato thokaṃ pavattitvā nirujjhanti. Tathā utujarūpānipi
analyzed: vattum ti kamma ja rūpa nirodhataḥ thokam nirujjhanti tathā utu ja rūpāni pi

original: cittajarūpanirodhato thokaṃ pavattitvā nirujjhantīti na na sakkā viññātuṃ. Naca tāvattakena
analyzed: citta ja rūpa nirodhataḥ thokam pavattitvā nirujjhanti iti na na sakkā viññātum na ca tāvattakena

original: kālena tesu pavatta mānesupi sarīranikkheponāma sakkā bhavitunti. Brahmānaṃ pana
analyzed: kālena tesu sarīra nikkhepaḥ nāma sakkā bhavitum ti brahmānam pana

original: thina middhādīnaṃ nīvaraṇajātiyānaṃ atthitāya tadanurūpaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ tadanugatikānañca
analyzed: nīvaraṇa jātiyānam tad anurūpam

original: utujarūpānaṃ lahukagarukatādivikāro na na sambhavatīti lahutādittayaṃpi gahetvā vuttaṃ
analyzed: lahuka garuka tā ādi vikāraḥ na na sambhavati iti gahetvā vuttam

original: tevīsarūpesūti. Ghānādittayabhāvadvayavajjāni tevīsarūpāni honti. Tāniyeva cakkhu
analyzed: tevīsarūpesu iti ghāna ādi ttaya bhāva dvaya vajjāni tevīsarūpāni honti cakkhu

original: sotavatthu viññattidvayavajjāni asaññīnaṃ sattaraseva rūpāni hontīti yojanā. Asaññīnaṃ
analyzed: sotavatthu viññatti dvaya vajjāni asaññīnam sattarasa iva rūpāni honti iti yojanā asaññīnam

original: pana garulahutādipakāro cinte tabbo. Na vā cintetabbo rūpadhammānaṃ ruppanavikārassa
analyzed: pana garulahuta ādi pakāraḥ cinte tabbaḥ na vā cintetabbaḥ rūpa dhammānam ruppana vikārassa

original: bahukāraṇattāti. Upapattiyanti kāmarūpāsaññīnaṃ paṭisandhiyā uppādakkhaṇe. Uppādakkhaṇoeva
analyzed: bahu kāraṇa ttā ati upapattiyanti kāmarūpa asaññīnam paṭisandhiyā uppāda khaṇe uppāda khaṇaḥ eva

original: hi ekantena upapattikhaṇonāma hotīti. Pavattetūti paṭisandhiyā ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: hi ekantena upapatti khaṇaḥ nāma hoti iti pavattetu uti paṭisandhiyā ṭhiti khaṇataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: sakale pavattikāle pana nakiñcipi nalabbhati. Labbhatiyevāti adhippāyo. Na hi idaṃnāma
analyzed: sakale pavatti kāle pana na kiñcipi na labbhati labbhatiyā iva ati adhippāyaḥ na hi idaṃnāma

original: rūpaṃ pavatte nalabbhati. Paṭisandhiyaṃeva labbhatīti atthīti. [Rūpapavattikkamo]
analyzed: rūpam pavatte na labbhati paṭisandhiyam eva labbhati iti atthi iti rūpa pavatti kkamaḥ

original: 161. Evaṃ cittacetasika rūpasaṅgahaṃ katvā idāni yathā nuppattaṃ nibbānasaṅgahaṃ
analyzed: evam rūpa saṅgaham katvā idāni yathā nu pattam nibbāna saṅgaham

original: karonto nibbānaṃpanātiādi māha. Nibbānaṃ pana nibbānanti pavuccatīti sambandho. Lokuttarasaṅkhātanti
analyzed: karontaḥ nibbānam pana ati ādi mā āha nibbānam pana nibbānanti pavuccati iti sambandhaḥ lokuttara saṅkhātanti

original: lokuttaranti bhagavatā kathitaṃ, yathāha-katame dhammā lokuttarā. Cattāroca ariyamaggā
analyzed: lokuttaram iti bhagavatā kathitam yathā āha katame dhammā lokuttarā cattāro ca ariya maggā

original: cattārica sāmaññaphalāni asaṅkhatāca dhātu, ime dhammā lokuttarāti. Etena nibbānassa
analyzed: cattāri ca sāmañña phalāni asaṅkhatā ca dhātu ime dhammā lokuttarā ti etena nibbānassa

original: paññattimattabhāvaṃ nivatteti. Na hi lokavohārasiddhā paññatti lokuttarānāma sakkā
analyzed: paññatti matta bhāvam nivatteti na hi lokavohāra siddhā paññatti lokuttarā nāma sakkā

original: bhavitunti. Catumaggañāṇena sacchikātabbanti cakkhumantena candamaṇḍalaṃviya cakkhunā
analyzed: bhavitum ti catu magga ñāṇena sacchikātabbanti cakkhumantena canda maṇḍalam viya cakkhunā

original: paṭiladdhamaggañāṇehi ariyajanehi catūhi ariyamaggañāṇehi paccakkhato daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: paṭiladdha magga ñāṇehi ariya janehi catūhi ariya magga ñāṇehi paccakkhataḥ daṭṭhabbam

original: Paṭivijjhitabbanti attho. Tattha catumaggañāṇenāti etena tādi samhā paṭipattimaggato
analyzed: paṭivijjhitabbanti atthaḥ tattha catu magga ñāṇena āti etena tādi samhā paṭipatti maggato

original: vimukhānaṃ andhaputhujjanānaṃ jaccandhānaṃ viya canda maṇḍalassa tassa avisayabhāvaṃ
analyzed: vimukhānam andha puthujjanānam jad candhānam viya canda maṇḍalassa tassa avisaya bhāvam

original: dasseti. Na ca jaccandhānaṃ cakkhumhi anupaladdhamattena candamaṇḍalaṃ natthināma
analyzed: dasseti na ca canda maṇḍalam

original: hotīti. Sacchikātabbanti etena paramatthato vijjamānabhāvaṃ dasseti. Yañhi kiñci
analyzed: hoti iti sacchikātabbanti etena paramatthataḥ vijjamāna bhāvam dasseti yat hi kiñci

original: paramatthato vijjamānaṃ nahoti. Taṃ sarūpato kassa paccakkhaṃnāma bhavissatīti. Tadubhayena
analyzed: paramatthataḥ vijjamānam nahoti tam sarūpataḥ kassa paccakkhaṃnāma bhavissati iti tad ubhayena

original: panassa paññavantānaṃ kalyāṇakaputhujjanānaṃ anumānato siddhataṃ dīpeti, na hi anumānatopi
analyzed: panassa paññavantānam kalyāṇaka puthujjanānam anumānataḥ siddha tam dīpeti na hi anumānataḥ pi

original: attano buddhiyaṃ asiddhassa apākaṭassa sacchikiriyāya vāyāmopināma atthi. Yena sacchikiriyā
analyzed: attanaḥ buddhiyam asiddhassa apākaṭassa sacchikiriyāya atthi yena sacchikiriyā

original: siddhiyāti. Evaṃ nibbānassa paramatthato vijjamānataṃ dassetvā idāni kevalaṃ vijjamānamattameva
analyzed: siddhiyā ti evam nibbānassa paramatthataḥ vijjamāna tam dassetvā idāni kevalam vijjamāna mattam eva

original: na hoti. Athakho mahātejavantaṃ mahojavantañca taṃ hotīti dassetuṃ maggaphalānamālambaṇabhūtanti
analyzed: na hoti athakho mahā tejavantam mahojavantam ca tam hoti iti dassetum magga phalānam ālambaṇa bhūtam ti

original: vuttaṃ. Etena nibbānena vināmagga phalānaṃ akiccasiddhiṃ dasseti. Tato tassa mahātejavanta
analyzed: vuttam etena nibbānena phalānam akicca siddhim dasseti tatas tassa

original: taṃ mahojavantatañca dīpeti. Yathā hi mahiddhiko eko rājā hoti. Tassa raṭṭhe ekasmiṃ
analyzed: tam dīpeti yathā hi mahiddhikaḥ ekaḥ rājā hoti tassa raṭṭhe ekasmin

original: mahāgāme eko gāmabhojako ekoca corajeṭṭhako mahāparivāro vasati. Teca aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: mahā gāme ekaḥ gāma bhojakaḥ ekaḥ ca cora jeṭṭhakaḥ mahā parivāraḥ vasati te ca aññam aññam

original: vadhāya parisakkantā vicaranti. Tattha gāmabhojako nagaraṃ gantvā rājānaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
analyzed: vadhāya parisakkantāḥ vicaranti tattha gāmabhojakaḥ nagaram gantvā rājānam upaṭṭhahi

original: So na cirasseva rājavallabho hoti. Rājato mahatiṃ āṇaṃ labhati. Taṃ sutvā corajeṭṭhako
analyzed: saḥ na cirassa iva rāja vallabhaḥ hoti rājataḥ mahatim āṇam labhati tam sutvā cora jeṭṭhakaḥ

original: idāni idhavasantassa mamajīvitaṃ natthīti attano parivārena saddhiṃ aṭṭaviṃ paviṭṭho.
analyzed: idāni idha vasantassa mama jīvitam na atthi iti attanaḥ parivārena saddhim aṭṭavim paviṭṭhaḥ

original: Gāmabhojakoca taṃaṭṭaviṃ paviṭṭhaṃpi muñcituṃ adatvā gahetvā vadhi. Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ
analyzed: muñcitum a datvā gahetvā evam sampadam idam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahiddhikarājā viya hi nibbānaṃ. Gāma bhojako viya ñāṇaṃ. Corajeṭṭhako
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam mahiddhika rājā viya hi nibbānam gāma bhojakaḥ viya ñāṇam cora jeṭṭhakaḥ

original: viya moho. Parivāra corā viya sesakilesā. Pubbe rañño anupaṭṭhā nakāle gāmabhojako
analyzed: viya mohaḥ parivāra corāḥ viya sesa kilesā pubbe rañño anupaṭṭhā na kāle gāma bhojako

original: viya puthujjanañāṇaṃ. Upaṭṭhānakāle gāma bhojako viya maggañāṇanti. Taṇhā pavattamānā
analyzed: viya puthujjana ñāṇam upaṭṭhāna kāle gāma bhojakaḥ viya magga ñāṇan ti taṇhā pavattamānā

original: ajjhattabahiddhādi bhedesu khandhādidhammesu vinandhamānāva pavattati. Yathāha –
analyzed: ajjhatta bahiddhā ādi bhedesu khandha ādi dhammesu vinandhamānā ava pavattati yathā āha

original: Antojaṭā bahijaṭā, jaṭāya jaṭitā pajāti.
analyzed: antojaṭā bahijaṭā jaṭāya jaṭitā pajāti

original: Tasmā sā veḷugumbe veḷusākhā viya vinanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena vānasamaññaṃ labhatīti
analyzed: tasmā sā veḷu gumbe veḷu sākhā viya vinana ṭṭhena saṃsibbana ṭṭhena vāna samaññam labhati iti

original: vuttaṃ vānasaṅkhātāyataṇhāyāti. Nikkhantattāti nissaṭattā. Tassā visayabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā
analyzed: vuttam vāna saṅkhātāya taṇhāya ati nikkhanta ttā ati nissaṭa ttā tassāḥ visaya bhāvam atikkamitvā

original: ṭhitattāti attho. Etena vānato nikkhantanti nibbānanti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Sabhāvatoti
analyzed: ṭhita ttā ti atthaḥ etena vānataḥ nikkhantanti nibbānanti imam attham dasseti sabhāvato ti

original: santilakkhaṇena. Ajjhattasambhūtānaṃ tividhavaṭṭasantāpānaṃ nibbutiatthena. Tesaṃ
analyzed: santi lakkhaṇena ajjhatta sambhūtānam tividha vaṭṭa santāpānam nibbuti atthena tesam

original: sabbaso abhāvaṭṭhenāti attho. Ekavidhaṃpīti yathā cittaṃ sabhāvato ekavidhaṃpi jātidhammattā
analyzed: sabbasas abhāva ṭṭhena ati attho ekavidham pi iti yathā cittam sabhāvataḥ ekavidham api jāti dhamma ttā

original: jātibhūmisampayogādi bhedena kāla disādesapuggalabhedenaca vatthuto bhinnameva hoti.
analyzed: jāti bhūmi sampayoga ādi bhedena kāla disa ādesa puggala bhedena ca vatthutaḥ bhinnam eva hoti

original: Na tathā idaṃ nibbānaṃ. Idaṃ pana sabhāvatopi vatthutopi abhinnameva hutvā ekavidhaṃ
analyzed: na tathā idam nibbānam idam pana sabhāvataḥ pi vatthutaḥ pi abhinnam eva hutvā ekavidham

original: hoti. Idañhi anamatagge saṃsāre atīte etarahi anāgateca parinibbutānaṃ buddhānaṃvā
analyzed: hoti idam hi anamatagge saṃsāre atīte etarahi anāgate ca parinibbutānam buddhānam vā

original: paccekabuddhānaṃvā buddhasāvakānaṃvā sabbesaṃpi ekameva hoti. Kasmā, aniddisitabbadhammattā.
analyzed: paccekabuddhānam vā buddhasāvakānam vā sabbesam pi ekam eva hoti kasmai a niddisitabba dhamma ttā

original: Viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ anantaṃ sabbatopabhanti hi bhagavatā vuttaṃ. Tattha viññāṇanti
analyzed: viññāṇam anidassanam anantam sabbata upabhanti hi bhagavatā vuttam tattha viññāṇanti

original: saṅkhatadhammānaṃ khayanirodhabhāvena siddhattā etaṃ tabbhāvenaeva suṭṭhu abhibyattaṃ
analyzed: saṅkhata dhammānam khaya nirodha bhāvena siddhattā etam tad bhāvena eva suṭṭhu abhibyattam

original: katvā ñātabbaṃ. Anidassananti animittadhammattā bālaputhujjanānaṃ dassanavisayabhūtena
analyzed: katvā ñātabbam anidassanam ti animitta dhamma ttā bāla puthujjanānam dassana visaya bhūtena

original: kenacinimittena nidassituṃvā kālabhedena disādesapuggalasantāna bhedena hīnapaṇītādibhedena
analyzed: kenacid nimittena nidassitum vā kāla bhedena disā desa puggala santāna bhedena hīna paṇīta ādi bhedena

original: ca bhinnaṃ katvā nidassituṃvā nārahatīti attho. Anantanti pubbantāparantavirahitaṃ.
analyzed: ca bhinnam katvā nidassitum vā na ārahati iti atthaḥ anantam ti pubba anta apara anta virahitam

original: Sabbatopabhanti vaṭṭadukkhapaṭipakkhasiddhehi anantehi guṇobhāsehi sabbato pabhāvantanti
analyzed: vaṭṭa dukkha paṭipakkha siddhehi anantehi guṇa ubhāsehi sabbatas

original: attho. Tathā aniddisitabbadhammattāca pana anamatagge saṃsāre sabbāsuca disāsu asukasmiṃ
analyzed: attho tathā a niddisitabba dhamma ttā ca pana anamatagge saṃsāre sabbāsu ca disāsu asukasmin

original: nāma kāle asukāyanāma disāya natthīti navattabbaṃ. Kasmā, ariyamaggaṃ bhāventena
analyzed: nāma kāle asukāya nāma disāya natthi iti na vattabbam kasmai ariya maggam bhāventena

original: yadā kadāci yattha katthaci avassaṃ adhigantabbatāvasena sabbadā sabbattha ca labbhamānattā.
analyzed: yadā kadāci yattha katthaci avassam adhigantabba tā vasena sabbadā sabbattha ca labbhamāna ttā

original: Vuttañhetaṃ vinaye, aṅguttare, udāneca –
analyzed: vuttam ha etam vinaye aṅguttare udāne ca

original: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yākāci loke savantiyo mahāsamuddaṃ appenti. Yāca antalikkhā
analyzed: seyyathā api bhikkhave yākāci loke savantiyaḥ mahā samuddam appenti yāca antalikkhā

original: dhārā papatanti. Na tena mahāsamuddassa ūnattaṃvā pūrattaṃvā paññāyati. Eva meva
analyzed: dhārā papatanti na tena mahā samuddassa ūnattam vā pūrattam vā paññāyati eva mā eva

original: kho bhikkhave bahūcepi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyanti. Na tena
analyzed: kho bhikkhave bahūce pi bhikkhū anupādisesāya nibbāna dhātuyā parinibbāyanti na tena

original: nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃvā paññāyatīti.
analyzed: nibbāna dhātuyāḥ ūnattam vā pūrattam vā paññāyati iti

original: Aṭṭhakathāsuca na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃvā pūrattaṃvā paññāyatīti asaṅkhyeyyepi
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāsu ca na tena nibbāna dhātuyāḥ ūnattam vā pūrattam vā paññāyati iti asaṅkhyeyye pi

original: mahākappe buddhesu anuppajjantesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ nasakkoti. Tadāpi tucchā
analyzed: mahākappe buddhesu an uppajjantesu eka sattaḥ api parinibbātum na sakkoti tadā api tucchā

original: nibbāna dhātūti nasakkā vattuṃ. Buddhakāle pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi
analyzed: nibbāna dhātū ti na sakkā vattum buddha kāle pana ekekasmin samāgame asaṅkhyeyyā api

original: sattā amataṃ ārādhenti. Tadāpi nasakkā vattuṃ pūrā nibbānadhātūti vuttaṃ. Brahmanimantanasutteca
analyzed: sattāḥ amatam ārādhenti tadā api na sakkā vattum pūrāḥ nibbāna dhātū iti vuttam brahmanimantanasutte ca

original: viññāṇaṃ anidassanaṃ anantaṃ sabbatopabhanti vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyañca sabbatopabhanti
analyzed: viññāṇam anidassanam anantam sabbatas upabhanti vuttam aṭṭhakathāyañca

original: sabbato pabhāsampannaṃ. Nibbānato hi añño koci dhammo pabhassaratarovā jotivantatarovā
analyzed: sabbatas pabhā sampannam nibbānataḥ hi aññaḥ koci dhammo pabhassarataraḥ vā jotivantataraḥ vā

original: parisuddhatarovā paṇḍara tarovā natthi. Sabbatovā pabhūtameva hoti. Nakatthaci natthīti
analyzed: natthi sabbatas vā pabhūtam eva hoti na katthaci natthi iti

original: sabbatopataṃ. Puratthimadisādīsu hi asukadisāyaṃnāma nibbānaṃ natthīti navattabbanti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: puratthima disā ādīsu hi asuka disā ayaṃnāma nibbānam natthi iti vuttam

original: Evaṃsantepi etaṃ niruddhatekālikadhamma sannissayena viññāya mānattā niruddhadhammabhedena
analyzed: evaṃsante pi etam niruddha tekālika dhamma sannissayena viññāya māna ttā niruddha dhamma bhedena

original: bhinnaṃ katvā upacarituṃ labbhatīti vuttaṃ saupādisesātiādi. Tattha upādīyati taṇhādiṭṭhīhi
analyzed: bhinnam katvā upacaritum labbhati iti vuttam saupādisesa atiādi tattha upādīyati taṇhā diṭṭhīhi

original: bhusaṃ gaṇhīyatīti upādi. Upādinnakhandhapañcakaṃ. Soyeva ekadesenavā anavasesenavā
analyzed: bhusam gaṇhīyati iti upādi upādinna khandha pañcakam ekadesena vā anavasesena vā

original: pahīnehi kammakilesehi sesoti upādiseso. Saṃvijjati tasmiṃ santāne upādiseso yassā
analyzed: pahīnehi kamma kilesehi sesaḥ ti upādiseso saṃvijjati tasmin santāne upādisesaḥ yassā

original: adhigatakāleti saupādisesā. Nibbānadhātūti nibbūtisa bhāvo. Saupādisesāca sā nibbānadhātucāti
analyzed: adhigata kāleti sa aupādisesā nibbāna dhātu uti nibbūti sa bhāvaḥ sa aupādisesā ca sā nibbāna dhātu ca ati

original: samāso. Natthi tasmiṃ santāne upādiseso yassā adhigatakāleti anupādisesā, anupādisesāca
analyzed: samāsaḥ na atthi tasmin santāne upādisesaḥ yassā adhigata kāle iti anupādisesā anupādisesā ca

original: sā nibbānadhātucāti viggaho. Vuttañhetaṃ iti vuttake-dve mā bhikkhave nibbānadhātuyo.
analyzed: sā nibbāna dhātu ca iti viggahaḥ vuttam ha etam iti mā bhikkhave nibbāna dhātuyaḥ

original: Katamā dve, saupādisesāca nibbānadhātu, anupādisesāca nibbānadhātūtiādi. Tattha purimā
analyzed: katamā dve saupādisesā ca nibbāna dhātu anupādisesā ca nibbāna dhātu utiādi tattha purimā

original: kilesanibbānaṃnāma. Pacchimā khandhanibbānaṃnāma. Purimāvā diṭṭhadhammika nibbānaṃnāma.
analyzed: kilesa nibbānaṃ nāma pacchimā khandha nibbānaṃ nāma purimā vā diṭṭhadhammika nibbānaṃ nāma

original: Pacchimā samparāyika nibbānaṃnāma. Yathāha-ekā hi dhātu idha diṭṭhadhammikā saupādisesā
analyzed: pacchimā yathā āha ekā hi dhātu idha diṭṭhadhammikā sa aupādisesā

original: bhavanetti saṅkhayā. Anupādisesā pana samparāyikāti. Aṅguttare pana sattanipāte ubhatobhāgavimutta
analyzed: bhavanā itti saṅkhayā anupādisesā pana samparāyikā ati aṅguttare pana satta nipāte

original: paññāpi muttānaṃ dvinnaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ khandhupādisesavasena kāyasakkhidiṭṭhipatta
analyzed: muttānam dvinnam khīṇāsavānam khandhu pādisesa vasena kāya sakkhi diṭṭhi patta

original: saddhāvimuttadhammānusārīsaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ sekkhānaṃ āraddhavipassa kassaca yogīkalyāṇaputhujjanassa
analyzed: saddhā vimutta dhamma anusārī saṅkhātānam catunnam sekkhānam āraddha vipassa kassa ca yogī kalyāṇa puthujjanassa

original: kilesu pādisesavasena saupādisesatā anupādisesatāca vuttā. Tattheva navanipāte antarāparinibbāyī,
analyzed: kilesu pādisesa vasena saupādisesa tā anupādisesa tā ca vuttā tattha iva nava nipāte antarā parinibbāyī

original: upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṃ sotaakaniṭṭhagāmīti
analyzed: upahacca parinibbāyī asaṅkhāra parinibbāyī sa saṅkhāra parinibbāyī uddham sota akaniṭṭha gāmī iti

original: pañcannaṃ anāgāmīnaṃ sakadāgāmissa tiṇṇaṃ sotāpannānanti navannaṃ sekkhapuggalānaṃ
analyzed: pañcannam anāgāmīnam sakadāgāmissa tiṇṇam sotāpannānam ti navannam sekkha puggalānam

original: kilesupādisesavasena saupādisesatā vuttā.
analyzed: kilesa upādisesa vasena saupādisesa tā vuttā

original: Nettiyaṃ pana arahattaphalaṃpi saupādisesanibbānanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha nādhippetaṃ.
analyzed: nettiyam pana arahatta phalam pi sa upādisesa nibbānan ti vuttam tat idha na adhippetam

original: Etthaca maggakkhaṇe kilesānaṃ khayo saupādi sesaṃnāma. Cuti anantare khandhānaṃ anuppādo
analyzed: ettha ca magga kkhaṇe kilesānaṃ khayo cuti anantare khandhānaṃ anuppādo

original: anupādisesaṃnāma. Yasmā pana paṭisandhivandhānāma kilesesu satieva jāyanti. Asati
analyzed: yasmā pana paṭisandhi vandhā nāma kilesesu sati eva jāyanti asati

original: najāyanti, tasmā tepi kilesakkhayena saheva khiyyanti. Yāvacutiyā pavattamānaṃ paccuppannakhandhasantānaṃ
analyzed: na jāyanti tasmā te pi kilesa kkhayena saha iva khiyyanti yāva cutiyā pavattamānam paccuppanna khandha santānam

original: pana khīṇāsavassapi purimabhave pavattakammakilesānaṃ phalanisandabhūtaṃ sabbasattānaṃ
analyzed: pana khīṇāsavassa api purima bhave pavatta kamma kilesānam phala nisanda bhūtam sabba sattānam

original: dhamma tāsiddhaṃ. Tasmā taṃ khīṇesupi kilesesu yāvacutiyā pavatta tiyeva. Cutikkhaṇe
analyzed: dhamma tā siddham tasmā tam khīṇesu pi kilesesu yāva cutiyā tiyā iva cuti kkhaṇe

original: tassa nirodhopi dhammatānirodho eva. Yo pana tadanantare punabhavassa anuppādo. So
analyzed: tassa nirodhaḥ api dhamma tā nirodhaḥ eva yaḥ pana tad anantare punabhavassa anuppādaḥ so

original: kilesakkhayena saheva siddho. Na kevalaṃ tadanantare puna bhavasseva. Tato paraṃpi
analyzed: kilesa kkhayena saha iva siddhaḥ na kevalam tad anantare puna bhavassa iva tatas

original: anamatagga saṃsāre bhavaparaṃparāya anuppādopi tena saheva siddho. Sabbañcetaṃ ekameva
analyzed: saṃsāre bhava paraṃparāya anuppādaḥ api tena saha iva siddhaḥ sabbam ca etat ekam eva

original: nibbānaṃ. Evaṃsantepi khandhāvasesassa bhāvā bhāvalesaṃ upādāya ayaṃ bhedo vuttoti
analyzed: nibbānam khandha avasesassa bhāvā bhāva lesam upādāya ayam bhedaḥ vutto ti

original: vuttaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti kāraṇapariyāyenāti duvidha paññāpanassa kāraṇalesenāti attho.
analyzed: vuttam duvidham hoti kāraṇa pariyāyena ati duvidha paññāpanassa kāraṇa lesena ati attho

original: Yasmā pana saṅkhatadhammānāma sapalibodhadhammattā nānāpalibodhehi niccakālaṃ janaṃ
analyzed: yasmā pana saṅkhata dhammā nāma sa palibodha dhamma ttā nānā palibodhehi nicca kālam janam

original: pīḷenti. Santasukhaṃnāma laddhuṃ nadenti. Sanimitta dhammattāca kilesānaṃ jarāmaraṇādīnañca
analyzed: pīḍenti laddhum nadenti jarā maraṇa ādīnam ca

original: sabbesaṃ anatthānaṃ vatthu bhūtā bhūmibhūtā honti. Sapaṇihitadhammattāca sabbadukkhānaṃ
analyzed: sabbesam anatthānam vatthu bhūtāḥ bhūmi bhūtāḥ honti sa paṇihita dhamma ttā ca sabba dukkhānam

original: mūlabhūtaṃ āsādukkhaṃnāma niccakālaṃpi janenti. Tasmā tappaṭipakkhasiddhena guṇabhedena
analyzed: mūla bhūtam āsādukkham nāma nicca kālaṃpi janenti tasmā tad paṭipakkha siddhena guṇa bhedena

original: tividhaṃbhedaṃ dassetuṃ suññatantiādi māha. Tattha sabbapalibodha vivittattā suññataṃ.
analyzed: tividham bhedam dassetum suññata nti ādi mā āha tattha sabba palibodha vivitta ttā suññatam

original: Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā hi sati bālānaṃ yattakā pāpakammapalibodhā apāya dukkhapalibodhāca
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhiyā hi sati bālānam yattakā pāpa kamma palibodhā dukkha palibodhā ca

original: sandissanti. Paṇḍitānaṃca tato attānaṃ rakkhanatthaṃ yattakā kalyāṇakammapalibodhā
analyzed: sandissanti paṇḍitānam ca tatas attānam rakkhana attham yattakā kalyāṇa kamma palibodhā

original: sandissanti. Sakkāyadiṭṭhinirodhoyeva sabbe te sakkāyadiṭṭhimūlake palibodhe nirodhetuṃ
analyzed: sandissanti sakkāya diṭṭhi nirodho yeva sabbe te sakkāya diṭṭhi mūlake palibodhe nirodhetuṃ

original: sakkoti. Na vinā tena añño koci. Tasmā sonirodho tehi palibodhehi vivitto hoti, tathā
analyzed: sakkoti na vinā tena añño koci tasmā tehi palibodhehi vivitto hoti tathā

original: rāgakkhayoyeva rāgamūlake palibodhe nirodhetuṃ sakkoti. Na vinā tena añño koci. Dosakkhayoyeva
analyzed: rāga kkhayaḥ yā iva rāga mūlake palibodhe nirodhetum sakkoti na vinā tena añño koci dosa kkhayaḥ yā iva

original: dosamūlake. Mohakkhayoyeva mohamūlaketiādi vattabbaṃ. Iti nibbānaṃ sabbapali bodhehi
analyzed: dosa mūlake moha kkhayaḥ yeva moha mūlaka iti ādi vattabbam iti nibbānam bodhehi

original: vivittattā suññataṃnāma.
analyzed: vivitta ttā suññataṃnāma

original: Nimittaṃ vuccati uppādapavattamūlako oḷārikākāro. Yena samannāgatā saṅkhatadhammā
analyzed: nimittam vuccati uppāda pavatta mūlakaḥ oḷārika ākāraḥ yena samannāgatā saṅkhata dhammā

original: sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ jarāmaraṇānañca vatthubhūtā bhūmibhūtā honti. Tathā sabbesaṃ mārānaṃ
analyzed: sabbesam kilesānam jarā maraṇānam ca vatthu bhūtāḥ bhūmi bhūtāḥ honti tathā sabbesam mārānam

original: sabbesaṃ verānaṃ sabbesaṃ rogādi anatthānaṃ vatthubhūtā bhūmibhūtā honti. Yato te
analyzed: sabbesam verānam sabbesam roga ādi anatthānam vatthu bhūtāḥ bhūmi bhūtāḥ honti yatas te

original: māradheyyātipi maccudheyyātipi vuccanti. Kāla disā desa santānādi bhedena hīnapaṇītādi
analyzed: māradheyya atipi maccudheyya atipi vuccanti kāla disā desa santāna ādi bhedena hīna paṇīta ādi

original: bhedenaca bhedaṃ gacchanti. Nibbānaṃ pana sabbesaṃ nimittadhammānaṃ khayanirodhabhāvena
analyzed: bhedena ca bhedam gacchanti nibbānam pana sabbesam nimitta dhammānam khaya nirodha bhāvena

original: siddhattā natthi. Tasmiṃ nimittanti animittaṃ. Tañhi sabbesaṃ kile sādīnaṃ anatthānaṃ
analyzed: siddha ttā na atthi tasmin nimittam ti animittam tat hi sabbesam kilesa ādīnam anatthānam

original: vatthubhūte nimittadhamme viddhaṃsetvā tesaṃ anatthānaṃ abhāvaṃ sādhentaṃ niccaṃ
analyzed: vatthu bhūte nimitta dhamme viddhaṃsetvā tesam anatthānam abhāvam sādhentam niccam

original: tiṭṭhati. Naca taṃ kālabhedena bhinnaṃ hoti. Idaṃ atīte asukakappe asukabuddhassa
analyzed: tiṭṭhati na ca tam kāla bhedena bhinnam hoti idam atīte asuka kappe asuka buddhassa

original: nibbānaṃ, idaṃ anāgate, idaṃ etarahīti. Nāpi disābhedena bhinnaṃ. Idaṃ dasasu disāsu
analyzed: nibbānam idam anāgate idam etarahi iti nā api disā bhedena bhinnam idam dasasu disāsu

original: asukāyanāma disāya nibbānaṃ, idaṃ asukāya nāmāti. Nacāpi desabhedenavā santānabhedenavā
analyzed: asuka āya nāma disāya nibbānaṃ idam asukāya nāma ati na ca api desa bhedena vā santāna bhedena vā

original: bhinnaṃ. Idaṃ manussaloke idaṃ devaloke idaṃ brahmaloketi vā idaṃ manussānaṃ idaṃ
analyzed: bhinnam idam manussa loke idam deva loke idam brahma loke iti vai idam manussānam idam

original: devānaṃ idaṃ brahmānantivāti. Tathā paṇītādi bhedena bhinnaṃ na hoti. Idaṃ sabbaññubuddhānaṃ.
analyzed: devānam idam tathā paṇīta ādi bhedena bhinnam na hoti idam sabbaññu buddhānam

original: Idaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ. Idaṃ buddhasāvakānanti.
analyzed: idam paccekabuddhānam idam buddha sāvakānam ti

original: Paṇihitaṃ, paṇidhānaṃ, paṇidhi, patthanā, āsā, jīghacchā, pipāsāti atthato ekaṃ.
analyzed: paṇihitam paṇidhānam paṇidhi patthanā āsā jīghacchā pipāsā ati atthataḥ ekam

original: Saṅkhatadhammāca labbhamānāpi bhijjanadhammattā punappunaṃ laddhuṃ āsā dukkhaṃnāma
analyzed: saṅkhata dhammā ca labbhamānā api bhijjana dhamma ttā punappunam laddhum āsā dukkham nāma

original: vaḍḍhenti. Āsādukkhassa pariyantonāma natthi. Sabbañca dukkhaṃ āsāmūlakaṃ hoti. Āsāsadisaṃ
analyzed: vaḍḍhenti āsā dukkhassa pariyantaḥ nāma natthi sabbañca dukkham āsā mūlakam hoti āsā sadisam

original: dukkhanidānaṃnāma natthi, nibbānaṃ pana sayaṃ pipāsavinayadhammattā āsāsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: dukkha nidānam nāma natthi nibbānam pana sayam pipāsa vinaya dhamma ttā āsā saṅkhātam

original: sabbaṃ taṇhāpaṇidhiṃvā chandapaṇidhiṃvā vinentaṃ vidhamentaṃ vattatīti natthi. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: sabbam taṇhā paṇidhim vā chanda paṇidhim vā vinentam vidhamentam vattati iti na atthi tasmin

original: paṇihitanti appaṇīhitaṃ. Etthaca duvidhaṃ sukhaṃ vedayitasukhaṃ santisukhanti. Tattha
analyzed: paṇihitanti appaṇīhitam ettha ca duvidham sukham vedayita sukham santi sukham ti tattha

original: manussa dibba brahma sampattiyo labhitvā anubhavanavasena pavattaṃ pītisomanassa
analyzed: manussa dibba brahma sampattiyaḥ labhitvā anubhavana vasena pavattam pīti somanassa

original: sukhaṃ vedayitasukhaṃnāma. Taṃ pana khaṇekhaṇe vijjuviya bhijjanadhammaṃ. Sampattiyoca
analyzed: sukham vedayitasukhaṃnāma tam pana khaṇekhaṇe bhijjana dhammam

original: aniccadhammā. Sabbe te apariyantaṃ āsādukkhaṃ bhiyyo vaḍḍhentiyeva. Tasmā sabbaṃ
analyzed: anicca dhammā sabbe te a pariyantam āsā dukkham bhiyyas vaḍḍhenti yeva tasmai sabbam

original: vedayitasukhaṃnāma āsā dukkhajanakattā ekantena dukkhameva hoti. Yathāha-yaṃkiñci
analyzed: vedayita sukham nāma āsā dukkha janaka ttā ekantena dukkham eva hoti yathā ha yaṃkiñci

original: vedayitaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhasminti. Dhammasenāpatināca katamaṃ taṃ āvuso sāriputta
analyzed: vedayitam sabbam tat dukkhasmin ti dhammasenāpatinā āca katamam tat āvuso sāriputta

original: nibbāne sukhaṃ, yadettha vedayitaṃ natthīti puṭṭhena etadevettha āvuso nibbāne sukhaṃ,
analyzed: nibbāne sukham yat ettha vedayitam na atthi iti puṭṭhena etat eva ittha āvuso nibbāne sukham

original: yadettha vedayitaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ. Santisukhaṃnāma attani uppannānaṃvā uppajjituṃ
analyzed: yat ettha vedayitam natthi iti vuttam santisukham nāma attani uppannānam vā uppajjitum

original: paccupaṭṭhi tānaṃvā kilesādīnaṃ apāyadukkhādīnañca attano sammāpayogaṃ paṭicca vimuccanasukhaṃ.
analyzed: kilesa ādīnam apāya dukkha ādīnam ca attano sammāpayogam paṭicca vimuccana sukham

original: Etadevettha ekantasukhaṃ acalasukhaṃ. Etasmiñhi asati puthujjanānaṃ manussa dibbabrahmasampattiyo
analyzed: etat eva itthā ekanta sukham acala sukham etasmin hi asati puthujjanānam manussa dibba brahma sampattiyaḥ

original: anubhavantānaṃpi avassaṃ pattabbaṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhitāneva honti aviciniraya bhayādīnīti.
analyzed: anubhavantānam pi a vassam pattabba ṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhitāna eva honti a vici niraya bhaya ādīni iti

original: Tasmā sabbassa vedayitasukhamūlakassa āsādukkhassa santisukhadīpakaṃ idaṃ appaṇihitapadaṃ
analyzed: tasmā sabbassa vedayita sukha mūlakassa āsā dukkhassa santi sukha dīpakam idam appaṇihita padam

original: nibbānassa ekaṃ mahantaṃ guṇapadaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: nibbānassa ekam mahantam guṇa padam hoti iti

original: Ākāra bhedenāti tividhassa suññatādikassa guṇakoṭṭhāsassa bhedena. Etthaca yadetaṃ
analyzed: ākāra bhedena ati tividhassa suñña tā ādikassa guṇa koṭṭhāsassa bhedena ettha ca yat etam

original: anamatagge saṃsāre ajjhattaṃ anusayitvā āgatānaṃ kilesānaṃ maggakkhaṇe ajjhattameva
analyzed: anamatagge saṃsāre ajjhattam anusayitvā āgatānam kilesānam magga kkhaṇe ajjhattam eva

original: nirujjhanaṃ khiyyanaṃ. Taṃ khayadhātu nirodhadhātu saṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ hoti.
analyzed: nirujjhanam khiyyanam tam khaya dhātu nirodha dhātu saṅkhātam ekam dhamma āyatanam hoti

original: Ekā dhammadhātu hoti. Eko paramatthadhammo hoti. Khayaṭṭhena nirodhaṭṭhena sabhāvato
analyzed: ekā dhammadhātu hoti ekaḥ paramattha dhammo hoti khaya ṭṭhena nirodha ṭṭhena sabhāvato

original: vijjamānattā, na hi taṃ paññattirūpaṃ hoti. Kāye ñāṇeca sarūpato upaladdhattā, duvidhañhi
analyzed: vijjamāna ttā na hi tam paññatti rūpam hoti kāye ñāṇe ca sarūpataḥ upaladdha ttā duvidhan hi

original: nibbānassa sacchikaraṇaṃ kāyasacchikaraṇaṃ ñāṇasacchikaraṇañca. Yathāha-chandajāto
analyzed: nibbānassa sacchikaraṇam kāya sacchikaraṇam ñāṇa sacchikaraṇam ca yathā aha chanda jātaḥ

original: ussahati. Ussahitvā tuleti. Tulayitvā padahati. Pahitatto samāno kāyenaceva paramatthasaccaṃ
analyzed: ussahati ussahitvā tuleti tulayitvā padahati pahitattaḥ samāno kāyena ca iva paramattha saccaṃ

original: sacchikaroti. Paññāyaca taṃ paṭivijjha passatīti. Tattha anamatagge saṃsāre ajjhattaṃ
analyzed: sacchikaroti paññāya ca tam paṭivijjha passati iti tattha anamatagge saṃsāre ajjhattam

original: niccaṃ santāpetvā paridayhitvā āgatānaṃ kilesānaṃ maggakkhaṇe ajjhattameva nirujjhanaṃ
analyzed: niccam santāpetvā paridayhitvā āgatānam kilesānam magga kkhaṇe ajjhattam eva nirujjhanam

original: nibbāyanaṃ kāyasacchikaraṇaṃnāma. Evaṃ kāyena sacchikatvā puna paccavekkhanto ajjhattaṃ
analyzed: nibbāyanam kāya sacchikaraṇam nāma evam kāyena sacchikatvā puna paccavekkhantaḥ ajjhattam

original: taṃ nirujjhanaṃ ñāṇena paccakkhato passati. Niruddhā me kilesāti jānāti, idaṃ ñāṇasacchikaraṇaṃnāma.
analyzed: tam nirujjhanam ñāṇena paccakkhataḥ passati niruddhāḥ me kilesāḥ ti jānāti idam ñāṇa sacchikaraṇaṃ nāma

original: Tesu kāya sacchikaraṇaṃ anantaṃ aparimāṇaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ khepeti. Ñāṇasacchikaraṇaṃ
analyzed: tesu kāya sacchikaraṇam anantam aparimāṇam vaṭṭa dukkham khepeti ñāṇa sacchikaraṇam

original: anappakaṃ pītisomanassaṃ uppādeti. Paññattidhammesu eva rūpaṃ sacchikaraṇaṃnāma natthīti.
analyzed: anappakam pīti somanassam uppādeti paññatti dhammesu eva rūpam sacchikaraṇam nāma natthi iti

original: Tassa pana nirujjhanassa suññatadhammattā mandabuddhīnaṃ tasmiṃ tucchasaññā niratthakasaññā
analyzed: tassa pana nirujjhanassa suññata dhamma ttā manda buddhīnam tasmim tuccha saññā niratthaka saññā

original: saṇṭhāti. Animitta dhammattā tasmiṃ abhāvamattasaññā paramatthato avijjamānasaññā
analyzed: tasmin abhāva matta saññā paramatthataḥ avijjamāna saññā

original: saṇṭhāti. Appaṇihitadhammattā taṇhāvasikā janā tasmiṃ sukhaṃ nāma kiñci natthīti maññanti.
analyzed: saṇṭhāti appaṇihita dhamma ttā taṇhāvasikā janā tasmim sukham nāma kiñci natthi iti maññanti

original: Ye pana yathāvuttaṃ khayanirodhamattaṃ nibbānaṃnāma nahoti. Tañhi abhāvamattaṃ paññattirūpaṃ
analyzed: ye pana yathāvuttam khaya nirodha mattam nibbānam nāma tat hi abhāva mattam paññatti rūpam

original: hoti. Nibbānañcanāma gambhīrādīnaṃ anantaguṇānaṃ vatthu hoti, naca abhāvamattaṃ tesaṃ
analyzed: hoti gambhīra ādīnam ananta guṇānam vatthu hoti na ca abhāva mattam tesam

original: vatthu bhavituṃ arahati. Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukhanti vuttaṃ. Naca abhāvamatte kiñci
analyzed: vatthu bhavitum arahati nibbānam paramam sukhanti vuttam na ca abhāva matte kiñci

original: sukhaṃnāma sakkāladdhuṃ. Tasmā yo tassa khayanirodhassa paccayo atthi. Yassaca ānubhāvena
analyzed: sukhaṃnāma tasmai yaḥ tassa khaya nirodhassa paccayo atthi yassa ca ānubhāvena

original: so khayanirodho sijjhati. Eta deva nibbānaṃ nāmāti icchanti. Tesaṃpi vaṭṭadukkha
analyzed: saḥ khaya nirodhaḥ sijjhati eta deva nibbānam nāma ati icchanti tesam pi vaṭṭa dukkha

original: santito atirekapayojanaṃnāma nalabbhati. Nibbānassaca guṇapadāni nāma anantānaṃ vaṭṭadhammānaṃ
analyzed: santitaḥ atireka payojanam nāma na labbhati nibbānassa ca guṇa padāni nāma anantānam vaṭṭa dhammānam

original: paṭipakkhavasena sijjhanti, no aññathā. Tasmā yattakāni aguṇapadāni vaṭṭadhammesu
analyzed: paṭipakkha vasena sijjhanti no aññathā tasmā yattakāni aguṇa padāni vaṭṭa dhammesu

original: labbhanti, tattakāni tesaṃ khaya nirodhe anantāni guṇapadāni hutvā sijjhanti. Yo
analyzed: labbhanti tattakāni tesam khaya nirodhe anantāni guṇa padāni hutvā sijjhanti

original: khayanirodhopi tāva visuṃ dhammabhāvenaviññātuṃ dukkarogambhīro hoti. Yato taṃ abhāvamattaṃ
analyzed: khaya nirodhaḥ api tāva visum dhamma bhāvena viññātum dukkaraḥ gambhīraḥ hoti yatas tam abhāva mattam

original: paññattirūpaṃ maññanti. Guṇapadānaṃ panassa gambhīrabhāve vattabbamevanatthi. Santisukhañca
analyzed: paññatti rūpam maññanti guṇa padānam pana assa gambhīra bhāve vattabbam eva natthi santi sukham ca

original: nāma vaṭṭadukkhānaṃ vūpasantatāeva. Tesaṃ vūpasamo sukhoti hi vuttaṃ. Vūpasantatātica
analyzed: nāma vaṭṭa dukkhānam vūpasanta tā eva tesam vūpasamaḥ sukhaḥ ti hi vuttam vūpasanta tā ati ca

original: tesaṃ sabbaso khayanirodhoevāti vaṭṭadukkhapariyāpannānaṃ sabba vedayītasukhānaṃ
analyzed: tesam sabbaso khaya nirodhaḥ eva ati vaṭṭa dukkha pariyāpannānam

original: ukkaṃsagatā tassa khayanirodhassa paramasukhatā siddhā hotīti. Tassa pana paramatthato
analyzed: ukkaṃsa gatā tassa khaya nirodhassa parama sukha tā siddhā hoti iti tassa pana paramatthato

original: vijjamānabhāve tāva idaṃ suttaṃ.
analyzed: vijjamāna bhāve tāva idam suttam

original: Atthi bhikkhave ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ. No ce taṃ bhikkhave abhavissa ajātaṃ
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhatam no ce tat bhikkhave abhavissa a jātam

original: abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, na yimassa jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ
analyzed: a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhatam na yimassa jātassa bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam

original: paññāyetha. Yasmāca kho bhikkhave atthi ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhataṃ, tasmā jātassa
analyzed: paññāyetha yasmā ca kho bhikkhave atthi a jātam a bhūtam a katam a saṅkhatam tasmā jātassa

original: bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyatīti.
analyzed: bhūtassa katassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇam paññāyati iti

original: Tattha ajānanaṃ ajātaṃ. Jātikkhayoti attho. Abhavanaṃ abhūtaṃ. Abhāvoti attho. Akaraṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha a jānanam a jātam jāti kkhayaḥ ti atthaḥ a bhavanam a bhūtam a bhāvaḥ iti atthaḥ a karaṇam

original: akataṃ. Asaṅkharaṇaṃ asaṅkhataṃ. Uppādetuṃvā pavattetuṃvā saṅkhāradukkhassa abhāvoti
analyzed: akatam a saṅkharaṇam a saṅkhatam uppādetum vā pavattetum vā saṅkhāra dukkhassa abhāvaḥ ti

original: attho. Jātikkhayotivā visuṃ ekā dhammadhātu hoti. Tasmā visuṃ dhammabhāvaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: atthaḥ jāti khayaḥ ti vā visum ekā dhammadhātu hoti tasmā visum dhamma bhāvam sandhāya

original: natthi jātaṃ etthāti ajātantīpi yujjatiyeva. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti, saṅkhatadhammānāma
analyzed: natthi jātam ettha ati idam vuttam hoti saṅkhata dhammā nāma

original: paccaye sati jāyanti. Asati na jāyantīti jātaṃ viya ajātaṃpi tesaṃ atthi. Paramatthato
analyzed: paccaye sati jāyanti asati na jāyanti iti jātam viya ajātam pi tesam atthi paramatthato

original: vijjamānaṃ hotīti attho. Yadica ajātaṃnāma natthi, jātameva atthi. Evaṃsati attani
analyzed: vijjamānam hoti iti atthaḥ yadi ca ajātam nāma na atthi jātam eva atthi evam sati

original: kilesānaṃ ajātatthāya sammā paṭipajjantānaṃpi sabbe kilesadhammā jātāyeva siyuṃ.
analyzed: kilesānaṃ a jāta tthāya sammā paṭipajjantānam pi sabbe kilesa dhammā jātāya iva siyuṃ

original: No ajātā. Kasmā, ajātassanāma natthitāyāti. Esanayo sabbesu duccaritadhammesu apāyadukkhavaṭṭadukkhesu,
analyzed: no a jātā kasmai na atthitāya ati esa nayo sabbesu duccarita dhammesu apāya dukkha vaṭṭa dukkhesu

original: diṭṭhadhammeca sabbesu rogābādhabhayupaddavesu. Evañca sati loke sabbe purisakārā
analyzed: diṭṭhadhamme ca sabbesu roga ābādha bhaya upaddavesu evam ca sati loke sabbe purisakārā

original: purisathāmā purisaparakkamā niratthakā eva siyunti imamatthaṃ sandhāya no cetaṃ bhikkhave.La.
analyzed: purisa thāmā purisa parakkamā niratthakāḥ eva siyun ti imam attham sandhāya no ca itam bhikkhave

original: Paññāyethāti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana ajātaṃnāma ekantena atthiyeva. Tasmā attani ajātatthāya
analyzed: paññāyetha iti vuttam yasmā pana ajātaṃ nāma ekantena atthiyā iva tasmā attani ajāta tthāya

original: sammāpaṭipajjantānaṃ te ekantena najāyanti. Evaṃ sati sabbe purisakārā purisathāmā
analyzed: sammā paṭipajjantānam te ekantena na jāyanti evam sati sabbe purisakārā purisathāmā

original: purisaparakkamā satthakā eva hontīti imamatthaṃ sandhāya yasmāca kho bhikkhavetiādi
analyzed: purisa parakkamāḥ satthakāḥ eva honti iti imam attham sandhāya yasmā ca kho bhikkhave tiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Ettāvatā avijjānirodhā saṅkhāra nirodho. Saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho.La.
analyzed: vuttam ettāvatā avijjā nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodho saṅkhāra nirodhā viññāṇa nirodho

original: Dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti evaṃ vuttassa nirodhassa paramatthato vijjamānabhāvaṃ
analyzed: dukkhakkhandhassa nirodhaḥ hoti iti evam vuttassa nirodhassa paramatthataḥ vijjamāna bhāvam

original: dasseti. Atthi saddassa vijjamānatthavacanattā. Tattha nirodho duvidho jātanirodho
analyzed: dassa iti atthi saddassa vijjamāna attha vacana ttā tattha nirodhaḥ duvidhaḥ jāta nirodhaḥ

original: ajātanirodhoti. Tattha uppajjitvā nirodho jātanirodhonāma. Maccūtica maraṇantica
analyzed: ajāta nirodho ti tattha uppajjitvā nirodhaḥ jāta nirodhaḥ nāma maccu iti ca maraṇa nti ca

original: etassevanāmaṃ. Ajjhattapariyā pannānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ uppādassapi sabbaso abhāvo ajāta
analyzed: ajjhatta pariyā pannānam kilesa ādīnam uppādassa api sabbasas abhāvaḥ ajāta

original: nironāma. Yo sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbupadhinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānanti
analyzed: niro nāma yaḥ sabba saṅkhāra samatho sabba upadhi nissaggo taṇha kkhayaḥ virāgaḥ nirodhaḥ nibbānanti

original: vuccati. Ayamidhādhippeto, ayameva hi sabbapalibodhehi suññattā suññatonāma. Kilesānaṃ
analyzed: vuccati ayam idha adhippetaḥ ayam eva hi sabba palibodhehi suññattā suññataḥ nāma kilesānam

original: jārāmaraṇādīnañca vatthubhūtassa nimittassa abhāvā animittonāma. Sabbadukkhānaṃ nidānabhūtassa
analyzed: jāra amaraṇa ādīnam ca vatthu bhūtassa nimittassa abhāvāḥ sabba dukkhānam nidāna bhūtassa

original: āsādukkhassa abhāvā appaṇihitonāma. Tena vuttaṃ suññataṃanimittaṃ appaṇihitañceti
analyzed: āsā dukkhassa abhāvā appaṇihitaḥ nāma tena vuttam suññatam animittam appaṇihitam ca iti

original: tividhaṃ hotīti. Padantiādi nibbānassa vevacanāni. Tañhi visuṃ asaṃmisso kevalo upalabbhamāno
analyzed: tividham hoti iti nibbānassa vevacanāni tat hi visum asaṃmissaḥ kevalaḥ upalabbhamānaḥ

original: eko paramattha dhammoti padaṃ nāma. Koṭṭhāsattho hi padasaddo. Yathā padaso dhammaṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ dhammo ti padam nāma koṭṭhāsa tthaḥ hi pada saddaḥ yathā dhammam

original: vāceyyāti. Cavanābhāvena accutaṃ. Pubbantāparante atikkamma pavattattā accantaṃ.
analyzed: vāceyya ati cavana abhāvena accutam pubbanta aparante atikkamma pavatta ttā accantam

original: Saṅkharaṇakiccarahitattā asaṅkhataṃ. Attano uttaritarassa kassaci dhammassa abhāvato
analyzed: saṅkharaṇa kicca rahita ttā asaṅkhatam attanaḥ uttaritarassa kassacid dhammassa abhāvato

original: anuttaranti. Vānamuttā taṇhā vimuttā, mahante sīlakkhandhādike dhamme esiṃsu adhigacchiṃsūti mahesayo, buddhā.
analyzed: taṇhā vimuttā mahante sīla kkhandha ādike dhamme esiṃsu adhigacchiṃsu iti mahesayaḥ buddhā

original: Iti paramatthadīpaniyānāma abhidhammatthasaṅgahassa
analyzed: iti

original: Catutthavaṇṇanāya rūpanibbāna saṅgahassa
analyzed: catuttha vaṇṇanāya rūpa nibbāna saṅgahassa

original: Paramatthadīpanā niṭṭhitā.
Samuccaya saṅgaha paramatthadīpanī
162. Evaṃ chahi paricchedehi cattāro paramatthe dassetvā idāni tesaṃ taṃtaṃrāsisaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: evam chahi paricchedehi cattāraḥ paramatthe dassetvā idāni tesam taṃ taṃ rāsi saṅkhātam

original: samuccayaṃ dassento ādigātha māha. Ye salakkhaṇā dvāsattatividhā vatthudhammā mayā
analyzed: samuccayam dassentaḥ ādi gātha mā āha ye sa lakkhaṇāḥ dvāsattatividhāḥ vatthu dhammāḥ mayā

original: vuttā. Idāni tesaṃ samuccayaṃ yathāyogaṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā. Tattha salakkhaṇāvatthudhammāti
analyzed: vuttāḥ idāni tesam samuccayam yathāyogam pavakkhāmi iti yojanā tattha sa lakkhaṇā vatthu dhammā ti

original: padehi dasavidhāni anipphannarūpāni paṭikkhipati. Na hi tāni attano āvenikabhūtena
analyzed: padehi dasavidhāni anipphanna rūpāni paṭikkhipati na hi tāni attanaḥ āvenika bhūtena

original: sabhāva lakkhaṇena aniccatādi sāmaññalakkhaṇenaca salakkhaṇāni honti. Ekantaparamatthatāya
analyzed: sabhāva lakkhaṇena anicca tā ādi sāmañña lakkhaṇena ca sa lakkhaṇāni honti ekanta paramattha tāya

original: abhāvato. Tatoyevaca vatthudhammāca nahonti. Sarūpato anupalabbhamānattā. Dabbavācako
analyzed: abhāvato vatthu dhammā ca na honti sarūpataḥ anupalabbhamāna ttā dabba vācako

original: hi idha vatthusaddo. Dabbañcanāma idha sarūpato labbhamāno sabhāvo eva. Etena nibbānassapi
analyzed: hi idha vatthu saddaḥ idha sarūpataḥ labbhamāno sabhāvaḥ eva etena nibbānassa api

original: maggaphala paccavekkhanañāṇesu sarūpato labbhamāna sabhāvatā vuttā hoti. Anipphannarūpānaṃ
analyzed: magga phala paccavekkhana ñāṇesu sarūpataḥ labbhamāna sabhāva tā vuttā hoti anipphanna rūpānam

original: viya ca vatthudhamma sannissayena dissamānadhammamattabhāvaṃ vā paññattidhammānaṃ
analyzed: ca vatthu dhamma sannissayena dissamāna dhamma matta bhāvam vā paññatti dhammānam

original: viya parikappitākāramattabhāvaṃvā sasavisāṇa kacchapalomādīnaṃ viya sabbaso abhūta
analyzed: viya parikappita ākāra matta bhāvam vā kacchapa loma ādīnam viya sabbasas abhūta

original: parikappita mattabhāvaṃvā nivāretīti veditabbaṃ. Etthaca dvāsattatividhāsalakkhaṇāvatthudhammāti
analyzed: parikappita matta bhāvam vā nivāreti iti veditabbam ettha ca dvāsattati vidhā salakkhaṇā vatthu dhammā ti

original: vacane payojanaṃ nadissati. Tesu hi dvāsattatividhesu ekacce eva dhammā purimesu
analyzed: vacane payojanam na dissati tesu hi dvāsattatividhesu ekacce eva dhammā purimesu

original: tīsu saṅgahesu āgatā. Pacchimeca sabbasaṅgahe anipphannarūpānipi adhippetānievāti.
analyzed: tīsu saṅgahesu āgatā pacchime ca sabba saṅgahe anipphanna rūpāni pi adhippetāni eva ati

original: Etthaca vatthudhammāsalakkhaṇāti padehi anipphannarūpānaṃ salakkhaṇatā paṭikkhipane
analyzed: ettha ca vatthu dhammāḥ asalakkhaṇā ti padehi anipphanna rūpānam salakkhaṇa tā paṭikkhipane

original: yaṃ vattabbaṃ. Taṃ rūpasamuddesa dīpaniyaṃ vuttamevāti. Ekantākusalajātiyānaṃ āsava
analyzed: yat vattabbam tat rūpa samuddesa dīpaniyam vuttam eva ati ekanta akusala jāti yānam āsava

original: catukkādīnaṃ saṅgaho akusalasaṅgaho, na akusala sampayuttattāyeva akusalabhūtānaṃ
analyzed: catukka ādīnam saṅgahaḥ akusala saṅgahaḥ na akusala sampayutta ttāya iva akusala bhūtānam

original: cittaphassādīnanti. Kusalā kusalābyākatamissakānaṃ saṅgaho missakasaṅgaho.
analyzed: citta phassa ādīnam ti saṅgahaḥ missaka saṅgahaḥ

original: Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, bujjhanti etāyāti katvā. Bodhiyā pakkhā bodhipakkhā.
analyzed: bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇam bujjhanti etāya ati katvā bodhiyā pakkhāḥ bodhi pakkhāḥ

original: Bodhisambhārāti attho. Bodhi pakkhesu bhavā antogadhāti bodhipakkhiyā. Tesaṃ saṅgahoti
analyzed: bodhi sambhārā ti atthaḥ bodhi pakkhesu bhavā antogadhā ati bodhi pakkhiyā tesam saṅgahaḥ ti

original: bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho. Sabbesaṃ anavasesānaṃ paramatthadhammānaṃ saṅgaho sabbasaṅgaho.
analyzed: bodhi pakkhiya saṅgahaḥ sabbesam anavasesānam paramattha dhammānam saṅgahaḥ sabbasaṅgaho

original: Cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madaniyaṭṭhenaca āsava sadisattā āsavā. Yadica tadubhayaṭṭhena
analyzed: cira pārivāsiya ṭṭhena madaniya ṭṭhena ca āsava āsavāḥ yadi ca tad ubhaya ṭṭhena

original: āsavānāma siyuṃ. Ime lobhādayo eva āsavānāma siyuṃ. Pupphāsavādayo hi loke cha pañca
analyzed: āsavā nāma siyum ime lobha ādayaḥ eva āsavā nāma siyum puppha āsava ādayaḥ hi loke cha pañca

original: rattimattaṃ vā sattaṭṭharattimattaṃ vā sayaṃpi kumbhesu parivāsaṃ gaṇhanti. Kumbheca
analyzed: rattimattam vā kumbhesu parivāsam gaṇhanti

original: parivāsaṃ gāhāpenti. Ime pana anamatagge saṃsāre sayaṃpi sattasantāne parivāsaṃ gaṇhanti.
analyzed: parivāsam gāhāpenti ime pana anamatagge saṃsāre sayam pi satta santāne parivāsam gaṇhanti

original: Sattasantānañca parivāsaṃ gāhāpenti. Sakalaṃ sattasantānaṃ sadā āsavapūritameva hoti.
analyzed: satta santānam ca parivāsam gāhāpenti sakalam satta santānam sadā āsava pūritam eva hoti

original: Yathāha-cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati. Ettha
analyzed: yathā āha cakkhum loke piya rūpam sāta rūpam ettha isā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati ettha

original: nivīsamānā nivīsatītiādi. Tattha esā taṇhā pariyuṭṭhānavasena uppajjamānā ettheva
analyzed: nivīsamānā nivīsati itiādi tattha esā taṇhā pariyuṭṭhāna vasena uppajjamānā ettha eva

original: uppajjati. Uppajjitvāca puna anusayabhāvena parivāsaṃ katvā nivīsamānā ettheva nivīsatīti
analyzed: uppajjati uppajjitvā ca punar anusaya bhāvena parivāsam katvā nivīsamānā etthā iva nivīsati iti

analyzed: atthaḥ yāva ca ariya magga dhovanam tāva santānam gūtha pūrita kūpam viya

original: dubbisodhaṃ katvā pavattati. Pupphāsavādayoca madaṃ janentā muhuttameva janenti.
analyzed: dubbisodham katvā pavattati madam janentāḥ muhuttam eva janenti

original: Ime pana yāva ariyamaggaṃ nalabhati. Tāva niccamadaṃ janenti. Tasmā ekantena imeyeva
analyzed: ime pana yāva ariya maggam na labhati tāva nicca madam janenti tasmai ekantena

original: cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhena madani yaṭṭhenaca āsavānāma bhavituṃ arahantīti.
analyzed: cira pārivāsi yaṭṭhena madani yaṭṭhena ca āsavāḥ nāma bhavitum arahanti iti

original: Visandanaṭṭhenavā āsavasadisattā āsavā, yathā hi kudhita kuṭṭhino mahāvaṇamukhehi
analyzed: visandana ṭhenavāḥ āsava sadisa ttāḥ āsavāḥ yathā hi kudhita kuṭṭhinaḥ mahā vaṇa mukhehi

original: yūsasaṅkhāto āsavo visanditvā pilotikakhaṇḍāni dūseti, evaṃ imepi chahidvārehi visanditvā
analyzed: yūsa saṅkhātaḥ āsavaḥ visanditvā pilotika khaṇḍāni dūseti evam ime api chahi dvārehi visanditvā

original: chaḷārammaṇānidūsentīti. Āyataṃvā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savantipasavanti vaḍḍhentīti āsavā.
analyzed: chaṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇāni dūsenti iti āyatam vā saṃsāra dukkham savanti pasavanti vaḍḍhenti iti āsavā

original: Athavā, bhavato ābhavaggā dhammato āgotratumhā savanti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattantīti

original: āsavā. Āsaddassa avadhiatthajotakattā. Avadhica duvidho mariyādavisayo abhividhivisayocāti
analyzed: avadhi attha jotaka ttā avadhi ca duvidhaḥ mariyāda visayaḥ abhividhi visayaḥ ca ati

original: tattha yassa sambandhinīkriyā avadhibhūtaṃ attānaṃ bahikatvā pavattati. So mariyādavisayo
analyzed: tattha yassa sambandhinī kriyā avadhi bhūtam attānam bahika tvā pavattati saḥ mariyāda visayaḥ

original: nāma. Yathā āpātaliputtā devo vuṭṭhoti. Yassa sambandhinīkriyā avadhibhūtaṃ attānaṃ
analyzed: nāma yathā āpātaliputtā devaḥ vuṭṭho ti yassa sambandhinī kriyā avadhi bhūtam attānam

original: byāpetvā anto katvā pavattati, so abhividhivisayonāma. Yathā ābrahmalokā bhagavato
analyzed: byāpetvā antaḥ katvā pavattati saḥ abhividhivisayaḥ nāma yathā ābrahmalokā bhagavataḥ

original: kittisaddo abbhuggatoti. Idha pana abhividhivisayo daṭṭhabbo. Tasmā bhavaggañca gotrabhuñca
analyzed: kitti saddaḥ abbhuggato ti idha pana abhividhi visayaḥ daṭṭhabbo tasmā bha vaggañca gotrabhun ca

original: byāpetvā anto katvā savantīti attho veditabbo.
analyzed: byāpetvā antar katvā savanti iti atthaḥ veditabbo

original: [204] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Avadhica mariyādaabhividhivasena duvidhoti vatvā puna taṃ vibhāvento “tattha āpātaliputtā
analyzed: avadhi ca mariyāda abhividhi vasena duvidhā iti vatvā puna tam tattha āpātali puttā

original: devo vuṭṭhotiādīsuviya kriyaṃ bahikatvā pavatto mariyādo. Ābhavaggāsaddo abbhuggatotiādīsuviya
analyzed: devaḥ vuṭṭhaḥ iti ādīsu viya kriyam bahi katvā pavattaḥ mariyādaḥ abbhuggataḥ iti ādīsu viya

original: kriyaṃ byāpetvā pavatto abhividhī”ti vadati. Taṃ na yujjati.
analyzed: kriyam byāpetvā vadati tam na yujjati

original: Na hi avavidhivisayabhūto bhavaggo lokattayabyāpakaṃ saddassa abbhuggamanakriyaṃ
analyzed: na hi avavidhi visaya bhūtaḥ bhavaggaḥ loka ttaya byāpakam saddassa abbhut gamana kriyam

original: byāpetvā pavattati. Naca avadhibhūto attho kriyaṃ bahivā antovā katvā pavattatīti
analyzed: byāpetvā pavattati na ca avadhi bhūtaḥ attho kriyam bahivā antovā katvā pavattati iti

original: yutto. Kriyāeva pana taṃ bahivā antovā katvā pavattatīti yutto. Evañca katvā mūlaṭīkāyaṃ-duvidhohi
analyzed: kriyā eva pana tam bahivā antarvā katvā pavattati iti evam ca katvā

original: avadhi abhividhivisayo anabhividhivisayoca. Abhividhivisayaṃ kriyābyāpetvā pavattati,
analyzed: avadhi abhividhi visayaḥ anabhividhi visayaḥ ca abhividhi visayam pavattati

original: ābhavaggā bhagavato yaso gatoti. Itaraṃ bahikatvā, āpātaliputtā vuṭṭho devoti. Kāmeti
analyzed: ābha vaggāḥ bhagavataḥ yasaḥ gataḥ iti itaram bahi katvā āpātali puttāḥ vuṭṭhaḥ devaḥ iti

original: icchatīti kāmo. Soeva āsavoti kāmāsavo. Kāmīyativā oḷārikena kāmena icchīyatīti kāmo.
analyzed: icchati iti kāmaḥ saḥ eva āsavaḥ iti kāma āsavaḥ oḷārikena kāmena icchīyati iti kāmaḥ

original: Pañcakāmaguṇamukhena desito sabbo kāmāvacaradhammo. Idha pana taṃ nāmena tadārammaṇā
analyzed: pañca kāmaguṇa mukhena desito sabbo kāmāvacara dhammo idha pana tam nāmena tad ārammaṇā

original: taṇhāeva adhippetā, kāmoeva āsavoti kāmāsavo. Kāmāvacaradhammesu assādanābhinandana
analyzed: taṇhā eva adhippetā kāmo eva āsavo ti kāma āsavaḥ kāmāvacara dhammesu assādana abhinandana

original: vasena pavatto kāmarāgo. Therena pana ayamatthova icchito. Vakkhati hi kāmabhava
analyzed: vasena pavatto kāmarāgaḥ therena pana icchito vakkhati hi kāma bhava

original: nāmena tabbatthukā taṇhā adhippetāti.
analyzed: nāmena tabbatthukā taṇhā adhippetā ti

original: [205] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Purimatthova vutto. So anupapanno, theramatānugatassa idhādhippetassa atthassa avuttattā.
analyzed: purima atthaḥ uva vuttaḥ saḥ anupapannaḥ thera mata anugatassa idha adhippetassa atthassa a vutta ttā

original: Bhavāsavoti ettha duvidho bhavo kammabhavo upapattibhavo ca. Tattha mahaggatakusaladhammā
analyzed: bhava āsavaḥ ti ettha duvidhaḥ bhavaḥ kamma bhavaḥ upapatti bhavo ca tattha mahaggata kusala dhammā

original: kammabhavo. Taṃnibbattā vipāka dhammā upapattibhavo. Idhapi bhavasaddena tadārammaṇā
analyzed: kamma bhavaḥ dhammāḥ upapatti bhavaḥ idha api bhava saddena tad ārammaṇā

original: taṇhāeva adhippetā. Bhavoeva āsavoti bhavāsavo. Tasmiṃ duvidhe bhave nikantivasena
analyzed: taṇhā eva adhippetā bhavaḥ eva āsavo ti bhava āsavaḥ tasmin duvidhe bhave nikanti vasena

original: pavatto rūpārūparāgo.
analyzed: pavattaḥ rūpa arūpa rāgaḥ

original: [206] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Sassata diṭṭhisahagatoca rāgo ettheva saṅgayhatī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yuttaṃ.
analyzed: diṭṭhi sahagataḥ ca rāgaḥ ettha iva saṅgayhati iti vuttam tat na yuttam

original: Bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhigata vippayutta lobhasahagatesu cittuppādesu uppajjatīti hi
analyzed: bhavāsavo catūsu diṭṭhigata vippayutta lobha sahagatesu cittuppādesu uppajjati iti hi

original: aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe vuttaṃ. Yattha pana kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti āgataṃ. Tattheva
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā kaṇḍe vuttam yattha pana kāma taṇhā bhava taṇhā vibhava taṇhā ti āgatam tattha eva

original: sassatadiṭṭhi sahagato rāgo yākāci kusalākusala kammabhavanikanti yākāci upapattibhavapatthanā.
analyzed: sassata diṭṭhi sahagataḥ rāgaḥ yā akāci kusala akusala kamma bhava nikanti yā akāci upapatti bhava patthanā

original: Sabbā bhavataṇhāyaṃ saṅgahitāti yuttā. Idha pana yathāvuttaṃ bhavāsavaṃ thapetvā
analyzed: sabbā bhava taṇhā ayam saṅgahitā ati yuttā idha pana yathāvuttam bhava āsavam thapetvā

original: sabbo lobho kāmāsave eva saṅgahitoti yuttoti.
analyzed: sabbaḥ lobho kāma āsave eva saṅgahito ti yutto ti

original: [207] Eteneva yañca tattha vuttaṃ.
analyzed: etena iva yat ca tattha vuttam

original: “Tatiyo bhādiṭṭhisahagato”ti. Taṃpi paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
analyzed: tatiyaḥ bhā ādiṭṭhi sahagato ti tat pi paṭikkhittam hoti

original: Yākāci diṭṭhi diṭṭhāsavo. Yokoci moho avijjāsavo. Ettha siyā, kasmā ime eva āsavāti
analyzed: yākāci diṭṭhi diṭṭha āsavo yokoci mohaḥ avijja āsavo ettha siyā kasmai ime eva

original: vuttā. Nanu aññepi mānādayo cirapārivāsiyaṭṭhādiyuttā eva hontīti. Saccaṃ. Imesu
analyzed: vuttāḥ nanu aññe pi māna ādayaḥ cirapārivāsiya ṭṭhā ādi yuttāḥ eva honti iti saccam imesu

original: pana kāmāsave parivuṭṭhe sati sabbekāmavisayā mānādayo parivuṭṭhāeva honti. Tasmiṃ
analyzed: pana kāma āsave parivuṭṭhe sati sabbe kāma visayāḥ māna ādayo parivuṭṭhāḥ eva honti tasmiṃ

original: vimutte vimuttāeva, tathā bhavāsave parivuṭṭhe sati bhavavisayā. Diṭṭhāsaveca parivuṭṭhe
analyzed: vimutte vimuttā eva tathā bhava āsave parivuṭṭhe sati bhava visayāḥ diṭṭha āsave ca parivuṭṭhe

original: sati diṭṭhivisayāti. Avijjāpana tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃpi mūlabhūtāti. Iti ime eva pārivāsiyaṭṭhādīsu
analyzed: tesam tiṇṇam pi mūla bhūtā ti iti ime eva pārivāsiya ṭṭha ādīsu

original: padhānabhūtā honti. Itare pana tadanubandhamattāeva sampajjantīti na te āsavāti visuṃ
analyzed: padhāna bhūtāḥ honti itare pana tad anubandha mattāḥ eva sampajjanti iti na te visum

original: vattuṃ arahantīti. Attani patitaṃ janaṃ anassāsikaṃ katvā ajjhottha ranto hanati
analyzed: vattum arahanti iti attani patitam janam anassāsikam katvā ajjhottha rantaḥ hanati

original: māretīti ogho. Pakatimahogho. Tathā avahananaṭṭhena duttaraṭṭhenaca oghasadisāti
analyzed: māreti iti ogho pakati mahā ogho tathā avahanana ṭṭhena duttara ṭṭhena ca ogha sadisā ati

original: oghā. Yadica avahaññanaṭṭheca duttaraṭṭhenaca oghānāma siyuntiādiko pasaṅgo mānādīnañca
analyzed: oghāḥ yadi ca duttara ṭṭhena ca oghāḥ nāma upasaṅgaḥ māna ādīnam ca

original: oghabhāva parihāro vutta nayena veditabbo.
analyzed: ogha bhāva parihāraḥ vutta nayena veditabbo

original: Vaṭṭasmiṃvā bhavayantakevā satte yojentīti yogā. Bhavantaracutiyā saha bhavantarapaṭisandhiṃ
analyzed: vaṭṭasmin vā satte yojenti iti yogāḥ bhavantara cutiyā saha bhavantara paṭisandhim

original: gantenti ghaṭentīti ganthā. Abhijjhāti sabbassa rāgassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tasmā rūpārūpa
analyzed: ghaṭenti iti ganthāḥ sabbassa rāgassa etam nāmam tasmā

original: rāgāpi ettha saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Byāpādotipi sabbo doso eva. Idaṃ saccāti nivesoti
analyzed: rāgā api ettha saṅgahitā ati daṭṭhabbā byāpādaḥ ti pi sabbaḥ dosaḥ eva idam saccā ati niveso ti

original: idameva saccaṃ, moghamaññanti pavatto micchābhiniveso. Vaṭṭadukkhato vimuttiyā amaggabhūtaṃyeva
analyzed: idam eva saccam mogham aññanti pavattaḥ micchā abhinivesaḥ vaṭṭa dukkhataḥ vimuttiyā a magga bhūtam yeva

original: gosīlagovatādikaṃ parato āmasanaṃ tathā tathā kappetvā gahaṇaṃ sīlabbataparāmāso.
analyzed: gosīla govata ādikam paratas āmasanam tathā tathā kappetvā gahaṇam sīlabbataparāmāsaḥ

original: Etthaca paratoti bhūtasabhāvapaccanikatoti attho. Kāyasaddo pana sabbattha rūpakāye
analyzed: ettha ca parato ti bhūta sabhāva paccanikato ti attho kāya saddo pana sabbattha rūpa kāye

original: nāmakāyeca pavattoti atitakāyena paccuppanna kāyaṃ paccuppannakāyenaca anāgatakāyaṃ
analyzed: nāma kāye ca atita kāyena paccuppanna kāyam paccuppanna kāyena ca anāgata kāyam

original: gantheti ghaṭetīti kāyagantho. Athavā, kāye gaṇṭhoti kāyagaṇṭho. Ajjhatta gaṇṭhoti
analyzed: gantha iti ghaṭa iti iti iti kāya ganthaḥ athavā kāye gaṇṭho ti kāya gaṇṭhaḥ ajjhatta gaṇṭho ti

original: attho. Nigaṇṭhonāṭaputtotiādīsuviya gaṇṭhasaddo gaṇṭhiyaṃ pavatto. Bhusaṃ ādiyanti
analyzed: atthaḥ gaṇṭha saddaḥ gaṇṭhiyam pavattaḥ bhusam ādiyanti

original: amuñcanagāhaṃ gaṇhantīti upādānāni. Kilesabhūto kāmoeva upādānaṃ kāmu pādānaṃ. Vatthubhūtaṃvā
analyzed: amuñcana gāham gaṇhanti iti upādānāni upādānam upādānam vatthu bhūtam vā

original: kāmaṃ upādiyatīti kāmupādānaṃ.
analyzed: kāmam upādiyati iti kāma upādānam

original: Dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhiyo tividha mahādiṭṭhiyo aññāpivā sāsane lokeca sandissamānā viparītagāhabhūtā
analyzed: sāsane loke ca sandissamānā viparīta gāha bhūtā

original: diṭṭhiyo diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Yathāgahitaṃvā purimadiṭṭhiṃ idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti
analyzed: diṭṭhiyaḥ diṭṭhupādānam yathā gahitam vā purima diṭṭhim idam eva saccam mogham aññanti

original: upādiyatīti diṭṭhupādānaṃ. Goṇakukkurādīnaṃ taṃtaṃpakaticārittaṃ sīlaṃ nāma. Tameva
analyzed: upādiyati iti diṭṭhupādānam goṇa kukkura ādīnam sīlam nāma tam eva

original: suṭṭhuṃ samādinnaṃ vataṃnāma. Tadubhayaṃ saṃsāramuttiyā maggoti daḷhagahaṇaṃ sīlabbatu
analyzed: suṭṭhum samādinnam vataṃnāma tat ubhayam saṃsāra muttiyā maggo ti daḷha gahaṇam

original: pādānaṃ nāma. Attavādupādānanti ettha attā vuccati parikappabuddhiyā gahito ekekasmiṃ
analyzed: pādānam nāma attavādu pādānanti ettha attā vuccati parikappa buddhiyā gahitaḥ ekekasmin

original: satta santāne padhānissaro. Yaṃ lokiyamahājanā sattotivā puggalotivā jīvotivā tathāgatotivā
analyzed: satta santāne padhā nissaraḥ yam lokiya mahājanā satto ti vā puggalo ti vā jīvo ti vā tathāgataḥ ti vā

original: lokotivā sañjānanti. Yañca nānātitthiyā issaranimmitaṃvā adhiccasamuppannaṃvā accantasassataṃvā
analyzed: sañjānanti yat ca nānā titthiyāḥ issara nimmitam vā adhicca samuppannam vā accanta sassatam vā

original: ekaccasassataṃvā ucchedaṃvā paññapentīti. Taṃ attānaṃ abhivadanticeva upādiyantica
analyzed: ekacca sassatam vā ucchedam vā paññapenti iti tam attānam abhivadanti ca iva upādiyanti ca

original: sattā etenāti attavā dupādānaṃ. Vīsatividhā sakkāyadiṭṭhi. Tattha abhivadantīti visiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: sattā etena ati dupādānam vīsatividhā sakkāyadiṭṭhi tattha abhivadanti iti visiṭṭham

original: padhānaṃ katvā vadanti. Upādiyantīti daḷhaṃ ādiyanti. Yathāha –
analyzed: padhānam katvā vadanti upādiyanti iti daḷham ādiyanti yathā āha

original: Tattha katamā sakkāyadiṭṭhi. Idha assutavā puthujjano rūpaṃ attato samanupassati.
analyzed: tattha katamā sakkāyadiṭṭhi idha assutavā puthujjanaḥ rūpam attataḥ samanupassati

original: Rūpavantaṃvā attānaṃ. Attani vā rūpaṃ. Rūpasmiṃvā attānaṃ. Vedanaṃ attato samanupassati.
analyzed: rūpavantam vai attānam attani vā rūpam rūpasmin vā attānam vedanam attataḥ samanupassati

original: Vedanāvantaṃvā attānaṃ. Attanivā vedanaṃ. Vedanāpavā attānaṃ. Saññaṃ. Saṅkhāre. Viññāṇanti.
analyzed: vedanāvantam vai attānam attanivā vedanam vedanāpavā attānam saññam saṅkhāre viññāṇanti

original: Tattha rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti rūpameva attāti gaṇhāti. Rūpavantaṃvā attānanti
analyzed: tattha rūpam attataḥ samanupassati iti rūpam eva attā ati gaṇhāti rūpavantam vā attā ananti

original: attā me rūpavāti gaṇhāti. Attani vā rūpanti attānaṃ paṭicca rūpaṃ tiṭṭhatīti gaṇhāti.
analyzed: attā me rūpavā iti gaṇhāti attani vā rūpanti attānam paṭicca rūpam tiṭṭhati iti gaṇhāti

original: Rūpasmiṃvā attānanti rūpaṃ paṭicca attā tiṭṭhatīti gaṇhāti. Kathaṃ rūpakāyaṃ uddissa
analyzed: rūpasmin vā attā ananti rūpam paṭicca attā tiṭṭhati iti gaṇhāti katham rūpa kāyam uddissa

original: ajja ahaṃ thaddhomhīti vā ajja ahaṃ mudukomhītivā vadanto pathavi saṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ
analyzed: ajja aham thaddhomhi iti vā ajja aham mudukomhi itivā vadantaḥ pathavi saṅkhātam rūpam

original: attato samanupassatināma. Ajja mama kāyo thaddhotivā mudūtivā vadanto sesadhammevā
analyzed: attataḥ samanupassati nāma ajja mama kāyaḥ thaddho tivā mudu itivā vadantaḥ

original: dhammamuttakaṃvā attānaṃ gahetvā taṃ attānaṃ pathavīvantaṃ samanupassatināma. Ajja
analyzed: dhammamuttakam vā attānam gahetvā tam attānam pathavīvantam samanupassati nāma ajja

original: thaddhabhāvovā mudubhāvovā mayi jātoti vadanto attani pathaviṃsa manupassatināma.
analyzed: mayi jātaḥ iti vadantaḥ attani

original: Ajjāhaṃ thaddhabhāve ṭhitomhi mudubhāve ṭhito mhīti vadantopathavimhi attānaṃ samanussatināma.
analyzed: ajja aham thaddha bhāve ṭhitaḥ asmi mudu bhāve ṭhitaḥ mhi iti attānam samanussati nāma

original: Ayaṃ pathavimhi caturāvatthikāya saṃkkāyadiṭṭhiyā pavattākāro. Sesesu sattavīsatirūpesu

original: yathāsambhavaṃ vattabbo. Ahaṃ marāmi marissāmītiādinā hi aniccatāyaṃpi sādiṭṭhi pavattatiyeva.
analyzed: yathāsambhavam vattabbaḥ aham marāmi marissāmi iti ādinā hi anicca tā ayam pi sādiṭṭhi pavattatiyā iva

original: Sesarūpesu vattabbaṃ natthi. Idaṃ nāma ahaṃ pubbe saṃbhuñjiṃ. Ajja saṃbhuñjāmi. Parato
analyzed: sesa rūpesu vattabbam natthi idam nāma aham pubbe saṃbhuñjim ajja saṃbhuñjāmi paratas

original: saṃbhuñjissāmītivā sukhitomhi dukkhitomhītivā vedanaṃ attato samanupassati. Ajja
analyzed: saṃbhuñjissāmi itivā sukhitaḥ amhi dukkhitaḥ amhi itivā vedanam attataḥ samanupassati ajja

original: mama kāyo sukhito dukkhitotivā mamacittaṃ sukhitaṃ dukkhitantivā attānaṃ vedanāvantaṃ
analyzed: mama kāyaḥ sukhitaḥ dukkhitaḥ iti vā mama cittam sukhitam dukkhitam iti vā attānam vedanāvantam

original: samanupassati. Ajjasukhaṃvā dukkhaṃvā mayijātanti attani vedanaṃ samanupassati. Ajjāhaṃ
analyzed: samanupassati ajja sukham vā dukkham vā mayi jātanti attani vedanam samanupassati ajja aham

original: sukhita bhāve ṭhitomhi dukkhitabhāve ṭhitomhīti vedanāya attānaṃ samanupassatīti.
analyzed: sukhita bhāve ṭhitaḥ asmi dukkhita bhāve ṭhitaḥ asmi iti vedanāya attānam samanupassati iti

original: Saññāya sabbesuca paññāsamattesu saṅkhāresu visuṃ visuṃ vitthāretvā vattabbo. Ahaṃ
analyzed: saññāya sabbesu ca paññāsa mattesu saṅkhāresu visum visum vitthāretvā vattabbaḥ aham

original: passāmīti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ attato samanupassati. Dassanaṃ meti attānaṃ viññāṇavantaṃ
analyzed: passāmi iti cakkhu viññāṇam attataḥ samanupassati dassanam me ti attānam viññāṇavantam

original: samanupassati. Mayidassanaṃnāma atthīti attani viññāṇaṃ samanupassati, ahaṃ dassane
analyzed: samanupassati mayi dassanam nāma atthi iti attani viññāṇam samanupassati aham dassane

original: samatthomhīti viññāṇasmiṃ attānaṃ samanupassati. Ese vanayo sesesu pañcasu viññāṇesūti.

original: Aha masmi ahaṃ eko satto ekopuggalo eko jīvo eko loko eko naro manusso devosakko

original: brahmātivā ahaṃgacchāmi ahaṃ tiṭṭhāmi ahaṃ nisīdāmi ahaṃ nippajjāmi ahaṃ samiñjemi
analyzed: brahmātivā aham gacchāmi aham tiṭṭhāmi aham nisīdāmi aham nippajjāmi aham samiñjemi

original: pasāremītiādinā vā khandhapañcakaṃvā ekamekaṃvā khandhaṃ samūhato gahetvā pavattipi
analyzed: pasāremi iti ādinā vā khandha pañcakam vā ekam ekam vā khandham samūhataḥ gahetvā

original: vattabbā. Apariññātavatthukānañhi ekamuhutta mattepi yaṃkiñci attanovā parassavā
analyzed: vattabbā apariññāta vatthukānam hi eka muhutta matte pi yaṃkiñci attanaḥ vā parassa vā

original: attapaṭisaṃyuttavacanaṃ kathentānaṃ cittaṃvā vacanaṃvā yathāvutte rūpārūpadhamme
analyzed: atta paṭisaṃyutta vacanam kathentānam cittam vā vacanam vā yathā vutte rūpa arūpa dhamme

original: kadāci attato upādiyitvā pavattati. Kadāci attaparivāra bhāvena. Kadāci attanissitabhāvena.
analyzed: kadāci attataḥ upādiyitvā pavattati kadāci atta parivāra bhāvena kadāci atta nissita bhāvena

original: Kadāci attanissayabhāvena. Kadāci ekekadhammavasena. Kadāci samūhadhammavasenāti.
analyzed: kadāci atta nissaya bhāvena kadāci ekeka dhamma vasena kadāci samūha dhamma vasena ati

original: Yasmā pana attanimittaṃnāma vasavattanākāraṃ paṭicca upaṭṭhāti. Vasavattanā kāroca
analyzed: yasmai pana vasa vattana ākāram paṭicca upaṭṭhāti

original: rūpārūpadhammānaṃ paccayāyatta vuttikattaṃ khaṇi kattañca suṭṭhu passantānaṃ natthi.
analyzed: rūpa arūpa dhammānam paccaya āyatta vutti kattam suṭṭhu passantānam natthi

original: Tasmā pariññātavattukānaṃ atta paṭisaṃyuttavacanaṃ kathentānaṃpi cittaṃ paduminipatte
