original: udakabindu viya tesu dhammesu alaggitvāeva pavattatīti veditabbaṃ. Sattānaṃ cittasantāne
analyzed: udaka bindu viya tesu dhammesu a laggitvā eva pavattati iti veditabbam sattānam citta santāne

original: kusale dhamme anuppannevā uppādetuṃ uppannevā vā setuṃ adatvā nīvārentīti nīvaraṇāni.
analyzed: kusale dhamme uppādetum uppannevā vā setum a datvā nīvārenti iti nīvaraṇāni

original: Kāmanaṭṭhena kāmo, chandanaṭṭhenachandoti kāmacchando. Balavarāgo. Soevanīvaraṇanti
analyzed: kāmana ṭṭhena kāmo chandana ṭṭhena chando ti kāmacchandaḥ

original: kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ. Paṭṭhāneāruppekāmacchandaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ paṭiccauddhaccanīvaraṇanti
analyzed: kāmacchanda nīvaraṇam paṭṭhāne āruppe kāmacchandam nīvaraṇam paṭicca auddhacca nīvaraṇam ti

original: vuttattā pana thapetvā rūpārūparāge avaseso sabbolobho kāmacchande asaṅgahitonāma
analyzed: vutta ttā pana thapetvā rūpa arūpa rāge avasesaḥ sabba lobho kāmacchande asaṅgahitaḥ nāma

original: natthi. Jhānapaṭipakkhabhāvopana pañcakāmaguṇikarāgasseva hotīti veditabbo. Byāpajjanaṃ
analyzed: natthi pañca kāmaguṇika rāgassa iva hoti iti veditabbaḥ byāpajjanam

original: byāpādo. Cittassa pūtibhāvoti attho. Yokocidoso. Kasmā panettha thinamiddha nīvaraṇanti
analyzed: byāpādo cittassa pūti bhāvo ti attho yokocidoso kasmā pana ittha

original: ca uddhacca kukkucca nīvaraṇanti ca dve dve dhammā ekaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ katvā vuttāti.
analyzed: ca uddhat ca kukkucca nīvaraṇanti ca dve dve dhammā ekam nīvaraṇam katvā vuttā ati

original: Kiccato paccayato paṭipakkhatoca sadisattā. Tathā hi kiccato tāva thinamiddhadvayaṃ
analyzed: kiccataḥ paccayataḥ paṭipakkhato ca sadisa ttā tathā hi kiccataḥ tāva thinam iddha dvayam

original: cittuppādānaṃ līnabhāvā pādanakiccaṃ. Uddhaccakukkuccadvayaṃ avūpasantabhāvāpādanakiccaṃ.
analyzed: citta uppādānam līna bhāvā pādana kiccam uddhacca kukkucca dvayam a vūpasanta bhāva āpādana kiccam

original: Paccayato purimadvayaṃ tandivijambhi tatāpaccayaṃ. Pacchimadvayaṃ ñātibyasanādivitakkapaccayaṃ.
analyzed: paccayataḥ purima dvayam tat tā paccayam pacchima dvayam ñāti byasana ādi vitakka paccayam

original: Paṭipakkhato purimadvayaṃ vīriyapaṭipakkhaṃ. Pacchimadvayaṃ samathapaṭipakkhanti.
analyzed: paṭipakkhato purima dvayam vīriya paṭipakkham pacchima dvayam samatha paṭipakkhanti

original: Anusentīti anusayā. Anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti attho. Anuanu sentītivā
analyzed: anusenti iti anusayāḥ anurūpam kāraṇam labhitvā uppajjanti iti atthaḥ anu anu senti itivā

original: anusayā. Yāva maggaṃ napaṭilabhati. Tāva antarā aparikkhiyyamānā hutvā kāraṇalābhe
analyzed: anusayāḥ yāva maggam na paṭilabhati tāva antarā a parikkhiyyamānāḥ hutvā kāraṇa lābhe

original: sati punappunaṃ uppajjantīti attho. Uppajjanañcettha appahīnaṭṭhena uppajjanā rahabhāvo
analyzed: sati punappunam uppajjanti iti atthaḥ uppajjanam ca ittha appahīna ṭṭhena uppajjanā raha bhāvaḥ

original: veditabbo. Na pana sarūpato uppatti, kathaṃ viññā yatīti ce. Yassa kāmarāgānusayo
analyzed: veditabbaḥ na pana sarūpataḥ uppatti katham viññā yati iti ce yassa kāma rāga anusayo

analyzed: uppajjati tassa iva paṭigha anusayaḥ uppajjati iti vutta ttā evañca katvā pāḷiyam puthujjanassa

original: sattapi anusayā anusayavāre saha anusentīti uppajjanavāre saha uppajjantīti vuttā.
analyzed: satta pi anusayāḥ anusaya vāre saha anusenti iti uppajjana vāre saha uppajjanti iti vuttā

original: Yathāha puthujjanassa avijjānusayoca anuseti. Kāmarāga. Paṭigha. Māna. Diṭṭhi. Vicikicchā.

original: Bhavarāganusayoca anusetīti. Tathā uppajjanavārepīti.
analyzed: bhava rāj anusayaḥ ca anuseti iti tathā uppajjana vāre pi iti

original: Apica, sarūpato pariyuṭṭhānaṃ apatvā santāne pavattamānehi kusalākusalā byākatacittuppādehi
analyzed: apica sarūpataḥ pariyuṭṭhānam a patvā santāne pavattamānehi kusala akusalāḥ byākata cittuppādehi

original: sayitā hontīti anusayā. Anu anu sentītivā anusayā. Pakatiyā yathānusayitesueva kāmarāgādīsu
analyzed: sayitāḥ honti iti anusayāḥ anu anu senti itivā anusayāḥ yathā anusayitesu eva kāma rāga ādīsu

original: punappunaṃ uppajjitvā diguṇa tiguṇādi vasena punappunaṃ senti. Sayanākārena uparupari
analyzed: punappunam uppajjitvā diguṇa tiguṇa ādi vasena punappunam senti sayana ākārena upari upari

original: paliveṭhentīti attho.
analyzed: paliveṭhenti iti attho

original: Tīsu rāgādīnaṃ avatthāsu pathamāvatthāya ṭhitānaṃ kāmarāgā dīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
analyzed: tīsu rāga ādīnam avatthāsu pathama avatthāya adhivacanam

original: Tisso hi avatthā anusayāvatthā pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā vītikkamāvatthāti. Tattha ye kāmarāgādayo

original: Ye manasmiṃ eva javanacittasahajātā hutvā pavattanti, tesaṃ tathāpavattā avatthā
analyzed: ye manasmin eva javana citta sahajātāḥ hutvā pavattanti tesam tathāpavattāḥ avatthā

analyzed: ye pana javana sahajāta bhāvaṃpi a patvā

original: cikkasantānā nusayitā hutvā pariyuṭṭhānappattiyā bījabhāvena tiṭṭhanti, subhanimittādikeca

analyzed: ārammaṇe āpātam āgate vasena āvajjanam rāga ādi pātubhāva tthāya ayonisaḥ bhavaṅgam

analyzed: kāma rāga ādayaḥ anusayā nāma te pana

original: na honti. Ekantaparamatthajātikattā. Naca kusalābyākatabhūtā ekantākusalajātikattā.
analyzed: na honti ekanta paramattha jāti kattā na ca kusala abyākata bhūtāḥ ekanta akusala jāti kattā

original: Nāpi kusalābyākataviruddhā, visuṃ sampayuttadhammabhāvena anupaladdhattā. Nāpi kālattayavinimuttā,

analyzed: gacchanti tadā visum sampayutta dhamma bhāvam ca gacchanti tesam

analyzed: paribyattaḥ hoti etad attham sandhāya kathā vatthumhi tesam sa ārammaṇa dhamma bhāvo

original: patiṭṭhāpito hotīti.
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpitaḥ hoti iti

original: Yathā pana phaladhārimhi rukkhamhi visakaṇṭake dinne rukkhānusayito phaluppattiyā
analyzed: yathā pana phala dhārimhi rukkhamhi visakaṇṭake dinne rukkha anusayito phala uppattiyā

analyzed: paccaya bhūto sinehaḥ parikkhayam gacchati samaye uppajjissamānāni phalāni na uppajjanti

original: Evaṃ sānusaye citta santāne yasmiṃ khaṇe maggo pātubhavati, tasmiṃ sahamagguppādā

analyzed: saḥ saḥ anusayaḥ parikkhayam gacchati parikkhīṇassa pana puna pariyuṭṭhānam nāma natthi

original: kuto vītikkamoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya maggo anāgatasāmaññaṃ kilesajātaṃ pajahatīti

original: tattha tattha vutto. Tattha anāgatasāmaññanti anāgatasammataṃ, na ekanta anāgataṃ.

analyzed: na vattabbā ti vuttam etena ca maggaḥ kilesa mukhena yāni kusala akusala kammāni ca upādinnaka khandha pañcake ca

original: pajahati, te atītātivāanāgatātivā paccuppannātivā navattabbāti dīpeti. Yadi evaṃ
analyzed: pajahati te atītā ativā anāgatā ativā paccuppannā ativā na vattabbā ati dīpeti yadi evam

analyzed: maggena pahīnā sabbe tebhūmaka dhammā kāla vimuttā nāma ataṅkhatāḥ nāma apaccayā nāma

original: siyunti.Na. Tekālikajātikattā saṅkhata sapaccayajātikattā ca. Te hi magge anuppanne
analyzed: tekālika jātika ttā sa paccaya jātika ttā ca te hi magge an uppanne

original: gahitattā lakkhaṇavasena tebhūmakādibhāvaṃ bhajantīti. Evañca katvā visuṃ sampayuttadhammabhāvaṃ

analyzed: ṭhitānam sabhāvānam jāti vasena paramattha dhamma tā akusala ādi tā ca paccetabbā hoti iti

original: [208] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: tadavatthā anusayāti vuccanti. Te pana nippariyāyato anāgata kilesā. Atītapaccuppannāpi
analyzed: tad avatthāḥ anusayā ti vuccanti te pana nippariyāyataḥ anāgata kilesāḥ atīta paccuppannā api

original: taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha anusayānāma santāne kadācipi anuppanna

analyzed: pubbā anāgata kilesā eva iti katvā santāne anu viya honti iti vuttam tat na yujjati

original: Na hi te anuanusayitā viya honti. Ekantena anusayitāeva hontīti.
analyzed: na hi te anuanusayitāḥ viya honti ekantena anusayitāḥ eva honti iti

original: [209] Yañca tattha
analyzed: yañca tattha

original: “Te pana nippariyāyato anāgatakilesā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yuttaṃ.
analyzed: te pana nippariyāyataḥ anāgata kilesā ti vuttam tat pi na yuttam

original: Na hi maggena appahīnā anusayā anāgatānāma honti. Pahīnāpica nippariyāyato anāgatāti
analyzed: na hi maggena appahīnāḥ anusayāḥ anāgatā nāma honti pahīnā api ca nippariyāyataḥ anāgatā ati

analyzed: na sakkā vattum anāgata sāmaññassa adhippeta ttā ti etena atīta paccuppannā api

analyzed: tekālika tā hoti iti tad apattānam anusayānam paccuppanna tā pariyāyā uva vattum yuttaḥ

original: Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ yassa kāmarāganusayo uppajjati, tassa paṭighānusayo uppajjatītiādinā
analyzed: evañca katvā pāḷiyam yassa kāma rāga anusayaḥ uppajjati tassa paṭigha anusayaḥ uppajjati iti ādinā

analyzed: paccuppanna kālikaḥ uppāda vāraḥ eva vuttaḥ na nirodha vāraḥ na ca atīta anāgata vārā ti

original: Yaṃ pana paṭisambhidāmagge hañci paccuppanne kilese pajahati. Tena hi ratto rāgaṃ

original: Bhutvāvigatuppannaṃ atītameva. Okāsa katuppannaṃ anāgatameva. Tadubhayaṃ pana paccuppannasamīpattā
analyzed: atītam eva okāsa kata uppannam anāgatam eva tat ubhayam pana paccuppanna samīpa ttā

original: uppannanti vuttaṃ. Samīpapaccuppannanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: uppannanti vuttam samīpa paccuppannanti vuttam hoti

analyzed: pariyuṭṭhāna vegaḥ bhāvena

original: tesaññeva nāmaṃ. Anusayā hi nāma anamatagge saṃsāre punappunaṃ pariyuṭṭhānapattānaṃ

original: kilesānaṃ vasena uparupari thira tara daḷhatara pattiyā pakatiyāpi thāmagatāevanāma
analyzed: kilesānam vasena uparupari thira tara daḷhatara

original: honti. Na yenavā tenavā vāyāmena pajahituṃ sakkuṇeyyā. Evaṃ santepi yadā yo yo anusayo
analyzed: honti na yena vā tena vā vāyāmena pajahitum evam sante pi yadā yaḥ yaḥ anusayaḥ

original: paccayalābhena pariyuṭṭhāna bahulo hoti, tadā so so visesena adhimattathāma gatabhāvaṃ
analyzed: paccaya lābhena pariyuṭṭhāna bahulaḥ hoti tadā saḥ saḥ visesena gata bhāvam

analyzed: saḥ saḥ manda thāma gata bhāvam patvā ṭhitaḥ hoti iti

original: vipassanāhi suṭṭhuaniggahitānaṃ tesaññeva nāmaṃ. Asamugghāṭi tuppannaṃnāma maggena

original: accantapaṭipakkhā hontīti heṭṭhimā maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhā sekkhā attano maggaphalakkhaṇesu

analyzed: upari anusayehi sa anusayā ativā nira anusayā ativā

original: navattabbā. Tasmā anusayānaṃ tādise paccuppanna bhāve satipi hañci paccuppanne kilese

original: pajahati. Tenahi thāmagato anusayaṃ pajahatīti vutta doso natthīti veditabboti. Kāmarāgoeva
analyzed: pajahati tena hi thāma gataḥ anusayam pajahati iti vutta doso na atthi iti veditabbaḥ ti kāma rāgaḥ eva

original: anusayo kāmarāgānusayo.
analyzed: anusayaḥ kāma rāga anusayaḥ

original: Saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanāni, tāni pana sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso
analyzed: saṃyojenti bandhanti iti saṃyojanāni tāni pana sakkāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbata parāmāso

original: kāmacchando byāpādoti pañca orambhāgiyāni. Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ avijjāti

analyzed: pañca uddhaṃbhāgiyāni iti suttante abhidhamme ca dasa saṃyojanāni āgatāni itarāni pana

analyzed: abhidhamme eva āgatāni iti tatas visesa karaṇa attham suttante ti vuttam kamaḥ pana dvinnam pi

original: pāḷiyā nasameti. Sabhāga dhammasaṅgahavasena pana idha aññathā kamo vutto siyāti.
analyzed: pāḷiyā dhamma saṅgaha vasena pana idha aññathā kamaḥ vuttaḥ siyāti

original: Cittaṃ kilissanti vibādhenti upatāpenticāti kilesā. Kilissantivā malīnabhāvaṃ nihīnabhāvañca
analyzed: cittam kilissanti vibādhenti upatāpenti ca ati kilesā kilissanti vā malīna bhāvam nihīna bhāvam ca

original: gacchanti sattā etehīti kilesā. Kāmabhavanāmenāti vatthukāmadīpakena kāmanāmena rūpārūpabhavadīpakena
analyzed: gacchanti sattāḥ etehi iti kilesā kāma bhava nāmena ati vatthu kāma dīpakena kāma nāmena rūpa arūpa bhava dīpakena

original: ca bhavanāmena. Tādisaṃ kāma bhavasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ vatthu etissāti tabbatthukā.

analyzed: yañca tattha

original: [212] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana

original: [213] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

analyzed: sampayutta dhammesu thira bhāvaḥ ti ca paṭipakkhehi a kampiya tā ti ca atthataḥ nānatta abhāvato ti

original: Vīriyasamādhibalāni kusalākusalābyākatāni. Ahirikānottappāni akusalabalāni. Sesāni
analyzed: vīriya samādhi balāni kusala akusala abyākatāni ahirika anottappāni akusala balāni sesāni

original: kusalābyākatānīti. Adhipatīti ettha patīti sāmi issaro. So pana padesa issaro sakalissaroti
analyzed: kusala abyākatāni iti adhipati iti ettha pati iti sāmi issaro so pana padesa issaro sakalissaro ti

original: duvidho. Tattha indriyāni paresaṃ visaye sayaṃ paravase vattitvā attano visayeeva
analyzed: duvidhaḥ tattha indriyāni paresam visaye sayam para vase vattitvā attanaḥ visaye eva

original: parehi attano vase vattāpentīti padesissarā nāma. Pubbāti saṅkhāravasena pubbāgamanavasena
analyzed: parehi attanaḥ vase vattāpenti iti padesissarā nāma pubbā ti saṅkhāra vasena pubba āgamana vasena

original: vā visesetvā pavattaṃ adhipatiṭṭhānaṃ patvā pana añño dutiyo issaronāma natthi. Tasmā
analyzed: vā visesetvā pavattam adhipati ṭhānam patvā pana aññaḥ dutiyaḥ issaro nāma natthi tasmā

original: adhiko patīti adhipati. Attā dhīnavuttīnaṃ patīti adhipatītica vadanti.
analyzed: adhikaḥ pati iti adhipati attā dhīnavuttīnam pati iti adhipati iti ca vadanti

original: Chandoeva adhipatīti chandādhipati. Chandavato kiṃnāma kammaṃ nasijjhatīti evaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhāravasenavā
analyzed: chandaḥ eva adhipati iti chanda adhipati chandavataḥ kiṃnāma kammam evam evam

original: pubbe atītabhavesu suṭṭhu āsevitachandāgamanavasenavā tesu tesu kalyāṇa pāpakammesu
analyzed: pubbe atīta bhavesu suṭṭhu tesu tesu kalyāṇa pāpa kammesu

original: sampayuttadhamme mahoghoviya tiṇapaṇṇakasaṭe attaparādhīne niccaṃ paggahitadhure
analyzed: sampayutta dhamme atta para adhīne niccam paggahita dhure

original: katvā pavatto kattukamyatā chando. Esa nayo sesesupi. Nanu cettha pacchimā tayo dhammā
analyzed: katvā pavattaḥ kattu kamyatā chando esa nayo sesesu pi nanu ca ittha pacchimā tayaḥ dhammā

original: adhipatibhāvaṃ gaṇhantā indriyabhāvaṃ avijahitvāva gaṇhantīti adhipatibhūtāva samānā
analyzed: adhipati bhāvam gaṇhantau indriya bhāvam a vijahitvā ava gaṇhanti iti adhipati bhūtā ava samānā

original: indriyakiccavasena paravasepi vattantīti. Saccaṃ, aññaṃ pana adhipatikiccaṃ, aññaṃ
analyzed: indriya kicca vasena para vase pi vattanti iti saccam aññam pana adhipati kiccam aññam

original: indriyakiccanti natthettha dosoti. Yathā hi rājā cakkavattī ekassa attano purohitassa
analyzed: indriya kiccanti nattha ittha doso ti yathā hi rājā cakkavattī ekassa attano purohitassa

original: santike ekaṃ dibbavijjaṃ gaṇhāti. Na ettāvatā rājā cakkavattināma nahoti. Naca vijjāhetu
analyzed: santike ekam dibba vijjam gaṇhāti na ettāvatā rājā cakkavatti nāma nahoti na ca vijjā hetu

original: aññassa vasena vattati. Aññañhi cakkavatti rajjakiccaṃ, aññaṃ vijjāgahaṇa kiccanti.
analyzed: aññassa vasena vattati aññan hi cakkavatti rajja kiccam aññam vijjā gahaṇa kiccanti

original: Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha adhipatikiccaṃnāma taṃtaṃkicca visesaṃ anapekkhitvā
analyzed: evam sampadam idam daṭṭhabbam tattha adhipati kiccam nāma tad tad kicca visesam an apekkhitvā

original: atulyabalena abhibhavitvā sahajāta dhamme attano attano kiccesu anivattamāne katvā
analyzed: atulya balena abhibhavitvā sahajāta dhamme attano attano kiccesu anivattamāne katvā

original: dhura vāhitā. Indriyakiccaṃ pana vijānanādikiccaṃ ārabbha pavuccatīti.
analyzed: indriya kiccam pana vijānana ādi kiccam ārabbha pavuccati iti

original: Āharanti sahajātādipaccayasāmaññato atirekena asādhāraṇapaccayasattivisesena haranti
analyzed: āharanti sahajāta ādi paccaya sāmaññataḥ atirekena asādhāraṇa paccaya satti visesena haranti

original: pavattentīti āhārā. Āharantivā ajjhattasambhūtā te te paccayadhammā paccayuppannadhammāca
analyzed: pavattenti iti āhārā āharanti vā ajjhatta sambhūtā te te paccaya dhammā paccaya uppanna dhammā ca

original: attānañceva attano attano paccayakiccaṃ paccayuppannakiccañca suṭṭhu haranti vahanti
analyzed: attānam ca iva attanaḥ attanaḥ paccaya kiccam paccayuppanna kiccam ca suṭṭhu haranti vahanti

original: etehīti āhārā. Yathāhasabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti. Etthaca sabbe sattāti etena sabbe
analyzed: etehi iti āhārāḥ yathā āha sabbe sattā āhāra ṭṭhitikā ati ettha ca sabbe sattā ati etena sabbe

original: ajjhattasambhūtā paccayapaccayuppannadhammā vuttā. Āhāraṭṭhitikāti paccayaṭṭhitikā.
analyzed: ajjhatta sambhūtā paccaya paccaya uppanna dhammā vuttā āhāra ṭṭhitikā ati paccaya ṭṭhitikā

original: Yathārahaṃ catuvīsatipaccayehi ṭhitisabhāvāti attho. Nanucettha paccayāhārova vutto.
analyzed: yathāraham catuvīsati paccayehi ṭhiti sabhāvā ti atthaḥ nanu ca ittha paccaya āhāraḥ eva vutto

original: Na āhārapaccayo. Idha pana catubbidho āhārapaccayadhammova vuttoti. Saccaṃ, paccayaṭṭhena
analyzed: na āhāra paccayaḥ idha pana catubbidhaḥ āhāra paccaya dhammaḥ u vuttaḥ ti saccam paccaya ṭṭhena

original: pana āhāranāmakānaṃ sabbesaṃ catuvīsatipaccayadhammānaṃ majjhe yedhammā cattāro āhārāti
analyzed: pana āhāra nāmakānam sabbesam catuvīsati paccaya dhammānam majjhe ye dhammā cattāro āhārā ti

original: visesetvā vuttā. Te tesaṃ paccayāhārānaṃpi āhārabhūtāti siddhā hontīti. Imasmiṃ atthe
analyzed: visesetvā vuttā te tesam paccaya āhārānam pi āhāra bhūtā ati siddhā honti iti imasmin atthe

original: catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ mahanta bhāvo pākaṭo hotīti.
analyzed: mahanta bhāvaḥ pākaṭaḥ hoti iti

original: Tattha yathā yavabījānaṃvā sālibījānaṃvā ānubhāvo nāma kaḷiraṅkurānaṃ uppādāna padhānaṃ
analyzed: tattha yathā yava bījānam vā sāli bījānam vā ānubhāvaḥ nāma uppādāna padhānam

original: hoti. Tatoparaṃ pana sassabhāvaṃ patvā cha pañca māse vaḍḍhiyāvā ṭhitiyāvā pathavi
analyzed: hoti tatas uparam pana sassa bhāvam patvā cha pañca māse vaḍḍhiyāvā ṭhitiyāvā pathavi

original: rasaāporasānaṃ ānubhāvo padhānaṃ hoti. Evamevaṃ kabaḷī kārāhārūpajīvīnaṃ kāmasattānaṃ
analyzed: padhānam hoti evam evam kabaḷī kārā hārūpa jīvīnam kāma sattānam

original: kammassa ānubhāvonāma paṭisandhirūpuppādane padhānaṃ hoti. Tatoparaṃ pana yāvatāyukaṃ
analyzed: kammassa ānubhāvaḥ nāma paṭisandhiḥ ūpa uppādane padhānam hoti tatoparam pana yāvatāyukam

original: vaḍḍhīyāvāṭhitiyāvā utuāhārānaṃ ānubhāvo padhānaṃ hoti. Kammajarūpāni hi yāva āsannamaraṇā
analyzed: padhānam hoti kamma ja rūpāni hi yāvaḥ āsanna maraṇā

original: pavattamānānipi utuāhārehi anuggahitānieva pavattanti. Utuca āhāru patthambhitoyeva
analyzed: pavattamānāni pi utu āhārehi anuggahitāni eva pavattanti

original: attano kiccaṃ karoti. Tasmā tesaṃ sattānaṃ catusantatirūpaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārena anupatthambhīyamānaṃ
analyzed: attano kiccam karoti tasmā tesam sattānam catu santati rūpam kabaḷīkāra āhārena an upatthambhīyamānam

original: ciraṃ napavattati. Upatthambhīyamānaṃeva yāvatāyukaṃ pavattati. Yathāca sakuṇāvā
analyzed: ciram na pavattati upatthambhīyamānam eva yāvatā āyukam pavattati yathā ca sakuṇāvā

original: ḍaṃsamakasā dayovā tuṇḍena āhāraṃ gahetvā attabhāvaṃ posenti. Tuṇḍe asante āhāraṃ
analyzed: ḍaṃsama kasāḥ tuṇḍena āhāram gahetvā atta bhāvam posenti tuṇḍe asante āhāram

original: alabhantā maranti. Evameva ime sattā phassena ārammaṇesu rasaṃ gahetvā vedanāsaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: alabhantā maranti evam eva ime sattā phassena ārammaṇesu rasam gahetvā vedanā saṅkhātam

original: upabhogaparibhogaṃ sampādetvā taṇhāvepullaṃ patvā tividhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ pūretvā yāvajjatanāpi
analyzed: upabhoga paribhogam sampādetvā taṇhā vepullam patvā tividham vaṭṭam pūretvā yāvat jatana api

original: vaṭṭe anukaṇṭhamānā pavattanti.
analyzed: vaṭṭe anukaṇṭhamānā pavattanti

original: Yadi hi phassonāma na siyā, ārammaṇarasaṃ alabhitvā vedanā paribhogarahitena taṇhuppattiyā
analyzed: yadi hi phassaḥ nāma na siyā ārammaṇa rasam a labhitvā vedanā paribhoga rahitena taṇhā uppattiyā

original: okāso natthīti tividhavaṭṭameva nasiyāti. Yathāca te sakuṇādayo pakkhe viyūhitvā
analyzed: okāsaḥ natthi iti tividha vaṭṭam eva nasiyā ati yathā ca te sakuṇa ādayo pakkhe viyūhitvā

original: antarā apatamānā rukkhato rukkhaṃ vanato vanaṃ vicaritvā attānaṃ yāpenti. Pakkhesu
analyzed: antarā a patamānāḥ rukkhataḥ rukkham vanataḥ vanam vicaritvā attānam yāpenti pakkhesu

original: asantesu gamanaṃ asampādentā patitvā maranti. Evamevaṃ ime sattā āyūhanalakkhaṇāya
analyzed: asantesu gamanam patitvā maranti evam evam ime sattā āyūhana lakkhaṇāya

original: cetanāya cetayitvā kammasamaṅgitaṃ sampādetvā bhavato bhavaṃ vicaritvā yāvajjatanā
analyzed: cetanāya cetayitvā kamma samaṅgitam sampādetvā bhavataḥ bhavam vicaritvā yāvajjatanā

original: vaṭṭe saṃsaranti. Yadi hi cetanānāma na siyā, kammavaṭṭassa abhāvo. Tadabhāveca vipākavaṭṭassa
analyzed: vaṭṭe saṃsaranti yadi hi cetanā nāma na siyā kamma vaṭṭassa abhāvo tad abhāve ca vipāka vaṭṭassa

original: abhāvo. Tadabhāveca tadanusayitassa kilesavaṭṭassa abhāvoti vaṭṭaṃnāma na siyāti.
analyzed: abhāvo tad abhāve ca tad anusayitassa kilesa vaṭṭassa abhāvo ti vaṭṭam nāma na siyāti

original: Yathāca te sakuṇādayo cakkhunā gocaraṭṭhānaṃvā taṃtaṃdisābhāgaṃvā vibhāvetvā yāvajīvaṃ
analyzed: yathā ca te sakuṇa ādayo cakkhunā gocara ṭṭhānam vā taṃ taṃ disā bhāgam vā vibhāvetvā yāvajīvam

original: attānaṃ yāpenti. Cakkhusmiṃ asante kiñcigahetabbavatthuṃvā gantabbaṭṭhānaṃvā alabhitvā
analyzed: attānam yāpenti cakkhusmiṃ a sante kiñci gahetabba vatthum vā gantabba ṭṭhānam vā a labhitvā

original: tattheva maranti. Evamevaṃ sampayuttā dhammā ārammaṇavijānalakkhaṇena viññāṇena taṃtaṃārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tattha iva maranti evam evam sampayuttāḥ dhammāḥ ārammaṇa vijāna lakkhaṇena viññāṇena tat tat ārammaṇam

original: labhitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ phassādayo uppādetvā tividhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭenti. Yadi hi viññāṇaṃnāma
analyzed: labhitvā tasmin tasmin phassa ādayaḥ uppādetvā tividham vaṭṭam vaṭṭenti yadi hi viññāṇaṃ nāma

original: na siyā, phassādīnaṃ ārammaṇalābhoyeva natthīti vaṭṭameva na siyāti. Tenāha cattāro
analyzed: na siyā phassa ādīnam ārammaṇa lābho yeva natthi iti vaṭṭam eva na siyā ti tena āha cattāro

original: āhārā.La. Viññāṇaṃ catutthanti. Saṃyuttakeca –
analyzed: viññāṇam catutthan ti saṃyuttake ca

original: Cattārome bhikkhave āhārā bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃvā sattānaṃ anuggahāya
analyzed: cattāraḥ me bhikkhave āhārāḥ bhūtānam vā sattānam ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnam vā sattānam anuggahāya

original: kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷārikovā sukhumovā, phasso dutīyo, manosañcetanā tatīyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthanti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: kabaḷīkāraḥ āhāraḥ oḷārikaḥ vā sukhumaḥ vā phassaḥ dutīyaḥ manaḥ sañcetanā tatīyā viññāṇam catuttham ti vuttam

original: Tattha bhūtānanti vuddhippattānaṃ. Sambhavesīnanti kalalādi kāle ṭhitānaṃ. Catunnaṃpana
analyzed: tattha bhūtānam ti vuddhi pattānam kalala ādi kāle ṭhitānam catunnam pana

original: āhārānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭevā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavevā ṭhitiyāvā
analyzed: yathāsambhavam tasmin tasmin

original: anuggahāyavā pavatti ākāro vuttanayena veditabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kopanettha āhāro.
analyzed: pavatti ākāraḥ vutta nayena veditabbaḥ aṭṭhakathāyam pana kopanā ittha āhāro

original: Kiṃ āhāretīti. Kabaḷīkārā hāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āhāreti. Phassāhāro tisso vedanā.
analyzed: kim āhāreti iti kabaḷīkārāḥ hāro ojaṭṭha maka rūpāni āhāreti phassa āhāro tissaḥ vedanā

original: Manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave. Viññāṇā hāro paṭisandhināmarūpanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pākaṭaphalavasena
analyzed: manaḥ sañcetanā āhāro tayaḥ bhave viññāṇā hāro paṭisandhi nāma rūpan ti vuttam tam pākaṭa phala vasena

original: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ojaṭṭhamakarūpuppādanaṃ pana kabaḷīkārāhārassa mahantaṃ kiccaṃ
analyzed: vuttanti daṭṭhabbam ojaṭṭha maka rūpa uppādanam pana kabaḷīkāra āhārassa mahantam kiccam

original: nahoti. Catusantatirūpupatthambhanameva mahantaṃ. Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ ṭhitiyātica anuggahāyātica vuttaṃ.
analyzed: catu santati rūpa upatthambhanam eva mahantam tena iva hi pāḷiyam ṭhitiyā ati ca anuggahāya ati ca vuttam

original: Apica yathā upanissayāsevanapaccayā suttanti kapariyāyā abhidhammapariyāyātica duvidhā
analyzed: apica yathā upanissaya āsevana paccayā suttanti ka pariyāyā abhidhamma pariyāyā ati ca duvidhā

original: honti. Tathā āhārapaccayopi duvidho. Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ manosañcetanāhāro tayobhaveti.
analyzed: honti tathā āhāra paccayaḥ api duvidhaḥ tattha yam vuttam manaḥ sañcetanā āhāro

original: Taṃ suttantikapariyāyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Nahi paṭṭhāne arūpā hārā asahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ
analyzed: tam suttantika pariyāyam sandhāya vuttam nahi paṭṭhāne arūpāḥ hārāḥ asahajātānam dhammānam

original: āhāraṭṭhena paccayānāma hontīti. Pañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni nalabbhanti. Tāni hi dubbalakiccaṭṭhānavatthukattā
analyzed: āhāra aṭṭhena paccayā nāma honti iti pañca viññāṇesu jhāna aṅgāni na labbhanti tāni hi dubbala kicca ṭṭhāna vatthuka ttā

original: rūpādīsu abhinipātamattāni hontīti na tesu vijjamānā vedanā ekaggatā jhānakiccaṃ
analyzed: rūpa ādīsu abhinipāta mattāni honti iti na tesu vijjamānā vedanā ekagga tā jhāna kiccam

original: sādhentīti. Vitakkapacchimakaṃ jhānantica vuttaṃ. Jhānaṅgānaṃ nāyakabhūtoca vitakko
analyzed: sādhenti iti vitakka pacchimakam jhānan ti ca vuttam jhāna aṅgānam nāyaka bhūtaḥ ca vitakko

original: tesu natthīti tattha tāvedanā ekaggatāyo taṃ na sādhentīti. Vīriyupatthambharahitā
analyzed: tesu natthi iti tattha tā vedanā ekagga tāyaḥ tam na sādhenti iti vīriya upatthambha rahitā

original: dhammā sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvappattā nahontīti avīriyesu soḷasāhetukacittesu
analyzed: dhammā sampayutta dhammesu thira bhāva pattāḥ na honti iti a vīriyesu soḷasa ahetuka cittesu

original: samādhibalakiccaṃ na sādheti. Vīriyapacchimakaṃ balanti hi vuttanti āha avīriyesu
analyzed: samādhi bala kiccam na sādheti vīriya pacchimakam balanti hi vuttanti āha a vīriyesu

original: balāni nalabbhantīti. Heturahitā ca dhammā vaṭṭassa vivaṭṭassaca pattiyā pathabhāvaṃ
analyzed: balāni na labbhanti iti hetu rahitā ca dhammā vaṭṭassa vivaṭṭassa ca pattiyā patha bhāvam

original: nagacchanti. Hetupacchimako maggoti hi vuttanti āha ahetukesu maggaṅgāni na labbhantīti.
analyzed: na gacchanti hetu pacchimakaḥ maggaḥ ti hi vuttanti āha ahetukesu maggaṅgāni na labbhanti iti

original: Vicikicchāsampayuttecitte ekaggatā adhimokkharahi tattā ekantena saṃsappanasabhāvāya
analyzed: vicikicchā sampayutte citte ekagga tā adhimokkha rahi tattā ekantena saṃsappana sabhāvāya

original: vicikicchāya abhibhūtattā ca maggindriyabalabhāvāya balavatī nahotīti vuttaṃ vicikicchā
analyzed: vicikicchāya abhibhūta ttā ca maggindriya bala bhāvāya balavatī nahoti iti vuttam vicikicchā

original: citte ekaggatā maggindriyabalabhāvaṃ na gacchatīti. Dvihetuka tihetuka javanesvevāti
analyzed: citte ekagga tā maggindriya bala bhāvam na gacchati iti dvi hetuka ti hetuka javanesu eva ati

original: ettha dvihetuka tihetukasaddena momūhadvayahasanajavanāni nivatteti. Javanasaddena
analyzed: ettha dvi hetuka ti hetuka saddena momūha dvaya hasana javanāni nivattā iti javana saddena

original: tibhūmakāni dvihetukatihetukavipākāni nivatteti.
analyzed: ti bhūmakāni dvi hetuka ti hetuka vipākāni

original: [214] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Dvihetukatihetukagahaṇena ekahetukesu adhipatīnaṃ abhāvaṃ dassetī”ti vuttaṃ, javanabhāvasāmaññattā pana hasanacittepi tesaṃ abhāvo dassetabboyeva hotīti.
analyzed: dvi hetuka ti hetuka gahaṇena eka hetukesu adhipatīnam abhāvam dasseti iti vuttam javana bhāva sāmañña ttā pana hasana citte pi tesam abhāvaḥ dassetabbaḥ yeva hoti iti

original: Yathāsambhavanti laddhapubbāti saṅkhārassa laddhapubbāgamassa ca ekekassa adhipatino
analyzed: yathā sambhavanti laddha pubbā ati saṅkhārassa laddha pubba āgamassa ca ekekassa adhipatino

original: sambhavānurūpaṃ ekova labbhati. Na dutiyo. Itarathā adhipatieva nasiyāti. Evañca
analyzed: sambhava anurūpam ekaḥ iva labbhati na dutiyaḥ itarathā evam ca

original: katvā paṭṭhāne yathā indriyapaccayavibhaṅge arūpinoindriyā sampayuttakānaṃdhammānaṃ
analyzed: katvā paṭṭhāne yathā indriya paccaya vibhaṅge arūpino indriyā sampayuttakānam dhammānam

original: taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayoti vuttaṃ. Na tathā adhipatipaccayavibhaṅge.

analyzed: yañca tattha

original: Nevasaññā nāsaññā yatanajjhānaṃ iddhināma. Sotā pattimaggo iddhipādonāma. Sakadāgāmimaggo
analyzed: nevasaññā na asaññā yatana jhānaṃ iddhi nāma sotā patti maggo iddhipādo nāma sakadāgāmi maggo

original: iddhināma.La. Arahattamaggo iddhināmāti ca vuttaṃ. Taṃtaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ iddhipādonāma.
analyzed: arahatta maggo iddhi nāmā ti ca vuttam taṃ tam pādaka jjhānam iddhipādo nāma

original: Tato tato vuṭṭhahitvā uppāditamaggo iddhināmātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Idha pana uttaracūḷabhājaniye
analyzed: tatas tatas vuṭṭhahitvā uppādita maggaḥ vattum pana uttaracūḷa bhājaniye

original: āgatanayena cattāro adhipatidhammāeva iddhipādāti vuttā.
analyzed: āgata nayena cattāro adhipati dhammā eva iddhipādā ti vuttā

original: Tattha pana lokuttarabhūtāeva adhippetā. Idha lokiya lokuttara missakabhūtāti. Indriyabalāni
analyzed: tattha pana lokuttara bhūtā eva adhippetā idha indriya balāni

original: atthato heṭṭhā vuttāneva. Pākaṭaṭṭhānato pana catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhāya thāmo
analyzed: atthataḥ heṭṭhā vuttāna eva pākaṭa ṭṭhānato pana catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhāya thāmo

original: veditabbo. Yathāha-kattha bhikkhave saddhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu
analyzed: veditabbaḥ yathā āhakattha bhikkhave saddhi indriyam daṭṭhabbam catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu

original: ettha saddhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. Catūsu sammappadhānesu vīriyassa. Yathāha-kattha
analyzed: ettha saddhi indriyam daṭṭhabbanti catūsu sammappadhānesu vīriyassa

original: bhikkhave vīriyindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu sammappadhānesu ettha vīriyindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave vīriya indriyam daṭṭhabbam catūsu sammappadhānesu ettha vīriya indriyam daṭṭhabbanti

original: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu satiyā. Yathāha-kattha bhikkhavesatindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu
analyzed: catūsu sati paṭṭhānesu satiyāḥ yathā ahakattha bhikkhave sati indriyam daṭṭhabbam catūsu

original: satipaṭṭhānesuettha satindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. Catūsu jhānesu samādhissa. Yathāha-kattha
analyzed: sati paṭṭhānesu ettha sati indriyam daṭṭhabbanti catūsu jhānesu samādhissa

original: bhikkhave samādhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu jhānesu ettha samādhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti.
analyzed: bhikkhave samādhi indriyam daṭṭhabbam catūsu jhānesu ettha samādhi indriyam daṭṭhabbanti

original: Catūsu ariyasaccesu paññāya thāmo veditabbo. Yathāha-kattha bhikkhave paññindriyaṃ
analyzed: catūsu ariya saccesu paññāya thāmaḥ veditabbo yathā ahakattha bhikkhave paññindriyam

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu ariyasaccesu ettha paññindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. Sambodhi vuccati
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam catūsu ariya saccesu ettha paññindriyam daṭṭhabbanti sambodhi vuccati

original: catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, samantato bujjhati paṭivijjhati bujjhanti vā etāyāti katvā.
analyzed: catūsu maggesu ñāṇam samantataḥ bujjhati paṭivijjhati bujjhanti vā etāya ati katvā

original: Sā hi catusaccadhammaṃ bujjhamānā ekakkhaṇe soḷasahi atthehi saddhiṃ samantato bujjhati,
analyzed: sā hi catu sacca dhammam bujjhamānā eka kkhaṇe soḷasahi atthehi saddhim samantataḥ bujjhati

original: na ekadesa toti tassā sambodhiyā samuṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena sambodhiyā aṅgo sahakārībalavapaccayoti
analyzed: na eka desa toti tassā sambodhiyā samuṭṭhāpana ṭṭhena sambodhiyā aṅgo sahakārī balava paccayoti

original: sambojjhaṅgo. Satieva sambojjhaṅgo satisambojjhaṅgo. Sā hi kāyādīsu catūsu attano
analyzed: sambojjhaṅaḥ sati eva sambojjhaṅgaḥ sati sambojjhaṅgaḥ sā hi kāya ādīsu catūsu attanaḥ

original: gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhusaṃvaḍḍhamānā anupubbena sabbapamāda pakkhaṃ vidhametvā

original: sabbaṃ appamādapakkhañca pūretvā catumaggaññāṇa saṅkhātaṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti.
analyzed: sabbam appamāda pakkhañca pūretvā catu magga ññāṇa saṅkhātam sambodhim samuṭṭhāpeti iti

original: Vipassanāya bhūmibhūte ajjhatta bahiddhādhamme vicināti kakkhaḷattaphusanādīhi aniccatādīhica
analyzed: vipassanāya bhūmi bhūte ajjhatta bahiddhā dhamme vicināti kakkhaḷatta phusana ādīhi anicca tā ādīhi ca

original: vividhā kārehi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumānoviya tesu daṭṭhabbākāraṃ asesaṃ upadhāretīti
analyzed: vividhā kārehi cuṇṇa vicuṇṇam tesu daṭṭhabba ākāram asesam upadhāreti iti

original: dhammavicayo. Soeva sambojjhaṅgoti dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgo. Sopi hi attano gocarabhūtesu
analyzed: dhammavicayo saḥ eva sambojjhaṅgo ti dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgo saḥ api hi attanaḥ gocara bhūtesu

original: tesu dhammesu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhusaṃvaḍḍhamāno anupubbena sabbaṃsammoha pakkhaṃ

original: vidhametvā sabbaṃ asammohapakkhaṃ pūretvā sayaṃ catumaggañāṇa sambodhi hutvā samuṭṭhahatīti.
analyzed: vidhametvā sabbam asammoha pakkham pūretvā sayam catu magga ñāṇa sambodhi hutvā samuṭṭhahati iti

original: Sammappadhānavīriyameva sambojjhaṅgoti vīriyasambojjhaṅgo. Tampi hi catubbidhesu
analyzed: sammappadhāna vīriyam eva sambojjhaṅgo ti vīriya sambojjhaṅgo tam pi hi catubbidhesu

original: attano gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānaṃ anupubbena sabbaṃ kusalesu dhammesu
analyzed: attanaḥ gocaresu bhāvanā vasena suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānam anupubbena sabbam kusalesu dhammesu

original: līnasaṅkoca kosajjapakkhaṃ kilesajātaṃ vidhametvā sabbaṃ dhurasaṃpaggahapakkhaṃ pūretvā
analyzed: līna saṅkoca kosajja pakkham kilesa jātam vidhametvā sabbam dhura saṃpaggaha pakkham pūretvā

original: vuttappakāraṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhā petīti.
analyzed: vutta ppakāram sambodhim samuṭṭhā peti iti

original: Pītiyeva sambojjhaṅgo pīti sambojjhaṅgo. Sāpi hi vuttappakāresu gocaresu suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānā

original: kusalesu dhammesu sabbaṃ cittassa aratiukkaṇṭhapakkhaṃ vidhametvā sabbaṃ dhammarati
analyzed: kusalesu dhammesu sabbam cittassa arati ukkaṇṭha pakkham vidhametvā sabbam dhamma rati

original: dhammanandidhammārāma pakkhaṃ pūretvā vuttappakāraṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Passaddhieva
analyzed: dhamma nandi dhamma ārāma pakkham pūretvā vutta ppakāram sambodhim samuṭṭhāpeti passaddhi eva

original: sambojjhaṅgo passaddhi sambojjhaṅgo. Sāpi hi vuttapakāresu gocaresu bhāvanāvasena
analyzed: sambojjhaṅgo passaddhi sambojjhaṅgo sā api hi vutta pakāresu gocaresu bhāvanā vasena

original: suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānā sabbaṃ cittassa sārambha darathapakkhaṃ vidhametvā sabbaṃ vūpasantasītalapakkhaṃ

analyzed: pūretvā vutta ppakāram sambodhim samuṭṭhāpeti samādhi eva sambojjhaṅgo ti samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ

original: Tassa sambodhisamuṭṭhāpanatā pākaṭā. Tatramajjhattatā saṅkhātā upekkhāeva sambojjhaṅgoti
analyzed: tassa sambodhi samuṭṭhāpana tā pākaṭā tatra majjhatta tā saṅkhātā upekkhā eva sambojjhaṅgo ti

original: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgo. Sāpihi vuttappakāresu satiādīnaṃ gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu

original: saṃvaḍḍhamānā sabbaṃ cittassa līnuddhaccapakkhaṃ vidhametvā samavāhitapakkhaṃ pūretvā
analyzed: saṃvaḍḍhamānā sabbam cittassa līn uddhacca pakkham vidhametvā samavāhita pakkham pūretvā

original: vuttappakāraṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti. Sammā aviparītato dassanaṃ sammādiṭṭhi. Sā
analyzed: vutta ppakāram sambodhim samuṭṭhāpeti iti sammā a viparītataḥ dassanam sammādiṭṭhi sā

original: pana dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhaniro dhagāminipaṭipadāya
analyzed: pana dukkhe ñāṇam dukkha samudaye ñāṇam dukkha nirodhe ñāṇam dukkha nirodha gāmini paṭipadāya

analyzed: ñāṇanti catubbidhā hoti sammā a viparītataḥ saṃkappanam sammāsaṅkappaḥ yathā sammādiṭṭhi

original: daṭṭhabbasabhāvesu pharamānā pavattati tathā tassā saṃvidhānanti attho. Teneva hi
analyzed: daṭṭhabba sabhāvesu pharamānā pavattati tathā tassā saṃvidhānam ti atthaḥ tena iva hi

original: so paññākkhandhe saṅgahitoti. Yathāha-yācāvuso visākha sammādiṭṭhi, yoca sammāsaṅkappo,
analyzed: so paññā kkhandhe saṅgahito ti yathā āha yāca avuso visākha sammādiṭṭhi yaḥ ca sammāsaṅkappo

original: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitāti. Sammāvācā dayo pubbe vuttatthāyeva. Sammā vāyamanti

original: ekenāti sammāvāyāmo. Catukiccasādhakaṃ sammappadhāna vīriyaṃ. Passaddhidvayaṃ passaddhisāmaññena
analyzed: ekena ati catu kicca sādhakam sammappadhāna vīriyam passaddhi dvayam passaddhi sāmaññena

original: ekaṃ katvā cuddasete sabhāvatoti vuttaṃ. Sattadhāti vuttappakārānaṃ satipaṭṭhānacatukka

original: sammappadhānacatukkādīnaṃ vasena sattadhā. Idāni tesaṃ cuddasannaṃ kiccānaṃ ṭhānabhedaṃ
analyzed: sammappadhāna catukka ādīnam vasena sattadhā idāni tesam kiccānam ṭhāna bhedaṃ

original: dassetuṃ saṅkappapassaddhicātiādimāha.
analyzed: dassetum saṅkappa passaddhi ca ati ādim āha

original: [220] Yaṃpana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yaṃpana vibhāvaniyam

original: “Sattadhā tattha saṅgahoti vatvā puna taṃ dassetuṃ saṅkappapassaddhicātiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
analyzed: sattadhā tattha saṅgahaḥ iti vatvā puna tam dassetum saṅkappa passaddhi ca āti ādim āha ati vuttam tam na yujjati

original: Na hi tattha satta sarūpaṃ labbhatīti. Saṅkappo viratittayañca ekaṃ maggaṅgaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: na hi tattha satta sarūpam labbhati iti saṅkappaḥ virati ttayam ca ekam maggaṅgaṭṭhānaṃ

original: pāpuṇāti. Passaddhica pītica upekkhāca ekaṃ bojjhaṅgaṭṭhānaṃ. Chandoca cittañca ekaṃ

analyzed: iddhipāda ṭṭhānan ti evam nava dhammāḥ eka ṭṭhānikāḥ honti ekam vīriyam catu sammappadhāna

original: iddhi pādindriya balabojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena navaṭṭhānikaṃ. Ekā sati catusatipaṭṭhāna

original: indriya bala bojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena aṭṭhaṭṭhānikā. Eko samādhi indriya bala bojjhaṅga

original: maggaṅga vasena catuṭṭhāniko. Ekāpaññā iddhipādindriya bala bojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena
analyzed: maggaṅga vasena catuṭṭhānikaḥ ekāpaññā iddhipād indriya bala bojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena

original: pañcaṭṭhānikā. Ekā saddhā indriya bala vasena duṭṭhānikāti. Te pana sattatiṃsa pabhedā

original: dhammā pubbabhāge nānārammaṇā nānākhaṇikāca honti. Maggaphalesu pana navaṭṭhānikaṃ

original: paccaya yamugghātavasena nava kiccāni sādhayamānaṃ ekameva pavattati. Esa nayo aṭṭhaṭṭhānikādīsu.
analyzed: yam ugghāta vasena nava kiccāni sādhayamānam ekam eva pavattati esa nayaḥ aṭṭha ṭṭhānika ādīsu

original: Tasmā te ekakkhaṇe ekacitte sabbe ekato upalabbhantīti vuttaṃ sabbe lokuttare hontīti.
analyzed: tasmā te eka kkhaṇe eka citte sabbe ekatas upalabbhanti iti vuttam sabbe lokuttare honti iti

original: Navāsaṅkappa pītiyoti ettha vāsaddo kvaci saddattho. Saṅkappo kvaci dutīyajjhānikā
analyzed: ettha vā a saddaḥ kvaci sadda attho saṅkappo kvaci dutīya jhānikā

original: dikepītica kvaci catutthajjhānikādike lokuttare nahontīti attho.
analyzed: dike api iti ca kvaci catuttha jhānikā ādike lokuttare na honti iti attho

original: Lokiyepīti sīlavisodhanādivasena pavatte kāmā vacarakusalādike lokiyakusala kriyacittuppādepi.
analyzed: lokiye pi iti sīla visodhana ādi vasena pavatte kāmāḥ vacara kusala ādike lokiya kusala kriya cittuppāde pi

original: Yathā yoganti sīlavisodhanakamma samathakammanāmarūpapariggahādikammesu yujjitabbānaṃ

analyzed: virati ttaya ādīnam anurūpam sīla visuddha ādīnam channam visuddhīnam

original: anukkamena pavattikāle. Etena diṭṭheva dhamme maggaphalapatiṭṭhābhāvatthāya pūrite
analyzed: anukkamena pavatti kāle etena diṭṭhe iva dhamme magga phala patiṭṭhā bhāva tthāya pūrite

original: catupārisuddhi sīlepi saddhāsatiādayo bodhipakkhiyesu saṅgahitā eva honti. Tathā
analyzed: sīle pi saddhā sati ādayaḥ bodhi pakkhiyesu saṅgahitāḥ eva honti tathā

original: maggapādakatthāya uppāditesu mahaggatajjhānesu mīti dasseti. Tathā hi bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttake –

original: Evaṃ bhāvito kho kuṇḍaliya indriyasaṃvaro tīṇi sucaritāni paripūreti. Evaṃ bhāvitāni
analyzed: evam bhāvitaḥ kho kuṇḍaliyaḥ indriya saṃvaraḥ tīṇi su caritāni evam bhāvitāni

original: tīṇi sucaritāni cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti. Evaṃ bhāvitā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
analyzed: tīṇi su caritāni cattāraḥ satipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti evam bhāvitā cattāraḥ satipaṭṭhānā

original: satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti. Evaṃ bhāvitā satta bojjhaṅge vijjāvimuttiyo paripūrentīti vuttaṃ.

original: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi nakevalaṃ balavavipassanā maggaphalesueva bojjhaṅge uddharanti. Vipassanāpādaka
analyzed: na kevalam balava vipassanā magga phalesu eva bojjhaṅge uddharanti

original: kasiṇajjhāna ānāpāṇā suka brahmavihārajjhānesupi uddharantīti vuttaṃ. [Bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho]
analyzed: uddharanti iti vuttam bodhi pakkhiya saṅgaho

original: 165. Sabbasaṅgahe pañcakkhandhāti pañca rāsayo. Atītādi bheda bhinnānaṃ rūpānaṃ khandho
analyzed: sabba saṅgahe pañca khandhā ti pañca rāsayaḥ atīta ādi bheda bhinnānam rūpānam khandho

original: Tathā ekasmiṃ vedayitalakkhaṇe sañjānana lakkhaṇe rāsiṃ katvā pariggahitā atītādibhedabhinnā

original: vedanāsaññāyo vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho canāma. Saṅkharontīti saṅkhārā. Phassa
analyzed: vedanā saññāyaḥ vedanā kkhandho saññā kkhandho canāma saṅkharonti iti saṅkhārā phassa

original: cetanā dayo. Tehi chasuvā upapattidvāresu tīsuvā kammadvāresu ekato saṅgamma samāgamma
analyzed: cetanā dayo tehi chasuvā upapatti dvāresu tīsuvā kamma dvāresu ekatas saṅgamma samāgamma

original: phusanacetayitādīhi attano attano kiccehi dassanasavanādīni sādhāraṇakiccānivā kāyika
analyzed: phusana cetayita ādīhi attanaḥ attanaḥ kiccehi dassana savana ādīni

original: vācasikamānasikānivā sayana nisajjaṭṭhāna gamana kathana cintanādīni sabbāni kiccāni
analyzed: sayana nisajja ṭṭhāna gamana kathana cintana ādīni sabbāni kiccāni

original: karonti vidahantīti. Vuttañhetaṃ saṃyuttake –

original: Kiñca bhikkhave saṅkhāre vadetha. Saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti kho bhikkhave tasmā

original: Tato jivhāti imāni cattāri padesāyatanānināma. Tato sakalakāyabyāpako kāyo. Tato
analyzed: tatas jivhā ti imāni cattāri tato sakala kāya byāpako kāyo tato

original: Kassaci pana puggalassavā sattassavā manussassavā devassavā brahmunovā vase avattitvā

original: dhātuyo. Tattha nissattaṭṭhenāti sattākārā bhāvaṭṭhena sattakiccābhāvaṭṭhena. Ko

original: Cakkhādayoca dhammā sabbaso sattākārarahitā satta kiccarahitāca honti. Naca sayaṃ

original: Tesaṃ pana daṭṭhabbākāro aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. Yathāha-bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu

analyzed: yāva ca lobhaḥ na pahiyyati tāva cakkha ādīni assādeti yāva ca tāni assādeti tāva

original: Na bhūmiṃ māpesi. Bījāni māpenti. Tesaṃ idaṃ uyyānanti vuccati. Kā pana uyyānasampattiyā

original: paccayaparaṃparāti vutte pana bhūmieva ādito vattabbā. Na uyyānapālo. Naca bījānīti.
analyzed: paccaya paraṃparā ti vutte pana bhūmi eva āditas vattabbā na uyyāna pālaḥ na ca bījāni iti

original: Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭiccasamuppāda nayañhi patvā paccayaparaṃ paravasena
analyzed: evam sampadam idam daṭṭhabbam paṭiccasamuppāda nayan hi patvā paccaya param para vasena

original: dukkha dhammānaṃ pavatti nivattividhāne avijjāeva ādi pabhavapadhānabhūtā hoti, na
analyzed: dukkha dhammānam pavatti nivatti vidhāne avijjā eva ādi pabhava padhāna bhūtā hoti na

original: taṇhā. Saccadesanāyaṃ pana tesaṃ nibbattakadhammavidhāne taṇhāeva sāmijeṭṭhaka padhānabhūtā
analyzed: taṇhā sacca desanā ayam pana tesam nibbattaka dhamma vidhāne taṇhā eva padhāna bhūtā

original: hoti. Na avijjāti natthi samudayāriyasaccabhāve avijjāya okāsoti daṭṭhabbo. Kilesānaṃ
analyzed: hoti na avijjā ati natthi samudaya ariya sacca bhāve avijjāya okāso ti daṭṭhabbo kilesānaṃ

original: tadaṅganirodhavikkhambhana nirodhā nirodhasaccaṃnāma. Nibbānaṃ nirodhāriyasaccaṃnāma.
analyzed: tad aṅga nirodha vikkhambhana nirodhāḥ nirodha saccaṃ nāma nibbānam nirodhāriya saccaṃ nāma

original: Chasu lokiyavisuddhīsu maggaṅgāni maggasaccaṃ nāma. Aṭṭhaṅgiko lokuttaramaggoeva
analyzed: chasu lokiya visuddhīsu maggaṅgāni maggasaccam nāma aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ lokuttara maggaḥ eva

original: maggaariyasaccaṃnāmāti.
analyzed: magga ariya saccam nāma ati

original: Ariyasaddo cettha katthaci kadāci kesañci kutoci kathañci avitathabhāvena uttamatthavācakoti.
analyzed: ariya saddo ca ittha katthaci kadāci kesañci kutoci kathañci avitatha bhāvena uttama attha vācakaḥ ti

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena saccasaddassa attho vibhāvito dukkhaṃariya
analyzed: pana aṭṭhakathāyam vutta nayena sacca saddassa attho vibhāvito

original: saccanti ettha pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭhoti imehi catūhi
analyzed: saccam ti ettha pīḷana ṭhaḥ saṅkhata ṭṭhaḥ santāpa ṭṭhaḥ vipariṇāma ṭṭho ti imehi catūhi

original: atthehi cakkhādikassa ekekassa tebhūmakadhammassa dukkhasaccatā veditabbā. Tattha
analyzed: atthehi cakkha ādikassa ekekassa tebhūmaka dhammassa dukkha sacca tā veditabbā tattha

original: saṅkhataṭṭha vipariṇāmaṭṭhā pubbe saṅkhāra dukkhavipariṇāmadukkhesu vuttanayāeva.
analyzed: vipariṇāma ṭṭhā pubbe saṅkhāra dukkha vipariṇāma dukkhesu vutta nayā eva

original: Padatthatopana paccayehi saṅkharīyatīti saṅkhato. Pageva kammādipaccayābhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena
analyzed: paccayehi saṅkharīyati iti saṅkhato pagā iva kamma ādi paccaya abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena

original: vinā na uppajjati, napavattatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Virūpo hutvā pariṇāmo vipariṇāmo. Parihāniceva
analyzed: vinā na uppajjati na pavattati iti vuttam hoti virūpaḥ hutvā pariṇāmaḥ vipariṇāmaḥ

original: paribhedoca. Pīḷanaṭṭhoti ettha pīḷitabbanti pīḷanaṃ. Pīḷetīti pīḷanaṃ. Pīḷīyate
analyzed: paribhedaḥ ca pīḷana ṭṭho ti ettha pīḷitabbanti pīḷanam pīḷeti iti pīḷanam pīḷīyate

original: pīḷanaṃ. Atthoti sabhāvo. Pīḷanaṃ attho yassāti viggaho. Tattha yathā ekissā duggatitthiyā
analyzed: pīḷanam attho ti sabhāvaḥ pīḷanam atthaḥ yassa ati viggahaḥ tattha yathā ekissā dugga titthiyā

original: kucchimhi putto uppajjati. Soca nānārogehi sayaṃ niccaṃ pīḷito hutvā paṭijagganadukkhehi
analyzed: kucchimhi putto uppajjati saḥ ca nānā rogehi sayam niccam pīḍitaḥ hutvā paṭijaggana dukkhehi

original: mātarañca niccaṃ pīḷetiyeva. Yañca tassā kucchimhi tādisassa puttassa uppajjanaṃ,
analyzed: mātaram ca niccam yat ca tassā kucchimhi tādisassa puttassa uppajjanam

original: tañca tassā itthiyā pīḷanakiccameva hoti. Evamevaṃ ye cakkhādayo dhammā jarāmaraṇehi
analyzed: tat ca tassāḥ itthiyāḥ pīḷana kiccam eva hoti evam evam ye cakkha ādayaḥ dhammāḥ jarā maraṇehi

original: niccaṃ pīḷīyanti, te paṭijagganadukkhehi taṃ samaṅgīnaṃ puggalaṃ niccaṃ pīḷentiyeva.
analyzed: niccam pīḷīyanti te paṭijaggana dukkhehi tam samaṅgīnam puggalam niccam

original: Yañca tassa santāne tesaṃ uppajjanaṃ, tañca tassa pīḷanakiccamevāti. Yathāhayo bhikkhave
analyzed: yat ca tassa santāne tesam uppajjanam tat ca tassa pīḷana kiccam eva ati yathā āhayaḥ bhikkhave

original: cakkhussa uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo. Dukkhasseso uppādo. Rogānaṃ ṭhiti
analyzed: cakkhussa uppādaḥ ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvaḥ dukkhassa isaḥ uppādaḥ rogānam ṭhiti

original: jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo. Yo bhikkhave sotassa ghānassa jivhāya kāyassa manassa uppādotiādi.
analyzed: jarā maraṇassa pātubhāvaḥ yaḥ bhikkhave sotassa ghānassa jivhāya kāyassa manassa uppādaḥ tiādi

original: Santāpaṭṭhoti rāgaggiādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi bhusaṃ paridayhanaṭṭho. Yathāha –
analyzed: santāpa ṭṭhaḥ ti rāga aggi ādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi bhusam paridayhana ṭṭhaḥ yathā āha

original: Cakkhuṃ ādittaṃ. Kena ādittaṃ. Rāgagginā ādittaṃ. Dosagginā. Mohagginā. Jātiyā. Jarāya.
analyzed: cakkhum ādittam kena ādittam rāga agginā ādittam dosa agginā moha agginā jātiyāḥ jarāya

original: Maraṇena. Sokena. Paridevena. Dukkhena. Domanassena. Upāyāsena ādittanti vadāmi.
analyzed: maraṇena sokena paridevena dukkhena domanassena upāyāsena ādittanti vadāmi

original: Sotaṃ ādittaṃ. Ghānaṃ ādittaṃ. Jivhā ādittā. Kāyo āditto. Mano ādittoti.
analyzed: sotam ādittam ghānam ādittam jivhā ādittā kāyaḥ ādittaḥ manaḥ āditta uti

original: Ādipanaṃ santāpanaṃ paridayhananti idha atthato ekanti. Ettha siyā, ariyamaggopi
analyzed: ādipanam santāpanam paridayhananti idha atthataḥ ekanti ettha siyā ariya maggo pi

original: cirakālaṃ pāramitābhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena antimabhaveca sīlādivisuddhibhāvanābhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena
analyzed: cira kālam pāramitā abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena sīla ādi visuddhi bhāvanā abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena

original: puggalaṃ susaṃ pīḷetiyeva. Tathā vipariṇāmadhammoca. Tasmā sopi piḷanādiatthena dukkhasaccasaṅgaho
analyzed: puggalam tathā saḥ api piḷana ādi atthena dukkha sacca saṅgaho

original: siyāti.Na. Sabbadukkhasanti vaṃhattā. So hi vuttappakāraṃ abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
analyzed: siyāti na sabba dukkha santi so hi vutta ppakāram abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkham paripuṇṇam

original: anubhūtassa puggalassa sakiṃ uppajjamāno sabbaṃ kilesajātaṃ khepento uppajjati. Nirujjhamānoca
analyzed: anubhūtassa puggalassa sakim uppajjamānaḥ sabbam kilesa jātam khepentaḥ uppajjati nirujjhamānaḥ ca

original: sabbaṃ āyatiṃ anamatagge saṃsāre vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vūpasamento nirujjhati. Vūpasantaṃca
analyzed: sabbam āyatim anamatagge saṃsāre vaṭṭa dukkham vūpasamentaḥ nirujjhati vūpasantam ca

original: anāgata dukkhaṃ upādāya vuttappakāraṃ abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ gaṇanupagaṃ nahoti. Bhijjantoca
analyzed: anāgata dukkham upādāya vutta ppakāram abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkham gaṇan upagam

original: anuttaraṃ vimuttisukhaṃ datvāva bhijjati. Tasmā tassa vipariṇāmapaccayāpi puggalassa
analyzed: anuttaram vimutti sukham bhijjati tasmā tassa vipariṇāma paccayā api puggalassa

original: kāci hānināma natthīti na so dukkhasaccasaṅgahoti. Lokiyadhammā pana uppajjamānā
analyzed: kāci hāni nāma natthi iti na so dukkha sacca saṅgaho ti lokiya dhammā pana uppajjamānā

original: pavatta mānāca pubbe vuttapakārehi saṅkhāradukkhehi bhusaṃ pīḷetvā eva uppajjanti
analyzed: pubbe vutta pakārehi saṅkhāra dukkhehi bhusam pīḷetvā eva uppajjanti

original: pavattantica. Nirujjhamānā mahantaṃ pariḷāhadukkhaṃ janetvā apariyante khuracakkasadise
analyzed: pavattanti ca nirujjhamānāḥ mahantam pariḷāha dukkham janetvā a pariyante khura cakka sadise

original: vaṭṭadukkhayante puggalaṃ yojentāva nirujjhanti. Tasmā teeva pīḷanādiatthehi ekantadukkhā
analyzed: vaṭṭa dukkhayante puggalam yojentā ava nirujjhanti tasmā te eva pīḷana ādi atthehi ekanta dukkhā

original: hontīti. Etena nibbānassapi sampāpakapaccayābhisaṅkharaṇalesaṃ gahetvā dukkhasaccattapasaṅgo nivattito hotīti.
analyzed: honti iti etena nibbānassa api sampāpaka paccaya abhisaṅkharaṇa lesam gahetvā dukkha saccatta pasaṅgaḥ nivattitaḥ hoti iti

original: Dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccanti ettha bhavābhavasaṅkhātaṃ dukkhakkhandhaṃ samudeti.
analyzed: dukkha samudayaḥ ariya saccan ti ettha bhava abhava saṅkhātam dukkha kkhandham samudeti

original: Punappunaṃ abbocchinnaṃ katvā udayati uṭṭhāpeti vaḍḍhetivāti dukkhasamudayo, āyūhanaṭṭho,
analyzed: punappunam abbocchinnam katvā udayati uṭṭhāpeti vaḍḍheti vāti dukkha samudayaḥ āyūhana ṭṭho

original: nidānaṭṭho, saṃyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭhoti catūhi atthehi lobhassa dukkhasamudayatā
analyzed: nidāna ṭṭho saṃyoga ṭṭho palibodha ṭṭho ti catūhi atthehi lobhassa dukkha samudaya tā

original: veditabbā. Tattha āyūhanaṭṭhoti bhavābhava saṅkhātassa ekekasmiṃ bhavepi vatthukāmapaṭisaṃyuttassa
analyzed: veditabbā tattha āyūhana ṭṭho ti bhava abhava saṅkhātassa ekekasmin bhave pi vatthu kāma paṭisaṃyuttassa

original: dukkhakkhandhassa bhiyyo paribyūhanaṭṭho rāsikaraṇaṭṭho nidānaṭṭhoti tadeva nirantaraṃ
analyzed: dukkhakkhandhassa bhiyyas paribyūhana ṭhaḥ rāsi karaṇa ṭṭhaḥ nidāna ṭṭhaḥ ti tat eva nirantaram

original: katvā anuppadānaṭṭho niyyātanaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṃyogaṭṭhoti dukkhakkhandhasmiṃeva
analyzed: katvā anuppadāna ṭṭho niyyātana ṭṭhoti vuttam hoti saṃyoga ṭṭho ti dukkha kkhandhasmiṃ eva

original: daḷhaṃ bandhanaṭṭho. Palibodhaṭṭhoti tato tassa tassa muccanupāyassa nīvāraṇa vasena
analyzed: daḷham bandhana ṭṭho palibodha ṭṭho ti tatas tassa tassa mucca nupāyassa vasena

original: palibundhanaṭṭho uparundhanaṭṭhoti attho. Dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti ettha vaṭṭadukkhassa
analyzed: palibundhana ṭṭho uparundhana ṭṭho ti attho dukkha nirodho ariya saccanti ettha vaṭṭa dukkhassa

original: nirujjhanaṃ anuppāda dhammatāpatti vasena khiyyānaṃ dukkhanirodho. Dukkhaṃ vā nirujjhati
analyzed: nirujjhanaṃ anuppāda dhamma tāpatti vasena khiyyānam dukkha nirodhaḥ dukkham vā nirujjhati

original: napavattati etasminti dukkhanirodho. Nissaraṇaṭṭho vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭhoti
analyzed: na pavattati etasmin ti dukkha nirodhaḥ nissaraṇa ṭṭhaḥ viveka ṭṭhaḥ asaṅkhata ṭṭhaḥ amata ṭṭho ti

original: catūhi atthehi nibbānassa dukkhanirodhatā veditabbā. Tattha nissaraṇaṭṭhoti nissaraṇa
analyzed: catūhi atthehi nibbānassa dukkha nirodha tā veditabbā tattha nissaraṇa ṭṭho ti nissaraṇa

original: vimuttiyā vimuccanaṭṭho. Vivekaṭṭhoti vaṭṭadukkhapalibodhato viviccanaṭṭho. Asaṅkhataṭṭhoti
analyzed: vimuttiyāḥ vimuccana ṭho viveka ṭṭho ti vaṭṭa dukkha palibodhataḥ viviccana ṭṭho asaṅkhata ṭṭho ti

original: saṅkhāradukkhassa abhāvaṭṭho. Amataṭṭhoti maraṇadukkhassa abhāvaṭṭhoti.
analyzed: saṅkhāra dukkhassa abhāva ṭho amata ṭṭho ti maraṇa dukkhassa abhāva ṭhoti

original: Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāti ettha dukkhanirodhaṃ gameti sampāpetīti dukkhanirodhagāminī.
analyzed: dukkha nirodha gāmini paṭipadā ti ettha dukkha nirodham gameti sampāpeti iti dukkha nirodha gāminī

original: Attano santāne paṭilābhakaraṇa vasena paṭipajjitabbāti paṭipadā. Dukkhanirodhagāminīca
analyzed: attano santāne paṭilābha karaṇa vasena paṭipajjitabbā ti paṭipadā dukkha nirodha gāminī ca

original: sā paṭipadā cāti viggaho. Niyyānaṭṭho, hetvaṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, adhipateyyaṭṭhoti
analyzed: sā paṭipadā ca ati viggahaḥ niyyāna aṭṭhaḥ hetu aṭṭhaḥ dassana ṭṭhaḥ adhipateyya ṭṭho ti

original: catūhi atthehi aṭṭhaṅgikamaggassa dukkhanirodhamaggatā veditabbā. Tattha niyyānaṭṭhoti
analyzed: catūhi atthehi aṭṭhaṅgika maggassa dukkha nirodha magga tā veditabbā tattha niyyāna aṭṭho ti

original: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādikaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ paṭinivattetvā avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodhotiādikaṃ
analyzed: avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ati ādikam vaṭṭa sotam paṭinivattetvā avijjā nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodhaḥ iti ādikam

original: vaṭṭapaṭisotaṃ abhimukhaṃ niggamanaṭṭho. Hetvaṭṭhoti sabbesaṃ ariyaguṇānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāva
analyzed: vaṭṭa paṭisotam abhimukham niggamana aṭṭhaḥ hetu aṭṭhaḥ ti sabbesam ariya guṇānam suppatiṭṭhita bhāva

original: sādhanaṭṭho. Dassanaṭṭhoti aññāṇaadassanasaṅkhātassa sammohassa pahāna vasena catusaccadhammassa
analyzed: sādhana ṭṭho dassana ṭṭho ti aññāṇa adassana saṅkhātassa sammohassa pahāna vasena catu sacca dhammassa

original: paṭivijjhanaṭṭho. Adhipateyyaṭṭhoti taṇhā dāsabyavimuttiyā bhūjissabhāvapattivasena
analyzed: paṭivijjhana ṭṭhaḥ adhipateyya ṭṭho ti taṇhā dāsa bya vimuttiyā

original: sayameva attano adhipati hutvā virocanaṭṭho. Lokiyamaggā hi taṇhāya ārammaṇabhāve
analyzed: sayam eva attanaḥ adhipati hutvā virocanaṭṭhaḥ lokiya maggāḥ hi taṇhāya ārammaṇa bhāve

original: ṭhitā taṇhādāsabyaṃ nātivattantīti. Etthaca ime sattānāma ekantena dukkhapaṭikūlā
analyzed: ṭhitā taṇhā dāsabyam na ativattanti iti ettha ca ime sattā nāma ekantena dukkha paṭikūlā

original: honti dukkhabhīrukā. Yeca attani dukkhaṃ janenti. Tesu verisaññaṃ uppādenti. Attano
analyzed: honti dukkha bhīrukāḥ ye ca attani dukkham janenti tesu veri saññam uppādenti attano

original: pana ekantadukkhaṃvā ekantadukkhajanakaṃvā te najānanti. Tasmā te attano dukkhamuttiyā
analyzed: pana ekanta dukkham vā ekanta dukkha janakam vā te na jānanti tasmā te attanaḥ dukkha muttiyā

original: yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ āyūhanti. Taṃ taṃ attano dukkhavaḍḍhiyāeva sampajjati. Kiṃ pana ekantadukkhaṃ,
analyzed: yam yam kammam āyūhanti tam tam attanaḥ dukkha vaḍḍhiyā eva sampajjati kim pana ekanta dukkham

original: kiṃca ekanta dukkhajanakanti. Atītānāgatapaccuppannabhūtā attano attano attahāvapariyāpannā
analyzed: kiṃca ekanta dukkha janakanti atīta anāgata paccuppanna bhūtā attanaḥ attanaḥ atta hāva pariyāpannā

original: tebhūmakadhammāeva attano attano ekantadukkhānāma. Kasmā, tehi mutteeva sabbadukkhehi
analyzed: te bhūmaka dhammā eva attanaḥ attanaḥ ekanta dukkhā nāma kasmā tehi mutte eva sabba dukkhehi

original: muccanato, amutteca amuccanatoti. Attano taṇhāeva attano ekantadukkhajanakaṃnāma.
analyzed: amutte ca amuccanato ti attano taṇhā eva attano ekanta dukkha janakaṃ nāma

original: Kasmā, tāya pahīnāyaeva ekanta dukkhehi muccanato, apahīnāyaca amuccanatoti.
analyzed: kasmā tāya pahīnāya eva ekanta dukkhehi muccanataḥ apahīnāya ca a muccanataḥ ti

original: Tathā ime sattā ekantena sukhakāmā honti sukhābhinandino. Yeca attani sukhaṃ janenti.
analyzed: tathā ime sattāḥ ekantena sukha kāmāḥ honti sukha abhinandinaḥ ye ca attani sukham janenti

original: Tesu piyamittasaññaṃ uppādenti. Attanopana ekantasukhaṃvā ekantasukhamaggaṃvāte najānanti.
analyzed: tesu piya mitta saññam uppādenti ekanta sukham vā ekanta sukha maggam vā te na jānanti

original: Tasmā te attano sukhavaḍḍhiyā yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ āyūhanti. Taṃ taṃ attano dukkhavaḍḍhiyāeva
analyzed: tasmā te attanaḥ sukha vaḍḍhiyāḥ yam yam kammam āyūhanti tam tam attanaḥ dukkha vaḍḍhiyā eva

original: sampajjati. Kiṃ pana ekantasukhaṃ koca ekanta sukhamaggoti. Ekantadukkhadhammassa
analyzed: sampajjati kim pana ekanta sukham kocaḥ ekanta sukha maggo ti ekanta dukkha dhammassa

original: abhāvoeva attano ekanta sukhaṃnāma. Ekantadukkhajanakassa pahānamaggoeva attano ekanta
analyzed: abhāvaḥ eva attano ekanta sukham nāma ekanta dukkha janakassa pahāna maggo eva attano ekanta

original: sukhamaggonāmāti imamatthaṃ dassento imāni catusaccapadāni kathesīti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: sukha maggaḥ nāma ati imam attham dassentaḥ imāni catu sacca padāni kathesi iti veditabbam

original: [223] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Dukkhassa anuppādanirodho ettha etenātivā dukkhanirodho”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha etenāti idaṃ nayujjati.
analyzed: dukkhassa anuppāda nirodho ettha etena ati vā dukkha nirodho ti vuttam tattha etena ati idam na yujjati

original: Na hi nibbānaṃ dukkhassa anuppādanirodha kriyāsādhane dukkhena sahakārī kāraṇaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: na hi nibbānam dukkhassa anuppāda nirodha kriyā sādhane dukkhena sahakārī kāraṇam hoti iti

original: Sesacetasikāti vedanā saññāhi sesā paññāsa cetasikā. Atītādivasena tividha bhinnānaṃ
analyzed: sesa cetasikā ti vedanā saññā hi sesā cetasikā atīta ādi vasena

original: sattā etenāti vā upādānaṃ.
analyzed: sattā etena ati vai upādānam

original: Bhavati vaḍḍhatīti bhavo. Bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti sukhadukkhāni etenāti vā bhavo.
analyzed: bhavati vaḍḍhati iti bhavaḥ bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti sukha dukkhāni etena ati vā bhavaḥ

original: Jananaṃ jāti. Jāyanti pātubhavanti saṅkhata dhammā etāyāti vā jāti. Jīraṇaṃ jarā.
analyzed: jananam jāti jāyanti pātubhavanti vā jāti jīraṇam jarā

original: Jīranti jiṇṇabhāvaṃ gacchanti etāyāti vā jarā. Socanaṃ soko. Socanti cittapariḷāhaṃ
analyzed: jīranti jiṇṇa bhāvam gacchanti vā jarā socanam sokaḥ socanti citta pariḷāham

original: gacchanti etenāti vā soko. Paridevanaṃ paridevo. Taṃ taṃ pavattiṃ parikittetvā devanti
analyzed: gacchanti etena ati vā sokaḥ paridevanam paridevaḥ tam tam pavattim parikittetvā devanti

original: kandanti etenāti vā paridevo. Khamituṃ sahituṃ dukkaranti dukkhaṃ. Dummanassa virūpacittassa
analyzed: kandanti etena ati vā paridevaḥ khamitum sahitum dukkaranti dukkham dummanassa virūpa cittassa

original: bhāvo domanassaṃ. Bhuso āyāsanaṃ upāyāso. Āyāsananti anassāsanaṃ. Visīdananti attho.
analyzed: bhāvaḥ domanassam bhusaḥ āyāsanam upāyāsaḥ āyāsananti anassāsanam visīdananti attho

original: Evanti iminā yathāvuttena. Avijjādi saṅkhārādipaccayapaccayuppanna paraṃparavidhinā
analyzed: evam ti iminā yathā vuttena avijja ādi saṅkhāra ādi paccaya paccaya uppanna paraṃpara vidhinā

original: samudayo hotīti sambandho. Etassakevalassadukkhakkhandhassāti avijjādikassa etassa
analyzed: samudayaḥ hoti iti sambandhaḥ etassa kevalassa dukkha kkhandhassa ati avijjā ādikassa etassa

original: sakalassa dukkharāsissa kenaci sukhena asaṃmissassa vā dukkharāsissa abhinibbatti
analyzed: sakalassa dukkha rāsissa kenaci sukhena asaṃmissassa vā dukkha rāsissa abhinibbatti

original: hotīti attho. Etthaca duvidho paṭiccasamuppādanayo suttantikanayo abhidhammanayoti.
analyzed: hoti iti atthaḥ ettha ca duvidhaḥ paṭiccasamuppāda nayaḥ suttantika nayaḥ abhidhamma nayaḥ ti

original: Tattha suttantikanayena tāva avijjā catubbidhā dukkhapaṭicchādikā samudayapaṭicchādikā
analyzed: tattha sutta antika nayena tāva avijjā catubbidhā dukkha paṭicchādikā samudaya paṭicchādikā

original: nirodhapaṭicchādikā maggapaṭicchādikācāti. Abhidhammanayena pana pubbantapaṭicchādikā
analyzed: nirodha paṭicchādikā magga paṭicchādikā ca ati abhidhamma nayena pana pubbanta paṭicchādikā

original: aparanta paṭicchādikā pubbantāparantapaṭicchādikā paṭiccasamuppādapaṭicchādikāti
analyzed: pubbanta aparanta paṭicchādikā paṭiccasamuppāda paṭicchādikā ati

original: catūhi saddhiṃ aṭṭha vidhāti veditabbā.
analyzed: catūhi saddhim aṭṭha vidhāti veditabbā

original: Saṅkhārā suttantikanayena sāsavā kusalākusalacetanā apuññābhisaṅkhāro puññābhisaṅkhāro
analyzed: saṅkhārā suttantika nayena sa āsavā kusala akusala cetanā apuñña abhisaṅkhāro puñña abhisaṅkhāro

original: āneñjā bhisaṅkhāroti pana tividhā honti. Tattha dvādasa akusalacetanā apuññāti saṅkhāronāma.
analyzed: pana tividhāḥ honti tattha dvādasa akusala cetanāḥ apuññā ti saṅkhāro nāma

original: Kāmarūpa kusalacetanā puññābhisaṅkhāronāma. Arūpakusalacetanā āneñjātisaṅkhāronāma.
analyzed: kāma rūpa kusala cetanā puñña abhisaṅkhāraḥ nāma arūpa kusala cetanā āneñjāti saṅkhāraḥ nāma

original: Abhidhammanayena pana sabbāpi lokiyalokuttarabhūtā kusalākusalacetanā saṅkhārānāma.
analyzed: abhidhamma nayena pana sabbā api lokiya lokuttara bhūtā kusala akusala cetanā saṅkhārāḥ nāma

original: Kiriyacetanā pana sabbāpi vibhaṅge nagahitā. Aṭṭhakathāyañca kiriyadhammānaṃ pana
analyzed: kiriya cetanā pana sabbā api vibhaṅge na gahitā aṭṭhakathāyañca kiriya dhammānam pana

original: yasmā neva avijjā na kusalā kusalamūlāni upanissayapaccayattaṃ labhanti. Tasmā kiriyavasena
analyzed: yasmai na iva avijjā na kusalā kusala mūlāni upanissaya paccaya ttam labhanti tasmai kiriya vasena

original: paccayākāro navuttoti vuttaṃ. Avijjāca kusalākusalamūlā nica kiriyadhammānaṃ upanissaya
analyzed: paccaya ākāraḥ na vuttaḥ ti vuttam avijjā ca kusala akusala mūlāḥ kiriya dhammānaṃ

original: paccayā na honti. Tasmā kiriyadhammā paṭiccasamuppādadesanāyaṃ nagahitāti vuttaṃ
analyzed: paccayāḥ na honti tasmā kiriya dhammā paṭiccasamuppāda desanā ayam na gahitā ti vuttam

original: hoti. Saṃyuttepi yato kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno avijjā pahīnā hoti. Vijjāuppannā. So
analyzed: hoti saṃyutte pi yatas kho bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ avijjā pahīnā hoti vijjā uppannā so

original: avijjā virāgā vijjuppādā neva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti. Na apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ.
analyzed: avijjāḥ virāgāḥ vijjuppādāḥ na iva puñña abhisaṅkhāram abhisaṅkharoti na apuñña abhisaṅkhāram

original: Na āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotīti vuttaṃ. Attano anurūpapaccayavasena pana tesaṃpi
analyzed: na āneñja abhisaṅkhāram abhisaṅkharoti iti vuttam attanaḥ anurūpa paccaya vasena pana tesam pi

original: paṭicca samuppādo avāritoyeva. Nahi koci paṭiccasamuppādarahito saṅkhatadhammonāma
analyzed: paṭicca samuppādaḥ a vāritaḥ yeva nahi koci paṭiccasamuppāda rahitaḥ saṅkhata dhammaḥ nāma

original: atthīti. Esa nayo viññāṇādīsupīti. Viññāṇanti bāttiṃsavidhaṃ lokiyavipākaviññāṇaṃ
analyzed: atthi iti esa nayaḥ viññāṇa ādīsu pi iti viññāṇam ti bāttiṃsavidham lokiya vipāka viññāṇam

original: suttantikanayena. Abhidhammanayena pana kiriyacittavajjitaṃ ekūnasattatividhaṃ lokiyalokuttaraviññāṇaṃ.
analyzed: suttantika nayena abhidhamma nayena pana kiriya citta vajjitam ekūnasattatividham lokiya lokuttara viññāṇam

original: Nāmarūpanti lokiya viññāṇa sahajātaṃ vedanādikhandhattayaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ kammajarūpaṃ
analyzed: nāma rūpanti lokiya viññāṇa sahajātam vedanā ādi khandha ttayam paṭisandhiyam kamma ja rūpam

original: pavattiyaṃ cittaja rūpañca suttantikanayena. Abhidhammanayena pana sabbaṃ kusalākusala
analyzed: pavattiyam citta ja rūpam ca suttantika nayena abhidhamma nayena pana sabbam kusala akusala

original: vipākasampayuttaṃ khandhattayaṃ vuttappakārarūpañca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana laddhapacchājātapaccayaṃ
analyzed: vipāka sampayuttam khandha ttayam vutta ppakāra rūpam ca aṭṭhakathāyam pana laddha pacchājāta paccayam

original: sabbaṃpi catusamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ gahitameva.
analyzed: sabbam api catu samuṭṭhāna rūpam gahitam eva

original: [226] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: “Tadubhayaṃpi idha paṭisandhiviññāṇasahagata”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ anupapannaṃ.
analyzed: tat ubhayam api idha paṭisandhi viññāṇa sahagatan ti vuttam tat anupapannam

original: Saḷāyatananti cha ajjhattikāyatanāni eva sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ vibhattāni. Ekacce pana
analyzed: saḷāyatanam ti cha ajjhattika āyatanāni eva sabbattha pāḷiyam vibhattāni ekacce pana

original: ācariyā bāhirāyatanāni phassassa paccayā hontīti katvā tānipi idha gaṇhanti. Taṃpi
analyzed: ācariyāḥ bāhira āyatanāni phassassa paccayāḥ honti iti katvā tāni pi idha gaṇhanti taṃ pi

original: nidānavagga pāḷiyā sametiyeva. Yathāha –
analyzed: nidāna vagga yathā āha

original: Katamoca bhikkhave lokassa samudayo. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpeca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
analyzed: katamaḥ ca bhikkhave lokassa samudayo cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇam

original: Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso. Phassapaccayā vedanā. Vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.La. Domanassupāyāsā
analyzed: tiṇṇam phasso phassa paccayā vedanā vedanā paccayā domanassa upāyāsā

original: sambhavantīti ayaṃ lokassa samudayo. Sotañca.La. Manañca paṭicca dhammeca uppajjati
analyzed: sambhavanti iti ayam lokassa samudayo paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati

original: manoviññāṇaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso.La. Lokassa samudayoti.
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇam tiṇṇam lokassa samudayo ti

original: Phassavedanādayopi nayadvaye taṃ taṃ viññāṇasampayuttā veditabbā. Taṇhupādānāni pākaṭāni.
analyzed: phassa vedanā ādayaḥ api naya dvaye tam tam viññāṇa sampayuttā veditabbā taṇhā upādānāni pākaṭāni

original: Bhavo duvidho kammabhavo upapattibhavoca. Lokiyakusalākusalabhūtā cetanāca. Cetanāsampayuttā
analyzed: bhavaḥ duvidho kamma bhavo upapatti bhavo ca lokiya kusala akusala bhūtā cetanā ca cetanā sampayuttā

original: abhijjhādayo anabhijjhādayoca kammabhavo. Yathāha-sabbaṃpi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavoti.
analyzed: abhijjha ādayaḥ anabhijjha ādayaḥ ca kamma bhavaḥ yathā āha sabbam pi bhava gāmi kammam kamma bhavaḥ ti

original: Kammanibbattā pana sabbepi lokiyavipākakkhandhā sabbānica kammajarūpāni upapattibhavo
analyzed: kamma nibbattā pana sabbe pi lokiya vipāka khandhā sabbāni ca kamma ja rūpāni upapatti bhavaḥ

original: suttantikanayena. Abhidhammanayena pana lokuttara khandhāpi vibhaṅge āgatāeva. Jātijarāmaraṇāni
analyzed: suttantika nayena abhidhamma nayena pana lokuttara khandhā api vibhaṅge āgatā eva jāti jarā maraṇāni

original: sabbesaṃ saṅkhata dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇapattāni. Sokādīsu ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa
analyzed: sabbesam dhammānam lakkhaṇa pattāni soka ādīsu ñāti byasana ādīhi phuṭṭhassa

original: socanākārena pavattā domanassavedanā sokonāma. Rodanākārena pavatto aniṭṭho cittajasaddo
analyzed: socana ākārena pavattā domanassa vedanā sokaḥ nāma rodana ākārena pavattaḥ aniṭṭhaḥ citta ja saddo

original: paridevonāma. Kāyikā dukkhavedanā dukkhaṃnāma. Cetasikā dukkhavedanā domanassaṃnāma.
analyzed: paridevaḥ nāma kāyikā dukkha vedanā dukkhaṃnāma cetasikā dukkha vedanā domanassaṃnāma

original: Ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ saṃsīdanavisīdanākārapavatto doso upāyāsonāma. Ayamettha vibhāgo.
analyzed: ñāti byasana ādi nimittam saṃsīdana visīdana ākāra pavattaḥ doso upāyāsaḥ nāma ayam ettha vibhāgaḥ

original: Yesaṃ pana khandhadukkhe avijjā appahīnā hoti. Tesaṃ itarasaccesupi sā appahīnāeva
analyzed: yesam pana khandha dukkhe avijjā appahīnā hoti tesam itara saccesu pi sā appahīnā eva

original: hotīti te khandhapavattiyaṃeva sukhasaññaṃ labhanti. Khandhanirodhe dukkhasaññaṃ.
analyzed: hoti iti te khandha pavattiyam eva sukha saññam labhanti khandha nirodhe dukkha saññam

original: Khandhapavattimaggeeva sukhamaggasaññaṃ labhanti. Khandhanirodhamagge dukkhamaggasaññaṃ.
analyzed: khandha pavatti magge eva sukha magga saññam labhanti khandha nirodha magge dukkha magga saññam

original: Tasmā khandhapavattipaccayabhūtā puññā puññāneñjābhisaṅkhāradhammāeva tesaṃ avijjānivuṭānaṃ
analyzed: khandha pavatti paccaya bhūtā puññā puñña aneñja abhisaṅkhāra dhammā eva tesam avijjā nivuṭānam

original: sukhakāmānaṃ dukkhapaṭikūlānaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisaraṇā hontīti vuttaṃ avijjāpacca yāsaṅkhārāti.
analyzed: sukha kāmānam dukkha paṭikūlānam sattānam paṭisaraṇāḥ honti iti vuttam avijjā pacca yā a saṅkhārā ti

original: Etthaca visesato paccuppannakhandhapaṭicchādikāya avijjāya duccaritabhūtā apuññābhisaṅkhārā
analyzed: ettha ca visesataḥ paccuppanna khandha paṭicchādikāya avijjāya duccarita bhūtā apuñña abhisaṅkhārā

original: sambhavanti. Anāgata khandhapaṭicchādikāya avijjāya sucaritabhūtā puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārā
analyzed: sambhavanti anāgata khandha paṭicchādikāya avijjāya su carita bhūtā puñña aneñja abhisaṅkhārā

original: sambhavantīti veditabbā. Saṅkhāresu sati appahīnabhavataṇhānaṃ sattānaṃ cutianantaraṃ
analyzed: sambhavanti iti veditabbā saṅkhāresu sati appahīna bhava taṇhānam sattānam cuti anantaram

original: punabhavābhinibbattiyā koci vibandho nāma natthi. Tasmā saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ
analyzed: punabhava abhinibbattiyā koci vibandho nāma natthi tasmā saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam

original: nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ phasso vedanāti ime attabhāvasaññitā pañcadhammā bhavantare
analyzed: nāma rūpam saḷāyatanam phassaḥ vedanā ati ime atta bhāva saññitā pañca dhammā bhavantare

original: pātu bhavanti. Tattha pana viññāṇameva padhānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ. Saṅkhārapaccayāviññāṇanti
analyzed: pātu bhavanti tattha pana viññāṇam eva padhānam jeṭṭhakam hoti iti vuttam saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇam ti

original: viññāṇeca sati tassa udayabhūtānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ uppattiyā vibandhonāma natthīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: viññāṇe ca sati tassa udaya bhūtānam nāma rūpānam uppattiyā vibandho nāma natthi iti vuttam

original: Viññāṇapaccayānāma rūpanti. Ettāvatā sāmaññato paripuṇṇonāma kāyo rūpa kāyoca vutto
analyzed: viññāṇa paccayā nāma rūpanti ettāvatā sāmaññato paripuṇṇaḥ nāma kāyo vutto

original: hoti. Evaṃsantepi tesu dvīsu kāyesu yedhammā sattapaññattiyā padhānaṅgabhūtā honti.
analyzed: hoti evaṃsante pi tesu dvīsu kāyesu ye dhammā satta paññattiyā padhāna aṅga bhūtāḥ honti

original: Yehica phassā dīni upari aṅgāni āgatāni honti. Yesuca sattā attagāhaṃ daḷhataraṃ
analyzed: yehi ca phassā dīni upari aṅgāni āgatāni honti yesu ca sattāḥ attagāham daḷhataram

original: gaṇhanti. Te visuṃ nīharitvā dassetuṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatananti vuttaṃ. Nāmarūpe
analyzed: gaṇhanti te visum nīharitvā dassetum nāma rūpa paccayā saḷāyatanam ti vuttam nāma rūpe

original: sati tesaṃpi uppattiyā vibandho natthiyeva. Saḷāyatanasamuṭṭhitoca phasso saḷāyatane
analyzed: sati tesaṃpi uppattiyāḥ vibandho natthiya iva saḷāyatana samuṭṭhitaḥ ca phasso saḷāyatane

original: sati ekantena sambhavatīti vuttaṃ saḷāyatanapaccayāphassoti. Phassasamuṭṭhitāca vedanā
analyzed: sati ekantena sambhavati iti vuttam saḷāyatana paccayā aphassaḥ ti phassa samuṭṭhitā ca vedanā

original: phasse sati ekantena sambhavatiyevāti vuttaṃ phassapaccayāvedanāti. Sukhavedanāsadiso
analyzed: phasse sati ekantena sambhavatiyā iva ati vuttam phassa paccayā vedanā ti sukha vedanā sadiso

original: taṇhāya avassayonāma natthīti vuttaṃ vedanāpaccayātaṇhāti. Kāmupādānañcanāma ekasmiṃ
analyzed: taṇhāya avassayaḥ nāma natthi iti vuttam vedanā paccayā taṇhā ti kāma upādānam ca nāma ekasmin

original: ārammaṇe punappunaṃ samudācaritvā daḷhattappattā taṇhāeva, diṭṭhiyoca attanica attano
analyzed: ārammaṇe punappunam samudācaritvā daḷha tta pattā taṇhā eva

original: ārammaṇesuca assādana khamana rocana bhūtāya taṇhāya vasena daḷhattaṃ āpajjantīti
analyzed: ārammaṇesu ca assādana khamana rocana bhūtāya taṇhāya vasena daḷhattam āpajjanti iti

original: vuttaṃ taṇhāpaccayāupādānanti. Upādiyantāca tassa tassa upādāniyassa atthassa hitavuḍḍhisaññitaṃ

original: taṃtaṃ kammabhavaṃ āyūhantiyevāti vuttaṃ upādānapaccayābhavoti. Bhavasaddo hettha

original: vaḍḍhipariyāyo. Yathā –
analyzed: vaḍḍhi pariyāyaḥ yathā

original: Suvijāno bhavaṃ hoti, duvijāno parābhavoti.
analyzed: su vijānaḥ bhavam hoti duvijānaḥ parābhavoti

original: Kammabhave sati ekantena punabhavopi sambhavatīti vuttaṃ bhavapaccayājātīti. Jātiyāca
analyzed: kamma bhave sati ekantena punabhavaḥ api sambhavati iti vuttam bhava paccayā jāti iti jātiyā ca

original: sati ekantena jarāmaraṇaṃ hotiyevāti vuttaṃ jātipaccayājarāmaraṇanti. Ayamettha tabbhāvabhāvibhāvavidhi.
analyzed: sati ekantena jarā maraṇam hotiyā iva ati vuttam jāti paccayā ajarā maraṇam ti ayam ettha tad bhāva bhāvi bhāva vidhi

original: Sokādivacanañcettha īdisena tabbhāva bhāvibhāvena pavattassa sakalassa vaṭṭadhammassa
analyzed: soka ādi vacanam ca ittha īdisena tad bhāva bhāvi bhāvena pavattassa sakalassa vaṭṭa dhammassa

original: ādīnavarāsidassa natthaṃ vuttanti. Etthāti imasmiṃ paccayasaṅgahe. Tatthāti tasmiṃ
analyzed: ādīnava rāsi dassa na attham vuttanti ettha ati imasmin paccaya saṅgahe tattha ati tasmin

original: paṭiccasamuppādanaye. Addhānavante dhamme bhuso dhāretīti addhā. Kālo. So hi tekālike
analyzed: paṭiccasamuppāda naye addhānavante dhamme bhusaḥ dhāreti iti addhā kālaḥ saḥ hi tekālike

original: dhamme santānānupabandhavasena kappaparaṃparā vassa utu māsa pakkha ratti diva paraṃparāca
analyzed: dhamme santāna an upabandha vasena kappa paraṃparā vassa utu māsa pakkha ratti diva paraṃparā ca

original: hutvā apatamāne dhārento viya upaṭṭhātīti. Athavā, bhuso dahanti tiṭṭhanti pavattanti
analyzed: hutvā a patamāne dhārentaḥ viya upaṭṭhāti iti athavā bhusaḥ dahanti tiṭṭhanti pavattanti

original: tekālikā dhammā etthāti addhā. Kāloyeva. So pana sayaṃ abhinnopi bhedavante dhamme
analyzed: tekālikāḥ dhammāḥ ettha ati addhā so pana sayam abhinnaḥ api bhedavante dhamme

original: upādāya bhinno viya upacarituṃ yuttoti vuttaṃ tayoaddhāti.
analyzed: upādāya bhinnaḥ viya upacaritum yuttaḥ iti vuttam

original: [227] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Atati satataṃ gacchati pavattatīti addhāti vuttaṃ”. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.

original: Evañhi sati addhānanti nasijjhati. Yathā addhānamaggapaṭipannoti. Aṅgānīti avayavapadhānaṅgāni.

original: Padhānasambhārāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ākārāti avayavakoṭṭhāsā. Koṭṭhāsattho hettha ākārasaddo.

original: Vaṭṭanti punappunaṃ āvaṭṭantīti vaṭṭāni. Mūlayanti sabbepi vaṭṭadhammā ettha tiṭṭhanti

original: hoti. Tattha hetū nāma purimabhave siddhā avijjā saṅkhārā. Phalaṃnāma anāgatabhave

original: avijjāsaṅkhārāatītoaddhātiādi. Etthaca addhuno addhāvantānañca abhedaṃ viya katvā

original: vacanaṃ dhammato visuṃ addhāsaṅkhātassa kālassa abhāvaṃ dasseti. Kāloyeva lokaṃ pavatteti

original: Ahetuvisamahetudiṭṭhīnaṃ nīvāraṇatthaṃ atītahetu dassanaṃ. Ucchedadiṭṭhi nīvāraṇatthaṃ

analyzed: anāgata phala dassanam diṭṭhinī vāraṇa ttham ubhaya dassanan ti daṭṭhabbam tattha

original: ahetu apaccayā sattā pavattanti nivattanti saṃkilissanti visujjhantīti pavattā diṭṭhi

original: Attānicco dhuvo, sova bhavato bhavaṃ sandhāvati saṃsaratīti pavattā diṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhināma.

original: Evaṃ nicco hutvā sandhāvantopana avijjādīhi sādhetabbo nahoti. Tasmā avijjāsaṅkhārehi

original: Kasmā panettha sokādayo aṅgesu nagahitāti. Jātiyā sati sokādayo ekantena sambhavantīti

original: vacananti. Jātiyāvā avijjādikassavā vuttappakārassa sakalassa vaṭṭapavattassa mahāādīnavarāsidassanatthanti

original: dassetuṃ sokādivacanaṃ panettha nissanda phalanidassananti vuttaṃ. Tattha nissandaphalanidassananti
analyzed: dassetum soka ādi vacanam pana ittha nissanda phala nidassanan ti vuttam tattha nissanda phala nidassanan ti

analyzed: te eva dve imassa paccayāḥ honti iti aññe pi atha kasmā te pāḷiyam na vuttā ati

original: Avuttānaṃpi tesaṃ atthato laddhattāti. Kathañca te avuttāpi laddhāti. Tabbhāva bhāvibhāvalakkhaṇena

original: tadavinābhāvibhāvalakkhaṇenaca laddhāti dassento avijjāsaṅkhāraggahaṇenātiādi māha.
analyzed: tad avinābhāvi bhāva lakkhaṇena ca laddhā iti dassentaḥ avijjā saṅkhāra ggahaṇena ati ādi mā āha

original: Esa nayo paratthapi. Tattha avijjā saṅkhāraggahaṇenāti pāḷiyaṃ ādito vuttena avijjāsaṅkhāra
analyzed: esa nayo parattha api tattha avijjā saṅkhāra ggahaṇena ati pāḷiyam āditas vuttena avijjā saṅkhāra

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Kilesabhāvasāmaññato avijjāgahaṇena taṇhupādānāni. Kammabhāva sāmaññato saṅkhāraggahaṇena kammabhavo gahitoti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi yujjati.
analyzed: kilesa bhāva sāmaññato avijjā gahaṇena taṇhā upādānāni kamma bhāva sāmaññato saṅkhāra ggahaṇena kamma bhavaḥ gahito ti vuttam tat pi yujjati

analyzed: siddhesu pathamena dutīyassa dutīyena tatīyassa tatīyena catutthassa ati evam tissaḥ

original: phalapañcakatācāti. Evañhi sati hetuto phalameva siyā. Na phalato hetūti codanā anokāsāeva
analyzed: phala pañcaka tā ca ati evam hi sati hetutaḥ phalam eva siyā na phalataḥ codanā

original: hotīti. Dvīsu pana hetupañcakesu saṅkhārakammabhavānaṃ viseso aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttoyeva.

original: [228] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: “Kammabhavasaṅkhāto bhavekadesoti ettha āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayacetanā saṅkhārāti veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ idha na yujjati.

original: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃpi dvīsu hetupañcakesu saṅgahitattāti. Yathā rutapāḷinayenavā etaṃ vuttanti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Avasesācāti idaṃ jātijarāmaraṇehi saddhiṃ viññāṇādiphalapañcakaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam avasesāca ati idam jāti jarā maraṇehi saddhim viññāṇa ādi phala pañcakam sandhāya

original: Taṃ atthato upapattibhavoeva. Nahi phalapañcakato añño upapattibhavonāma atthīti.

original: Evaṃ santepi dhammavibhāga rakkhaṇatthaṃ upapattibhavasaddena catutthapañcakaṃ gahitanti

analyzed: yuttam dvādasasu aṅgesu avijjā nāma moho soca akusala mūlam taṇhā nāma lobho soca

original: akusala mūlanti vuttaṃ avijjā taṇhāvasena dve mūlānīti. Athavā, mūlanti sīsaṃ. Dve
analyzed: akusala mūlanti vuttam avijjā taṇhā vasena dve mūlāni iti athavā mūlanti sīsam dve

original: apāyagāmīnaṃvā cakkaṃ. Pacchimaṃ taṇhāmūlaṃ. Tañca rāgacaritānaṃvā sugatigāmīnaṃvā
analyzed: apāya gāmīnam vā cakkam pacchimam taṇhā mūlam tat ca rāga caritānam vā sugati gāmīnam vā

original: cakkanti dassitaṃ. Cakkanti pana yato paṭṭhāya vaṭṭasantānassa ārabbho hoti. Tasmiṃ

original: puna āgateeva cakkaṃnāma siyā. Tasmā idha dutīyena hetuphala yugaḷena saddhiṃ sabbaṃ

original: ekameva cakkanti yuttaṃ.
analyzed: ekam eva cakkanti yuttam

original: Kasmā panettha āgamanasambhāresu avijjāeva sīsaṃ katvā vuttā. Gamanasambhāresuca

original: taṇhāeva. Nanu ubhayattha ubhayaṃpi sīsaṃ katvā vattabbanti. Vuccate, sukhavedanāsadiso

original: hi taṇhāya āhāronāma natthi. Tasmā vedanaṅgato paraṃ vaṭṭaṅgaṃ ghaṭentena vedanā

analyzed: vattabbā na avijjā ti gamana sambhāresu tāva avijjāya okāso natthi

original: Sabbapathamaṃ ārabbhaṭṭhāneca sabbapadhānā avijjāeva vattabbā hoti. Sāca saṅkhāruppādane

original: avirajjhanakaṅgabhūtāti na tesaṃ antare ekassa aṅgassa atthāya kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti
analyzed: a virajjhanaka aṅga bhūtā ti na tesam antare ekassa aṅgassa atthāya kiñci vattabbam atthi iti

original: āgamanasambhāresu taṇhāya okāso natthīti. Ayañhi paṭiccasamuppādadesanānāma padhānaṅgapariggaha

original: vasena pavattā. Na labbhamāna sabbadhamma pariggaha vasenāti.

original: Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: Pubbantassa avijjāmūlaṃ. Aparantassa taṇhāmūlanti vuttaṃ.

original: Tattha pubbantassāti pubbassa hetuphalakoṭṭhāsassa. Aparantassāti pacchimassa hetuphala koṭṭhāsassāti atthoti. Kasmā panetāni dvemūlānināma hontīti āha –

original: Tesamevaca mūlānaṃ, nirodhena nirujjhatīti.
analyzed: tesam eva ca mūlānam nirodhena nirujjhati iti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Keci pana paṭiloma paṭiccasamuppāda dassanametanti vadanti. Paṭiloma
analyzed: vuttam hoti keci pana paṭiloma paṭiccasamuppāda dassanam etan ti vadanti paṭiloma

original: paṭicca samuppādonāma avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodhotiādiko

analyzed: idāni soka ādi vacanam na kevalam hoti

original: Athakho jarāmaraṇena saddhiṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ hutvā upari vaṭṭamūladhammapaṭipādakānaṃ

original: Nānā byasanaphuṭṭhassa, sokādīnaṃ pavattito;
analyzed: nānā byasana phuṭṭhassa soka ādīnam pavattitaḥ

original: Avijjā taṇhā vaḍḍhanti, yato vaṭṭaṃ pavattatī tipi.
analyzed: avijjā taṇhā vaḍḍhanti yatas vaṭṭam pavattati tipi

original: Vattabbaṃ. Yathāha-katamoca bhikkhave dukkhassa vipāko. Sammohavepakkaṃ vāhaṃ bhikkhave
analyzed: vattabbam yathā āha katamaḥ ca bhikkhave dukkhassa vipākaḥ sammoha vepakkam vā aham bhikkhave

original: sammohaṃ āpajjatīti evaṃ āgato sammoho. Pariyiṭṭhināma yathā jigacchāti pīḷito. Bhojanaṃ

original: Athaca panimassaṃ dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassātiādi. Yesu pana
