analyzed: anāgate ca sakala saṃsāre tasmin tasmin bhave tassa tassa atta bhāvassa nibbatti dassitā eva

original: hoti. Sabbānica diṭṭhigatāni nivattitāni. Bhavacakkañca anādimantaṃ hutvā ābandhatiyeva.
analyzed: hoti sabbāni ca diṭṭhi gatāni nivattitāni bhava cakkam ca an ādimantam hutvā ābandhatiyā iva

original: Tattha iccevaṃ ābandhanti jarāmaraṇamucchāyātiādinā vutta nayena punappunaṃ ābandhaṃ.

analyzed: vattabbaḥ ti saccam tassā pana paccaye vutte pi tassa paccayassa api paccayaḥ vattabbaḥ ti

analyzed: desesi iti attho

original: Tādi senasabhāvena upaladdhiyeva. Nahi sabhāvadhammesu īhāvā byāpārovā upalabbhati.
analyzed: tādi sena sabhāvena upaladdhiyā iva nahi sabhāva dhammesu īhāvā upalabbhati

original: Yena kattāvā kāretāvā upalabbheyyāti. Tathā upaladdhiyaṃ pana sati anurūpānaṃ paccayuppannadhammānaṃ

analyzed: āramanti cittacetasikā dhammā suṭṭhu ratim anubhavantā viya ajjholambamānā pavattanti

original: Adhipati saddattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Adhipati bhāvena upakārako dhammo adhipatipaccayo.

original: adatvā santānānubandhavasena sārammaṇadhamma bhāvena attasadisassa dhammantarassa
analyzed: a datvā santāna anubandha vasena sa ārammaṇa dhamma bhāvena atta sadisassa dhammantarassa

original: uppādanaṃ anantarapaccayatā. Dhammantare uppādiyamānepi yaṃkiñci dhammaṃ anuppādetvā
analyzed: uppādanam anantara paccaya tā dhamma antare uppādiyamāne pi yaṃ kiñci dhammam an uppādetvā

original: asaññasattā cavantassaca purimapacchimabhāgapavattānaṃ cittuppādānaṃpi anantaratā
analyzed: asaññasattā cavantassa ca purima pacchima bhāga pavattānam cittuppādānam pi anantara tā

original: samanantaratāca upapannā hotīti. Nahi abhāva bhūto antare kālo tesaṃ antaraṃ karotināma.
analyzed: upapannā hoti iti nahi abhāva bhūtaḥ antare kālaḥ tesam antaram

original: Naca aññasantānabhūto antare rūpadhammo. Aññañhi rūpasantānaṃ, aññaṃ arūpasantānaṃ.
analyzed: na ca añña santāna bhūtaḥ antare rūpa dhammo aññañhi rūpa santānam aññam arūpa santānam

original: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kālānantaratā samanantarapaccayoti vādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā saṇṭhānābhāvato

original: suṭṭhu anantarāti samanantarāti vuttaṃ. Etena yathāsaṇṭhānavantānaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ

original: Tasmā purimapacchimānaṃ tesaṃ ekībhūtānaṃ viya pavattisamanantaratānāma. Tathā pavattana

original: samatthatā samanantarapaccayatāti dasseti.
analyzed: samattha tā samanantara paccaya tā ati dasseti

analyzed: ye pana dhammā attani jāte eva jāyanti no a jāte attanā saha iva ca jāyanti no pure

original: pacchāca, tesaṃ jātatthāya viya sayaṃ tehi saha jātabhāvena upakārako dhammo sahajātapaccayo.

original: Pakāsassa padīpo viya. Padīpajālañhi uppajjamānaṃ pakāsasaṅkhātena ālokena saheva
analyzed: pakāsassa padīpaḥ viya padīpa jālam hi uppajjamānam pakāsa saṅkhātena ālokena saha eva

original: uppajjatīti. Aññamaññaṃ upatthambhantaṃ tidaṇḍaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ upatthambhanavasena
analyzed: uppajjati iti aññam aññam upatthambhantam ti daṇḍam viya aññam aññam upatthambhana vasena

original: upakārako dhammo aññamaññapaccayo. Evañca sati imassa paccayassa purimena saha viseso
analyzed: upakārakaḥ dhammaḥ aññamañña paccayaḥ evam ca sati imassa paccayassa purimena saha viseso

original: pākaṭo hoti. Nahi saha jātasaddo evarūpaṃ aññamaññopatthambhanaṃ bodhetīti. Nissayanti
analyzed: pākaṭaḥ hoti nahi saha jāta saddaḥ evarūpam aññamañña upatthambhanam bodheti iti nissayanti

original: etthāti nissayo. Nissayabhāvena upakārako dhammo nissayapaccayo. So pana sahajātanissayo
analyzed: ettha ati nissayaḥ nissaya bhāvena upakārako dhammo nissaya paccayo saḥ pana sahajāta nissayo

original: vatthupurejāta nissayoti duvidho hoti. Tattha sahajātova samāno paṭakoṭṭhako viya
analyzed: vatthu purejāta nissayaḥ ti duvidhaḥ hoti tattha sahajātaḥ uva samānaḥ paṭa koṭṭhakaḥ viya

analyzed: pure jātaḥ hutvā adhiṭṭhāna bhāvena upakārakaḥ vatthu purejāta nissayaḥ balavataraḥ pana

original: nissayo upanissayo. Yathā hi sālibhattassa uppattiyā sūdovā ukkhalivākaṭṭhaṃvā aggivānissayo
analyzed: nissayaḥ upanissayaḥ yathā hi sālibhattassa uppattiyā sūdaḥ vā aggi vā nissayaḥ

original: eva hoti, na upanissayo. Sālikhettavuṭṭhidhārā eva pana upanissayo, na hi tāsuasati

original: bhattuppattiyā sūdādīnaṃpi thāmonāma atthīti. Tathā yahiṃ paccaye asati nissayadhammāpi
analyzed: bhattuppattiyā sūda ādīnam pi thāmo nāma atthi iti tathā paccaye asati nissaya dhammā api

original: natthi. Kuto nissitadhammā. So paccayo nissayatopi balavataraṭṭhena upanissayoti vuccatīti.

original: So pana ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayoti tividho hoti. Tattha

original: garukatā ārammaṇa dhammā garukatattāeva adhipatibhūtā balava nissayabhūtāca honti.
analyzed: garukatā ārammaṇa dhammā garukata ttā eva adhipati bhūtā balava nissaya bhūtāca honti

original: Anantarapaccayadhammāca tehi vinā cittasantānapavattiyā eva abhāvato balavanissayāeva

analyzed: honti pakata upanissayo ti ettha pana pakataḥ upanissayo ti pakata upanissayo pakataḥ ti ca

original: yathā kate sati anurūpe kāle tasmiṃsantāne ekantena paccayuppannadhammā pātubhavanti,
analyzed: yathā kate sati anurūpe kāle tasmin santāne ekantena paccaya uppanna dhammā pātubhavanti

original: tathā suṭṭhu katoti attho. Karaṇañcettha saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo paññātica rāgo doso

original: moho māno diṭṭhi patthanātica vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ attano santāne pubbabhāge vuttappakārena
analyzed: mohaḥ mānaḥ diṭṭhi patthanā ati ca vuttānam dhammānam attano santāne pubba bhāge vutta ppakārena

original: Puretaraṃ uppajjitvā vattamānabhāvena upakārako dhammo purejātapaccayo. So duvidho
analyzed: puretaram uppajjitvā vattamāna bhāvena upakārako dhammo purejāta paccayo so duvidho

original: tāmattavisiṭṭhā purejātapaccayoti vuttāti. Ācariyānandattherena pana nissayārammaṇākārādīhi

analyzed: jāta tā visiṭṭhehi nissaya ārammaṇa satti visesehi aññaḥ visum purejāta satti visesaḥ nāma

original: Pure ropetvā jātānaṃ rukkhapotakānaṃ viya pacchā āsiñciyamānaṃ udakaṃ pure jātānaṃ
analyzed: pure ropetvā jātānam rukkha potakānam viya pacchā āsiñciyamānam udakam pure jātānam

analyzed: vuttam mūla ṭīkāyan ca etena arūpa dhammehi

analyzed: nāma ati siddham ha iti

original: upatthambhanena saheva janentīti.
analyzed: upatthambhanena saha iva janenti iti

original: Yāva soḷasamacittā eva vā purejātassa. Yadaggena hi maraṇāsannakāle vatthurūpaṃ cuticittassa

original: purejātapaccayataṃ upagacchati. Tadaggena cuticittaṃpi tassa vatthurūpassa pacchājātapaccayo
analyzed: purejāta paccaya tam upagacchati tad aggena cuti cittam pi tassa vatthu rūpassa pacchājāta paccayo

original: na hotīti navattabbo. Tathā sesarūpānañca. Yathā hi upatthambhanto āhāro vaḍḍhanapakkhe
analyzed: na hoti iti tathā sesa rūpānam ca yathā hi upatthambhantaḥ āhāraḥ vaḍḍhana pakkhe

original: ṭhitameva upatthambhati. Hāyanapakkhe ṭhitaṃ nupatthambhatīti natthi. Tadāpi tadanurūpassa

original: upatthambhanassa icchitabbattā. Evamayaṃpīti.
analyzed: upatthambhanassa icchitabba ttā evam ayam pi iti

original: Arūpadhammānaṃ ānubhāvonāma mahāvipphāro hoti. Tasmā te kāyekadese vatthumhi uppannāpi
analyzed: arūpa dhammānam ānubhāvaḥ nāma mahā vipphāraḥ hoti tasmā te kāya ekadese vatthumhi uppannā api

analyzed: sakalam imam catuja kāyam upatthambhetum sakkontiyā iva ati vuttam imassa kāyassa ati cakkha ādīni

original: pasādavatthūni rūpādīhi sahaladdhaghaṭṭanānieva viññāṇassa ādhārabhāvaṃ gacchanti.
analyzed: pasāda vatthūni rūpa ādīhi saha laddha ghaṭṭanāni eva viññāṇassa ādhāra bhāvam gacchanti

original: Ghaṭṭanañca ṭhitipattakāleevāti tesaṃ niccakālaṃpi attano viññāṇassa purejātapaccayatā
analyzed: ghaṭṭanam ca ṭhiti patta kāle eva ati tesam nicca kālam pi attanaḥ viññāṇassa purejāta paccaya tā

original: siddhi hoti. Viññāṇañcanāma pañcavokārabhave vatthunissayena vinā uppajjituṃ nasakkotīti,
analyzed: hoti viññāṇam ca nāma pañcavokāra bhave vatthu nissayena vinā uppajjitum na sakkoti iti

original: jātaṃ suṭṭhu balavantañca vatthuṃ labhati, tadā tadeva nissāya pavattati. Tañca niyamato

original: bhavituṃ sakkotīti vuttaṃ chavatthūni pavattiyanti.
analyzed: bhavitum sakkoti iti vuttam cha vatthūni pavattiyanti

original: Pañcālambaṇānica pañcaviññāṇavīthiyāti idaṃ niyamasiddhigahaṇa vasena vuttaṃ. Sabbāni

original: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena

original: [230] Yaṃ pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yam pana

original: Cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandatītiādinā assā danādivasenapi assa niddesassa

original: [231] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana

analyzed: yañ ca

original: ‘Tatthā’tiādinā attanorāgādayonissāyaajjhattaṃ kusalākusalānameva uppattividhānaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃpi anupapannameva.

analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Chavatthūni sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnanti ettha vatthusahajāta nissayo vatthupurejātanissayo

original: ārabbhaaniccādivasena sammasanti, etaṃ mamātivā assādenti, tadāyaṃ vatthu āvajjitaṃ

analyzed: aṭṭhakathā virodhato tasmā so kāle na sakkā

analyzed: hoti evam hi sati tesam nirāvajjana tāvā bhinna ārammaṇa tāvā natthi iti ayam tesam adhippāyaḥ ti

analyzed: tattha pana yadi āvajjanena āvajjitam vatthum a gahetvā attanaḥ attanaḥ nissaya vatthūni

original: āvajji tappakārasseva gahaṇato. Yathā hi āvajjanaṃpi vatthuntveva āvajjati. Tathā

analyzed: daṭṭhabbam yadi evam

original: yojetabbaṃ. Nanu kabaḷīkārāhāro rūpajīvitindriyañca sahajāte saṅgahetabbaṃ. Evañhi

original: sati tividhova atthipaccayo siyāti.Na. Sahajananasaṅkhātassa sahuppādanalakkhaṇassa

analyzed: upatthambhantā attanā saha uppādana pubbakā eva upatthambhanti na tathā saḥ āhāro

original: So pana vināva sahuppādanakiccena sahajātānipi asahajātānipi upatthambhatīti rūpajīvitaṃpi

original: cattāropaccayā hontīti dassetuṃ ārammaṇūpanissaya.La. Samodhānaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cattāro paccayāḥ honti iti dassetum gacchanti iti vuttam

original: Tatrāyaṃ samodhānavidhi, catuvīsatiyā paccayesu adhipati paccayo tāva duvidho ārammaṇasahajātavasena.

original: Tattha ārammaṇādhipati tīsu kammavajjesu samodhānaṃ gacchati. Ārammaṇa mattaṃpi hi

original: kammena saha samodhānaṃ nagacchati. Kuto adhipati bhūtanti.
analyzed: kammena saha samodhānam na gacchati kutas

original: Ettha siyā, kasmā ārammaṇamattaṃpi.La. Na gacchatīti vuttaṃ. Nanu kammārammaṇāpi
analyzed: ettha siyā na gacchati iti vuttam nanu kamma ārammaṇā api

original: paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutiyo hontīti. Saccaṃ. Ettha pana mūlaṭīkāyaṃ kammaṃ pana tasmiṃ

original: kate pavattamānānaṃ katūpacita bhāvena kammapaccayo hoti. Na ārammaṇākārena. Visaya
analyzed: kate pavattamānānam kata upacita bhāvena kamma paccayaḥ hoti na ārammaṇa ākārena visaya

original: mattatāvasenaca ārammaṇapaccayo hoti. Na santānavisesanaṃ katvā phaluppādanasaṅkhātena

original: kammapaccayākārena. Tasmā te paccayākāravisabhāgattā saha ghaṭanaṃ nagacchantīti
analyzed: kamma paccaya ākārena tasmā te paccaya ākāra visabhāga ttā saha ghaṭanam na gacchanti iti

original: visajjitanti. Sahajātādhipati pana atthipaccaye. Nissayapaccayo tividho sahajāto
analyzed: visajjitanti sahajāta adhipati pana atthi paccaye nissaya paccayo tividhaḥ sahajātaḥ

original: vatthupurejāto vatthārammaṇapurejātoti. Tattha purimā dve atthipaccaye, pacchimo

Kammaṭṭhāna saṅgaha paramatthadīpanī
170. Evaṃ aṭṭhahi paricchedehi sapaccayapabhedaṃ nāmarūpa vibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni
analyzed: evam aṭṭhahi paricchedehi sa paccaya pabhedam nāma rūpa vibhāgam dassetvā idāni

original: viditanāmarūpa vibhāgassa kammaṭṭhānavidhānaṃ dassento samathavipassanānantiādi māha.
analyzed: vidita nāma rūpa vibhāgassa kammaṭṭhāna vidhānam dassento samatha vipassanā na ti ādi mā āha

original: Ito paccaya saṅgahato paraṃ samathavipassanānaṃ bhāvanānaṃ duvidhaṃpi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: itas saṅgahato param samatha vipassanānam bhāvanānam duvidham pi kammaṭṭhānam

original: yathākkamaṃ pavakkhāmīti yojanā. Tattha kilese aññepivā vitakkādayo oḷārikadhamme
analyzed: yathākkamam pavakkhāmi iti yojanā tattha kilese vitakka ādayaḥ oḷārika dhamme

original: sametīti samatho. Tathā pavatto ekaggatāsaṅkhāto samādhi. Visesena passanti etāyāti
analyzed: sameti iti samathaḥ tathā pavattaḥ ekagga tā saṅkhāto samādhi visesena passanti etāya ati

original: vipassanā. Aniccānupassanādikā bhāvanāpaññā. Tāya hi yogino khandhesu lokiyamahājanena
analyzed: vipassanā anicca anupassanā ādikā bhāvanā paññā tāya hi yoginaḥ khandhesu lokiya mahājanena

original: passitaṃ itthipurisādikaṃ niccasukhādikañca atikkamitvā visesena aniccādikameva passantīti.
analyzed: passitam itthi purisa ādikam nicca sukha ādikañca atikkamitvā visesena anicca ādikam eva passanti iti

original: Bhāvetabbāti bhāvanā. Bhāventivā cittasantānaṃ etāhīti bhāvanā. Kiriyā kammaṃ. Tiṭṭhati
analyzed: bhāvetabbā ati bhāvanā bhāventivā citta santānam etāhi iti bhāvanā kiriyā kammam tiṭṭhati

original: etthāti ṭhānaṃ. Kammassa ṭhānanti kammaṭṭhānaṃ. Vīriyārabbhasaṅkhātassa yogakammassa
analyzed: ettha ati ṭhānam kammassa ṭhānan ti kammaṭṭhānam vīriya ārabbha saṅkhātassa yoga kammassa

original: pavattiṭṭhānanti attho. Kasiṇamaṇḍalādikaṃ kasiṇabhāvanādikañca. Ādimajjha pariyosānānañhi
analyzed: pavatti ṭṭhānanti attho kasiṇa maṇḍala ādikam kasiṇa bhāvanā ādikam ca ādi majjha hi

original: samudāyabhūkaṃ ekametaṃ pathavīkasiṇa bhāvanādikaṃ bhāvanākammaṃpi attano avayavabhūtassa
analyzed: samudāya bhūkam ekam etam pathavī kasiṇa bhāvanā ādikam bhāvanā kammam api attanaḥ avayava bhūtassa

original: yoga kammassa pavattiṭṭhānaṃ sambhavatīti.
analyzed: yoga kammassa pavatti ṭṭhānam sambhavati iti

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Uttaruttara yogakammassa padaṭṭhānatāya kammaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ bhāvanāvidhiñcātipi vuttaṃ. Tampi yujjatiyeva.
analyzed: uttara uttara yoga kammassa padaṭṭhāna tāya kammaṭṭhāna bhūtam vuttam tam pi

original: Yogakammamevavā sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenaṭhānanti kammaṭṭhānaṃ. Tatthāti tasmiṃ
analyzed: sukha visesānam kammaṭṭhānam tattha ti tasmin

original: duvidhepi kammaṭṭhāne. Samathasaṅgaheti samatha kammaṭṭhānasaṅgahe. Dasakasiṇānīti
analyzed: duvidhe api kammaṭṭhāne samatha saṅgaha iti kammaṭṭhāna saṅgahe dasa kasiṇāni iti

original: dasakasiṇamaṇḍalāni kasiṇajjhānānica. Tadubhayānipi hi yogānuyogasaṅkhātassa samatha
analyzed: dasa kasiṇa maṇḍalāni kasiṇa jhānāni ca tad ubhayāni pi hi yoga anuyoga saṅkhātassa

original: kammassa pavattiṭṭhānattā samathakammaṭṭhānānināma hontīti. Dasaasubhāti dasaasubhavatthūni
analyzed: kammassa pavatti ṭṭhāna ttā samatha kammaṭṭhānāni nāma honti iti dasa asubhā ati dasa asubha vatthūni

original: asubhajjhānānica. Dasaanussati yoti buddhaguṇādīni dasaanussatiṭṭhānāni anussaraṇasati
analyzed: asubha jjhānāni ca dasa anussati buddha guṇa ādīni dasa anussati ṭhānāni anussaraṇa sati

original: yoca. Sesānipi yathānurūpaṃ vattabbānīti. Caraṇaṃ cariyā. Samudācaraṇanti attho.
analyzed: yathānurūpam vattabbāni iti caraṇam cariyā samudācaraṇam ti atthaḥ

original: Pavattibahulatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Rāgassa cariyā rāgacariyā. Rāgacaritāti pāṭho, so
analyzed: pavatti bahula tā ti vuttam hoti rāgassa cariyā rāga cariyā rāga caritā ati pāṭhaḥ so

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ natthi, puggalaṭṭhāneeva so yuttoti. Esanayo sesesupi.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā yam natthi so yutto ti esa nayo sesesu pi

original: [243] Yo pana vibhāvaniyaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ pana

original: Cariyānaṃ saṃsaggabhedo vutto. So idha nādhippeto.
analyzed: cariyānam saṃsagga bhedaḥ vuttaḥ saḥ idha na adhippetaḥ

original: Nahi kammaṭṭhānānaṃnāma saṃsaggacaritassapi ekassa dve tīṇi dātabbāni hotīti. Teneva
analyzed: nahi ekassa dve tīṇi dātabbāni hoti iti tena iva

original: hi so bhedo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ nagarukatoti. Sabbāpi appanāya pubbabhāgapavattā kāmāvacara
analyzed: hi so bhedaḥ aṭṭhakathā ayam nagaru kato ti sabbā api appanāya pubba bhāga pavattā kāmāvacara

original: bhāvanā parikammabhāvanānāma. Sā pana appanāya āsanne dūreti duvidhā hoti. Tattha
analyzed: bhāvanā parikamma bhāvanā nāma sā pana appanāya āsanne dūrā iti duvidhā hoti tattha

original: yā āsanne, sā appanaṃ upecca samīpe ṭhatvā pavattattā upacārabhāvanāti vuccati. Itarā
analyzed: yā āsanne sā appanam upecca samīpe ṭhatvā pavatta ttā upacāra bhāvanā ati vuccati itarā

original: pana parikamma bhāvanāevanāma. Iti parikammabhāvanāpi samānā pubbāparavisesa pākaṭabhāvatthaṃ
analyzed: pana iti parikamma bhāvanā api samānā pubba apara visesa pākaṭa bhāva attham

original: aṭṭhakathāsu dvīhi nāmehi gahitāti vuttaṃ parikammabhāvanā.La. Tissobhāvanāti tāsaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāsu dvīhi nāmehi gahitā ti vuttam tāsam

original: pana viseso parato āgamissati. Parikammanimittanti parikammabhāvanāya ārammaṇabhūtaṃ
analyzed: pana visesaḥ paratas āgamissati parikamma nimittan ti parikamma bhāvanāya ārammaṇa bhūtam

original: kasiṇamaṇḍalādinimittaṃ. Tañca tassā ārammaṇa bhāvena ekaṃpi samānaṃ pubbāparavisesapākaṭabhāvatthaṃ
analyzed: kasiṇa maṇḍala ādi nimittam tat ca tassā ārammaṇa bhāvena ekam pi samānam pubba apara visesa pākaṭa bhāva attham

original: parikammanimittaṃ uggahanimittanti dvidhā bhinditvā vuttaṃ. Tesaṃpi viseso āgamissati.
analyzed: parikamma nimittam uggaha nimittam ti dvidhā bhinditvā vuttam tesam pi visesaḥ āgamissati

original: Vidatthicaturaṅgulasaṅkhātena parittapamāṇenavā khala maṇḍalādisaṅkhātena mahantapamāṇenavā
analyzed: vidatthi catur aṅgula saṅkhātena paritta pamāṇena vā khala maṇḍala ādi saṅkhātena mahanta pamāṇena vā

original: kataṃ akataṃvā pathavī maṇḍalatalameva asesapharitabbaṭṭhena kasiṇanti pathavīkasiṇaṃ.
analyzed: katam a katam vā pathavī maṇḍala talam eva kasiṇanti pathavī kasiṇam

original: Sakalasaddapariyāyo hi kasiṇasaddo. Yathā kasiṇena jambudīpassāti. Tasmā yattake
analyzed: sakala sadda pariyāyaḥ hi kasiṇa saddaḥ yathā kasiṇena jambudīpassa ati tasmā yattake

original: pathavītale nimittaṃ gaṇhāti, tattakaṃ cittena asesaṃ pharitvā eva gahetabbaṃ hoti.
analyzed: pathavī tale nimittam gaṇhāti tattakam cittena asesam pharitvā eva gahetabbam hoti

original: Na pana tassa ekadese ṭhatvāti, tena vuttaṃ pathavīmaṇḍalatalameva asesapharitabbaṭṭhena
analyzed: na pana tassa eka dese ṭhatvā ti tena vuttam pathavī maṇḍala talam eva asesa pharitabba ṭṭhena

original: kasiṇanti pathavīkasiṇanti. Esanayo sesakasiṇesupīti. Etthaca, avibhūtavaṇṇāya pathaviyā
analyzed: pathavī kasiṇanti sesa kasiṇesu pi iti ettha ca avibhūta vaṇṇāya pathaviyā

original: eka talabhāvenasanniviṭṭhāsaṇṭhānapaññattiidhapathavīkasiṇaṃnāma. Tathā āpokasiṇaṃ
analyzed: eka tala bhāvena sanniviṭṭha asaṇṭhāna paññatti idha pathavīkasiṇam nāma tathā āpokasiṇam

original: tejokasiṇañca. Phuṭṭhaṭṭhāne cittena saṇṭhānaṃ katvā gahitā vāyuvaṭṭi vāyokasiṇaṃnāma.
analyzed: tejokasiṇam ca phuṭṭha ṭṭhāne cittena saṇṭhānam katvā gahitā vāyuvaṭṭi vāyokasiṇam nāma

original: Nīlavaṇṇavisiṭṭhāekā saṇṭhānapaññatti nīlakasiṇaṃnāma. Tathā pītalohito dātakasiṇānipi.
analyzed: saṇṭhāna paññatti tathā pīta lohitaḥ

original: Candasūriyaaggobhāsavisiṭṭhā katthaci dissamānā saṇṭhānapaññatti ālokakasiṇaṃnāma.
analyzed: canda sūriya agga ubhāsa visiṭṭhā katthaci dissamānā saṇṭhāna paññatti ālokakasiṇam nāma

original: Tittichiddavāta pānachiddādīsu dissamānā ākāsavisiṭṭhā saṇṭhānapaññatti ākāsakasiṇaṃnāmāti.
analyzed: pāna chidda ādīsu dissamānā ākāsa visiṭṭhā saṇṭhāna paññatti

original: Ativiya dhumātaṃ sunabhāvaṃ gatanti uddhumātaṃ. Tadeva kucchitattā uddhumātakaṃ.
analyzed: ativiya dhumātam suna bhāvam gatanti uddhumātam tat eva uddhumātakam

original: Tathābhūtassa chavasarīrassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tadeva pūtibhāvaṃ gatakāle purimavaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā
analyzed: tathābhūtassa chava sarīrassa itam nāmam tat eva pūti bhāvam gata kāle purima vaṇṇam vijahitvā

original: puna nīlabhāvaṃ pattaṃ vinīlakaṃ. Tadeva puna paccitvā tato tato visandamānapubbayuttaṃ
analyzed: puna nīla bhāvam pattam vinīlakam tat eva puna paccitvā tatas tatas visandamāna pubba yuttam

original: vipubbakaṃ. Yuddhabhūmiyādīsu satthena majjhe chinditvā thapitaṃ virūpachinnasarīraṃ
analyzed: vipubbakam yuddha bhūmiya ādīsu satthena majjhe chinditvā thapitam virūpa chinna sarīram

original: vicchinnakaṃnāma. Soṇa siṅgālādīhi vividhākārena khāyitapadesayuttaṃ sarīraṃ vikkhāyitakaṃnāma.
analyzed: vicchinnakam nāma soṇa siṅgāla ādīhi vividha ākārena khāyita padesa yuttam sarīram vikkhāyitakam nāma

original: Soṇasiṅgālādīhi eva khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ katvā apakaḍḍhitvā tato tato khittaaṅgapaccaṅgayuttaṃ
analyzed: soṇa siṅgāla ādīhi eva khaṇḍākhaṇḍikam katvā apakaḍḍhitvā tato tato khitta aṅga paccaṅga yuttam

original: sarīraṃ vittakkhikaṃ nāma. Aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ katvā
analyzed: sarīram vittakkhikam nāma aṅga paccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā khaṇḍākhaṇḍikam katvā

original: tato tato khittaaṅgapaccaṅgayuttaṃ sarīraṃ hatavikkhittakaṃnāma. Paggharita lohitasarīraṃ
analyzed: tato tato khitta aṅga paccaṅga yuttam sarīram hatavikkhittakaṃ nāma lohita sarīram

original: lohitakaṃ nāma. Puḷuvaparipūraṃ sarīraṃ puḷuvakaṃ. Sakalo aṭṭhisaṅghāṭovā ekamekaṃvā
analyzed: lohitakam nāma puḷuva paripūram sarīram puḷuvakam sakalaḥ aṭṭhi saṅghāṭaḥ vā ekam ekam vā

original: aṭṭhi aṭṭhikaṃ nāma. Punappunaṃ nirantaraṃ saraṇaṃ anussati. Buddhaguṇassa anussati
analyzed: aṭṭhi aṭṭhikam nāma punappunam nirantaram saraṇam anussati buddha guṇassa anussati

original: buddhānussati. Esa nayo sesāsupīti. Tattha arahatādiguṇo buddhaguṇonāma. Svakkhātatādiguṇo
analyzed: buddha anussati esa nayaḥ sesāsu pi iti tattha arahat ādi guṇaḥ buddha guṇaḥ nāma svakkhāta tā ādi guṇaḥ

original: dhammaguṇonāma. Suppaṭipannatādiguṇo saṅghaguṇo nāma. Attano sīlassa akhaṇḍatādi
analyzed: dhamma guṇo nāma suppaṭipanna tā ādi guṇaḥ saṅgha guṇo nāma attano sīlassa akhaṇḍa tā ādi

original: guṇo sīlaguṇonāma. Attano dānassa vigatamalamaccheratādi guṇo cāgaguṇonāma. Attānaṃ
analyzed: guṇo sīla guṇo nāma dānassa guṇo cāga guṇo nāma

original: devattaṃvā sakkattaṃvā brahmattaṃvā vahituṃ samatthā attano saddhādiguṇā devatāguṇānāma.
analyzed: devattam vā sakkattam vā brahmattam vā vahitum samatthāḥ saddhā ādi guṇāḥ devatā guṇānām

original: Vatta paṭipattivasenavā dhutaṅgasamādānavasenavā jhānasamāpattivasenavā vipassanāvasenavā
analyzed: paṭipatti vasena vā dhutaṅga samādāna vasena vā jhāna samāpatti vasena vā vipassanā vasena vā

original: attano santāne ciraṃvikālaṃ vikkhambhitānaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ vūpasamo attanāadhigatanibbānañca
analyzed: attano santāne ciram vikālam vikkhambhitānam kāma rāga ādīnam vūpasamaḥ attanā adhigata nibbānam ca

original: upasamonāma. Ekabhavapariyāpannassa attano khandhasantānassa bhedo maraṇaṃ nāma.
analyzed: upasamaḥ nāma eka bhava pariyāpannassa attanaḥ khandha santānassa bhedaḥ maraṇam nāma

original: Kesakāyādīnaṃ nānākāyānaṃ samūhabhūto ayaṃ kāyo kāyonāma. Attani nirantaraṃ pavattamānā
analyzed: samūha bhūtaḥ ayam kāyaḥ nirantaram pavattamānā

original: assāsa passāsā ānāpāṇaṃnāma. Mijjati siniyhatīti mettā. Yaṃ ārabbha uppajjati. Tassa
analyzed: mijjati siniyhati iti mettā yam ārabbha uppajjati tassa

original: hitasukhaṃ avippakiṇṇaṃ katvā saṅgaṇhatīti attho. Mittassavā esā mittesuvā bhavāti
analyzed: hita sukham a vippakiṇṇam katvā saṅgaṇhati iti attho mittassa vā esā mittesuvā bhavāti

original: mettā. Atthato pana parasattānaṃ hitūpasaṃhāravasena pavatto adosoeva. Parasattānaṃ
analyzed: mettā atthato pana para sattānam hitu upasaṃhāra vasena pavatto adosaḥ eva para sattānam

original: hitūpasaṃhāra hitamodana ahitāpanayanasaṅkhātaṃ byāpārattayaṃ pahāya tesaṃ kammasakatānubrūhanavasena
analyzed: ahita apanayana saṅkhātam byāpāra ttayam pahāya tesam

original: upapattito yuttito pekkhatīti upekkhā. Tathā pavattā tatramajjhattatāeva. Appamāṇesusattesu
analyzed: upapattitaḥ yuttitaḥ pekkhati iti upekkhā tathā pavattā appamāṇesu sattesu

original: bhavāti appamaññā. Na hi ettakesu eva sattesu etā pavattetabbā. Na tato aññesūti
analyzed: bhavāti appamaññā na hi ettakesu eva sattesu etā pavattetabbā na tatas aññesu iti

original: evaṃ etāsaṃ visayaparicchedonāma atthīti. Evaṃsantepi ādikammi kena ādito ekasmiṃ
analyzed: evam etāsam atthi iti evam sante pi ādi kammi kena āditaḥ ekasmin

original: puggale attano bhāvanācittaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ laddhavisesañca katvā pacchā dvīsu tīsūtiādinā
analyzed: puggale attanaḥ bhāvanā cittam laddha āsevanam laddha visesam ca katvā pacchā dvīsu tīsu iti ādinā

original: vaḍḍhitvā sīmasambhedoca odhisopharaṇa anodhisopharaṇa disāpharaṇāniva kattabbānīti.
analyzed: vaḍḍhitvā odhi sopharaṇa anodhi sopharaṇa disāpharaṇāni iva kattabbāni iti

original: Yaṃ pana vibhaṅge mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatītiādinā paṭisambhidāmaggeca
analyzed: yam pana vibhaṅge mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā viharati iti ādinā paṭisambhidā magge ca

original: sabbesattā averā hontūtiādinā mettāvidhānaṃ nāma vuttaṃ. Taṃ mettājhāne vasībhāvappattānaṃ
analyzed: sabbesattāḥ averāḥ hontu iti ādinā mettāvidhānam nāma vuttam tam mettā jhāne vasībhāva pattānam

original: vasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etā pana visesena dosapakkhikānaṃ kilesānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhūtā
analyzed: vasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbam etā pana visesena dosa pakkhikānam kilesānam uju paṭipakkha bhūtā

original: hontīti taṃsamaṅginoca niccaṃ sommahadayabhāvena brahmasadi sattā brahmānonāma. Tesaṃ
analyzed: honti iti niccam somma hadaya bhāvena brahma sadi sattāḥ brahmāno nāma tesam

original: vihāroti brahmavihāro. Seṭṭhānaṃvā seṭṭhabhūtovā vihāroti brahmavihāroti. Āhāreti
analyzed: vihāro ti brahmavihāro seṭṭhānam vā seṭṭha bhūtaḥ vā vihāro ti brahmavihāro ti āhāra iti

original: asita pīta khāyita sāyita vasena catuppabhede ajjhohaṭāhāre. Paṭikūlasaññāti āhārahetu
analyzed: asita pīta khāyita sāyita vasena catu pabhede ajjhohaṭa āhāre paṭikūla saññā ati āhāra hetu

original: anubhavitabbānaṃ dukkhadhammānaṃ paccavekkhanavasena sarasapaṭikūlatā paccavekkhanavasena
analyzed: anubhavitabbānam dukkha dhammānam paccavekkhana vasena sarasa paṭikūla tā paccavekkhana vasena

original: āsayanidhāna pakkāpakkaphalanissandapaccavekkhana vasena ca tattha nikanti pahānasaññā.
analyzed: āsaya nidhāna pakka apakka phala nissanda paccavekkhana vasena ca tattha nikanti pahāna saññā

original: Catudhātuvavatthānanti sarīragatānaṃ pathaviādīnaṃ catunnaṃ mahādhātūnaṃ salakkhaṇā
analyzed: catu dhātu vavatthānanti sarīra gatānam pathavi ādīnam catunnam mahā dhātūnam salakkhaṇā

original: divasena visuṃ visuṃ paricchinditvā samanupassanaṃ. Tañhi catasso dhātuyo vavatthapiyanti
analyzed: divasena visum visum paricchinditvā samanupassanam tat hi catassaḥ dhātuyaḥ

original: vinicchiyanti sallakkhiyanti etenāti catudhātuvavatthānanti vuccatīti. Asubhasaññā
analyzed: etena ati catu dhātu vavatthānan ti vuccati iti asubha saññā

original: bhāvetabbā rāgassapahānāyāti vacanato dasaasubhā.La. Rāgacaritassa sappāyāti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: bhāvetabbāḥ rāgassa apahānāya ati vacanataḥ rāga caritassa sappāya ati vuttam

original: Tattha rāgena caratīti rāgacarito. So hi kāmaṃ kadāci dosena carati. Kadāci mohena.
analyzed: tattha rāgena carati iti rāga caritaḥ saḥ hi kāmam kadācid dosena carati kadācid mohena

original: Kadāci saddhādīsupi aññatarena. Rāgo panassa ussanno. Tasmā ussannena rāgena so rāgacaritoti

original: [244] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Evañhi sati so buddhicaritena saha vattabbo siyāti. Kāmañca buddhaguṇādayopi ekantena

original: citte sannisinnanti sambandho. Tattha anuyuñjanthassāti nirantaraṃ padahantassa.

analyzed: sannisinnam niccala bhāvena saṇṭhitam hutvā suṭṭhu appitam pavesitam hoti tanti nimitta ālambaṇam

original: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
analyzed: āvāsaḥ gocaraḥ bhassam puggalaḥ bhojanam utu

original: Sappāye satta sevetha, evañhi paṭipajjato;
analyzed: sappāye satta sevetha evam hi paṭipajjataḥ

analyzed: nacirena iva kālena hoti kassaci appanā iti hi vuttam

analyzed: siddhāya siddhā eva ha uti iti

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

analyzed: taṃpi

original: Teneva hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ visuddhimaggeca āruppajjhānānaṃpaccayabhāvaṃanupagatassapiākāsakasiṇajjhānassa

original: ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tādisānaṃ aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasībhāvānaṃ abhiññākamme
analyzed: ṭhānam vijjati iti vuttam tasmā tādisānam aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasībhāvānam abhiññā kamme

original: ādikammikakulaputtānaṃ kasiṇā nulomato kasiṇapaṭilomatotiādinā nayena vuttehi cuddasahi
analyzed: ādikammika kula puttānam kasiṇa anulomataḥ kasiṇa paṭilomataḥ ti ādinā nayena vuttehi cuddasahi

original: ākārehi attano rūpapañcamajjhānacittaṃ paridametvā tikkhaṃ sūraṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ
analyzed: ākārehi attanaḥ rūpa pañcama jhāna cittam paridametvā tikkham sūram abhinīhāra kkhamam

original: katvā idāni iddhivikubbanaṃ karissā mīti ārabhantānaṃ abhiññāvasena pavattamānaṃ
analyzed: katvā idāni iddhivikubbanam karissā mi iti ārabhantānam abhiññā vasena pavattamānam

original: pana rūpāvacarapañca majjhānaṃ rūpādīsu chasu ālambaṇesu yathārahaṃ appetīti yojanā
analyzed: pana rūpāvacara pañca majjhānam rūpa ādīsu chasu ālambaṇesu yathāraham appeti iti yojanā

original: veditabbā. Abhiññāpādakapañcamajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvāti abhiññāya pādakatthāya yaṃabhiññājātikaṃ
analyzed: veditabbāḥ abhiññā pādaka pañcamajjhānāḥ vuṭṭhahitvā ati abhiññāya pādaka tthāya yaṃ abhiññā jātikam

original: rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānaṃ sabbapathamaṃ samāpajjiyati. Tato bhavaṅgapavattivasena
analyzed: rūpāvacara pañcama jhānam sabba pathamam samāpajjiyati tatas bhavaṅga pavatti vasena

original: vuṭṭhahitvā. Adhiṭṭhātabbanti adhiṭṭheyyaṃ. Savatthukaṃ satarūpasahassarūpādikaṃ
analyzed: vuṭṭhahitvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti adhiṭṭheyyam sa vatthukam sata rūpa sahassa rūpa ādikam

original: nimmitarūpaṃ. Taṃ adhiṭṭheyyaṃ ādi yassa avatthukassa āvibhāvatirobhāvādikassa kammassāti
analyzed: nimmita rūpam tam adhiṭṭheyyam ādi yassa a vatthukassa āvibhāva tirobhāva ādikassa kammassa ati

original: adhiṭṭheyyādikaṃ. Āvajjitvā parikammaṃkarontassāti ettha iddhividhe tāva yaṃyaṃsatādikaṃ
analyzed: adhiṭṭheyya ādikam āvajjitvā parikammaṃkarontassa ati ettha iddhi vidhe tāva yaṃ yaṃsa ta ādikam

original: nimmitarūpaṃvā āvibhāvādikaṃ nimmitakammaṃvā nipphādetuṃ icchati. Taṃ taṃ avajjitvā
analyzed: nimmita rūpam vā āvi bhāva ādikam nimmita kammam vā nipphādetum icchati tam tam avajjitvā

original: sallakkhetvā sataṃ homi sahassaṃ homītivā sataṃ hotu sahassaṃ hotūtivā idañcidañca
analyzed: sallakkhetvā satam homi sahassam homi itivā satam hotu sahassam hotu utivā idañc idañca

original: hotu evañcevañca hotūtivā parikammaṃ karontassa. Dibbasotādīsu pana yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: hotu evam ca ivam ca hotu utivā parikammam karontassa dibba sota ādīsu pana yam yam ārammaṇam

original: sotuṃvā passituṃvā jānituṃvā anussarituṃvā icchati. Taṃ taṃ sallakkhetvā asukassa
analyzed: sotum vā passitum vā jānitum vā anussaritum vā icchati tam tam sallakkhetvā asukassa

original: asukānaṃvā saddaṃ suṇomītiādinā parikammaṃ karontassa. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana parikammaṃ
analyzed: asukānam vā saddam suṇomi iti ādinā parikammam karontassa aṭṭhakathāyam pana parikammam

original: katvā puna pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ āgatameva. Yathāha abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
analyzed: katvā puna pādaka jjhāna samāpajjanam āgatam eva yathā āha abhiññā pādaka jjhānam samāpajjitvā

original: vuṭṭhāya sace sataṃ icchati. Sataṃ homīti parikammaṃ katvā puna abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ
analyzed: vuṭṭhāya sace satam icchati satam homi iti parikammam katvā puna abhiññā pādakam jhānaṃ

original: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva sataṃ hotīti. Tatthaca
analyzed: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhāti adhiṭṭhāna cittena saha iva satam hoti iti tattha ca

original: ādito pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ parikamma cittassa samādānatthāya hoti. Pacchimaṃ
analyzed: āditas pādakajjhāna samāpajjanam parikamma cittassa samādāna atthāya hoti pacchimam

original: pana abhiññāya anu balappadānatthāyāti. Tathā hi pādakajjhānabalena suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ
analyzed: pana abhiññāya anu bala ppadāna tthāya ati tathā hi pādakajjhāna balena suṭṭhu samāhitam

original: parikammacittaṃnāma attano visaye abhiññācittagatikaṃ hoti. Pubbenivāsānussaraṇakāle
analyzed: parikamma cittam nāma attanaḥ visaye abhiññā citta gatikam hoti pubbenivāsa anussaraṇa kāle

original: teneva cittena tasmiṃ bhave atītaṃ dhammajātaṃ yāva paṭisandhiyā jānāti. Teneva hi
analyzed: tena iva cittena tasmim bhave atītam dhamma jātam yāva paṭisandhiyā jānāti tena iva hi

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ parikammasamādhiñāṇanti vuttaṃ. Atītaṃsañāṇantipi
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam tad sampayuttam ñāṇam parikamma samādhi ñāṇan ti vuttam atīta saṃsa ñāṇam ti pi

original: vuccatīti. Sesābhiññāsupi tassa ñāṇassa visayaviseso yathārahaṃ vattabboti. Therena
analyzed: vuccati iti sesa abhiññāsu pi tassa ñāṇassa visaya visesaḥ yathāraham vattabbaḥ iti therena

original: pana pacchimaṃ pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃnāma na sabbesaṃ hoti. Na hi abhiññāsu vasībhāvapattānaṃ
analyzed: pana pacchimam pādakajjhāna samāpajjanam nāma na sabbesam hoti na hi abhiññāsu vasībhāva pattānam

original: puna pādakajjhānena kiccaṃ atthīti katvā taṃ idha nagahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rūpādīsuālambaṇesuyathārahamappetīti
analyzed: puna pādaka jjhānena kiccam atthi iti katvā tam idha naga hitanti daṭṭhabbam rūpa ādīsu ālambaṇesu yathāraham appeti iti

original: ettha iddhividhañāṇaṃ tāva tekālikabhūtesu chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Tañhi rūpādīsu
analyzed: ettha iddhividha ñāṇam tāva tekālika bhūtesu chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati tat hi rūpa ādīsu

original: chasu ārammaṇadhammesu yaṃ yaṃ nipphādeti. Taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati. Pādakajjhānacittaṃ
analyzed: chasu ārammaṇa dhammesu yam yam nipphādeti tam tam ārammaṇam katvā pavattati pādaka jhāna cittam

original: pana kāyagatikaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā dissamānenakāyena ākāsegamanakāle atītaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ
analyzed: pana kāya gatikam adhiṭṭhahitvā dissamānena kāyena ākāse gamana kāle atītam pādaka jhāna cittam

original: ārabbha pavattati. Kāyaṃ cittagatikaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā adissamānena kāyena gamanakāle
analyzed: ārabbha pavattati kāyam citta gatikam adhiṭṭhahitvā a dissamānena kāyena gamana kāle

original: paccuppannaṃ rūpakāyaṃ ārabbha pavattati. Tathāpavattamānassa pana tassa ñāṇassa
analyzed: paccuppannam rūpakāyam ārabbha pavattati tathā a pavattamānassa pana tassa ñāṇassa

original: kiñcirūpaṃ ārammaṇa mattaṃ hoti. Kiñci ārammaṇapurejātaṃ. Kiñci vatthārammaṇa purejātaṃ
analyzed: kiñci rūpam ārammaṇa mattam hoti kiñci ārammaṇa purejātam kiñci vattha ārammaṇa purejātam

original: hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Anāgate idaṃnāma hotūti adhiṭṭhāna kāle anāgataṃ taṃtaṃrūpadhammaṃ
analyzed: hoti iti daṭṭhabbam anāgate idaṃnāma hotu uti adhiṭṭhāna kāle anāgatam taṃ taṃ rūpa dhammam

original: ārabbha pavattatīti. Paccuppanno saddo dibbasotassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Atīte sattadivasāni
analyzed: ārabbha pavattati iti paccuppannaḥ saddo dibba sotassa ārammaṇam hoti atīte satta divasāni

original: anāgate sattadivasānīti etthantare kāle atītā nāgatapaccuppannabhūtaṃ parassacittaṃ
analyzed: anāgate satta divasāni iti etthantare kāle atītāḥ nāgata paccuppanna bhūtam parassa cittam

original: cattārovā khandhā cetopariya ñāṇassa. Cittañhi jānanto taṃ sampayuttadhammaṃpi icchanto
analyzed: cattāro vā khandhā cetaḥ upariya ñāṇassa cittam hi jānanto tam sampayutta dhammam pi icchanto

original: jānissatiyeva. Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne kusalā khandhā ceto pariyañāṇassa yathākammupagañāṇassa
analyzed: jānissati yeva evañca katvā paṭṭhāne kusalā khandhā cetaḥ pariya ñāṇassa yathā kammupaga ñāṇassa

original: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayoti ñāṇadvayaṃ ekato katvā vuttaṃ. Etthaca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ti ñāṇa dvayam ekatas katvā vuttam ettha ca aṭṭhakathāyam

original: tāva paracittassa paccuppannālambaṇatānāma santativasenavā addhā vasenavā yojitā.
analyzed: tāva para cittassa paccuppanna ālambaṇa tā nāma santati vasena vā addhā vasena vā yojitā

original: Yadi hi khaṇikavasena yojeyya. Āvajjane paccuppannaṃ yaṃkiñci ekaṃ cittaṃ āvajjetvā
analyzed: yadi hi khaṇika vasena yojeyya āvajjane paccuppannam yaṃkiñci ekam cittam āvajjetvā

original: niruddhe javanānipi tadeva āvajjanena saddhiṃ niruddhaṃ atītaṃ gaṇhantīti tāni kālato
analyzed: niruddhe tat eva āvajjanena saddhim niruddham atītam gaṇhanti iti tāni kālatas

original: āvajjanena saha bhinnālambaṇāni nāma honti. Naca aniṭṭhe maggaphalavīthito aññasmiṃ
analyzed: āvajjanena saha bhinna ālambaṇāni nāma honti na ca aniṭṭhe magga phala vīthitaḥ aññasmin

original: ṭhāne kālamattenāpi tesaṃ tena saha bhinnālambaṇatā aṭṭhakathācariyehi anu matāti.
analyzed: ṭhāne kāla mattena api tesam tena saha bhinna ālambaṇa tā aṭṭhakathā cariyehi anu matā ati

original: Tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu paccuppannaṃnāma santativasena addhāvasenaca gahetuṃ yuttanti.
analyzed: tasmai īdisesu ṭhānesu paccuppannam nāma santati vasena addhā vasena ca gahetum yuttam ti

original: Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana khaṇikapaccuppanna vaseneva yojitaṃ. Nahi abhidhamme atītārammaṇattikaṃ
analyzed: mūla ṭīkāyam pana khaṇika paccuppanna vasena iva yojitam nahi abhidhamme atīta ārammaṇa ttikam

original: santati addhānavaseneva vuttanti sakkā vattuṃ. Itarathā paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa
analyzed: santati addhāna vasena iva vuttan ti sakkā vattum itarathā paccuppannaḥ dhammo paccuppannassa

original: dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo āsevanapaccayena paccayoti vattabbo siyā. Na
analyzed: dhammassa anantara paccayena paccayaḥ āsevana paccayena paccayaḥ iti vattabbaḥ siyā na

original: tu vutto. Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo āsevanapaccayena
analyzed: tu vuttaḥ atītaḥ dhammaḥ paccuppannassa dhammassa anantara paccayena paccayaḥ āsevana paccayena

original: paccayoticceva pana vutto, tasmā āvajjanādīni sabbāni cittāni paccekaṃ attanā khaṇavasena
analyzed: paccayaḥ ticca iva pana vuttaḥ tasmai āvajjana ādīni sabbāni cittāni paccekam attanā khaṇa vasena

original: sahuppannāni parassa cittānigaṇhantīti yuttaṃ, naca tāni dhammato bhinnā lambaṇānināma
analyzed: sahuppannāni parassa cittāni gaṇhanti iti yuttam na ca tāni dhammataḥ bhinnā

original: honti. Gahaṇā kārassa abhinnattā. Āvajjanaṃpi hi cittanteva āvajjati. Javanānica
analyzed: honti gahaṇā kārassa abhinnattā āvajjanam pi hi āvajjati javanānica

original: cittaṃ cittanteva javanti. Tānica sabbāni cittānieva hontīti. Atītānantara cutito
analyzed: cittam cittanta iva javanti tāni ca sabbāni cittāni eva honti iti atīta anantara cutito

original: pana paṭṭhāya atītā khandhā khandhupani bandhā nāma gottakasiṇa nimittādikā paññattiyo
analyzed: pana paṭṭhāya atītā khandhā bandhā nāma gotta kasiṇa nimitta ādikā paññattiyaḥ

original: nibbānañca pubbenivāsañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Paccuppannaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ dibbacakkhussāti
analyzed: nibbānam ca pubbenivāsa ñāṇassa ārammaṇam hoti paccuppannam rūpa ārammaṇam dibba cakkhussa ati

original: evaṃ rūpādīsu chasu ālambaṇesu yathāraha mappetīti. Idāni abhiññāvasena pavakkhassa
analyzed: evam rūpa ādīsu chasu ālambaṇesu yathāraha mappeti iti idāni abhiññā vasena pavakkhassa

original: tassa pañcamajjhānassa kiccabhedena pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ iddhividhantiādigātha māha.
analyzed: tassa pañcama jhānassa kicca bhedena pabhedam dassetum

original: Tattha yaṃ yaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Yathā yathāca adhiṭṭhāti. Tassa tassa tathā tathāvā ijjhana
analyzed: tattha yam yam adhiṭṭhāti yathā yathā ca adhiṭṭhāti tassa tassa tathā tathāvā

original: saṅkhāto vidho koṭṭhāso pakārovā etassāti iddhividhaṃ. Taṃ pana tividhaṃ adhiṭṭhā
analyzed: saṅkhātaḥ vidhaḥ koṭṭhāso pakāro vā etassa ati iddhividham tam pana tividham adhiṭṭhā

original: niddhi vikubbaniddhi manomayiddhi vasena. Tattha attano pakativaṇṇaṃ avijahitvā tasseva
analyzed: vasena tattha attanaḥ pakati vaṇṇam a vijahitvā tassa iva

original: sata sahassādi bahubhāva karaṇa vasenavā ākāsagamanādivasena vā bahiddhā nānāvaṇṇa
analyzed: sata sahassa ādi bahu bhāva karaṇa vasena vā ākāsagamana ādi vasena vā bahiddhā nānā vaṇṇa

original: pāṭihāriya dassana vasenavā pavattitā iddhi adhiṭṭhāniddhināma. Pakativaṇṇaṃ pana
analyzed: pāṭihāriya dassana vasenavā pavatti tā iddhi adhiṭṭhāniddhi nāma pakati vaṇṇam pana

original: vijahitvā attānameva kumāravaṇṇanāgavaṇṇādikaṃ katvā dassanavasena pavattitā iddhi
analyzed: vijahitvā attānam eva kumāra vaṇṇa nāga vaṇṇa ādikam katvā dassana vasena pavattitā id hi

original: vikubbaniddhināma. Attano sarīrabbhantare aññaṃ sabbaso attanā sadisaṃ sarīraṃ nimminitvā
analyzed: vikubba niddhi nāma attano sarīra abbhantare aññam sabbasas attanā sadisam sarīram nimminitvā

original: nīharitvā dassanavasena pavattitā iddhi manomayiddhināma. Dive bhavaṃ dibbaṃ. Devaloke
analyzed: nīharitvā dassana vasena id hi manaḥ maya iddhi nāma dive bhavam dibbam deva loke

original: jātanti attho. Dibbañca taṃ sotañcāti dibbasotaṃ. Devānaṃ uḷārakammanibbattā dūrepi
analyzed: jātanti atthaḥ dibbam ca tam sotam ca ati dibba sotam devānam uḷāra kamma nibbattā dūre pi

original: paṭicchannepi ārammaṇasampaṭicchanasamatthaṃ pasādasotaṃ. Dibbasotasadisattā pana
analyzed: paṭicchanne pi ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana samattham pasāda sotam dibba sota sadisa ttā pana

original: idaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃpi dibbasotanti vuccati. Kasiṇajjhāna saṅkhātenavā dibbavihārena
analyzed: idam abhiññā ñāṇam pi dibba sotanti vuccati kasiṇa jhāna saṅkhātena vā dibba vihārena

original: paṭiladdhattā sayañca tasmiṃ dibbavihāre pariyāpannattā dibbañca taṃ sotañcāti dibbasotaṃ.
analyzed: paṭiladdha ttā sayam ca tasmin dibba vihāre pariyāpanna ttā dibbam ca tam sotam ca ati dibba sotam

original: Parassa cittaṃ vijānanti etenāti paracittavijānanaṃ. Tadeva cetopariyāyanti paricchijja
analyzed: parassa cittam vijānanti etena ati para citta vijānanam tat eva cetaḥ upariyāyanti paricchijja

original: jānanti etenāti katvā cetopariyañāṇantipi vuccati. Pubbe nivāso vuccati atītabhavesu
analyzed: jānanti etena ati katvā cetaḥ pariya ñāṇam ti pi vuccati pubbe nivāso vuccati atīta bhavesu

original: attano chasu dvāresu āpātaṃ āgatā suṭṭhu viditā dhammā. Pubbe atītajātīsu gocara
analyzed: attanaḥ chasu dvāresu āpātam āgatā suṭṭhu viditā dhammā pubbe atīta jātīsu gocara

original: nivāsavasena nivasiṃsu attano chadvārikāni cittāni etthāti katvā. Sabbaññubuddhānaṃ
analyzed: nivāsa vasena nivasiṃsu cha dvārikāni cittāni ettha ati katvā sabbaññu buddhānam

original: pana paresaṃ chadvāragahitāpi dhammā pubbe nivāso hotiyeva, pubbe nivāsassa anussaraṇaṃ
analyzed: pana paresam cha dvāra gahitā api dhammā pubbe nivāsaḥ hotiya iva pubbe nivāsassa anussaraṇam

original: pubbenivāsānussati. Idha pana taṃ sampayuttañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Pubbe vuttanayena dibbañca
analyzed: pubbenivāsa anussati idha pana tat sampayutta ñāṇam adhippetam pubbe vutta nayena dibbam ca

original: taṃ cakkhucāti dibbacakkhu. Taṃ sadisattā idaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃpi dibbacakkhūti vuccati.
analyzed: tam dibba cakkhu tam sadisa ttā idam abhiññā ñāṇam pi dibba cakkhu iti vuccati

original: Dibbavihāra vasena paṭiladdhattā sayañca dibbavihārasannissitattā dibbañca taṃ cakkhucāti
analyzed: dibba vihāra vasena paṭiladdha ttā sayam ca dibba vihāra sannissita ttā dibbam ca tam

original: dibbacakkhu. Yathākammupagañāṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇanti imāni dve ñāṇāni imasseva paribhaṇḍañāṇānināma.
analyzed: dibba cakkhu yathā kammupaga ñāṇam anāgataṃsa ñāṇam ti imāni dve ñāṇāni imassa eva

original: Nahi tesaṃ paṭilābhatthāya visuṃ cittaparidamanaparikammaṃnāma atthi. Dibbacakkhuñāṇe
analyzed: nahi tesam paṭilābha tthāya visum atthi dibba cakkhu ñāṇe

original: paṭiladdhe tesaṃpi paṭiladdhattāti. Tattha dibbacakkhunā nirayesu dukkhaṃ devesuvā
analyzed: paṭiladdhe tesam pi paṭiladdha ttā ti tattha dibba cakkhunā nirayesu dukkham devesu vā

original: sukhaṃ anubhavante satte disvā tesaṃ atītaṃ kammaṃ jānissāmīti parikammaṃ karontassa
analyzed: sukham anubhavante satte disvā tesam atītam kammam jānissāmi iti parikammam karontassa

original: taṃ kammārammaṇaṃ yathākammupagañāṇaṃ pavattati. Tato cavitvā kattha bhavissantīti
analyzed: tam kamma ārammaṇam yathā kamma upaga ñāṇam pavattati tatas cavitvā kattha bhavissanti iti

original: tesaṃ anāgate pavattiṃ passissāmīti parikammaṃ karontassa tesaṃ anāgatakhandhārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: tesam anāgate pavattim passissāmi iti parikammam karontassa tesam anāgata khandha ārammaṇam

original: anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pavattati. Pubbe nivāsānussati ñāṇaṃ viyaca sabbaṃpi anāgatadhammajātaṃ
analyzed: anāgataṃsañāṇam pavattati pubbe nivāsa anussati ñāṇam viya ca sabbam pi anāgata dhamma jātam

original: etassa ārammaṇaṃ hotiyeva. Etañhi attano visaye sabbaññutañāṇagatikanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: etassa ārammaṇam hotiyā iva etat hi attanaḥ visaye sabbaññuta ñāṇa gatikan ti aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam

original: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Anāgate sattadivasato paṭṭhāya cittacetasikadhammā dutīyadivasato paṭṭhāya yaṃkiñci ārammaṇaṃ etassa visayoti adhippetaṃ. Tampi yuttaṃviya dissati.
analyzed: anāgate satta divasataḥ paṭṭhāya citta cetasika dhammā dutīya divasataḥ paṭṭhāya yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇam etassa visayaḥ ti adhippetam tat pi yuttam viya dissati

original: Nahi bhavantarepi anāvatadhamme jānituṃ samatthaṃ etaṃ imasmiṃ bhave anāgatadhamme
analyzed: nahi bhavantare pi anāvata dhamme jānitum samattham etam imasmin bhave anāgata dhamme

original: najānātīti sakkā bhavituṃ. Yathā cetaṃ, tathā pubbenivāsañāṇaṃpi imasmiṃ bhave parasantānagate
analyzed: na jānāti iti sakkā bhavitum yathā cetam tathā pubbenivāsa ñāṇam pi imasmin bhave para santāna gate

original: atītadhammeti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāsuca bhavantaragatadhammehi eva ñāṇadvayaṃ
analyzed: atīta dhamma iti pāḷiyam pana aṭṭhakathāsu ca bhava antara gata dhammehi eva ñāṇa dvayam

original: yojitaṃ. Taṃ pana asādhāraṇakālavasena ānubhāvavisesapākaṭatthaṃ yojitanti yuttaṃ
analyzed: yojitam tam pana asādhāraṇa kāla vasena yojitam iti yuttam

original: siyāti. Gocarabhedoti dasakasiṇādīsu gocaresu samathajjhānānaṃ pavattibhedo.
analyzed: siyā ati gocara bhedaḥ iti dasa kasiṇa ādīsu gocaresu samatha jhānānam pavatti bhedo

original: Samathakammaṭṭhānanayo.
analyzed: samatha kammaṭṭhānanayaḥ

original: 171. Sabbalokiyamahājanehi yathādiṭṭhaṃ puggalasattaitthi purisādikaṃ nicca dhuva
analyzed: sabba lokiya mahājanehi yathā diṭṭham puggala satta aitthi purisa ādikam

original: sukha atta nimittañca atikkamitvā visesena passanti etāyāti vipassanā. Kiriyā kammaṃ.
analyzed: sukha atta nimittañca atikkamitvā visesena passanti etāyāti vipassanā kiriyā kammaṃ

original: Bhāvanāpayogo. Vipassanāya kammaṃ vipassanākammaṃ. Vipassanā eva vā kammanti vipassanā
analyzed: bhāvanā apayogaḥ vipassanāya kammam vipassanā kammam vipassanā eva vā kammanti vipassanā

original: kammaṃ. Vipassanākammassa ṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhumīti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Khandhādidhammajātaṃ.
analyzed: kammam vipassanā kammassa ṭhānam adhiṭṭhānam bhumi iti vipassanā kammaṭṭhānam khandha ādi dhamma jātam

original: Vipassanā kammameva vā uttaruttarassa bhāvanā visesassa ānisaṃsavisesassavā ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: vipassanā kammam eva vā uttaruttarassa bhāvanā visesassa ānisaṃsa visesassa vā ṭhānam

original: āsannakāraṇanti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Tasmiṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhāne sattavidhena visuddhi
analyzed: āsanna kāraṇam ti vipassanā kammaṭṭhānam tasmin vipassanā kammaṭṭhāne sattavidhena visuddhi

original: saṅgaho tīṇi lakkhaṇānītiādinā sambandho. Niccasīlameva sayañca dussilyamalato visuddhattā
analyzed: saṅgaho tīṇi lakkhaṇāni iti ādinā sambandhaḥ nicca sīlam eva sayam ca dussilya malataḥ

original: kāyaṃ vācañca tato visodhanato visuddhīti sīlavisuddhi. Subhāvita cittasantānameva
analyzed: kāyam vācam ca tatas visodhanataḥ citta santānam eva

original: sayañca nīvaraṇamalato visuddhattā taṃsamaṅgipuggalañca tato visodhanato visuddhīti
analyzed: sayam ca nīvaraṇa malataḥ taṃsam aṅgi puggalam ca tatas visodhanataḥ visuddhi iti

original: cittavisuddhi. Cittasīsena cettha samādhi adhippeto. Dhammavavatthānañāṇasaṅkhātā
analyzed: citta visuddhi citta sīsena ca ittha samādhi adhippetaḥ dhamma vavatthāna ñāṇa saṅkhātā

original: diṭṭhieva taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhimalato visodhanato visuddhīti diṭṭhivisuddhi.
analyzed: tam samaṅgi puggalam sakkāya diṭṭhi malataḥ visodhanataḥ visuddhi iti diṭṭhi visuddhi

original: Soḷasavidhaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vitaranti atikkamanti etāyāti kaṅkhāvitaraṇā. Paccayapariggahañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: soḷasavidham aṭṭhavidham kaṅkham vitaranti atikkamanti etāya ati kaṅkhā vitaraṇā paccaya pariggaha ñāṇam

original: Sā eva taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ ahetu diṭṭhi visamahetudiṭṭhīhi saddhiṃ yathāvuttāhi duvidhāhi
analyzed: sā eva tad samaṅgi puggalam ahetu diṭṭhi visama hetu diṭṭhīhi saddhim yathā vuttāhi duvidhāhi

original: kaṅkhāhi visodhanato visuddhīti kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi. Maggoca amaggoca maggāmaggā.
analyzed: kaṅkhā hi visodhanataḥ maggo ca amaggo ca magga amaggā

original: Tattha ñāṇadassanavisuddhādhigamanassa upāyabhūto manasikāravidhivā ariyamaggovā
analyzed: tattha ñāṇa dassana visuddha adhigamanassa upāya bhūtaḥ manasikāra vidhivā ariya maggaḥ uvā

original: maggonāma. Tassa anupāyabhūto manasikārovā adhimānavatthūnivā amaggonāma. Maggassa
analyzed: maggo nāma tassa anupāya bhūtaḥ manasikāraḥ vā adhimāna vatthūni vā amaggaḥ nāma maggassa

original: maggato amaggassaca amaggato jānanaṃ dassanañca maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ. Tameva taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ
analyzed: maggataḥ amaggassa ca amaggataḥ jānanam dassanam ca magga amagga ñāṇa dassanam tam eva tad samaṅgī puggalam

original: amagge maggasaññāya visodhanato visuddhīti maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma. Upari
analyzed: amagge magga saññāya visodhanataḥ visuddhī iti magga amagga ñāṇa dassana visuddhi nāma upari

original: visesaṃ paṭipajjanti etāyāti paṭipadā. Vipassanāparaṃparasaṅkhāto pubbabhāgamaggo.
analyzed: visesam paṭipajjanti etāya ati paṭipadā vipassanā paraṃpara saṅkhātaḥ pubbabhāga maggo

original: Paṭipadābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassananti paṭipadāñāṇadassanaṃ. Tameva niccasaññādito visuddhattā
analyzed: paṭipadā bhūtam ñāṇa dassananti paṭipadā ñāṇa dassanam tam eva nicca saññā āditaḥ visuddhattā

original: visuddhīti paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhināma, ariyamaggañāṇasaṅkhāta ñāṇadassanameva
analyzed: visuddhi iti paṭipadā ñāṇa dassana visuddhi nāma ariya magga ñāṇa saṅkhāta ñāṇa dassanam eva

original: sammohamalato visuddhattā visuddhīti ñāṇadassanavisuddhināma. Etthaca sutamayādivasena
analyzed: sammoha malataḥ visuddha ttā visuddhī iti ñāṇa dassana visuddhi nāma ettha ca suta maya ādi vasena

original: siddhaṃ anumāna ñāṇaṃpi ñāṇamevāti taṃ paṭikkhipitvā atthapaccakkhañāṇameva gahetuṃ
analyzed: siddham anumāna ñāṇam pi ñāṇam eva ati tam paṭikkhipitvā attha paccakkha ñāṇam eva gahetum

original: sabbattha dassanagahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. Lakkhīyanti sallakkhīyanti ime aniccāevāti
analyzed: sabbattha dassana gahaṇam katanti veditabbam lakkhīyanti sallakkhīyanti ime aniccā eva ati

original: ekantena vinicchīyanti dhammā etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ aniccatā eva lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: ekantena dhammāḥ etena ati lakkhaṇam anicca tā eva lakkhaṇanti anicca lakkhaṇam

original: Pubbapade bhāvapaccayalopo. Aññohi anicco, aññā aniccatāti. Tattha yathāgamanakriyāyogena
analyzed: pubba pade bhāva paccaya lopaḥ aññaḥ hi aniccaḥ aññā anicca tā ti tattha yathā gamana kriyā yogena

original: puriso gatoti vuccati. Na pana gamana kriyā puriso. Naca puriso gamanakriyā. Aññā
analyzed: purisaḥ gataḥ ti vuccati na pana gamana kriyā purisaḥ na ca purisaḥ gamana kriyā aññā

original: hi kriyā, añño puriso. Tathā aniccatāyogena sabbo saṅkhatadhammo aniccoti vuccati.
analyzed: hi kriyā añño puriso tathā anicca tā yogena sabbo saṅkhata dhammo aniccaḥ iti vuccati

original: Na pana aniccatā so dhammo, naca so dhammo aniccatā. Aññā hi aniccatā, añño so dhammoti.
analyzed: na pana anicca tā so dhammaḥ na ca so dhammo anicca tā aññā hi anicca tā aññaḥ so dhammo ti

original: Katamā pana sā aniccatāti. Vipariṇāmā kāro. Jīraṇākāro bhijjanākāroti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: katamā pana sā anicca tā ati vipariṇāmā kāraḥ jīraṇa ākāraḥ bhijjana ākāro ti vuttam hoti

original: Taṃ pana ākāraṃ disvā tadākāravante dhamme ñāṇaṃ pavattati ayaṃ dhammo aniccoti.
analyzed: tam pana ākāram disvā tad ākāravante dhamme ñāṇam pavattati ayam dhammo aniccaḥ ti

original: Tasmā sā aniccatāyeva idha lakkhaṇantipi vuccatīti. Esanayo sesesupi dvīsu. Tattha
analyzed: tasmā sā anicca tāya iva idha lakkhaṇa nti pi vuccati iti sesesu pi dvīsu tattha

original: pana abhiṇhasaṃpaṭipīḷanākāro dukkhatānāma. Avasavattanākāro anattatānāmāti. Yathāvuttāya
analyzed: pana abhiṇha saṃpaṭipīḷana ākāraḥ dukkha tā nāma avasavattana ākāraḥ anatta tā nāma ati yathā vuttāya

original: pana aniccatāya saha aniccassa dhammassa aniccena vā dhammena saha aniccatāya anuanupassanā
analyzed: pana anicca tāya saha aniccassa dhammassa aniccena vā dhammena saha anicca tāya anuanupassanā

original: aniccānupassanā. Esa nayo sesāsupi dvīsu. Yāva sarīre dhammānaṃ tividhalakkhaṇayuttatā
analyzed: anicca anupassanā esa nayaḥ sesāsu pi dvīsu yāva sarīre dhammānam tividha lakkhaṇa yutta tā

original: attano ñāṇena paññāyati. Tāva tesu tividhalakkhaṇavibhāvanavasena punappunaṃ masanaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ ñāṇena paññāyati tāva tesu tividha lakkhaṇa vibhāvana vasena punappunam masanam

original: āmasanaṃ sammasanaṃ. Sammasanākārena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ sammasanañāṇaṃ. Udayo vuccati
analyzed: āmasanam sammasanam sammasana ākārena pavattam ñāṇam sammasana ñāṇam udayaḥ vuccati

original: taṃtaṃ khaṇānurūpaṃ taṃtaṃ paccayānurūpañca navanavānaṃ dhammānaṃ pātu bhāvo ceva
analyzed: taṃtam khaṇa anurūpam taṃtam paccaya anurūpam ca nava navānam dhammānam pātu bhāvaḥ ca iva

original: uparupari vaḍḍhanañca. Vayo vuccati yattha yattha laddhapaccayā navanavā dhammā pātubhavanti
analyzed: upari upari vaḍḍhanam ca vayaḥ vuccati yattha yattha laddha paccayāḥ nava navāḥ dhammā pātubhavanti

original: ceva vaḍḍhantica. Tattha tattha aladdhapaccayānaṃ purāṇadhammānaṃ antaradhānaṃ. Samūha
analyzed: ca iva vaḍḍhanti ca tattha tattha a laddha paccayānam purāṇa dhammānam antaradhānam samūha

original: santativasena pana udayapakkhassavā vayapakkhassavā samanupassanañāṇaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: santati vasena pana udaya pakkha ssavā vaya pakkha ssavā samanupassana ñāṇam udaya bbaya ñāṇam

original: Tesu pana dvīsu pakkhesu udayakoṭṭhāsonāma uparupari pākaṭo hutvā āgacchati. Vayakoṭṭhāso
analyzed: tesu pana dvīsu pakkhesu udayakoṭṭhāso nāma upara upari pākaṭaḥ hutvā āgacchati vayakoṭṭhāso

original: pana apākaṭo. So eva ca aniccatāya paramā koṭīti tasseva suṭṭhutaraṃ samanupassanañāṇaṃ
analyzed: pana apākaṭaḥ saḥ eva ca anicca tāya paramā koṭī iti tassa iva suṭṭhutaram samanupassana ñāṇam

original: bhaṅgañāṇaṃ. Bhaṅge diṭṭhe evaṃ bhijjanasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ anekasahassasoka dukkhavatthubhāvena
analyzed: bhaṅga ñāṇam bhaṅge diṭṭhe evam bhijjana sabhāvānam dhammānam aneka sahassa soka dukkha vatthu bhāvena

original: tathā tathā bhāyitabbapakārasamanupassanañāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ nāma. Loke pana kiñci bhayavatthuṃ
analyzed: tathā tathā bhāyitabba pakāra samanupassana ñāṇam bhaya ñāṇam nāma loke pana kiñci bhaya vatthum

original: passantāpi āsanne aññasmiṃ paṭisaraṇe sati na bhāyanti. Asati eva bhāyanti. Evaṃ
analyzed: passantā api āsanne aññasmim paṭisaraṇe sati na bhāyanti asati eva bhāyanti evam

original: bhāyitabbānaṃ tesaṃ sabbaso aññapaṭisaraṇābhāvadassanaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ nāma. Kutoci
analyzed: bhāyitabbānam tesam sabbasas añña paṭisaraṇa abhāva dassanam ādīnava ñāṇam nāma kutoci

original: paṭisaraṇābhāvena tehi ukkaṇṭhatākāra sahitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃnāma. Nibbindīyamānehi
analyzed: paṭisaraṇa abhāvena tehi ukkaṇṭha tā ākāra sahitam vipassanā ñāṇam nibbidā ñāṇaṃ nāma nibbindīyamānehi

original: tehi attānaṃ vimuccituṃ ajjhāsayasahitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ nāma.
analyzed: tehi attānam vimuccitum ajjhāsaya sahitam vipassanā ñāṇam muccitu kamya tā ñāṇam nāma

original: Suṭṭhu muccituṃ icchantassa sīghaṃ muccanatthaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ cattālīsāya ākārehi
analyzed: suṭṭhu muccitum icchantassa sīgham muccana attham tesam dhammānam cattālīsāya ākārehi

original: anekādīnavarāsi bhāva paṭisaṅkhānavasena suṭṭhuvipphārataraṃ pavattamānaṃ vipassanā
ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ nāma. Tesaṃ pana anekādīnavarāsibhāve suṭṭhu diṭṭhe saṅkhāresu
analyzed: ñāṇam paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇam nāma tesam pana aneka ādīnava rāsi bhāve suṭṭhu diṭṭhe saṅkhāresu

original: nikantiyā pariyādinnāya idāni muccanupāyo laddhoti adhimattabyāpāraṃ akatvā samena
analyzed: nikantiyā pariyādinnāya idāni mucca nupāyaḥ laddhā iti adhimatta byāpāram a katvā samena

original: vāyāmena saṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa saṅkhārapariggahe majjhattākārasahitaṃ saṅkhāresuvā
analyzed: vāyāmena saṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa saṅkhāra pariggahe majjhatta ākāra sahitam saṅkhāresu vā

original: bhayañca nandiñca pahāya udāsinabhāvasahitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃnāma.
analyzed: bhayam ca nandiñca pahāya udāsina bhāva sahitam vipassanā ñāṇam saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇaṃ nāma

original: Upari maggappavattiṃ vahituṃ samatthabhāvena magguppattiyā anulomehi thāmabalehi
analyzed: upari magga ppavattim vahitum samattha bhāvena magga uppattiyāḥ anulomehi thāma balehi

original: sampannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ nāma. Heṭṭhimānaṃvā ñāṇānaṃtaṃ anulomaṃ hoti
analyzed: sampannam vipassanā ñāṇam anulomañāṇam nāma heṭṭhimānam vā ñāṇa anaṃtam anulomam hoti

original: lakkhaṇattayassa suṭṭhutaraṃ vibhāvanato. Uparimaggassavā anulomaṃ hoti tassa parikammabhāvato,
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ttayassa suṭṭhutaram vibhāvanataḥ upari maggassa vā anulomam hoti tassa parikamma bhāvato

original: padaṭṭhānattācātipi anulomañāṇaṃ nāmāti. Atta jīvasuññatādassana balena khandhesu
analyzed: anulomañāṇam nāma ati atta jīva suñña tā dassana balena khandhesu

original: kilesabandhanato vimuccamāno maggo suññatāvimokkho nāma. Saṅkhārānaṃ yāni nimittāni
analyzed: kilesa bandhanataḥ vimuccamānaḥ maggaḥ suñña tā vimokkhaḥ nāma saṅkhārānam yāni nimittāni

original: kilesānaṃ avassayo hoti. Tāni vidhamitvā sabbaso dhammānaṃ anātha bhāva dassana balena
analyzed: kilesānam avassayaḥ hoti tāni vidhamitvā sabbaso dhammānaṃ anātha bhāva dassana balena

original: vimuccamāno maggo animittovimokkho nāma. Saṅkhāresu sabbaso assāsābhāva dassanabalena
analyzed: vimuccamānaḥ maggaḥ animittaḥ vimokkhaḥ nāma saṅkhāresu sabbaso dassana balena

original: vimuccamāno maggo appaṇihitovimokkhonāma. Suññatānupassanāti anattānupassanā. Sā
analyzed: vimuccamānaḥ maggaḥ appaṇihitaḥ vimokkhaḥ nāma suññatā anupassanā ti anatta anupassanā sā

original: hi dhammānaṃ samūhaghana santatighana kiccaghana ārammaṇaghanesu taṃtaṃghana vinibbhujjana
analyzed: hi dhammānam samūha ghana santati ghana kicca ghana ārammaṇa ghanesu taṃtaṃghana vinibbhujjana

original: vasena pavattattā attā iti gahetabbassa kassaci sārassa abhāvānupassanato suññatānupassanāti
analyzed: vasena pavatta ttā attā iti gahetabbassa kassaci sārassa abhāva anupassanataḥ suññatā anupassanā ti

original: vuccati. Animittā nupassanāti aniccānupassanā. Sāpi hi santati vicchedana vasena
analyzed: vuccati animittā anupassanā ati anicca anupassanā sā api hi santati vicchedana vasena

original: pavattattā ahanti gahitassa nimittassa vidhamanato animittānupassanāti vuccati. Apaṇihitānupassanāti
analyzed: pavatta ttā ahanti gahitassa nimittassa vidhamanataḥ animittā anupassanā ati vuccati apaṇihita anupassanā ati

original: dukkhā nupassanā. Sāpi hi mahāādīnavarāsi bhāva vibhāvanavasena pavattattā idaṃ mama
analyzed: dukkhā nupassanā sā api hi mahā ādīnava rāsi bhāva vibhāvana vasena pavatta ttā idam mama

original: etaṃ mamāti gahetabbassa kassaci paṇihita guṇassa abhāvānupassanato appaṇihitānupassanāti
analyzed: etam mama ati gahetabbassa kassaci paṇihita guṇassa abhāva anupassanataḥ appaṇihita anupassanā ti

original: vuccatīti. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlanti vinayapaññattisīlaṃ. Tañhi sabbalo kiyasīlānaṃ
analyzed: vuccati iti pātimokkha saṃvara sīlam ti vinaya paññatti sīlam tat hi

original: jeṭṭhakattā patica hoti. Catubhūmakakusalānaṃ ādipabhavabhūtattā mukhañca. Iti patimukhaṭṭhena
analyzed: jeṭṭhaka ttā pati ca hoti mukham ca iti pati mukha ṭṭhena

original: pātimokkhanti vuccati. Tamevaca dussilyamaggassa saṃvaraṇato pidahanato saṃvaroti
analyzed: pātimokkham ti vuccati tam eva ca dussilya maggassa saṃvaraṇataḥ pidahanataḥ saṃvaroti

original: vuccatīti. Yesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiyā cakkhādīni indriyāni viphanditāni honti. Lolāni
analyzed: vuccati iti yesam dhammānam uppattiyā cakkha ādīni indriyāni viphanditāni honti lolāni

original: honti. Tadanubandhāca akusaladhammā uppajjanti. Tesaṃ uppatti maggassa saṃvaraṇavasena
analyzed: honti tad anubandhāḥ ca akusala dhammāḥ uppajjanti tesam uppatti maggassa saṃvaraṇa vasena

original: pavattamānā sati indriya saṃvaronāma. So eva sīlanti indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Ājīvanti
analyzed: sati indriya saṃvaraḥ nāma eva indriya saṃvara sīlam ājīvanti

original: jīvitaṃ kappenti etenāti ājīvo. Paccayapariyesanavāyāmo. Soyeva buddhapaṭikuṭṭhehi
analyzed: jīvitam kappenti etena ati ājīvo paccaya pariyesana vāyāmo buddha paṭikuṭṭhehi

original: pupphadānādīhi micchāpayogehi tividhakuhanavatthuhica parisuddhattā ājīvapārisuddhināma.
analyzed: puppha dāna ādīhi micchā apayogehi tividha kuhana vatthuhi ca parisuddha ttā ājīvapārisuddhi nāma

original: Sā eva sīlanti samāso. Tathārūpena parisuddhena bhikkhācārādinā payogena paṭiladdhānaṃ
analyzed: eva sīlanti samāsaḥ tathārūpena parisuddhena bhikkhā ācāra ādinā payogena paṭiladdhānam

original: paccayānaṃ paṭiggahaṇa paribhuñjanakālesu sammohassa gedhassa madassa pamādassaca
analyzed: paccayānam paṭiggahaṇa paribhuñjana kālesu sammohassa gedhassa madassa pamādassa ca

original: pahānatthaṃ taṃtaṃpayojanamariyādaṃvā paṭikūlalakkhaṇaṃvā dhātumattalakkhaṇaṃvā pariggahaṇa
analyzed: pahāna attham taṃ taṃ payojanam ariyādam vā paṭikūla lakkhaṇam vā dhātumatta lakkhaṇam vā pariggahaṇa

original: paccavekkhanavasena pavattaṃ paccayasevane paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ paccaya sannissitasīlaṃnāma.
analyzed: paccavekkhana vasena pavattam paccaya sevane paṭisaṅkhā ñāṇam paccaya sannissita sīlaṃ nāma

original: Parisujjhatīti parisuddhi. Parisuddhieva pārisuddhi. Sā eva sīlanti samāso. Cattāri
analyzed: parisujjhati iti parisuddhi parisuddhi eva pārisuddhi sā eva sīlanti samāso cattāri

original: pārisuddhisīlānīti catupāri suddhisīlaṃ. Cittavisuddhīti ettha cittasaddena samādhi
analyzed: pārisuddhi sīlāni iti catu pāri suddhi sīlam citta visuddhi iti ettha citta saddena samādhi

original: niddiṭṭhoti vuttaṃ duvidhopisamādhi cittavisuddhināmāti. Lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhāna
analyzed: niddiṭṭhaḥ ti vuttam duvidhaḥ pi samādhi citta visuddhi nāmā ti lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padaṭṭhāna

original: vasenāti ettha dhammānaṃ paccattasabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃnāma. Aggissa uṇhattaṃ viya. Tena
analyzed: vasena ati ettha dhammānam paccatta sabhāvaḥ lakkhaṇam nāma aggissa uṇha ttam viya tena

original: sabhāvena sādhetabbaṃ kiccaṃvā sādhanapaccayā paṭiladdhaguṇasaṅkhātā sampattivā rasonāma.
analyzed: sabhāvena sādhetabbam kiccam vā sādhana paccayā paṭiladdha guṇa saṅkhātā sampatti vā rasaḥ nāma

original: Aggissa parivācana jotanāni viya. Sā eva sampattivā kāriyasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃvā paccupaṭṭhānaṃnāma.
analyzed: aggissa parivācana jotanāni viya sā eva sampatti vā kāriya saṅkhātam phalam vā paccupaṭṭhānam nāma

original: Aggissa dhūmo viya. Attano uppattiyā asādhāraṇapaccayasaṅkhātaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃnāma.
analyzed: aggissa dhūmaḥ viya attanaḥ uppattiyā asādhāraṇa paccaya saṅkhātam āsanna kāraṇam padaṭṭhānam nāma

original: Tesaṃ vasena nāmassaca rūpassaca pariggaho ñāṇena paricchinditvā gahaṇaṃ nāmarūpavavatthānaṃ
analyzed: tesam vasena nāmassa ca rūpassa ca pariggahaḥ ñāṇena paricchinditvā gahaṇam nāma rūpa vavatthānam

original: diṭṭhivisuddhināma. Etthaca pariggaho duvidho saṅkhepa pariggaho vitthārapariggahoti.
analyzed: diṭṭhi visuddhi nāma ettha ca pariggahaḥ duvidho saṅkhepa pariggaho vitthāra pariggaho ti

original: Tattha ajjhattadhamme dvidhā katvā idaṃ nāmameva, na rūpaṃ. Idaṃ rūpameva, na nāmaṃ.
analyzed: tattha ajjhatta dhamme dvidhā katvā idam nāmam eva na rūpam idam rūpam eva na nāmam

original: Aññaṃ nāmaṃ aññaṃ rūpaṃ. Tadubhayatoca añño attāvā jīvovā sattovā puggalovā manussovā
analyzed: aññam nāmam aññam rūpam tad ubhayatas ca aññaḥ attā vā jīvaḥ vā satto vā puggalo vā manusso vā

original: devovā brahmāvā natthīti evaṃ paccakkhato sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā pariggaṇhanaṃ saṅkhepapariggahonāma.
analyzed: devo vā brahmā vā na atthi iti evam paccakkhataḥ su diṭṭham katvā pariggaṇhanam saṅkhepa pariggahaḥ nāma

original: Ñāṇuttarikohi puggalo ettakamattenapi sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti saddhiṃ
analyzed: ñāṇuttarikaḥ hi puggalaḥ ettaka mattena api sakkāya diṭṭhim vikkhambhetum sakkoti saddhim

original: saññā cittavipallāsehīti. Tayo hi vipallāsā. Yathāha-anattani attāti saññāvipallāso
analyzed: saññā citta vipallāsehi iti tayaḥ hi vipallāsāḥ yathā āha an attani attā ati saññā vipallāso

original: cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāsoti. Tattha satthusāsanadhamme suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitena saddhāmattenapi
analyzed: citta vipallāso diṭṭhi vipallāso ti tattha satthu sāsana dhamme suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitena saddhā mattena api

original: diṭṭhi vipallāso vikkhambhito hoti. Itare pana nāmarūpapariggahe kateyeva vikkhambhitā
analyzed: diṭṭhi vipallāsaḥ vikkhambhitaḥ hoti itare pana nāma rūpa pariggahe katā iyā iva vikkhambhitā

original: honti. Yāvaca ete dve avikkhambhitā honti. Tāva nāmarūpapariggahoca aparisuddhoyeva
analyzed: honti yāva ca ete dve a vikkhambhitāḥ honti nāma rūpa pariggahaḥ ca a parisuddhaḥ yeva

original: hoti. Taṃmūlikāca kilesadhammā avikkhambhitā eva hontīti apica. Catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ
analyzed: hoti taṃmūlikāḥ ca kilesa dhammāḥ a vikkhambhitāḥ eva honti iti apica catunnam āhārānaṃ

original: vasena catudhā, pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena pañcadhā, channaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena chadhātiādinā
analyzed: vasena catudhā pañcannam khandhānam vasena pañcadhā channam dhātūnam vasena chadhāti ādinā

original: nayena nāmarūpaṃ pariggahe tabbameva. Tattha cha dhātuyonāma pathavidhātu āpodhātu
analyzed: nayena nāma rūpam pariggahe tabbam eva tattha cha pathavi dhātu āpodhātu

original: tejodhātu vāyodhātu ākāsadhātu viññāṇadhātuyo. Pakkusāti kulaputto hi imā cha dhātuyo
analyzed: tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu ākāsa dhātu viññāṇa dhātuyaḥ pakkusāti kula puttaḥ hi imā cha dhātuyaḥ

original: pariggaṇhitvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā capitvā suddhāvāsesu nibbattoti. Yattake vā pana
analyzed: pariggaṇhitvā anāgāmi phalam patvā capitvā suddhāvāsesu nibbatto ti yattake vā pana

original: dhamme pariggaṇhanto attā meti pavattamāne saññācittadiṭṭhi vipallāse vikkhambhetuṃ
analyzed: dhamme pariggaṇhantaḥ attā mā iti pavattamāne saññā citta diṭṭhi vipallāse vikkhambhetum

original: sakkoti. Tattakāpi pariggahetabbā yevāti. Imasmiṃ pana saṅgahapakaraṇe yo yo cittacetasika
analyzed: pariggahetabbā yeva ati imasmim pana saṅgaha pakaraṇe yaḥ yaḥ

original: vibhāgo rūpavibhāgoca heṭṭhā vutto. Tassa sabbassa vasena nāmarūpassa pariggaṇhanaṃ
analyzed: vibhāgaḥ rūpa vibhāgaḥ ca heṭṭhā vuttaḥ tassa sabbassa vasena nāma rūpassa pariggaṇhanam

original: vitthārapariggahonāma. Ayaṃpana ādikammikānaṃ avisayo. Paṭividdhacatusaccānaṃ pana
analyzed: vitthāra pariggaho nāma ayam pana ādikammikānam avisayo paṭividdha catu saccānam pana

original: ābhidhammikattherānaṃ eva visayoti veditabbo. Nāmarūpaṃ pariggaṇhantassa pana nāmarūpa
analyzed: ābhidhammika therānam eva visayaḥ ti veditabbaḥ nāma rūpam pariggaṇhantassa pana nāma rūpa

original: mattato uddhaṃ aññassa kassaci abhāvadassanatoca sarīrabbhantare jīvasaññito attā
analyzed: mattataḥ uddham aññassa kassaci abhāva dassanato ca sarīra abbhantare jīva saññitaḥ attā

original: atthi. So karoti, so paṭisaṃvedeti, saṃsarati, sandhāvatīti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi pahīyati.
analyzed: atthi so karoti so paṭisaṃvedeti saṃsarati sandhāvati iti evam pavattā diṭṭhi pahīyati

original: Suddhe nāme evavārūpe evavā puggalasattakriyasaññitānaṃ īhābyāpārānaṃ sabbaso abhāvadassanato
analyzed: suddhe nāme eva vā rūpe eva vā puggala satta kriya saññitānam īhā byāpārānam sabbasas abhāva dassanato

original: tadubhayasaṃyogeeva tesaṃ labbhamānatā dassanatoca tadubhayaṃvā ekamekaṃvā uddissa
analyzed: tad ubhaya saṃyoge eva tesam labbhamāna tā dassanato ca tat ubhayam vā ekam ekam vā uddissa

original: attāti pavattā diṭṭhi pahīyati. Attā jīvo satto puggalo manusso devo brahmāti evamādīsu
analyzed: attā iti pavattā diṭṭhi pahīyati attā jīvaḥ satto puggalo manussaḥ devaḥ brahmā ati evamādīsu

original: vohāresuca vohāra matte aṭṭhatvā attānāma ekantato atthi jīvonāma ekantato atthītiādinā
analyzed: vohāresu ca vohāra matte aṭṭhatvā attā nāma ekantataḥ atthi jīvaḥ nāma ekantataḥ atthi itiādinā

original: tadatthābhinivesavasena atidhāvanañca pahīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tadatthābhinivesotica
analyzed: tad attha abhinivesa vasena atidhāvanam ca pahīyati iti daṭṭhabbam tad attha abhinivesa uti ca

original: attānāma atthi jīvonāma atthītiādinā daḷhataraṃ abhiniveso. Atidhāvananti nāmarūpaṃ
analyzed: attā nāma atthi jīvaḥ nāma atthi iti ādinā daḷhataram abhinivesaḥ nāma rūpam

original: attātiādinā gahaṇaṃ. Paccayapariggahoti etthapi duvidho paccayapariggaho saṅkhepato
analyzed: attā ati ādinā gahaṇam paccaya pariggaho ti ettha api duvidhaḥ paccaya pariggaho saṅkhepato

original: vitthārato cāti. Tattha vatthārammaṇavasena nāmassa cittotukāhāravasena rūpassa avijjātaṇhupādānakammavasena
analyzed: vitthārato ca ati tattha vattha ārammaṇa vasena nāmassa citta utuka āhāra vasena rūpassa avijjā taṇhā upādāna kamma vasena

original: tadubhayassaca paccayaṃ pariggaṇhanto saṅkhepato pariggaṇhātināma. Heṭṭhā paccayasaṅgahe
analyzed: tad ubhayassa ca paccayam pariggaṇhantaḥ saṅkhepataḥ pariggaṇhāti nāma heṭṭhā paccaya saṅgahe

original: vibhattehi paṭiccasamuppādanaya paṭṭhānanayehi pariggaṇhanto vitthārato pariggaṇhātināma.
analyzed: vibhattehi paṭiccasamuppāda naya paṭṭhāna nayehi pariggaṇhantaḥ vitthārato

original: Etthapi paṭṭhānanayena pariggaho ādikammikānaṃ avisayoeva. Paccayaṃ pariggaṇhantassapana
analyzed: ettha api paṭṭhāna nayena pariggahaḥ ādikammikānam avisayaḥ eva paccayam pariggaṇhantassa pana

original: yathāvavatthitassa sabbassa nāmarūpassa sabbaso paccayāyattavuttikatādassanato ahetukadiṭṭhi
analyzed: yathā avavatthitassa sabbassa nāma rūpassa sabbaso paccaya āyatta vuttika tā dassanataḥ ahetuka diṭṭhi

original: pahīyati. Attano anurūpapaccayasāmaggiyā vinā aññathā pavattiyā adassanato issaranimmāna
analyzed: pahīyati attanaḥ anurūpa paccaya sāmaggiyā vinā aññathā pavattiyāḥ a dassanataḥ

original: kālanimmānādikā visamahetudiṭṭhica pahīyati. Hetusambhārapaccayehi kammappavattiyā
analyzed: kāla nimmāna ādikā visama hetu diṭṭhi ca pahīyati hetu sambhāra paccayehi kamma ppavattiyā

original: vipākappavattiyāca aññassa kammakārakassavā vipāka vedakassavā kattuno abhāvadassanato
analyzed: vipāka ppavattiyāḥ ca aññassa kattuno abhāva dassanato

original: kāraka vedaka diṭṭhi pahīyati. Anamataggeca saṃsāre tīsu addhāsu hetuphala paraṃparāvasena
analyzed: kāraka vedaka diṭṭhi saṃsāre tīsu addhāsu hetu phala paraṃparā vasena

original: kevalassa nāmarūpamattasseva pavattidassanato ahosiṃ nukho ahamatītamaddhānanti evamādikāya
analyzed: kevalassa nāma rūpa mattassa iva pavatti dassanataḥ ahosim nu kho aham atītam addhā ananti evamādikāya

original: puggalasatta visayāya soḷasavidhāya kaṅkhāyaca atikkamo hoti. Sabhāvadhammapavattiyāca
analyzed: puggala satta visayāya soḷasavidhāya kaṅkhāya ca atikkamaḥ hoti sa bhāva dhamma pavattiyā ca

original: suṭṭhu diṭṭhāya desanādhammassa sudhammatā dassanato buddhasubuddhatañca disvā satthari
analyzed: suṭṭhu diṭṭhāya desanā dhammassa su dhamma tā dassanataḥ buddha subuddha tañca disvā satthari

original: kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatītiādinayapavattā aṭṭhavidhāpi kaṅkhā pahīyatīti. Lokuttaradhammānaṃ
analyzed: kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhati iti ādi naya pavattā aṭṭhavidhā api kaṅkhā pahīyati iti lokuttara dhammānam

original: saṅkhatānaṃpi sataṃ asammasanupagattā tebhūmakasaṅkhāresūti vuttaṃ. Anusayasamūhanatthañca
analyzed: saṅkhatānam pi tebhūmaka saṅkhāresu iti vuttam anusaya samūhana ttham ca

original: sammasananti katvā yattha kāmarāgādayo anusayā anusenti. Teyeva dhammā sammasanārahā
analyzed: katvā yattha kāma rāga ādayaḥ anusayāḥ anusenti teyeva dhammā sammasana arahā

original: hontīti vuttaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhāresūti. Imassa ca padassa lakkhaṇattayaṃ sammasantassāti
analyzed: honti iti vuttam tebhūmaka saṅkhāresu iti imassa ca padassa lakkhaṇa ttayam sammasantassa ati

original: iminā sambandho. Atītādibhedabhinnesūti atītānāgatapaccuppannajjhattabahiddhādīhi
analyzed: iminā sambandhaḥ atīta ādi bheda bhinnesu iti atīta anāgata paccuppanna jjhatta bahiddha ādīhi

original: ekādasahi bhedehi bhinnesu. Khandhādinayaṃārabbhāti paṭisambhidāmagge vibhattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ
analyzed: ekādasahi bhedehi bhinnesu khandha ādi nayam ārabbhāti paṭisambhidā magge vibhattam khandha pañcakam

original: dvārachakkaṃ ārammaṇachakkaṃ viññāṇachakkaṃ phassachakkaṃ vedanāchakkaṃ saññāchakkanti
analyzed: dvāra chakkam ārammaṇa chakkam viññāṇa chakkam phassa chakkam vedanā chakkam saññā chakkanti

original: evamādikaṃ sammasanabhūmivibhāganayaṃ ārabbha anugantvā taṃnayānusārenāti attho.
analyzed: evamādikam sammasana bhūmi vibhāga nayam ārabbha anugantvā tad naya anusārena ati attho

original: Tattha pana tevīsatiyā dhammakoṭṭhāsesu yassa yo koṭṭhāso pākaṭo hoti. Tena taṃ gahetvā
analyzed: tattha pana tevīsatiyā dhamma koṭṭhāsesu yassa yaḥ koṭṭhāso pākaṭaḥ hoti tena tam gahetvā

original: sammasanaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ. Sakkontena pana sabbampi gahetvā ārabhitabbameva. Kalāpavasenasaṃkhipitvāti
analyzed: sammasanam ārabhitabbam sakkontena pana sabbam pi gahetvā ārabhitabbam eva kalāpa vasena saṃkhipitvā ati

original: khandhapañcakena ye rūpaṃ tāva atītānāgatapaccuppannādibhedabhinnaṃpi samānaṃ sabbaṃ
analyzed: khandha pañcakena ye rūpam samānam sabbam

original: ekarūpapiṇḍabhāvena saṃkhipitvā esa nayo vedanā dīsupīti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo. Yaṃkiñci
analyzed: eka rūpa piṇḍa bhāvena saṃkhipitvā esa nayaḥ vedanā tatra ayam nayaḥ yaṃkiñcid

original: rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃvā bahiddhāvā oḷāritaṃvā sukhumaṃvā hīnaṃvā
analyzed: rūpam atīta anāgata paccuppannam ajjhattam vā bahiddhā vā oḷāritam vā sukhumam vā hīnam vā

original: paṇītaṃvā yaṃ dūre santikevā. Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena
analyzed: paṇītam vā yam dūre santike vā sabbam rūpam aniccam khaya ṭṭhena dukkham bhaya ṭṭhena

original: anattā asārakaṭṭhena. Yākāci vedanā.La. Yākāci saññā.La. Yekeci saṅkhārā.La. Yaṃkiñci
analyzed: anattā asārakaṭṭhena yākāci vedanā ala yākāci saññā ala yekeci saṅkhārāla yaṃkiñci

original: viññāṇaṃ.La. Sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena. Dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti.
analyzed: sabbam viññāṇam aniccam khaya ṭṭhena dukkham bhaya ṭṭhena anattā asāraka ṭṭhena ati

original: Etthaca sabbaṃ rūpaṃ.La. Sabbaṃ viññāṇanti gahaṇameva kalāpavasena saṅkhipananti
analyzed: ettha ca sabbam rūpam sabbam viññāṇam ti gahaṇam eva kalāpa vasena saṅkhipana nti

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aniccaṃkhayaṭṭhenāti ettha rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena. Vedanā aniccā.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam aniccam khaya ṭṭhena ati ettha rūpam aniccam khaya ṭṭhena vedanā aniccā

original: Saññā aniccā. Saṅkhārā aniccā. Viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādinā nayena sammasitabbadhammapariggahena
analyzed: saññā aniccā saṅkhārāḥ aniccāḥ viññāṇam aniccam khaya ṭṭhena ati ādinā nayena sammasitabba dhamma pariggahena

original: saheva sammasanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Itarathā sammasanaṃ na ruhati. Tadatthassa pana pākaṭattā
analyzed: saha iva sammasanam kātabbam itarathā sammasanam na ruhati tad atthassa pana pākaṭa ttā

original: idha aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādinā sammasanapadameva therena gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: idha aniccam khaya ṭṭhena ati ādinā sammasana padam eva therena gahitan ti daṭṭhabbam tattha

original: rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti taṃtaṃrūpaṃ ñāṇena daḷhaṃ gahetvā ayaṃ pathavidhātu aniccā
analyzed: rūpam aniccam khaya ṭṭhena ati tat taṃrūpam ñāṇena daḷham gahetvā ayam aniccā

original: khayaṭṭhena. Ayaṃ āpodhātu aniccā khayaṭṭhenātiādinā sammasanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: khaya ṭṭhena ayam āpodhātu aniccā khaya ṭṭhena ati ādinā sammasanam kātabbam tattha

original: imasmiṃ kāye sabbaṃ thaddhakriyāmattaṃ pathavīnāma. Sāca kriyā sītuṇhaparivattiyāvā
analyzed: imasmin kāye sabbam thaddha kriyā mattam pathavī nāma sā ca kriyā sītuṇha parivatti yāvā

original: parivattati. Nānāhāraparivattiyā vā nānācittaparivattiyāvā nāniriyāpathaparivattiyāvā
analyzed: parivattati nānā āhāra parivattiyā vā nānā citta parivattiyā vā nā niriyāpatha parivattiyā vā

original: nānā kāyikakriyā parivattiyāvā parivattati. Nānāsantati saṅkanti hotīti attho. Tattha
analyzed: nānā kāyika kriyā parivattiyāvā parivattati nānā santati saṅkanti hoti iti attho tattha

original: navanavāsu kriyāsantatīsu pātubhontīsu pubbapubbakriyāsantatiyo nassanti. Yasmāca
analyzed: nava navāsu kriyā santatīsu pātubhontīsu pubba pubba kriyā santatiyaḥ nassanti yasmā ca

original: santati nāma dhammato visuṃ natthi, tasmā navanavasantatīnaṃ pātubhāvonāma navanavakriyānaṃ
analyzed: santati nāma dhammataḥ visum natthi tasmā nava nava santatīnam pātubhāvaḥ nāma nava nava kriyānam

original: uppattieva. Pubbapubbasantatīnaṃ nassanaṃnāma pubbapubba kriyānaṃ bhijjanamevāti.
analyzed: uppatti eva pubba pubba santatīnam nassanam nāma pubba pubba kriyānam bhijjanam eva ati

original: Evaṃ attano kāye nānāthaddhakriyānaṃ parivattiṃ passanto pathavidhātuyā khayavayaṃ
analyzed: evam kāye parivattim passanto pathavi dhātuyā khaya vayam

original: passati. Tañca passanto taṃsahajātānaṃ rūpānaṃ khayavayaṃ passatiyeva. Āpo nāma ābandhanakriyāmattaṃ.
analyzed: passati tat ca passantaḥ tad sahajātānam rūpānam khaya vayam āpaḥ nāma ābandhana kriyā mattam

original: Tejonāma sītakriyāmattaṃ uṇha kriyāmattañca. Vāyonāma vitthambhanakriyāmattaṃ. Imāca
analyzed: tejaḥ nāma sīta kriyā mattam uṇha kriyā mattam ca vāyu nāma vitthambhana kriyā mattam imā ca

original: kriyā khaṇe khaṇe parivattantiyeva. Imāsañca, visuṃ visuṃ santatiparivattiṃ passanto
analyzed: kriyā khaṇe khaṇe parivattantiyā iva imāsam ca visum visum santati parivattim passanto

original: āpādīnaṃ taṃsahajātarūpānañca khayavayaṃ passati. Santatiparivattiṃ pana bahiddhā
analyzed: āpa ādīnam khaya vayam passati santati parivattim pana bahiddhā

original: cakkhunā disvā jānāti, sarīrabbhantare pana kāyasaṃphassena jānāti. Santatisarīrabhūtānaṃ
analyzed: cakkhunā disvā jānāti sarīra bbhantare pana kāya saṃphassena jānāti santati sarīra bhūtānaṃ

original: pana dhātūnaṃ khayavayaṃ ñāṇenaeva passati. Tasmā attano sarīrabbhantare taṃtaṃsantati
analyzed: pana dhātūnam khaya vayam ñāṇena eva passati tasmai attano sarīra abbhantare

original: parivattiṃ ñatvāvā tathā tathā kappetvā vā rūpadhātūnaṃ aniccattaṃ ñāṇena sudiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: parivattim ñatvā vā tathā tathā kappetvā vā rūpa dhātūnam anicca ttam ñāṇena su diṭṭham

original: katvā punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ. Sesakhandhesupi taṃtaṃsantatinānāttaṃ ñatvā vedanādīnaṃ
analyzed: katvā punappunam sammasitabbam sesa khandhesu pi taṃ taṃ santati nānā āttam ñatvā vedanā ādīnam

original: khayavayaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā sammasanaṃ kātabbanti. Bhayaṭṭhenāti bhāyitabbaṭṭhena.
analyzed: khaya vayam su diṭṭham katvā sammasanam kātabbanti bhaya ṭṭhena ati bhāyitabba ṭṭhena

original: Yañhi aniccaṃ hoti. Khaṇamattepi vipariṇāmadhammaṃ. Taṃ ekantena bhāyitabbameva.
analyzed: yat hi aniccam hoti khaṇa matte pi vipariṇāma dhammam tat ekantena bhāyitabbam eva

original: Kasmā, tañhi yo abhāyitvā vissāsaṃ karoti. Etaṃ meti attano aṅgaṃ katvā pariharati.
analyzed: kasmā tat hi yaḥ a bhāyitvā vissāsam karoti etam mā iti attanaḥ aṅgam katvā pariharati

original: Taṃ apariyantehi anekasahassehi abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhehivā vipariṇāmadukkhehivā abhiṇhaṃ
analyzed: tam apariyantehi aneka sahassehi abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhehi vā vipariṇāma dukkhehi vā abhiṇham

original: pīḷeti. Bādhati. Iti nānādukkhadhammehi abhiṇhaṃ sampaṭipīḷanasabhāvattā ekantena
analyzed: pīḷeti bādhati iti nānā dukkha dhammehi abhiṇham sampaṭipīḷana sabhāva tā ekantena

original: bhāyitabbaṭṭhena dukkhaṃnāmāti. Attapaṭipakkhattā anattā. Yo hi ito uddhaṃ mayhaṃ
analyzed: bhāyitabba ṭṭhena dukkhaṃnāmā ti atta paṭipakkha ttā anattā yaḥ hi itas uddham mayham

original: abbhantarimataronāma natthīti evaṃ paramajjhattabhāvena pariggahito hoti. So attāti
analyzed: abbhantarimataro nāma natthi iti evam param ajjhatta bhāvena pariggahitaḥ hoti saḥ attā ati

original: vuccati. Katamo pana tathāpariggahi tabboti. Yo attano vase sabbaso vattati. Yathā
analyzed: vuccati katamaḥ pana tathā pariggahi tabbaḥ ti yaḥ attanaḥ vase sabbasas vattati yathā

original: vuttehi abhisaṅkharaṇakiccehi vinā kevalaṃ attano chandenavā vasenavā ajjhāsayenavā
