analyzed: vuttehi abhisaṅkharaṇa kiccehi vinā kevalam chandena vā vasena vā ajjhāsayena vā

original: āṇāvidhānenavā niccaṃ avirajjhamāno pavattati. So tathā pariggahetabboti. Tathārūpo
analyzed: niccam a virajjhamāno pavattati saḥ tathā pariggahetabbaḥ ti tathārūpaḥ

original: eva hi dhammo niccaṃ sukhakāmānaṃ dukkhapaṭikūlānaṃ sattānaṃ attakiccaṃ karoti nāmāti.
analyzed: eva hi dhammaḥ niccam sukha kāmānam dukkha paṭikūlānam sattānam atta kiccam karoti nāma ati

original: Yo pana niccaṃ sukhakāmānaṃ tesaṃ yathāpavattaṃ sukhaṃ viddhaṃseti vikireti. Dukkhapaṭikūlānaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ pana niccam sukha kāmānam tesam yathāpavattam sukham viddhaṃseti vikireti dukkha paṭikūlānam

original: tesaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇādi mūlakaṃ nānādukkhaṃ janeti vaḍḍheti. So attapaṭipakkhoeva
analyzed: tesam abhisaṅkharaṇa ādi mūlakam nānā dukkham janeti vaḍḍheti saḥ atta paṭipakkhaḥ eva

original: hoti. Idañca rūpaṃ edisameva hoti. Iti attakiccassa akaraṇato attapaṭipakkhakiccassa
analyzed: hoti idam ca rūpam edisam eva hoti iti atta kiccassa a karaṇataḥ atta paṭipakkha kiccassa

original: karaṇatoca rūpaṃ anattānāmāti. Kasmā panetaṃ attano vase navattati attakiccaṃ na
analyzed: karaṇa to ca rūpam anatta anāma ati kasmā pana itam attanaḥ vase atta kiccam na

original: karoti attapaṭipakkhakiccaṃ karotīti āha asārakaṭṭhenāti. Tattha sāronāma paccayasāmaggiyā
analyzed: karoti atta paṭipakkha kiccam karoti iti āha asāraka ṭṭhena ti tattha sāraḥ nāma paccaya sāmaggiyā

original: vinā kevalaṃ ajjhāsayamattena uppajjituṃvā uppajjitvāca paccayupatthambhena vinā
analyzed: vinā kevalam ajjhāsaya mattena uppajjitum vā uppajjitvā ca paccaya upatthambhena vinā

original: yadicchakaṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ vā samatthabhāvasaṅkhāto thāmabalaviseso vuccati. Rūpaṃ pana
analyzed: yadicchakam patiṭṭhātum vā samattha bhāva saṅkhātaḥ thāma bala viseso vuccati rūpam pana

original: sayaṃpi evarūpo sāronāma na hoti. Naca evarūpena sārena yuttanti. Nahi tassa paccayasāmaggiyā
analyzed: sayam pi evarūpaḥ sāraḥ nāma na hoti na ca evarūpena sārena na hi tassa paccaya sāmaggiyā

original: vinā uppajjituṃvā uppajjitvāpi paccayupatthambhena vinā khaṇamattaṃpi patiṭṭhātuṃvā
analyzed: vinā uppajjitum vā uppajjitvā api paccaya upatthambhena vinā khaṇa mattam pi patiṭṭhātum vā

original: thāmovā balaṃvā atthi. Yañca attano thāmena balena vinā kevalaṃ paccayasāmaggi baleneva
analyzed: thāmaḥ uvā balaṃvā atthi yat ca thāmena balena vinā kevalam paccaya sāmaggi balena iva

original: uppajjati. Paccayupatthambheneva patiṭṭhāti. Taṃ aneka sahassāni paccayābhisaṅkharaṇadukkhāni
analyzed: uppajjati paccaya upatthambhena iva patiṭṭhāti tam aneka sahassāni paccaya abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhāni

original: janetvā ekantena niccaṃ attapaṭipakkhakiccaṃ karoti, pīḷeti, bādhatiyevāti. Esanayo
analyzed: janetvā ekantena niccam atta paṭipakkha kiccam karoti pīḷeti bādhatiyā iva ati

original: vedanā aniccā khayaṭṭhenātiādīsu. Iti lakkhaṇattayaṃ samma santassāti sambandho.
analyzed: vedanā aniccā khaya ṭṭhena ati ādīsu iti lakkhaṇa ttayam samma santassa ati sambandho

original: Addhānavasenāti ekekabhavaparicchinnassa pavattakālassa vasena. Nahi bhavantare uppannaṃ
analyzed: addhāna vasena ati ekeka bhava paricchinnassa pavatta kālassa vasena nahi bhavantare uppannam

original: khandhapañcakaṃ aññaṃ bhavantaraṃ gacchati. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhaveeva asesaṃ nirujjhatīti.
analyzed: khandha pañcakam aññam bhavantaram gacchati tasmin tasmin bhave eva asesam nirujjhati iti

original: Apica, ekasmiṃ bhavepi tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ mandādīnaṃ dasannaṃ dasakānaṃ saṃvaccharautu
analyzed: apica ekasmin bhave pi tiṇṇam manda ādīnam dasannam dasakānam saṃvat śarautu

original: māsa pakkhatithi ahoratti yāma pahārādīnañca vasena addhānabhedo yojetabbo. Santativasenāti
analyzed: māsa pakkha tithi ahoratti yāma pahāra ādīnam ca vasena addhāna bhedaḥ yojetabbaḥ santati vasena ati

original: sabhāgekasantānavasena pavattamānāya rūpasantatiyāvā arūpa santatiyāvā vasena. Khaṇavasenāti
analyzed: sabhāga eka santāna vasena pavattamānāya rūpa santati yāvā arūpa santati yāvā vasena khaṇa vasena ati

original: rūpārūpadhammānaṃ āyu parimāṇasaṅkhātassa khaṇassa vasena. Etthaca khaṇavasena sammasanaṃnāma
analyzed: rūpa arūpa dhammānaṃ āyu parimāṇa saṅkhātassa khaṇassa vasena ettha ca khaṇa vasena sammasanaṃ nāma

original: sabbaññubuddhānaṃ eva visayo siyā, na sāvakānaṃ. Nahi te evaṃ parittake khaṇe uppādaṃvā
analyzed: sabbaññu buddhānam eva visayaḥ siyā na sāvakānam nahi te evam parittake khaṇe uppādam vā

original: nirodhaṃvā sampāpuṇituṃ sakkontīti. Tasmā addhāsantativasena sammasanameva idhā dhippetanti
analyzed: nirodham vā sampāpuṇitum sakkonti iti tasmai addhā santati vasena sammasanam eva idha

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Lakkhaṇattayaṃsammasantassāti tesu tebhūmaka saṅkhāresu dhammesu tilakkhaṇāni
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam lakkhaṇa ttayam sammasantassa ti tesu tebhūmaka saṅkhāresu dhammesu ti lakkhaṇāni

original: āropetvā te dhamme punappunaṃ āmasantassa parimajjantassa. Tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anicca
analyzed: āropetvā te dhamme punappunaṃ āmasantassa parimajjantassa tesam dhammānaṃ anicca

original: jātikataṃvā dukkhajātikataṃvā anattajātikataṃvā ñāṇe suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ karontassāti
analyzed: jāti katam vā dukkha jāti katam vā anatta jāti katam vā ñāṇe suṭṭhu pākaṭam karontassa ati

original: attho. Visesato pana imasmiṃ ñāṇe aniccalakkhaṇadassanameva padhānaṃ. Tasmiṃ diṭṭheyeva
analyzed: atthaḥ visesato pana imasmim ñāṇe anicca lakkhaṇa dassanam eva padhānam tasmim diṭṭheyeva

original: itarāni kamena diṭṭhāni honti. Adiṭṭheca adiṭṭhānīti. Tasmā ādito aniccalakkhaṇasseva
analyzed: itarāni kamena diṭṭhāni honti adiṭṭhe ca adiṭṭhāni iti tasmai āditas anicca lakkhaṇassa iva

original: suṭṭhu pākaṭabhāvo adhippetoti. Tesvevāti tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu eva. Paccayavasenāti
analyzed: suṭṭhu pākaṭa bhāvaḥ adhippeto ti tesu eva āti tebhūmaka saṅkhāresu eva paccaya vasena ati

original: rūpakkhandhe tāva avijjātaṇhupādānakammāhārasaṅkhātānaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena. Vedanāsaññāsaṅkhāresu
analyzed: rūpa kkhandhe tāva avijjā taṇhā upādāna kamma āhāra saṅkhātānam paccayānam vasena vedanā saññā saṅkhāresu

original: pana āhāraṭṭhāne phasso vattabbo. Viññāṇeca nāmarūpaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ nayo. Atītānantarabhave
analyzed: pana āhāra ṭṭhāne phassaḥ vattabbo viññāṇe ca nāma rūpam tatra ayam nayaḥ atīta anantara bhave

original: avijjātaṇhupādāna kammesu appahīnavasena samuditesu imasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
analyzed: avijjāta ṇhupādāna kammesu appahīna vasena samuditesu imasmin bhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya

original: rūpasantatiyo vedanāsaññāsaṅkhāra viññāṇasantatiyoca samudenti. Yāva maraṇakālā khaṇe
analyzed: rūpa santatiyaḥ vedanā saññā saṅkhāra viññāṇa santatiyaḥ ca samudenti yāva maraṇa kālā khaṇe

original: khaṇe nānākalāpavasena udenti pasavanti. Tesu pana tasmiṃ bhave eva pahīnavasena
analyzed: khaṇe nānā kalāpa vasena udenti pasavanti tesu pana tasmin bhave eva pahīna vasena

original: niruddhesu tā rūpārūpasantatiyo nirujjhanti. Bhavantare puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṃ nirodhaṃ
analyzed: niruddhesu tāḥ rūpa arūpa santatiyaḥ nirujjhanti bhavantare puna anuppāda saṅkhātam nirodham

original: pāpuṇanti. Ettha pana yathā udake sati macchānāma honti, asati na honti. Evaṃ kammajesu
analyzed: pāpuṇanti ettha pana yathā udake sati macchā nāma honti asati na honti evam kamma jesu

original: nāmarūpesu sati itarāni nāmarūpāni honti. Asati na hontīti itarāni sabbāni kammajesu
analyzed: nāma rūpesu sati itarāni nāma rūpāni honti asati na honti iti itarāni sabbāni kamma jesu

original: saṅgahetvā kammavasena udayabbayavidhānaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ avijjātaṇhupādānakammapaccayānaṃ
analyzed: saṅgahetvā kamma vasena udaya bbaya vidhānam gahitan ti daṭṭhabbam evam avijjā taṇhā upādāna kamma paccayānam

original: vasena pañcakkhandhassa udayabbayapavatti hotīti. Kammavasena pana imasmiṃ bhave
analyzed: vasena pañca kkhandhassa udaya bbaya pavatti hoti iti kamma vasena pana imasmin bhave

original: samudentānipi paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya khaṇe khaṇe kabaḷīkārāhārūpatthambhanaṃ laddhā
analyzed: paṭisandhitaḥ paṭṭhāya khaṇe khaṇe kabaḷīkāra āhāra upatthambhanam laddhā

original: eva yathā pavattarūpasantatiyo anubandha mānā navanavā rūpasantatiyo samudenti. Aladdhā
analyzed: eva yathā nava navāḥ rūpa santatiyaḥ samudenti a laddhāḥ

original: pana nirujjhanti. Taṃ santatiyaṃ puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṃ ekabhavanirodhaṃ pāpuṇanti,
analyzed: pana nirujjhanti tam santatiyam puna anuppāda saṅkhātam eka bhava nirodham pāpuṇanti

original: yathā pavattasantatiyo vā chijjanti bhijjanti antaradhāyantīti.
analyzed: yathā pavatta santatiyaḥ vā chijjanti bhijjanti antaradhāyanti iti

original: Vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārā pana bahiddhā ārammaṇesu āpātāgatesu ārammaṇasamphassaṃ laddhāeva
analyzed: vedanā saññā saṅkhārā pana bahiddhā ārammaṇesu āpāta āgatesu ārammaṇa samphassam laddhā eva

original: chadvārikā kusalākusalavipāka kriyabhūtā samudenti. Navanavā santatiyo pātubhavanti.
analyzed: samudenti nava navā

original: Aladdhā pana nirujjhanti. Santatiṃ na ghaṭenti. Viññāṇaṃca sahajāta nāmeca vatthurūpeca
analyzed: a laddhā pana nirujjhanti santatim na ghaṭenti viññāṇam ca sahajāta nāme ca vatthu rūpe ca

original: pavattamāneeva pavattati. Nivattamāne nivattatīti. Khaṇavasenāti vuttappakāre paccaye
analyzed: pavattamāne eva pavattati nivattamāne nivattati iti khaṇa vasena ati vutta ppakāre paccaye

original: anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ pavattikkhaṇavasena. Khaṇasaddena cettha sammasanañāṇe
analyzed: an apekkhitvā kevalam nāma rūpānam pavatti kkhaṇa vasena khaṇa saddena ca ittha sammasana ñāṇe

original: vuttarūpasantati nāmasantatiyopi gahetabbā. Nahi sāvakānaṃ ñāṇaṃ khaṇavasena nāmarūpānaṃ
analyzed: vutta rūpa santati nāma santatiyaḥ api gahetabbāḥ nahi sāvakānam ñāṇam khaṇa vasena nāma rūpānam

original: udayaṃvā vayaṃ vā sampāpuṇituṃ sakkotīti. Yathā pana rattandhakāre anto leṇe mahanto
analyzed: udayam vā vayam vā sampāpuṇitum sakkoti iti yathā pana ratta ndhakāre antar leṇe mahantaḥ

original: tamokhandho jāyati. Dīpaṃ jālentassa pana dīpobhāso ekakkhaṇe eva sakalaṃ antoleṇaṃ
analyzed: tamaḥ khandhaḥ jāyati dīpam jālentassa pana dīpa ubhāsaḥ eka khaṇe eva sakalam

original: pharamāno udeti. Tamokhandho veti. Ālokassa udayo hoti. Tamokhandhassa vayo. Puna
analyzed: pharamānaḥ udeti tamokhandhaḥ veti ālokassa udayaḥ hoti tamokhandhassa vayaḥ puna

original: dīpe nibbāpīyamāne tamokhandhassa udayo hoti. Ālokassa vayo. Eva mevaṃ sarīre nānāutuvasenavā
analyzed: dīpe nibbāpīyamāne tamaḥ khandhassa udayaḥ hoti ālokassa vayaḥ eva mā evam sarīre

original: nānāhāravasenavā nānācitta vasenavā nāniriyāpathavasenavā nānāpayogavasenavā udayapakkhānaṃ
analyzed: udaya pakkhānaṃ

original: vayapakkhānañca nānāsantatīnaṃ udayañca udayato vayañca vayato sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā samanupassantassāti
analyzed: vaya pakkhānam ca nānā santatīnam udayam ca udayataḥ vayam ca vayataḥ su diṭṭham katvā samanupassantassa ati

original: attho. Evaṃ samanupassantassa pana āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ pattassa udayabbaya ñāṇe
analyzed: evam samanupassantassa pana āraddha vipassaka bhāvam pattassa udaya bbaya ñāṇe

original: tikkhe sūre vahante dasavidhā vipassanupakkilesasaṅkhātā pāripanthakadhammā uppajjanti.
analyzed: tikkhe sūre vahante dasavidhāḥ vipassanu pakkilesa saṅkhātā pāripanthaka dhammāḥ uppajjanti

original: Te dassetuṃ obhāsotiādigātha māha. Tattha obhāsoti vipassanā cittasamuṭṭhito sarīrobhāso.
analyzed: te dassetum obhāso ti ādi gātha māha tattha obhāso ti vipassanā citta samuṭṭhito sarīra ubhāso

original: Pītīti vipassanācittasampayuttā pañcavidhā pīti. Passaddhīti duvidhāpassaddhi. Adhimokkhoti
analyzed: pīti iti vipassanā citta sampayuttā pañcavidhā pīti passaddhī iti duvidhā apassaddhi adhimokkhā ti

original: saddhādhimokkho. Paggahoti vīriyaṃ. Sukhanti somanassaṃ. Ñāṇanti vipassanā ñāṇaṃ.
analyzed: saddhā adhimokkhaḥ paggaho ti vīriyam sukham ti somanassam ñāṇanti vipassanā ñāṇaṃ

original: Upaṭṭhānanti sati. Upekkhāti tatramajjhattupekkhā ceva āvajjanupekkhā ca. Nikantīti
analyzed: upaṭṭhānam ti sati upekkhā ati tatram ajjhattupekkhā ca iva āvajjanupekkhā ca

original: obhāsādīhi saha vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumā taṇhā. Ayameva pana ekantato
analyzed: obhāsa ādīhi saha vipassanāya ālayam kurumānā sukhumā taṇhā ayam eva pana ekantato

original: vipassanupakkileso hoti. Obhāsādayo pana tassā vatthubhūtattā upakkilesāti vuttā.
analyzed: vipassanā upakkilesaḥ hoti obhāsa ādayaḥ pana tassā vatthu bhūta ttā upakkilesā ati vuttā

original: Tesu hi uppajjamānesu na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo. Evarūpā pīti.La.
analyzed: tesu hi uppajjamānesu na vata me itas pubbe evarūpaḥ obhāsaḥ uppanna pubbaḥ evarūpā pītila

original: Upekkhā uppannapubbā addhā maggaṃ pattosmi. Phalaṃ pattosmīti evaṃ assādasahitā amagge
analyzed: upekkhā uppanna pubbā addhā maggam pattosmi phalam pattosmi iti evam assāda sahitā amagge

original: maggasaññā aphale phalasaññā uppajjati. Tadā koci abyatto yogāvacaro kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: magga saññā aphale phala saññā uppajjati tadā koci abyattaḥ yogāvacaro kammaṭṭhānam

original: vissajjetvā adhimānavasena vikkhipanto vicaratīti. Byatto pana tāvadeva sabhiṃ paṭilabhitvā
analyzed: vissajjetvā adhimāna vasena vikkhipantaḥ vicarati iti byattaḥ pana tāvat eva sabhim paṭilabhitvā

original: idāni mama etesu obhāsādīsu etaṃ mama eso ha masmi eso me attāti cittassa nikāmanākāro
analyzed: idāni mama etesu obhāsa ādīsu etam mama esaḥ ha masmi esaḥ me attā ati cittassa nikāmanā kāro

original: paññāyati. Naca lokuttaradhammonāma īdisassa nikāmanassa vatthu. Addhā mama saṃkilesadhammo
analyzed: paññāyati na ca lokuttara dhammaḥ nāma īdisassa nikāmanassa vatthu addhā mama saṃkilesa dhammo

original: uppanno. So vaḍḍhamāno maṃ niyyānamukhato pātetvā vaṭṭamukhe yojessati. Handa tesveva
analyzed: uppannaḥ saḥ vaḍḍhamānaḥ mam niyyāna mukhataḥ pātetvā vaṭṭa mukhe yojessati handa tesu eva

original: lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā nikantiṃ sodhetvā yathāpavattaṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ paṭipādessāmīti
analyzed: lakkhaṇa ttayam āropetvā nikantim sodhetvā yathāpavattam vipassanā vīthim paṭipādessāmi iti

original: te obhāsādayo eva tāva pariggaṇhāti. Ayaṃ me obhāso anicco khayaṭṭhena dukkho bhayaṭṭhena
analyzed: te obhāsa ādayaḥ eva tāva pariggaṇhāti ayam me obhāsaḥ aniccaḥ khaya ṭṭhena dukkhaḥ bhaya ṭṭhena

original: anattā asārakaṭṭhenātiādinā sammasatīti attho. Evaṃ te obhāsādike vipassanāya upakkilesabhūte
analyzed: anattā asāra kaṭṭhena ati ādinā sammasati iti attho evam te obhāsa ādike vipassanāya upakkilesa bhūte

original: paripantha dhamme pariggaṇhitvā tappariggahavasena tesu nikantiṃ pariyādi yitvā ṭhitassa
analyzed: dhamme pariggaṇhitvā tad pariggaha vasena tesu nikantim yitvā ṭhitassa

original: uppannaṃ maggāmaggalakkhaṇavavatthānañāṇaṃ maggāmaggañāṇa dassanavisuddhināma. Amaggesu
analyzed: uppannam magga amagga lakkhaṇa vavatthāna ñāṇam magga amagga ñāṇa dassana visuddhi nāma amaggesu

original: obhāsādīsu maggasaññāmalato yathā vuttanikantimalatoca visuddhattā. Tañhi ñāṇaṃ tesu
analyzed: obhāsa ādīsu magga saññā malataḥ yathā vutta nikanti malataḥ ca visuddha ttā tat hi ñāṇam tesu

original: nikantiyāpi vikkhambhitāya eva obhāsādipaṭibandhato suṭṭhu parisuddhaṃnāma hotīti.
analyzed: nikantiyā api vikkhambhitāya eva obhāsa ādi paṭibandhato suṭṭhu parisuddham nāma hoti iti

original: [245] Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana
analyzed: vibhāvaniyam pana

original: Aniccādivasena obhāsādi paṭibandhapariggahaṃ visuṃ avatvā maggāmaggajānanamatteneva maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhināma vuttā. Sā aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
analyzed: anicca ādi vasena obhāsa ādi paṭibandha pariggaham visum avatvā maggāmagga jānana mattena iva maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma vuttā sā aṭṭhakathāya na sameti

original: Tathā paripanthavimuttassāti tathā pariggahetvā tato vipassanupakkilesaparipanthato
analyzed: tathā paripantha vimuttassa ati tathā pariggahetvā tatas vipassanu pakkilesa paripanthato

original: vimuttassa yāvānulomāti yāvaanulomañāṇā. Tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvāti sambandho. Vipassanāparipākaṃāgammāti
analyzed: vimuttassa yāva anulomā ati yāva anuloma ñāṇā ti lakkhaṇam āropetvā iti sambandhaḥ vipassanā paripākam āgamma ati

original: saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā tividha vimokkhamukhabhāvappattiyāceva sattaariyapuggalavibhāgassa
analyzed: saṅkhāra upekkhā bhāvam patvā satta ariya puggala vibhāgassa

original: paccaya bhāvappattiyāca vipassanāñāṇassa paripākaṃ āgamma paṭicca. Idāni appanā uppajjissatīti
analyzed: paccaya bhāva ppattiyā ca vipassanā ñāṇassa paripākam āgamma paṭicca idāni appanā uppajjissati iti

original: vattabbakkhaṇeti sambandho. Appanā tica sotāpattimaggaappanā. Dvetīṇivipassanācittānīti
analyzed: vattabba kkhaṇā iti sambandhaḥ appanā ti ca sotāpatti magga appanā dve tīṇi vipassanā cittāni iti

original: tikkhapaññassa dve vipassanācittāni. Mandapaññassa tīṇi vipassanācittāni. Yaṃkiñcīti
analyzed: tikkha paññassa dve vipassanā cittāni manda paññassa tīṇi vipassanā cittāni yaṃkiñci iti

original: tīsu lakkhaṇesu aññataraṃ yaṃkiñci. Yāsikhāpattāsānulomāsaṅkhārupekkhāti matthakapattā
analyzed: tīsu lakkhaṇesu aññataram yaṃkiñci matthaka pattā

original: anulomañāṇasahitā yā saṅkhārupekkhā atthi. Sā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanātica vuccatīti
analyzed: anuloma ñāṇa sahitā yā saṅkhāra upekkhā atthi sā vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā ati ca vuccati iti

original: yojanā. Saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇanti imāni dve ñāṇāni vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanānāmāti
analyzed: yojanā saṅkhāra upekkhā ñāṇam anuloma ñāṇanti imāni dve ñāṇāni vuṭṭhāna gāmini vipassanā nāmā ti

original: vuccantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idaṃ pana paripākagatavipassanā dassanavacanaṃ. Etthaca vuṭṭhānanti
analyzed: vuccanti iti vuttam hoti idam pana paripāka gata vipassanā dassana vacanam ettha ca vuṭṭhānam ti

original: maggo vuccati. So hi vipassanāñāṇassa ārammaṇabhūta saṅkhāranimittatovā sayaṃ saṃyojanavatthubhāvatovā
analyzed: maggo vuccati saḥ hi vipassanā ñāṇassa saṅkhāra nimittataḥ vā sayam saṃyojana vatthu bhāvataḥ vā

original: vuṭṭhāti. Taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃvā puthujjanabhāvato samudayapahānavasena vaṭṭa pavattatoca
analyzed: vuṭṭhāti tam samaṅgi puggalam vā puthujjana bhāvataḥ samudaya pahāna vasena pavatta to ca

original: vuṭṭhāpeti. Tasmā vuṭṭhānanti vuccati. Avassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti etāyāti vuṭṭhānagāminīti
analyzed: vuṭṭhāpeti tasmai vuṭṭhānanti vuccati avassam vuṭṭhānam gacchanti etāya ati vuṭṭhāna gāminī iti

original: evaṃ dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vuṭṭhāna gāminibhāvo veditabbo. Tatoparanti dvinnaṃvā tiṇṇaṃvā
analyzed: evam dvinnam ñāṇānam vuṭṭhāna gāmini bhāvaḥ veditabbo dvinnam vā tiṇṇam vā

original: vipassanā cittānaṃ pavattiyā paraṃ nibbānaṃ ālambitvāti maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ
analyzed: vipassanā cittānaṃ pavattiyāḥ param nibbānam ālambitvā ti maggassa āvajjana ṭhāniyam

original: hutvā tassa purecarabhāvena nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Tato yevaca taṃ vipassanānāmaṃ
analyzed: hutvā tassa purecara bhāvena nibbānam eva ārammaṇam katvā tatas tam vipassanā nāmam

original: nalabhatīti. Puthujjana gottamabhibhavantanti etena gottaṃ bhavati abhibhavatīti
analyzed: na labhati iti puthujjana gottam abhibhavantanti etena gottam bhavati abhibhavati iti

original: gotrabhu. Gottanti cettha paripuṇṇakilesa samāyogena anariyabhāvasaṅkhātā puthujjanajāti
analyzed: ca ittha paripuṇṇa kilesa samāyogena anariya bhāva saṅkhātā puthujjana jāti

original: vuccatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Ariyagottamabhisambhontañcāti etena gottaṃ bhavati
analyzed: vuccati iti imam attham dasseti ariya gottam abhisambhontam ca ati etena gottam bhavati

original: pāpuṇātīti gotrabhu. Gottantica taṃtaṃ kilesa visuddhabhāva saṅkhātā ariyajāti vuccatīti
analyzed: pāpuṇāti iti taṃ tam kilesa visuddha bhāva saṅkhātā ariya jāti vuccati iti

original: imamatthaṃ dasseti. Maggo appanā vīthiṃ otaratīti sambandho. Dukkhasaccaṃparijānantoti
analyzed: imam attham dasseti maggaḥ appanā vīthim otarati iti sambandhaḥ dukkha saccaṃ parijānanto ti

original: tebhūmaka dhammānaṃ ekantadukkhabhāvaṃ paricchijja jānanto. Parijānanañcettha tesaṃ
analyzed: dhammānam ekanta dukkha bhāvam paricchijja jānantaḥ parijānanam ca ittha tesam

original: dukkhabhāva paṭicchādakassa sammohassa pahānameva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Samudaya saccaṃpajahantoti
analyzed: dukkha bhāva paṭicchādakassa sammohassa pahānam eva daṭṭhabbam samudaya saccam pajahanto ti

original: attano cittasantāne anusayabhāvena pavattamānaṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ samudayasaccaṃ ekadesenavā
analyzed: citta santāne anusaya bhāvena pavattamānam taṇhā saṅkhātam samudaya saccam eka desena vā

original: anavasesenavā apacchāvattikaṃ katvā pajahanto. Nirodhasaccaṃsacchikarontoti cakkhumā
analyzed: a pacchāvattikam katvā pajahantaḥ nirodha saccam sacchikarontaḥ ti cakkhumā

original: viya nabhamajjhe virocamānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ attano santāne ekadesassavā sakalassavā
analyzed: viya nabha majjhe virocamānam canda maṇḍalam attano santāne eka desassavā sakalassavā

original: kilesa vaṭṭassavā āyatiṃ bhāvino vipākavaṭṭassaṃvā attano santāne puna anuppādadhammabhāpattivasena
analyzed: āyatim bhāvinaḥ vipāka vaṭṭassa vā attano santāne puna anuppāda dhamma bhāpatti vasena

original: nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ paccakkhaṃ karonto. Maggasaccaṃbhāvanāvasenāti ito pubbe
analyzed: nirodha saṅkhātam nibbānam paccakkham karontaḥ magga saccaṃbhāvanā vasena ati itas pubbe

original: anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannapubbassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggasaccassa uppādanasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: anamatagge saṃsāre an uppanna pubbassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggasaccassa uppādana saṅkhātāya

original: bhāvanāya vasena. Maggacetanāya pana ānantarikaphalattā taṅkhaṇe apanītaggike padese
analyzed: bhāvanāya vasena magga cetanāya pana ānantarika phala ttā taṅkhaṇe apanīta aggike padese

original: puna udakaṃ āsiñcitvā nibbāpento viya maggānukūlapavattivasena dukkhaparijānanādīni
analyzed: punar udakam āsiñcitvā nibbāpentaḥ viya magga anukūla pavatti vasena dukkha parijānana ādīni

original: cattāri kiccāni anukubbantāni tatoparaṃ dvevā tīṇivā phalacittāni pavattanti. Tatoparaṃ
analyzed: cattāri kiccāni anukubbantāni tatas uparam dve vā tīṇi vā phala cittāni pavattanti tatas uparam

original: bhavaṅgapāto hotīti dassetuṃ tatoparantiādimāha. Yathā pana pasādacakkhunāvā dibbacakkhunāvā
analyzed: bhavaṅga pātaḥ hoti iti dassetum tatas uparan ti ādim āha yathā pana pasāda cakkhu nāvā dibba cakkhu nāvā

original: kiñcirūpaṃ passantassa tāni cakkhūni taṃ rūpaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā pacchā tassa puggalassapi
analyzed: kiñci rūpam passantassa tāni cakkhūni tam rūpam paccakkham katvā pacchā tassa puggalassa pi

original: paccakkhato pātubhūtaṃ katvā nirujjhanti. Na tāva tesaṃ uppattikkhaṇe taṃ rūpaṃ tassa
analyzed: paccakkhatas pātubhūtam katvā nirujjhanti na tāva tesam uppatti kkhaṇe tam rūpam tassa

original: ahaṃ idaṃnāma passāmīti pākaṭaṃ hoti. Pacchā pana paccavekkhana vāresu pavattamānesueva
analyzed: aham idaṃnāma passāmi iti pākaṭam hoti pacchā pana paccavekkhana vāresu pavattamānesu eva

original: taṃrūpaṃ tadanubandhāca nānākārā tassa pātubhūtā honti. Evamevaṃ idhapi paccavekkhanavāresu
analyzed: taṃrūpam tad anubandhā ca nānā ākārā tassa pātubhūtāḥ honti evam evam idha api paccavekkhana vāresu

original: pavattamānesueva nibbānañca tadanubandhāni maggaphalādīnica pātubhavantīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: pavattamānesu eva nibbānam ca tad anubandhāni magga phala ādīni ca pātubhavanti iti vuttam

original: punabhavaṅgaṃ.La. Pavattantīti. Idāni paccavekkhanañāṇassa bhūmiṃ dassetuṃ maggaṃphalañcanibbānantiādigātha
analyzed: pavattanti iti idāni paccavekkhana ñāṇassa bhūmim dassetum

original: māha. Tattha paṇḍitoti ariyāya paññāya samannāgato phalaṭṭho. Hīneti pahīne. Seseti
analyzed: mā āha tattha paṇḍito ti ariyāya paññāya samannāgato phala ṭṭho hīne iti pahīne sese iti

original: apahīne uparimaggavajjhe. Imāni pana dve pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhanāni kesañci
analyzed: apahīne upari magga vajjhe imāni pana dve pahīna avasiṭṭha kilesa paccavekkhanāni kesañci

original: jīvitasamasīsipuggalānaṃ kilesa vibhāgesu akovidānañca nalabbhantīti vuttaṃ paccavekkhativānavāti.
analyzed: jīvita sama sīsi puggalānam kilesa vibhāgesu akovidānam ca na labbhanti iti vuttam

original: Etthaca visuddhimagge tāva sabbapathamaṃ maggapaccavekkhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tato phalapaccavekkhanaṃ.
analyzed: ettha ca visuddhi magge tāva sabba pathamam magga paccavekkhanam vuttam tatas phala paccavekkhanam

original: Tato pahīnakilesapaccavekkhanaṃ. Tato avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhanaṃ. Avasāne nibbānapaccavekkhanaṃ
analyzed: tatas pahīna kilesa paccavekkhanam tatas avasiṭṭha kilesa paccavekkhanam avasāne nibbāna paccavekkhanam

original: vuttaṃ. Paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sabbapathamaṃ kilesapaccavekkhanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam paṭisambhidā magga ṭṭhakathāyam pana sabba pathamam kilesa paccavekkhanam adhippetam

original: Vuttañhi tattha paccavekkhanesu pathamaṃ kilesapaccavekkhanaṃ hoti. Tato maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhanānīti.
analyzed: vuttam hi tattha paccavekkhanesu pathamam kilesa paccavekkhanam hoti tatas magga phala nibbāna paccavekkhanāni iti

original: Taṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ paccavekkhana ñāṇassa niddesato pubbe pathamaṃ chinnamanupassane
analyzed: tam pana pāḷiyam paccavekkhana ñāṇassa niddesataḥ pubbe pathamam chinnam anupassane

original: paññāvimutti ñāṇanti evaṃ visuṃ vimuttiñāṇassa āgatattā vuttaṃ. Tattha chinnanti
analyzed: paññā vimutti ñāṇan ti evam visum vimutti ñāṇassa āgata ttā vuttam tattha chinna nti

original: tena tena maggena samucchinnaṃ kilesajātanti attho. Pāḷi anu sārena vuccamāne pana
analyzed: tena tena maggena samucchinnam kilesa jātanti sārena vuccamāne pana

original: pathamaṃ pahīnaṃ kilesānaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ. Tato paccekaṃ maggaṅgabojjhaṅgādīnaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ.
analyzed: pathamam pahīnam kilesānam paccavekkhanam tatas paccekam maggaṅga bojjhaṅga ādīnam paccavekkhanam

original: Tato tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtassa nibbānassa paccavekkhanaṃ. Tato phaladhammānaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ.
analyzed: tatas tesam ārammaṇa bhūtassa nibbānassa paccavekkhanam tatas phala dhammānam paccavekkhanam

original: Tato tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtassa nibbānassa paccavekkhananti vattabbaṃ hoti. Pāḷiyañhi
analyzed: tatas tesam ārammaṇa bhūtassa nibbānassa paccavekkhananti vattabbam hoti pāḷiyam hi

original: paccavekkhanañāṇaniddese nibbānaṃ maggavārepi phalavārepi dvikkhattuṃ āgatanti. Iti
analyzed: paccavekkhana ñāṇa niddese nibbānam magga vāre pi phala vāre pi dvi kkhattum āgatanti iti

original: nibbānapaccavekkhanaṃ nāma itaresaṃ paccavekkhanānaṃ ādimhivā majjhe antarantarāvā
analyzed: nibbāna paccavekkhanam nāma itaresam paccavekkhanānam ādimhi vā majjhe antarantarāvā

original: avasānevā yatthakatthaci pavattatīti siddhaṃ hoti. Tathā kilesapaccavekkhanaṃpi maggaphalapaccavekkhanānaṃ
analyzed: yattha katthaci pavattati iti siddham hoti tathā magga phala paccavekkhanānaṃ

original: ādimhivā pacchāvāti. Evañhi sati maggaṃ phalañca nibbānanti ayaṃ gāthāpi aviruddhā
analyzed: ādimhi vā pacchā vā ati evam hi sati maggam phalam ca nibbānam ti ayam gāthā api a viruddhā

original: hotīti. Evañca katvā adhimānaniddesaṭṭhakathāsu so hi maggaphalanibbāna pahīna kilesā
analyzed: hoti iti evam ca katvā adhimānaniddesaṭṭhakathāsu so hi kilesā

original: vasiṭṭhakilesa paccavekkhanena sañjātasomanasso ariyaguṇapaṭivedhe nikkaṅkhoti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: paccavekkhanena sañjāta somanassaḥ ariya guṇa paṭivedhe nikkaṅkhaḥ ti vuttam

original: Etthaca sotāpannassa pañca paccavekkhanāni honti. Tathā sakadāgāmissa pañca. Anāgāmissa
analyzed: ettha ca sotāpannassa pañca paccavekkhanāni honti tathā sakadāgāmissa pañca anāgāmissa

original: pañca. Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesonāma natthīti cattārīti ekūnavīsati paccavekkhanāni
analyzed: pañca arahataḥ pana avasiṭṭhakileso nāma natthi iti cattāri iti ekūnavīsati paccavekkhanāni

original: hontīti. Idañca paripuṇṇa vasena labbhamānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aparipuṇṇaṃpi pana
analyzed: honti iti idam ca paripuṇṇa vasena labbhamānam sandhāya vuttam aparipuṇṇam pi pana

original: hotiyeva. Tathā hi cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā
analyzed: tathā hi cūḷa dukkha kkhandha sutta aṭṭhakathā ayam sā pana na sabbesam paripuṇṇā

original: hoti. Eko hi pahīnakilesameva paccavekkhati. Eko avasiṭṭhakilesameva. Eko maggameva.
analyzed: hoti ekaḥ hi pahīna kilesam eva paccavekkhati ekaḥ avasiṭṭha kilesam eva ekaḥ maggam eva

original: Eko phalameva. Ekonibbānameva. Imāsu pana pañcasupaccavekkhanāsu ekaṃvādvevā no laddhuṃ
analyzed: ekaḥ phalam eva ekaḥ nibbānam eva imāsu pana pañcasu paccavekkhanāsu no laddhum

original: navaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ chabbisuddhikamena bhāvetabbo catubbidho maggo ñāṇadassanavisuddhināma
analyzed: navaṭṭati iti vuttam evam cha visuddhi kamena bhāvetabbaḥ catubbidhaḥ maggo ñāṇa dassana visuddhi nāma

original: vuccatīti sambandho. Maggasaddena cettha catubbidhaṃ maggañāṇaṃ tadanukūlapavattivasena
analyzed: vuccati iti sambandhaḥ magga saddena ca ittha catubbidham magga ñāṇam tad anukūla pavatti vasena

original: phalañāṇañca gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etthāti vipassanākammaṭṭhāne. Tatthāti tesu anupassanā
analyzed: phala ñāṇam ca gahitanti daṭṭhabbam ettha āti vipassanā kammaṭṭhāne tattha āti tesu anupassanā

original: maggaphalesu. Abhinivisanaṃ abhiniveso. Heṭṭhā silāpathaviyaṃ nikhātasinerupādassa
analyzed: magga phalesu abhinivisanam abhinivesaḥ heṭṭhā silā pathaviyam nikhāta sineru pādassa

original: viya ajjhattakhandhesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā pavattīti attho. Attā iti abhiniveso attābhiniveso.
analyzed: viya ajjhatta khandhesu daḷham gahetvā pavatti iti atthaḥ attā iti abhinivesaḥ atta abhinivesaḥ

original: Taṃ attābhinivesaṃ. Muñcantīti ajjhattadhammānaṃ kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitāya khaṇabhaṅgassaca
analyzed: tam atta abhinivesam muñcanti iti ajjhatta dhammānam kevalam vutti tāya khaṇa bhaṅgassa ca

original: adiṭṭhattā so abhiniveso pavattati. Tasmā taṃ dvayaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā rūpaṃ anattā
analyzed: a diṭṭha ttā saḥ abhinivesaḥ pavattati tasmā tam dvayam su diṭṭham katvā rūpam

original: vedanā anattātiādinā punappunaṃ samanupassanāvasena taṃ abhinivesaṃ vimocayamānāti
analyzed: vedanā anattā ati ādinā punappunam samanupassanā vasena tam abhinivesam vimocayamānā iti

original: attho. Vimokkhamukhaṃ hoti, suññatavimokkha saṅkhātassa maggassa phalassaca pavesanadvārabhūtattā,
analyzed: atthaḥ vimokkha mukham hoti suññata vimokkha saṅkhātassa maggassa phalassa ca pavesana dvāra bhūta ttā

original: vipallāsa nimittanti viparītavasena āsanaṃ upagamanaṃ pavattanaṃvā vipallāso. Anicce
analyzed: vipallāsa nimittam ti viparīta vasena āsanam upagamanam pavattanam vā vipallāsaḥ anicce

original: niccanti upagamanaṃ pavattanaṃvāti attho. So eva kile suppattiyā āsannakāraṇattā
analyzed: niccanti upagamanam pavattanam vā ti attho so eva kile suppattiyāḥ āsanna kāraṇa ttā

original: nimittanti vipallāsanimittaṃ. Muñcantīti ajjhattadhammānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgassa adiṭṭhattā
analyzed: nimittam ti vipallāsa nimittam muñcanti iti ajjhatta dhammānam khaṇabhaṅgassa a diṭṭha ttā

original: taṃnimittaṃ hotīti tesaṃ khaṇabhaṅgaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā rūpaṃ aniccaṃ vedanā aniccātiādinā
analyzed: taṃnimittam hoti iti tesam khaṇabhaṅgam su diṭṭham katvā rūpam aniccam vedanā anicca ati ādinā

original: punappunaṃ samanupassanāvasena taṃnimittaṃ vimocayamānāti attho. Taṇhāpaṇidhinti
analyzed: punappunam samanupassanā vasena tad nimittam vimocayamānā ati attho taṇhā paṇidhim ti

original: taṇhāeva abhisaṅgavasena ārammaṇe cittassa paṇidahanato daḷhaṃ thapanato paṇidhīti
analyzed: taṇhā eva abhisaṅga vasena ārammaṇe cittassa paṇidahanataḥ daḷham thapanataḥ paṇidhi iti

original: taṇhāpaṇidhi. Taṃtaṇhā paṇidhiṃ. Muñcantīti ajjhattadhammānaṃ mahāādīnavarāsibhāvassa
analyzed: taṇhā paṇidhi tat taṇhā paṇidhim muñcanti iti ajjhatta dhammānam mahā ādīnava rāsi bhāvassa

original: adiṭṭhattā sopaṇidhi hotīti tesaṃ mahāādīnavarāsibhāvaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā rūpaṃdukkhaṃ
analyzed: a diṭṭha ttā sa upaṇidhi hoti iti tesam mahā ādīnava rāsi bhāvam su diṭṭham katvā rūpaṃdukkham

original: vedanādukkhātiādinā punappunaṃ samanupassanāvasena taṃpaṇidhiṃ vimocayamānāti attho.
analyzed: vedanā dukkha āti ādinā punappunam samanupassanā vasena taṃ paṇidhim vimocayamānā iti atthaḥ

original: Tasmāti yasmā etā vimokkhamukhabhūtā tisso anupassanā evaṃ visesa nāmikā honti. Tasmā.
analyzed: tasmā ti yasmā etāḥ vimokkha mukha bhūtā tissaḥ anupassanāḥ evam visesa nāmikāḥ honti tasmā

original: Yasmā saṅkhāresu suññatadassanavasena atthasiddhināma kevalaṃ attākinivesabhūtassa
analyzed: saṅkhāresu suññata dassana vasena attha siddhi nāma kevalam

original: diṭṭhigāhassa paṭipakkhabhūtassa ñāṇasseva ānubhāvo hoti, tasmā tathā samanupassitvā
analyzed: diṭṭhi gāhassa paṭipakkha bhūtassa ñāṇassa iva ānubhāvaḥ hoti tasmā tathā samanupassitvā

original: vimuñcantassa vipassanāpi maggopi sahajātañāṇa kiccena nāmaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ yadivuṭṭhāna.La.
analyzed: vimuñcantassa vipassanā api maggaḥ api sahajāta ñāṇa kiccena nāmam labhati iti vuttam

original: Suññatovimokkho nāmahotimaggoti. Aniccadassanavasena atthasiddhināma nimittāti nivesabhūtassa
mānagāhassa paṭipakkhabhūtāya saddhāyapi ānubhāvo. Tasmā tathā samanupassitvā vimuccantassa
analyzed: māna gāhassa paṭipakkha bhūtāya ānubhāvaḥ tasmai tathā samanupassitvā vimuccantassa

original: vipassanāpi maggopi sahajātasaddhā kiccena nāmaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ yadianiccato.La.
analyzed: vipassanā api maggaḥ api sahajāta saddhā kiccena nāmam labhati iti vuttam

original: Animitto vimokkhonāmāti. Dukkhadassanavasena atthasiddhināma paṇidhisaṅkhāta taṇhāgāhapaṭipakkhabhūtassa

original: samādhissapi ānubhāvo. Tasmā tathā samanupassitvā vimuccantassa vipassanāpi maggopi
analyzed: samādhiḥ api ānubhāvaḥ tasmā tathā samanupassitvā vimuccantassa vipassanā api maggaḥ api

original: sahajātasamādhikiccena nāmaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ. Yadi dukkhato. La. Appaṇihito vimokkhonāmāti.
analyzed: sahajāta samādhi kiccena nāmam labhati iti vuttam yadi dukkhataḥ appaṇihitaḥ vimokkhaḥ nāma ati

original: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti.
analyzed: vuttam ha etam paṭisambhidā magge aniccataḥ manasikarotaḥ saddhi indriyam adhimattam hoti

original: Dukkhato manasikaroto samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Anattato manasikaroto paññindriyaṃ
analyzed: dukkhataḥ manasikaroto samādhi indriyam adhimattam hoti anattataḥ manasikaroto paññindriyam

original: adhimattaṃ hotīti. Magge pana tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccavisesonāma vipassanāgamanavaseneva
analyzed: adhimattam hoti iti magge pana tiṇṇam dhammānam kicca visesaḥ nāma vipassanā gamana vasena iva

original: siddhoti vuttaṃ maggo. La. Nāmāni labhatīti. Tattha suññatavimokkhena vimutto ariyasāvako

original: sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārīnāma hoti. Majjhe chasu maggaphalakkhaṇesu diṭṭhippatto
analyzed: sotāpatti magga kkhaṇe dhammānusārī nāma hoti majjhe chasu magga phalakkhaṇesu diṭṭhippatto

original: nāma. Arahattaphalakkhaṇe paññāvimuttonāma. Animittavimokkhena vimutto sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe
analyzed: nāma arahatta phala kkhaṇe paññā vimutto nāma animitta vimokkhena vimutto sotāpatti magga kkhaṇe

original: saddhānusārīnāma. Upari sattasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimuttonāma. Apaṇihitavimokkhena vimutto
analyzed: saddhā anusārī nāma upari sattasu ṭhānesu saddhā vimuttaḥ nāma apaṇihita vimokkhena vimuttaḥ

analyzed: pana aṭṭhasu pi ṭhānesu kāyasakkhi nāma arūpa jhānam pādakam katvā vimuttaḥ

original: arahattaphale ṭhito ubhatobhāgavimutto nāmāti ettāvatā yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ vipassanāparipākamāgammāti
analyzed: arahatta phale ṭhitaḥ ubhatobhāgavimutto nāma ati ettāvatā yat heṭṭhā vuttam vipassanā paripākam āgamma ati

original: saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvappattiyāceva sattaariyapuggalavibhāgassa
analyzed: saṅkhāra upekkhā bhāvam patvā tividha vimokkha mukha bhāva ppattiyā ca iva satta ariya puggala vibhāgassa

analyzed: paccaya bhāva ppattiyā ca vipassanā ñāṇassa paripākam āgamma paṭicca ati tam sarūpato

original: niddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti. Maggavīthiyaṃ phalañca maggāgamana vasena tathā tīṇi nāmāni labhatīti
analyzed: niddiṭṭham hoti iti magga vīthiyam phalam ca magga āgamana vasena tathā tīṇi nāmāni labhati iti

original: yojanā. Yathāvuttanayena vipassantānanti yadi anattato vipassatītiādinā vuttappakāranayena
analyzed: yojanā yathā vutta nayena yadi anattataḥ vipassati iti ādinā vutta ppakāra nayena

original: vipassantānaṃ catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānaṃ. Yathāsakaṃphalanti sotāpannassa sotāpattiphalaṃ.
analyzed: vipassantānam catunnam phala ṭṭhānam puggalānam yathāsakaṃ phalanti sotāpannassa sotāpatti phalam

original: Sakadāgāmissa sakadāgāmiphalantiādinā nayena attano attano santakabhūtaṃ yaṃ yaṃ
analyzed: sakadāgāmissa sakadāgāmi phala nti ādinā nayena attanaḥ attanaḥ santaka bhūtam yaṃ yaṃ

original: phalaṃ vipassanāgamana vaseneva suññatādivimokkhotica vuccati. Namaggāgamanavasenāti
analyzed: phalam vipassanā āgamana vasena iva vuccati na magga āgamana vasena ati

original: adhippāyo. Etthaca vipassanāgamana vasena maggassa animitta nāmalābhonāma suttantikapariyāyena
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ ettha ca vipassanā gamana vasena maggassa animitta nāma lābhaḥ nāma suttantika pariyāyena

original: vutto. Abhidhamme pana animitto nāmamaggo naāgato. Nahi so nippariyāyato animittonāma
analyzed: vuttaḥ abhidhamme pana animittaḥ nāma maggaḥ na āgataḥ nahi saḥ nippariyāyataḥ animittaḥ nāma

original: hoti. Hīnapaṇītādivasena vibhāgārahassa saṅkhāranimittassa sabbhāvato. Teneva hissa
analyzed: hoti hīna paṇīta ādi vasena vibhāga arahassa saṅkhāra nimittassa sabbhāvataḥ tena iva hi ssa

original: dukkhapaṭipadā dandhā bhiññādivasenavā pāramidhammānaṃ parittamahantādivasenavā hīna
analyzed: dukkha paṭipadāḥ dandhāḥ bhiññā ādi vasena vā pārami dhammānam paritta mahanta ādi vasena vā hīna

original: paṇīta paṇītatara paṇītatama vibhāgo sandissatīti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aniccānupassanā

original: saṅkhāresu niccanimittaṃ vidhamanavasena pavattattā animittānupassanānāma samānāpi
analyzed: saṅkhāresu nicca nimittam vidhamana vasena pavatta ttā animitta anupassanā nāma samānā api

original: sayaṃ saṅkhāranimitte pariyāpannattā ekantena attanonāmaṃ maggassa dātuṃ nasakkoti.
analyzed: sayam saṅkhāra nimitte pariyāpanna ttā ekantena attano nāmam maggassa dātum na sakkoti

original: Tasmā maggo abhidhamma pariyāyena animittanāmaṃ nalabhatīti vuttaṃ. Suttantikapariyāyena
analyzed: tasmā maggaḥ abhidhamma pariyāyena a nimitta nāmam na labhati iti vuttam suttantika pariyāyena

original: pana yathā pathavikasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ pathavikasiṇanti vuccati. Evaṃ suññatādināmaṃ
analyzed: pana yathā pathavi kasiṇa ārammaṇam jhānam pathavi kasiṇanti vuccati evam suññatā ādi nāmam

original: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattāni maggaphalānipi ārammaṇavasenapi suññatādināmaṃ
analyzed: nibbānam ārammaṇam katvā pavattāni magga phalāni pi ārammaṇa vasena api suññatā ādi nāmam

original: labhanti. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pana sampayogavasenavā palibodhakarāca nimittakarāca
analyzed: labhanti ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena pana sampayoga vasena vā palibodha karāca nimitta karāca

original: paṇidhikarāca rāgādayo kilesadhammā tesu natthi. Tasmā tāni aññaṃ āgamanaṃvā ārammaṇaṃvā
analyzed: rāga ādayaḥ kilesa dhammā tesu natthi tasmā tāni aññam āgamanam vā ārammaṇam vā

original: anapekkhitvā attano sabhāvenapi suññatādināmaṃ labhantīti dassetuṃ ārammaṇavasenātiādi
analyzed: an apekkhitvā attanaḥ sabhāvena api suññatā ādi nāmam labhanti iti dassetum ārammaṇa vasena atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha sarasavasenāti attano sabhāvena. Nāmattayanti suññatādi nāmattikaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam tattha sa rasa vasena āti attanaḥ sabhāvena nāmattayanti suññatā ādi nāmattikam

original: Sabbatthāti sabbāsu maggavīthi phalasamāpattivīthīsu. Sabbesaṃpīti sabbesaṃpi maggaphalānaṃ.
analyzed: sabbattha ati sabbāsu magga vīthi phala samāpatti vīthīsu sabbesaṃ pi iti sabbesam pi magga phalānaṃ

original: Samamevāti samānameva. Sadisameva. Etthapanāti etesu pana yathāvuttesu maggaphalesu.
analyzed: samam eva ati samānam eva sadisam eva ettha pana ati etesu pana yathā vuttesu magga phalesu

original: Yasmā sabbādiṭṭhiyoca soḷasavidhā vicikicchāca attadiṭṭhimūlikā eva honti. Attadiṭṭhiyā
analyzed: yasmā soḷasavidhāḥ vicikicchā ca atta diṭṭhi mūlikāḥ eva honti atta diṭṭhiyā

original: niruddhāya nirujjhanti sabbānica apāyagāmi kammānināma attadiṭṭhiyā satiyāeva vipaccanti.
analyzed: niruddhāya nirujjhanti sabbāni ca apāya gāmi kammāni nāma atta diṭṭhiyā satiyā eva vipaccanti

original: Asatiyā na vipaccanti. Diṭṭhasaccānañca sā diṭṭhi sabbaso pahīnā hoti. Tasmā sotāpattimaggaṃ.La.
analyzed: asatiyā na vipaccanti sā diṭṭhi sabbaso pahīnā hoti tasmā

original: Pahīnāpāya gamanoti vuttaṃ. Apāyaṃ gacchanti etehīti apāyagamanāni. Diṭṭhivicikicchāvippayuttā
analyzed: pahīna apāya gamanā ti vuttam apāyam gacchanti etehi iti apāya gamanāni diṭṭhi vicikicchā vippayuttā

original: akusaladhammāceva pubbekataduccaritakammānica. Pahīnāni apāyagamanāni etassāti pahīnāpāyagamano.
analyzed: akusala dhammā ca iva pubbekata duccarita kammāni ca pahīnāni apāya gamanāni etassa ati pahīna apāya gamanaḥ

original: Paṭividdhacatusaccānaṃ pahīnaattadiṭṭhīnaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammā ekantena uparūpari
analyzed: paṭividdha catu saccānam pahīna atta diṭṭhīnam bodhi pakkhiya dhammāḥ ekantena upari upari

original: vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhitā honti. Kilesadhammā pana hāyanapakkhe. Tasmā te anukkamena parihāyitvā
analyzed: vaḍḍhana pakkhe ṭhitāḥ honti kilesa dhammāḥ pana hāyana pakkhe tasmā te anukkamena

original: gacchantā uparima koṭiyā sattahi bhavehi sabbaso parikkhayaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ sattakkhattuparamosotāpannonāma
analyzed: gacchantāḥ sattahi bhavehi sabbaso parikkhayam gacchanti iti vuttam

original: hotīti, tattha sattakkhattusaddena sattapaṭisandhigahaṇavārā vuccanti. Paramoti ukkaṃsaparicchedo.
analyzed: hoti iti tattha sattakkhattu saddena satta paṭisandhi gahaṇa vārāḥ vuccanti paramaḥ ti ukkaṃsa paricchedaḥ

original: Iti sattakkhattuṃ paramo etassāti. Sattakkhattuparamo. So pana devesu sattakkhattu
analyzed: iti satta kkhattum paramaḥ etassa ati satta kkhattu paramaḥ saḥ pana devesu satta kkhattu

original: paramo, manussesu sattakkhattu paramo, ubhayattha sattakkhattu paramoti tividho hoti. Yathāha –
analyzed: paramaḥ manussesu sattakkhattu paramaḥ ubhayattha sattakkhattu paramaḥ ti tividhaḥ hoti yathā āha

original: Katamoca puggalo sattakkhattuparamo idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā
analyzed: katamaḥ ca puggalo satta kkhattu paramaḥ idha ekaccaḥ puggalo tiṇṇam saṃyojanānam parikkhayā

original: sotāpanno hoti, avinipātadhammo niyato, sambodhiparāyano, so sattakkhattuṃ deveca
analyzed: sotāpannaḥ hoti a vinipāta dhammaḥ niyataḥ sambodhi parāyano so sattakkhattum

original: manusseca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo sattakkhattu paramoti.
analyzed: sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantam karoti ayam vuccati puggalo sattakkhattu paramaḥ ti

original: Ettha hi ca saddo aniyamattho. Etena yoca deveeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsarati. Yoca manusseeva
analyzed: ettha hi ca saddaḥ aniyama atthaḥ etena yaḥ ca deve eva satta kkhattum saṃsarati yaḥ ca manusse eva

original: sattakkhattuṃ saṃsarati. Yoca deveca manusseca missakabhava vasena sattakkhattuṃ
analyzed: satta kkhattum saṃsarati yaḥ ca deve ca manusse ca missaka bhava vasena satta kkhattum

original: saṃsarati. Tividho peso sattakkhattu paramonāmāti dasseti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana missakabhava
analyzed: saṃsarati tividhaḥ pesaḥ sattakkhattu paramaḥ nāma ati dasseti aṭṭhakathāyam pana missaka bhava

original: vasenassa attho vutto. Etthaca yasmā mahaggatajjhānassaca uparimagga vipassanā yaca
analyzed: atthaḥ vuttaḥ ettha ca yasmā mahaggata jhānassa ca upari magga vipassanā

original: ānubhāvaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ imassa maggassa ānubhāvagatiyā eva sattakkhattuparamonāma
analyzed: ānubhāvam an apekkhitvā kevalam imassa maggassa ānubhāva gatiyā eva satta kkhattu paramaḥ nāma

original: vutto. Soca pāḷiyaṃ katamesaṃ pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā. Sattakkhattuparamassa kolaṃ
analyzed: vuttaḥ so ca pāḷiyam katamesam pañcannam idha niṭṭhā satta kkhattu paramassa kolaṃ

original: kolassa ekabījissa sakadāgāmissa yoca diṭṭhevadhamme arahāti vuttattā kāmabhaveeva
analyzed: kolassa ekabījissa sakadāgāmissa yaḥ ca diṭṭhe va dhamme arahā ati vutta ttā kāma bhave eva

original: jhānarahito sukkhavipassakovā parihīnajjhānovā daṭṭhabbo. Tenevaca paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭha
analyzed: jhāna rahitaḥ sukkha vipassakaḥ vā parihīna jjhānaḥ vā daṭṭhabbo tena iva ca

original: kathāyaṃ tayopi ime sotāpannā kāmabhavavasena vuttā. Rūpārūpabhave pana bahukāpi
analyzed: kathā ayam ime sā utāpannā kāma bhava vasena vuttā rūpa arūpa bhave pana bahukā api

original: paṭisandhiyo gaṇhantīti vuttaṃ. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca aṭṭhamaṃ bhavanti kāmabhave
analyzed: paṭisandhiyaḥ gaṇhanti iti vuttam aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca aṭṭhamam bhavanti kāma bhave

original: aṭṭhamaṃ paṭisandhinti vuttaṃ. Tasmā ye kāmabhaveyeva sattavārato oraṃvā diṭṭhadhamme
analyzed: aṭṭhamam paṭisandhin ti vuttam tasmā ye satta vārato diṭṭhadhamme

original: yevavā uparimaggaṃ gaṇhanti. Tesaṃ tathārūpo pavattiviseso upari maggavipassanābalena
analyzed: upari maggam gaṇhanti tesam tathārūpaḥ pavatti visesaḥ upari magga vipassanā balena

original: siddhoti veditabbo. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyāmetīti
analyzed: siddhaḥ ti veditabbaḥ tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu upari tiṇṇam maggānam vipassanā niyāmeti iti

original: vuttaṃ. Ye pana diṭṭhadhammevā sakkaanāthapiṇḍikavisākhādayo viya sattasu bhavesu
analyzed: vuttam ye pana sakka anāthapiṇḍika visākha ādayaḥ viya sattasu bhavesu

original: yatthakatthaci bhavevā jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmalokaṃ gacchanti. Yeca brahmalokeyeva
analyzed: yattha katthacid jhānam uppādetvā brahma lokam gacchanti ye ca brahma lokeya iva

original: sotāpattimaggaṃ labhitvā tattheva parinibbāyanti. Tesaṃ tathārūpo pavatti viseso
analyzed: sotāpatti maggaṃ labhitvā tattha iva parinibbāyanti tesam tathārūpaḥ pavatti viseso

original: mahaggatajjhānabalena siddhoti. Yasmāca pāḷiyaṃ sattakkhattuṃ devecāti etena kāmabhave
analyzed: mahaggata jhāna balena siddhaḥ iti yasmā ca pāḷiyam sattakkhattum etena kāma bhave

original: satta opapātika paṭisandhiyo dasseti. Sattakkhattuṃ manussecāti etena satta gabbhaseyyakapaṭisandhiyo
analyzed: satta opapātika paṭisandhiyaḥ dasseti satta kkhattum etena satta gabbhaseyyaka paṭisandhiyaḥ

original: dassetīti ubhayena cuddasa paṭisandhiyo dassitā honti. Tasmā tena pariyāyena labbhamāne
analyzed: dasseti iti ubhayena cuddasa paṭisandhiyaḥ dassitāḥ honti tasmā tena pariyāyena labbhamāne

original: cuddasabhave sandhāya sakkapañhasutte –
analyzed: cuddasa bhave sandhāya sakka pañha sutte

original: Ito satta tato satta, saṃsarāni catuddasāti vuttaṃ. Tathā aṅguttareca tikanipāte
analyzed: itas satta tatas satta saṃsarāni catuddasa iti vuttam tathā aṅguttare ca tika nipāte

original: sace udāyi ānando avitarāgo kālaṃ kareyya, tena cittapasādena sattakkhattuṃ devesu
analyzed: sace udāyi ānandaḥ avita rāgaḥ kālam kareyya tena citta pasādena sattakkhattum devesu

original: devarajjaṃ kareyya. Sattakkhattuṃ imasmiṃyeva jambudīpe mahārajjaṃ kareyya. Apica
analyzed: deva rajjam kareyya sattakkhattum imasmin yeva jambudīpe mahā rajjam kareyya apica

original: udāyi ānando diṭṭhevadhamme parinibbā yissatīti vuttaṃ. Keci pana imehi suttapadehi
analyzed: udāyi ānandaḥ diṭṭhe iva dhamme parinibbā yissati iti vuttam keci pana imehi sutta padehi

original: sattakkhattu paramassa sotāpannassa kāmabhave cuddasa paṭisandhiyo icchanti. Mahāvaggasaṃyuttaṭīkāyañca
analyzed: sattakkhattu paramassa sotāpannassa kāma bhave cuddasa paṭisandhiyaḥ icchanti mahāvaggasaṃyutta ṭīkāyañca

original: keci pana kāmabhave sattakkhattuṃeva uppajjati, na tato uddhanti vadanti. Taṃ vīmaṃsitabbanti
analyzed: keci pana kāma bhave satta kkhattum eva uppajjati na tatas uddhan ti vadanti tam vīmaṃsitabbanti

original: vuttaṃ. Vibhaṅge pana tattha tattha aṭṭhānasuttesuca aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno
analyzed: vuttam vibhaṅge pana tattha tattha aṭṭhāna suttesu ca aṭṭhānam etam anavakāsaḥ yam diṭṭhi sampanno

original: puggalo aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbatteyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatītica, aṅguttare chakkanipāte
analyzed: puggalaḥ aṭṭhamam bhavam nibbatteyya na etam ṭhānam vijjati iti ca aṅguttare chakkanipāte

original: abhabbo diṭṭhasampanno puggalo aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetunti ca, mahāniddese ajitapañhe
analyzed: abhabbaḥ diṭṭha sampannaḥ puggalo aṭṭhamam bhavam nibbattetun ti ca mahāniddese ajitapañhe

original: sohāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa, nirodhena sattabhave thapetvā anama
analyzed: sohāpatti magga ñāṇena abhisaṅkhāra viññāṇassa nirodhena satta bhave thapetvā anama

original: taggesaṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti. Vūpasamanti. Atthaṃ
analyzed: ye uppajjeyyum nāman ca rūpam ca ettha ete nirujjhanti vūpasamanti attham

original: gacchanti. Paṭipassambhantītica, evaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā yathāvuttanayeneva tesaṃ
analyzed: gacchanti paṭipassambhanti iti ca evam daḷham katvā vutta ttā yathā vutta nayena iva tesam

original: suttapadānaṃ attho veditabboti. Rāgadosamohānanti kāmarāgassa dosassa tadekaṭṭhamohassaca.
analyzed: sutta padānam attho veditabbo ti rāga dosa mohānam ti kāma rāgassa dosassa tad ekaṭṭha mohassa ca

original: Tanukarattāti yathā sotāpannasantāne uppajjantā dhammikesu kāmavatthūsu balavantā
analyzed: tanukara ttā ti yathā sotāpanna santāne uppajjantā dhammikesu kāma vatthūsu balavantā

original: hutvā uppajjanti. Yato tesaṃ methunavatthusamāyogopi pavattati, tathā uppajjituṃ
analyzed: hutvā uppajjanti yatas tesam methuna vatthu samāyogaḥ api pavattati tathā uppajjitum

original: asamatthe katvā saṃlikhanavasena tanukaraṇato. Adhiccuppattivasenaca pariyuṭṭhānamandatāvasenaca
analyzed: asamatthe katvā saṃlikhana vasena tanu karaṇataḥ adhiccuppatti vasena ca pariyuṭṭhāna manda tā vasena ca

original: tanukabhāvaṃ sādhanatoti attho. Tattha adhiccuppattivasenāti kadāci cirena uppattivasena.
analyzed: tanuka bhāvam sādhanato ti attho tattha adhicca uppatti vasena ati kadāci cirena uppatti vasena

original: Pariyuṭṭhānamandatāyāti cirena uppajjantānaṃpi mandataraṃ pariyuṭṭhānavasena. Mahāsivattherena
analyzed: pariyuṭṭhāna manda tāya ati cirena uppajjantānam api mandataram pariyuṭṭhāna vasena mahāsivattherena

original: pana tesaṃpi methunavatthu samāyogo icchito. So mahāṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhitto. Yañca
analyzed: pana tesam pi methuna vatthu samāyogaḥ icchito saḥ mahā aṭṭhakathā ayam paṭikkhittaḥ yat ca

original: chakkanipāte migāsālavatthumhi abrahmacārinopi isidattassa brāhmaṇassa sakadāgāmittaṃ
analyzed: chakka nipāte migāsālavatthumhi abrahmacārino pi isidattassa brāhmaṇassa

original: bhagavatā byākataṃ, taṃpi tassa āsannamaraṇakāle adhigamavasena byākatanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhagavatā byākatam tat pi tassa āsanna maraṇa kāle adhigama vasena byākatam ti veditabbam

original: Sakiṃdeva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā āgamanato sakadāgāmīnāma hotīti yojanā. Yamettha vattabbaṃ,
analyzed: sakiṃdevaḥ imam lokam āgantvā āgamanataḥ sakadāgāmī nāma hoti iti yojanā yam ettha vattabbam

original: taṃ heṭṭhā pathamaparicchede vuttameva. Arahattaṃbhāvetvāti arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetvākhīṇā
analyzed: tat heṭṭhā pathama paricchede vuttam eva arahattam bhāvetvā ati arahatta maggam bhāvetvā akhīṇā

original: cattāro āsavā yassāti khīṇāsavo. Dakkhiṇā vuccati kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvā
analyzed: cattāro āsavāḥ yassa ati khīṇa āsavaḥ dakkhiṇā vuccati kammañca kamma phalañca saddahitvā

original: āyatiṃ phalapaṭilābhatthāya dinnadānaṃ. Dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etāyāti katvā.
analyzed: āyatim phala paṭilābha atthāya dinna dānam dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti sattāḥ etāya ati katvā

original: Tāya pana dakkhiṇāya vipattikarānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso abhāvato sampattikarānañca
analyzed: tāya pana dakkhiṇāya vipatti karānam kilesānam sabbasas abhāvataḥ sampatti karānam ca

original: sīlakkhandhādiguṇānaṃ sabbaso paripuṇṇattā dakkhiṇeyyesu aggo jeṭṭhako hutvā taṃdakkhiṇaṃ
analyzed: sīla kkhandha ādi guṇānam sabbaso paripuṇṇa ttā dakkhiṇeyyesu aggaḥ jeṭṭhakaḥ hutvā taṃ dakkhiṇam

original: paṭiggahituṃ arahatīti aggadakkhiṇeyyo. Puggalabhedoti catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhapuggalānaṃ
analyzed: paṭiggahitum arahati iti aggadakkhiṇeyyaḥ puggala bhedaḥ ti catunnam phala ṭṭha puggalānam

original: saṅkhepabhedo. Vitthārabhedo pana evaṃ veditabbo, aṭṭhakathāsu tāva catuvīsati sotāpannā,
analyzed: saṅkhepa bhedaḥ vitthāra bhedaḥ pana evam veditabbo aṭṭhakathāsu tāva catuvīsati sotāpannā

original: dvādasa sakadāgāmino, aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino, dvādasa arahantoti phalaṭṭhānaṃ channavutibhedo
analyzed: dvādasa sakadāgāmino aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino dvādasa arahanto ti phalaṭṭhānam channavuti bhedo

original: vutto. Tattha saddhādhimutto paññādhimuttoti dve sotāpannā honti. Te ekabījī kolaṃkolo
analyzed: vutto tattha saddhā adhimutto paññā adhimutto ti dve sotāpannā honti te eka bījī kolaṃkolo

original: sattakkhattuparamocāti tīhi guṇitā cha. Puna catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā catuvīsati
analyzed: tīhi guṇitā cha puna catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā catuvīsati

original: honti. Tividha vimokkhacatupaṭipadānaṃ pana bhedena dvādasa sakadāgāmino dvādasa
analyzed: honti pana bhedena dvādasa sakadāgāminaḥ dvādasa

original: arahantoca honti. Anāgāmino pana avihesu tāva tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahacca
analyzed: arahanto ca honti anāgāminaḥ pana avihesu tāva tayo antarā parinibbāyinaḥ ekaḥ

original: parinibbāyī, eko uddhaṃ soto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca. Teyeva sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī
analyzed: parinibbāyī ekaḥ uddham sotaḥ akaniṭṭha gāmī iti pañca te yeva sa saṅkhāra parinibbāyī

original: asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīcāti dvīhi guṇitā dasa. Tathā atappasu dassasudassīsu ticattālīsa
analyzed: dvīhi guṇitāḥ dasa tathā atappasu dassa sudassīsu ticattālīsa

original: honti. Akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīnāma natthīti cattāro sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino
analyzed: honti akaniṭṭhe pana akaniṭṭha gāmī nāma natthi iti cattāro sa saṅkhāra parinibbāyino

original: cattāro asaṅkhāraparinibbāyinoti aṭṭhāti. Sabbe aṭṭhacattālīsa hontīti. Suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: cattāro asaṅkhāra parinibbāyino ti aṭṭha ati sabbe aṭṭha cattālīsa honti iti sutta nipāta ṭṭhakathā ayam

original: pana dvādasa sotāpannā, dvādasa sakadāgāmino, catuvīsati anāgāmino, dve arahanto,
analyzed: pana dvādasa sotāpannāḥ dvādasa sakadāgāmino catuvīsati anāgāminaḥ dve arahanto

original: cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa honti. Teyeva saddhādhura paññādhura vasena dvīhi
analyzed: cattāraḥ maggaṭṭhā ti catupaññāsa honti teyeva saddhādhura paññādhura vasena dvīhi

original: guṇitā aṭṭhasataṃ puggalā hontīti āgato. Etthāti etasmiṃ puggalabhede. Sabbesaṃpīti
analyzed: guṇitāḥ aṭṭhasatam puggalāḥ honti iti āgataḥ ettha ati etasmin puggala bhede sabbesam pi iti

original: catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃpi sādhāraṇāva. Na nirodhasamāpatti viya ekaccānaṃeva sādhāraṇāti
analyzed: catunnam na nirodha samāpatti

original: adhippāyo. Ativiya mamāyitassa abhinindi tassa ajjhositassa attano cittasantānassa
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ ativiya mamāyitassa abhininditassa ajjhositassa attano citta santānassa

original: apavattikaraṇaṃ nāma bahalarāgavimuttānaṃeva sijjhatīti vuttaṃ, anāgāmīnañceva arahantānañcalabbhatīti.
analyzed: apavatti karaṇam nāma bahala rāga vimuttānam eva sijjhati iti vuttam anāgāmīnam ca iva arahantānam ca labbhati iti

original: Tesaṃpi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnaṃ kāmarūpabhavagatānaññeva idha gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: tesam pi aṭṭha samāpatti lābhīnam idha gahaṇam daṭṭhabbaṃ

original: Kasmā, ādito paṭṭhāya anupubbanirodhabaleneva gantabbattā. Tenāha tatthātiādi. Tatrāyaṃ
analyzed: kasmai āditaḥ paṭṭhāya anupubba nirodha balena iva gantabba ttā tena āha tattha atiādi tatra ayam

original: vidhi, pathamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha gate saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato
analyzed: vidhi pathama jhānam samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha gate saṅkhāre aniccataḥ dukkhato

original: anattato vipassati. Tato dutīyajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate saṅkhāre
analyzed: anattataḥ vipassati tatas dutīya jhānam samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate saṅkhāre

original: tatheva vipassati. Tato tatīyaṃ jhānaṃ. Tato catutthaṃ jhānaṃ. Tato pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ.
analyzed: tathā iva vipassati tatas tatīyam jhānam tatas catuttham jhānam tatas pañcamam jhānam

original: Tato ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ. Tato viññāṇañcā yatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate
analyzed: tatas ākāsānañcāyatanam tatas viññāṇañcā yatanam samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate

original: saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati. Tato ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya nānābaddhaavikopanaṃ
analyzed: saṅkhāre tathā iva vipassati tatas ākiñcaññāyatanam samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya nānā baddha a vikopanam

original: saṅghapatimānanaṃ satthupakkosanaṃ addhāna paricchedoti imaṃ catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ
analyzed: saṅgha pati mānanam satthu pakkosanam addhāna paricchedaḥ ti imam catubbidham pubba kiccam

original: karoti. Tato nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati. Ekaṃvā dvevā cittavāre atikkamitvā
analyzed: karoti tatas na ivasaññā na asaññāyatanam samāpajjati ekam vā dve vā citta vāre atikkamitvā

original: acittako hoti nirodhaṃ phusatīti. Tatthatatthevāti tato tato jhānato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
analyzed: acittakaḥ hoti nirodham phusati iti tattha tattha iva ati tatas tatas jhānato tasmim tasmim

original: vuṭṭhitakāleeva. Vipassantoti nirodhassa samatha vipassanā yuganandhabaleneva pattabbattā
analyzed: vuṭṭhita kāle eva vipassanto ti nirodhassa samatha vipassanā yuga nandha balena iva pattabba ttā

original: vipassanābalenapi cittasantānassa saṇhasukhumabhāvā pādanatthaṃ idaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ
analyzed: vipassanā balena api citta santānassa saṇha sukhuma bhāvā pādanattham idam pathamajjhānam

original: aniccantiādinā nayena vipassanto. Yāvaākiñcaññāyatanaṃgantvāti yāva ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānaṃ,
analyzed: aniccaṃ ti ādinā nayena vipassantaḥ yāva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ gantvā ati yāva ākiñcaññāyatana jhānam

original: tāva samāpajjanavuṭṭhānavipassanāvasena gantvā. Āvajjanādhiṭṭhāna paccavekkhanānipettha
analyzed: samāpajjana vuṭṭhāna vipassanā vasena gantvā

original: icchitabbāniyeva. Teneva hi paṭisambhidāmagge pañcavidhā vasiyo nirodhaparikammesu
analyzed: icchitabbā aniyā iva tena iva hi paṭisambhidā magge pañcavidhāḥ vasiyaḥ nirodha parikammesu

original: vuttāti. Tatoparanti ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānagate saṅkhārevipassanānantaraṃ, adhiṭṭhātabbanti
analyzed: vuttā ti tatas uparanti ākiñcaññāyatana jhāna gate saṅkhāre vipassanā anantaram adhiṭṭhātabbanti

original: adhiṭṭheyyaṃ. Attano sarīrābandhe parikkhāre thapetvā nānābandhāni civarādīni parikkhārāni
analyzed: adhiṭṭheyyam attano sarīra ābandhe parikkhāre thapetvā nānā bandhāni civara ādīni parikkhārāni

original: aggiādinā parissayena māvinassantūtivā, ekasīmāyaṃ saṅghakamme karīyamāne saṅgho
analyzed: aggi ādinā parissayena mā avinassantu utivā eka sīmā ayam saṅgha kamme karīyamāne saṅghaḥ

original: maṃ pabhimānessati, tadā vuṭṭhahāmītivā, satthā maṃ kenacikāraṇena pakkosā pessati,
analyzed: mam tadā vuṭṭhahāmi itivā satthā mam kenacid kāraṇena pakkosā pessati

original: tadā vuṭṭhahāmītivā adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ. Ādisaddena nirodhabbhantareeva maraṇaṃ nukho
analyzed: tadā vuṭṭhahāmi iti vā adhiṭṭhāna kiccam ādi saddena maraṇam nu kho

original: me bhavissatīti evaṃ pavatto addhāna paricchedo gahito. Dvinnaṃ.La. Vocchijjaticittasantati
analyzed: me bhavissati iti evam paricchedaḥ gahitaḥ

original: tadatthāya ādito paṭṭhāya tathārūpassa payogavisesassa suṭṭhu katattā. Tatoti tasmiṃ
analyzed: tad atthāya āditaḥ paṭṭhāya tathārūpassa payoga visesassa suṭṭhu kata ttā tato ti tasmin

original: kāle. Anāgāmino anāgāmi phalacittaṃ nirāvajjanaṃpi nipparikammaṃpīti adhippāyo. Tathāhi
analyzed: kāle anāgāminaḥ anāgāmi phala cittam nirāvajjanam pi nipparikammam pi iti adhippāyaḥ tathā hi

original: ādito paṭṭhāya punappunaṃ pavattitaṃ vipassanāparikammameva tassa parikammaṭṭhāne
analyzed: āditas paṭṭhāya punappunam pavattitam vipassanā parikammam eva tassa parikammaṭṭhāne

original: tiṭṭhati. Na visuṃ āsannaparikammaṃ nāma atthīti. Paccavekkhananti phalapaccavekkhanaṃ.
analyzed: tiṭṭhati na visum āsanna parikammam nāma atthi iti paccavekkhananti phala paccavekkhanam

original: Evaṃ duvidhaṃ kammaṭṭhānanayaṃ niddisitvā idāni yadatthaṃ so niddisīyati, tadatthe
analyzed: evam duvidham kammaṭṭhāna nayam niddisitvā idāni yad attham saḥ niddisīyati tad atthe

original: sotujane niyojento bhāve tabbanti gāthamāha. Tattha paṭipajjitabbāti paṭipatti. Paṭipajjantivā
analyzed: sotu jane niyojentaḥ bhāve tabbanti gātham āha tattha paṭipajjitabbā ati paṭipatti

original: etāya uparupari visesanti paṭipatti. Sīlādidhammo. Rasīyati nirāmisasukhānubhavanavasena
analyzed: upari upari paṭipatti sīla ādi dhammo rasīyati nirāmisa sukha anubhavana vasena

original: anubhavīyatīti raso. Jhānamagga phalabhūto adhigamadhammo. Arahatta phalamevavā.
analyzed: rasaḥ phala bhūtaḥ adhigama dhammo

original: Tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppannapītisomanassamevavā. Paṭipattiyā raso paṭipatti raso. Soeva
analyzed: tat ubhayam paṭicca uppanna pīti somanassam eva vā paṭipattiyāḥ rasaḥ paṭipatti rasaḥ saḥ eva

original: assāditabbaṭṭhena assādo cāti paṭipatti rasassādo. Sāsane paṭipattirasassādaṃ patthayantena
analyzed: assāditabba ṭṭhena assādo ca ati paṭipatti rasassādo sa āsane paṭipatti rasassādam patthayantena

original: bhikkhunā iccevaṃ mayā niddiṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ bhāvanādvayaṃ bhāvetabbanti sambandho.
analyzed: bhikkhunā icca evam mayā niddiṭṭham uttamam bhāvanā dvayam bhāvetabban ti sambandho

original: Iti paramatthadīpaniyānāma abhidhammatthasaṅgahassa
analyzed: iti

original: Catutthavaṇṇanāya kammaṭṭhānasaṅgahassa
analyzed: catuttha vaṇṇanāya kammaṭṭhāna saṅgahassa

original: Paramatthadipanā niṭṭhitā.
Nigama paramatthadīpanī
172. Cārittena kulācārena sobhite ñāti mitta dhana bhogasampattiyā visāle kule udayo
analyzed: cārittena kula ācārena sobhite ñāti mitta dhana bhoga sampattiyā visāle kule udayaḥ

original: vaḍḍhi yassa soti cārittasobhitavisālakulodayo. Tena. Saddhāya abhivuḍḍhānaṃ parisuddhānañca
analyzed: yassa so ti cāritta sobhita visāla kula udayo tena saddhāya abhivuḍḍhānam parisuddhānam ca

original: attano sīlasutacāgādiguṇānaṃ udayo vaḍḍhi etasminti saddhātivuḍḍhaparisuddhaguṇodayo.
analyzed: sīla suta cāga ādi guṇānaṃ udayaḥ vaḍḍhi etasmin ti saddha ati vuḍḍha parisuddha guṇa udayo

original: Tena. Nampavhayenāti nampanāmakena upāsakena. Paṇidhāyāti bhusaṃ nidhāya hadaye thapetvā
analyzed: tena nampavhayena ati nampa nāmakena upāsakena bhusam nidhāya hadaye thapetvā

original: upādāya paṭicca. Parānukampanti paresaṃ attano mandabuddhīnaṃ pacchimajanānaṃ anukampaṃ
analyzed: upādāya paṭicca parā anukampanti paresam attanaḥ manda buddhīnam pacchima janānam anukampam

original: anudayaṃ kāruññaṃ paṇidhāyāti sambandho. Patthitanti abhiyācitaṃ. Puññena tena vipulenāti
analyzed: anudayam kāruññam paṇidhāya ati sambandho patthitam ti abhiyācitam puññena tena vipulena ati

original: tena vipulena abhidhammattha saṅgahapakaraṇassa karaṇapuññena. Tumūlasomanti evaṃ
analyzed: tena vipulena abhidhamma attha saṅgaha pakaraṇassa karaṇa puññena evam

original: nāmakaṃ vihāraṃ. Vuttañhi khuddasikkhāṭīkāyaṃsīhaḷadīpe tumūlasomavihāre saṅghassa
analyzed: nāmakam vihāram vuttam hi khudda sikkhāṭīkāyaṃsīhaḷa dīpe tumūlasomavihāre saṅghassa

original: pākavattaṃpi tāla paṇṇaṃ vikkiṇitvā karīyati. Na hi tattha paṇṇena attho atthi. Sabbepi
analyzed: pākavattam pi tāla paṇṇam vikkiṇitvā na hi tattha paṇṇena atthaḥ atthi sabbe pi

original: iṭṭhakacchannā pāsādādayoti. Eso kira vihāro ādito abhayagirirañño aggamahesibhūtāya
analyzed: pāsāda ādayaḥ ti esaḥ kira vihāraḥ āditas abhayagiri raññaḥ agga mahesi bhūtāya

original: somadeviyā kārāpitattā yāvajjatanāpi somavihārotveva paññāyittha. Tumūlasaddo pana
analyzed: somadeviyā kārāpitattā yāvajjatana api somavihāro tu eva paññāyittha tumūla saddo pana

original: vipulasaddapariyāyo.
analyzed: vipula sadda pariyāyo

original: Athettha vattati saddo, tumūlo bheravo mahā;
analyzed: athā ittha vattati saddo tumūlaḥ bheravaḥ mahā

original: Hatthināge padinnamhi, sivīnaṃ raṭṭhavaḍḍhaneti.
analyzed: hatthi nāge padinnamhi sivīnam raṭṭha vaḍḍhanā iti

original: Ādīsu
analyzed: ādīsu

original: Viya. Soca vihāro saṭṭhimattehi mahāpariveṇehi saṇṭhito hotīti ativiya vipulo mahanto
analyzed: viya so ca vihāro saṭṭhimattehi mahā pariveṇehi saṇṭhitaḥ hoti iti ativiya vipulaḥ mahantaḥ

original: vitthiṇṇo hoti. Tasmā so vipulattā mahantattā vitthiṇṇattā tumūla somoti vuccati.
analyzed: vitthiṇṇaḥ hoti tasmā saḥ vipula ttā mahanta ttā vitthiṇṇa ttā somaḥ ti vuccati

original: Taṃ tumūlasomaṃ. Atthato mahāsoma vihāranti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena thero attano ācariyavaṃsassa
analyzed: tam tumūlasomam atthataḥ mahāsoma vihāranti vuttam hoti etena theraḥ attanaḥ ācariya vaṃsassa

original: vasana vihāraṃ kitteti. Attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pana nāmarūpaparicchede kittitaṃ. Dhaññādhivāsanti
analyzed: vasana vihāram kitta iti attanaḥ vasana ṭṭhānam pana nāma rūpa paricchede kittitam

original: tasmiṃ vihāre ādikammikabhūta mahindattherādīnaṃ puññavantattherānaṃ ajjhāvuṭṭhabhūtaṃ.
analyzed: tasmin vihāre ādikammika bhūta mahinda thera ādīnam puññavanta ttherānam ajjhāvuṭṭha bhūtam

original: Dīpapasādaka mahāmahindattherassa hi vaṃse jātattā tasmiṃ vihāre ādikammikabhūto
analyzed: dīpapasādaka mahāmahinda therassa hi vaṃse jāta ttā tasmin vihāre ādikammika bhūtaḥ

original: mahātheropi mahindattheronāmāti dhātuvaṃse vutto. Uditoditanti ativiya uditaṃ. Nabhamajjhe
analyzed: mahā theraḥ api mahindattheraḥ nāmā ti dhātu vaṃse vuttaḥ uditoditam ti ativiya uditam nabha majjhe

original: puṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya sakalasīhaḷadīpe ativiya uggatanti attho. Ariyamaggapaññāvasena
analyzed: puṇṇa canda maṇḍalam viya sakala sīhaḷa dīpe ati viya uggatanti atthaḥ ariya magga paññā vasena

original: pariyattivesārajjādi paññāvasenavā avadātehi pariyodātehi guṇehi sotitāti paññāvadātaguṇasotitā.
analyzed: pariyatti vesārajja ādi avadātehi pariyodātehi guṇehi paññā avadāta guṇa soti tā

original: Te eva lajjīpāpagarahino. Maññantūti anussarantu. Puññavibhāvodaya maṅgalāyāti vipulānaṃ
analyzed: te eva lajjī pāpa garahinaḥ maññantu uti anussarantu maṅgalāya ati

original: puññānaṃ vaḍḍhisaṅkhāta maṅgalatthāya. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā, puññena tena vipulena dhaññādhivāsaṃ
analyzed: puññānam vaḍḍhi saṅkhāta maṅgala tthāya tatra ayam yojanā puññena tena vipulena dhañña adhivāsam

original: uditoditaṃ tumūlasoma vihārañca tattha nipāsino mahindattherādike paññāvadāta guṇasobhite
analyzed: udita uditam tumūlasoma vihāram ca tattha nipāsinaḥ mahindatthera ādike paññā avadāta guṇa sobhite

original: lajjibhūte bhikkhūca puññavibhavodayamaṅgalāya āyukantaṃ maññantu pacchimā janāti.
analyzed: lajji bhūte bhikkhū ca puñña vibhava udaya maṅgalāya āyukantam maññantu pacchimā janāti

original: Athavā, taṃvihāraṃ aññe paññāvadāta guṇasobhita lajjī bhikkhū maññantūti yojanā.
analyzed: athavā taṃ vihāram aññe bhikkhū maññantu iti yojanā

original: Etena thero pacchimajanānaṃ chasu anuttariyadhammesu anussatānuttariyasaṅkhātaṃ puññavisesañca
analyzed: etena thero pacchima janānam chasu anuttariya dhammesu anussata anuttariya saṅkhātam puñña visesam ca

original: mayaṃpi tādisaguṇabhāgino bhavissāmāti ussāhanupāyañca paṭipādesīti.
analyzed: mayam pi tādisa guṇa bhāginaḥ bhavissāma ati ussāhan upāyañca paṭipādesi iti

original: Paramatthadīpanī nigamakathā
Ettāvatāca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Nagare dīparaṅgamhi, gāme ti nāmake;
analyzed: nagare dīparaṅgamhi gāme ti nāmake

original: Aṭṭhasuññadvayekamhi, sāke jātena yā mayā.
analyzed: sāke jātena yā mayā

original: Muṃrvāgāme araññamhi, laṅghatīti vissutālaye;
analyzed: laṅghati iti vissuta ālaye

original: Vasatā mahato bhikkhu, gaṇassa hitakārinā.
analyzed: vasatā mahataḥ bhikkhu gaṇassa hita kārinā

original: Paramatthadīpanīnāma, saṅkhatā sāradassinā;
Sāresīnaṃ hitatthāya, sārāsāravivekinaṃ.
analyzed: sāresīnam hita tthāya sāra asāra vivekinam

original: Suniṭṭhitā ayaṃ ṭīkā, nibbhayā nirupaddavā;
analyzed: su niṭṭhitā ayam ṭīkā nibbhayā nirupaddavā

original: Navapañcadvayekamhi, sāke komudasārade.
analyzed: sāke komuda sārade

original: Tathā kalyāṇasaṅkappā, sādhūnaṃ amatapphalā;
analyzed: tathā kalyāṇa saṅkappā sādhūnam amata phalā

original: Niṭṭhaṃ gacchantu sabbepi, nibbhayā nirupaddavā.
analyzed: niṭṭham gacchantu sabbe api nibbhayāḥ nirupaddavāḥ

original: Yathā lokamhi jotanti, ubho candimasūriyā;
analyzed: yathā lokamhi jotanti ubho candima sūriyā

original: Tatheva paramatthesu, ayaṃ paramatthadīpanī.
analyzed: tathā iva parama atthesu ayam parama attha dīpanī

original: Pāḷiyattesu sā subhā, saddaniruttidīpanī;
analyzed: sā subhā sadda nirutti dīpanī

original: Ubho lokamhi jotantu, saddhammo yāva tiṭṭhatīti.
analyzed: ubho lokamhi jotantu saddhammaḥ yāva tiṭṭhati iti

original: Tattha nagare dīparaṅgamhīti dīpavāsimahājanaṃ rañjetīti dīparaṅganti laddhanāme
analyzed: tattha nagare dīparaṅgamhi iti dīpa vāsi mahājanam rañja iti iti laddha nāme

original: nagare. Gāme nāmaketi rohitamigānaṃ nivāsabhūmitale patiṭṭhitattā evaṃnāmake mahāgāme.
analyzed: nagare gāme nāmaka iti rohita migānam nivāsa bhūmi tale patiṭṭhita ttā evaṃnāmake mahā gāme

original: Sāketi kaliyuge. Yā mayāti paramatthadīpanīnāma yāṭīkā mayā saṅkhatāti sambandho.
analyzed: sākā iti kali yuge yā mayā ati paramatthadīpanī nāma yāṭīkā mayā saṅkhatā ati sambandhaḥ

original: Laṅghatīti vissutālayeti evaṃvissute araññavihāre. Sāresīnanti sāragavesīnaṃ. Sārāsāravivekinanti
analyzed: laṅghati iti vissuta ālaya iti evaṃvissute arañña vihāre sāresīnam ti sāra gavesīnam sāra asāra vivekinam

original: ayaṃ sāro ayaṃ asāroti evaṃ sārañca asārañcavive cetvā jānituṃ samatthānaṃ. Sāketi
analyzed: ayam sāraḥ ayam asāraḥ iti evam cetvā jānitum samatthānam sāka iti

original: kaliyuge. Komudasāra deti kumudapupphayutte saradautu pariyāpannepacchi makattikamāse.
analyzed: kali yuge komuda sāra deti kumuda puppha yutte makattika māse

original: Amatapphalāti nibbānapayojanā. Subhāti atthabyañjanasampattiyā sobhaṇā. Saddhammoti
analyzed: amata phalā ati nibbāna payojanā subhā ati attha byañjana sampattiyā sobhaṇā saddhammā iti

original: tividhaṃ satthusāsanaṃ vuccatīti.
analyzed: tividham satthu sāsanam vuccati iti

original: Iti abhidhammatthasaṅgahapakaraṇassa catutthasaṃvaṇṇanā
analyzed: iti abhidhamma attha saṅgaha pakaraṇassa catuttha saṃvaṇṇanā

original: Bhūtā paramatthadīpanīnāmā yaṃṭīkā
analyzed: bhūtā paramatthadīpanī nāmā yaṃṭīkā

original: Sabbākārena niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sabba ākārena niṭṭhitā
